sell.description: Новая кукла, в коробке. Не вскрывалась. Коробка целая не выгорела. Без торга

dolls.description:
Clawdeen’s is wearing a fabulous purple and green outfit to the dance. It goes perfectly with her party persona that boasts short neon green hair and purple lipstick.
The dress is purple with a scaly animal pattern as well as a variety of gold & black zippers. She accentuates the dress with a neon green ribbon belt and a black belt with gold rings. Her mesh tights are neon yellow and lead to her shiny gold heels.
Clawdeen’s accessories feature two shiny gold hoops in each ear, molded black gloves, and a neon green clutch with gold & black accents. Also included with the doll is an iCoffin phone, dance invitation, doll stand, and party photos.

Cleo has her hair cut short and peppered with shiny tinsel streaks for the dance. It goes well with her stunning green, yellow, and copper ensemble.
The form-fitting shoulderless dress is a shiny green and yellow. It has a left sleeve that wraps around her hand and a teal wrap around the shoulders. Under the dress is copper bandage tights that only cover her right leg. Her shoes are a shiny green with bronze gems dangling from the heels.
She accessorizes the outfit with a bronze scarab necklace, bronze armband, bronze earrings, and a shiny copper pyramid purse. Also included with Cleo is an iCoffin phone, teal brush, doll stand, dance invitation, and party photos.

Frankie’s party attire features am electrifying black, white, and pink outfit. She highlights the wardrobe by having her long black & white hair pulled back into a pony tail.
Her short black & white zigzag dress features a shiny blue sash held with a pair of white belts. Worn over the dress is a small pink jacket with short puffy sleeves and under the dress is pink fishnet tights. Each of Frankie’s shoes are unique with one being black with a gray sole and the other gray with a black sole.
Accessories for her outfit include blue lightning bolt earrings, a black & white pearl bracelet, a black necklace with silver pendant, and a stitched pink and blue purse with a black & white zigzag flap. Also included with the doll is her iCoffin phone, a pink brush, doll stand, invitation, and party photos.

Clawdeen is ready to have a blast at the beach. Her long purple streaked hair looks amazing with her one piece swimsuit with side cutouts and boyshort legs. It is a leopard print with a rainbow of colors, black seams, and a purple belt with white buckle. Over the suit is a pink & black pencil stripe mini-top and on her feet are pink sandals with gold chain straps.
She accessorizes the outfit with a pair of gold sunglasses as well as two triangle earrings in each ear. The earring are different colors that include pink, blue, purple, and green. Also packaged with the doll is a pink & green frisbee, a black brush, and a postcard of Clawdeen at the beach.

Cleo looks magnificent even when going to the beach. Her black hair is pulled into a ponytail and is embellished with gold tinsel highlights. Her eyeshadow is turquoise and so is her lipstick.
 She is wearing a stunning monokini made of a black & gold wrappings. Over the suit is a turquoise sarong and on her feet are turquoise sandals.
She accessorizes the outfit with sea green sunglasses, gold pyramid hoop earrings, a black & gold arm wrap, a black & gold leg wrap, and a gold & turquoise fan. Also included with the doll is a black brush and a postcard of Cleo sunning at the beach.

Draculauara looks beautiful with her long black hair and pink highlights. Her one piece bathing suit is black with pink heart stripes on top and yellow with pink polka dots on the bottom. It has yellow polka dot straps, white frills, and a pink bow. 
Around her waist is a yellow and pink polka dot sarong that is held with a pink and yellow polka dot bow. On her feet are black sandals with pink and yellow straps.
Accessories for the outfit feature pink bow-shaped sunglasses and yellow bow earrings. Also included with the doll is a black brush, a postcard of Draculaura at the beach, and a bottle of SPF 500 sunscreen to use on her sensitive skin.

Frankie is looking delightful with her eye-catching black & white hair and aqua blue eyeshadow and lipstick. Her one piece bathing suit is half yellow & aqua blue stripes and half black with a yellow & pink outlined lightning bolt.
Around her waist is a black & blue checkers sarong with yellow stripes. Her sandals are black with yellow straps and blue buckles.
Accessories for her outfit feature blue sunglasses, gray stud earrings, and a blue lightning bolt barrette. She also has a black beach bag with jagged yellow at the base and blue and pink jumper cables for handles. Also packaged with the doll is a black brush and a postcard of Frankie at the beach.

Jackson is ready to have some fun at the beach while still looking cool. He is wearing a yellow & white diagonal striped shirt with its sleeves cut off. It boasts black & white striped pockets, shoulders, and collar as well as black buttons. His swim shorts have one black leg and one leg checkered with white squares and squares with a variety of black, green & yellow patterns.
His flip-flops are black with yellow straps and white skulls. He also has orange shutter shades, a black & white beach ball, a black doll stand, and a postcard of Jackson at the beach.

The black coffin features pink hand rails, pink & black filigree, black skullettes, and a pink tufted double lid. The lid can be opened by the hinge to access the jewelry compartment or can be raised vertically to form a four-poster bed. 
The jewelry compartment has been divided into pink segments where valuables can be stores. The interior of the lid has black filigree, pink tufting,  and a white hand rail with hearts.
The sleeping compartment is formed with four retractable posts and is lined with pink tufting. The bed has a pink bow-shaped pillow with white frills, white curtains with pink hearts, and a blanket that is pink with a black trellis design as well as a white edge with pink hearts. The coffin also has a pop down TV and a white heart-shaped tray that attaches to the side.
Accessories for the playset include a pink & blue heart-shaped pitcher, a pink heart-shaped cup & saucer, and a journal with a white pen. Also included is a life-size heart ring with pink bat wings.

The Mirror Bed is actually a rotatable laboratory table. The table is silver with two pink & blue striped lightning bolts, a pair of black neck bolt clamps, a pair of clamps in the middle, and another pair at the foot. The black & blue headboard has two pink & purple plasma balls and a storage compartment with clear doors. The black & blue footboard has a retractable TV.
The bed is held by two blue legs that attach to a black base. There is a pink & silver crank which allows the bed to be rotated. On the underside of the table bed is a real mirror. When turned to a vertical position Frankie Stein can use it as a full-length mirror.
With the bed is a pillow and blanket. The pillow is white with a diagonal blue stitched line pattern and pink frills on the sides. The blanket has two designs. The first is blue checkered with black lightning bolts and pink squares with various images. The second part is white and matches the pillow with the diagonal blue stitched line pattern.
Accessories for the playset include a silver staple gun, silver scissors, silver need & thread, a blue drink box with silver straw, and a journal with a blue pen. Also included is a life-size blue comb with pink lightning bolts.

This wonderful black and pink soccer uniform will look amazing on Clawdeen. It features a sleeveless black top with the Monster High logo and a pink v-neck. The shorts are also black with “00” on one leg, pink & white on the hem, and a white waistband with purple drawstring.
The shoes are white open-toe cleats with pink soles and laces and come with purple knee high socks. Accessories for the outfit are pink & white earrings, a pink headband, and a black armband with a purple zigzag. Also included is a pink & black soccer ball and a trading card of Clawdeen in her uniform.

Deuce will look awesome on the court when he wears this casketball uniform. It features a sleeveless black jersey with a pink v-neck, “Monster High” and “13” on the front, and pink & white on the hem. The shorts are also black with pink & white on the hem. The white socks have a pink line and black diamond-shaped scales at the top.
The shoes are black, green & white high tops with green laces and light green scales on the sides. Also included are green sport sunglasses, a black & pink basketball, and a trading card of Deuce in his uniform.

Get ready to scream when Frankie puts on this fabulous fearleading uniform. The one piece black uniform sports a pink v-neck, the Monster High logo, blue stitches on the midsection, and a pink & white line around the waist and on the hem of the skirt.
The shoes are white with pink & black accents, black laces, and lightning bolt heels. Accessories for the outfit are blue skullette earrings and a blue armband with a yellow zigzag. Also included is a black megaphone with white & pink on the edge of the skullette shaped cone and a trading card of Frankie in her uniform.

Lagoona will look absolutely divine in her swim team uniform. The outfit features a low-cut black one piece suit with a collar. It has the Monster High logo, pink along the edges, and pink & white lines around the leg holes. Under the suit is a turquoise scaled bikini top with pink straps.
Accessories for the outfit are white skullette earrings and a turquoise armband with a pink zigzag. The shoes are white platform sandals with turquoise straps. 
Also included is a pink & black boogie board with turquoise bubbles, “Monster High” down the center, and a missing bite in the corner.  The outfit comes with a trading card of Lagoona wearing her suit.

Frankie is a grayscale variant of the standard doll in the Basic series. Her outfit is the same except that everything is in shades of gray. She was an exclusive of the 2010 San Diego Comic-Con International and is limited to only 5000 pieces.
Frankie is wearing a plaid dress with black fishnet sleeves and fishnet hem. She has a polka dot tie with a skullette clip and around her waist is a silver studded belt with lightning bolt buckle.
Her shoes are black & white striped heels and the purse has silver studs and skullettes on the sides. Other accessories include black & silver bracelets and silver skullette dangle earrings. Also included with the doll is a gray Watzit, her dog-like pet, a silver brush, silver doll stand, and her diary.

Clawdeen boasts long brown hair with highlights, curls, and her wolf-like ears poking through. She is wearing a fearsome purple, black & peach ensemble that features a jacket, skirt, and boots.
The black jacket has purple cuffs and hem as well as a purple fur collar. It is worn over a peach and black tiger striped top. Her short skirt is purple with black stitching and black tulle at the hem. She has long open-toe peach socks to go with her knee-high black and purple-strapped sandal boots.
She accessorizes the outfit with a black belt with gold studs, a gold necklace, and two hoop earrings in each ear. Her purse is black with purple straps and gold buckles, zippers, and studs. Also included with the doll is an orange brush, orange doll stand, her diary, and Crescent, Clawdeen’s cat.

Cleo looks stunning in her mummy themed ensemble. She has a turquoise & black top that is part sparkly and part sheer. Under the top is a sand-colored jumpsuit with the appearance of wrapped linen bandages. Her shoes are black wedges with sand-colored wrappings and one forearm is covered with bandages.
She accessorizes the outfit with gold earrings, bracelet, armband, belt, headband, and a golden cell phone strapped to her thigh. Her purse is also gold with black accents.
Deuce is wearing a gray & white striped vest over a red sleeveless tee with a skull and cassette graphic. He has black pants with diamond scale patterns and black & white checkered slip-on shoes.
Accessories include a black fingerless glove, a black wristband with gray skull, a gray chain necklace, and a gray-studded white belt with a red cassette tape buckle. He completes the outfit with a pair of red sunglasses.
Also included with the dolls is a gold brush, two doll stands, their diaries, and their pets. Hissette is Cleo’s cobra and Perseus is Deuce’s two-tailed rat.

Draculaura has black hair with pink highlights that is tied into long pigtails. She is wearing an adorable black, white, and pink outfit that includes a vest, skirt, and boots. 
The pink vest has gray buttons, white stitching, a white lace jabot, and black fishnet sleeves with white lace cuffs. She has black fishnet tights under her short white skirt that features pink stitching and white tulle at the bottom. The knee high boots are pink with black laces and gray hearts at the top.
The outfit is accessorized with gray safety pin earrings, a pink flower necklace, and a parasol. The parasol is adorned with a skull tip, a black bat-shaped handle, and a black canopy held closed with a pink strap and heart-shaped buckle. Also included with the doll is Draculaura’s pet bat, Count Fabulous, a pink brush, pink doll stand, and her diary.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked white and black and is wearing a plaid outfit with electrifying accessories. The dress is black & blue plaid with red and white lines, has a white collar, short black fishnet sleeves, and black fishnet on the hem. She intensifies the dress with a black & white polka dot tie with skullette pin and a silver-studded black belt with lightning bolt buckle.
Frankie’s purse is black & red with silver clasps, studs, and skullette. She completes the outfit with black & white striped shoes, blue skullette earrings, and blue and silver bracelets. Also included with the doll is Watzit, her dog-like pet, a gray brush, gray doll stand, and her diary.

Ghoulia is wearing a black & red ensemble that looks amazing with her light blue hair. She is wearing a red & white tank top with a cherry pattern over a black, red & white shoulderless 3/4 sleeve shirt with black fishnet gloves. Her pants are red with small black polka dots and her knee-high boots are black & white with red heels and laces.
She accessorizes the outfit with a black & white piano key belt, a silver necklace with pink pendant, pink zipper earrings, a green headband, and white cat-eye glasses. Her cassette tape purse is black, red, and white with “Monster Mix” in blue. Also included with Ghoulia is her pet owl, Sir Hoots A Lot, her diary, a brush, and a doll stand.
There are two different styles of packaging for Ghoulia. The initial release has a box with a coffin shaped window. The later release has a wraparound window box. Both packages have the same model number.

Holt is wearing a fire-themed outfit to go with his fiery hair and blue skin. He is wearing a half black & half white sleeveless shirt under a red pleather jacket with gold stitching and trim. His pinstripe pants are purple & black with yellow & orange flames at the bottom. The black high-top sneakers have yellow laces, yellow soles, and skulls on the toes.
Accessories for his outfit include a yellow belt, black & orange headphones, orange shutter shades, and an orange turntable backpack with a black & white checkerboard flap. Also included with Holt is Crossfade, his pet chameleon, his diary, and a doll stand. 
There are two different styles of packaging for Holt. The initial release has a box with a coffin shaped window. The later release has a wraparound window box. Both packages have the same model number.

Lagoona’s aquatic themed outfit looks amazing with her long blonde locks and pale blue skin. She is wearing a pink scaled bathing suit with blue fishnet tights. Over the suit is a teal scaled hoodie with black sleeves, black hem, and teal cuffs. Her shorts are black & teal with pink and teal stitching.
Accessories for the outfit include black & white striped flip-flops, a gold seahorse pendant, a golden pearl bracelet, gold earrings, and a pink flower barrette. Her purse is a blue fishbowl with a gold handle that holds Neptuna, Lagoona’s pet piranha. Also included with the doll is a white brush, a doll stand, and her diary.

Count Fabulous is Draculaura’s pet bat. He is black with yellow eyes, a furrowed brow, and tiny fangs. His small wings are outstretched and he wears a white top with pink hearts and pink trim. On his head is a translucent pink bow. When his bow is pressed pink skeletal flashes occur for several seconds.

Neptuna is the pet piranha of Lagoona Blue. She is translucent pink, has turquoise eyes with big black pupils, and sporadic pointy teeth protrude from her smile. When her dorsal fin is pressed she emits a blinking purplish light that lasts for several seconds.

Watzit is the dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. He is a translucent coppery brown and stitched together with patches of darker brown. One eye is green and the other is blue and he wears a studded black collar. He has small silvery wings on his back and silver spikes on his head. When the top spike is pressed he flashes green for several seconds.

This 2-pack includes Crescent and Hissette. Monster Cross figures have mix-and-match pieces and glow-in-the-dark skeletal insides.
Crescent
Crescent is a purple cat and Clawdeen Wolf’s pet. He has yellow eyes with green irises, a fanged mouth, and black lined features. His interior is orange.
Hissette
Hissette is the pet cobra of Cleo de Nile. He is turquoise with teal outlined scales, purple eyes, and a pink tongue poking out of his mouth. He wears a golden crown and gold chains around his neck. His interior is turquoise.

This 2-pack includes Watzit and Count Fabulous. Monster Cross figures have mix-and-match pieces and glow-in-the-dark skeletal insides.
Watzit
Watzit is the dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. He is tan with stitched brown patches, one blue and one green eye, a fanged mouth, studded collar, and black lined features. His interior is blue.
Count Fabulous
Count Fabulous is a bat and Draculaura’s pet. He is black with yellow eyes and a fanged mouth. He has a pink bow on his head and wears a white shirt with pink hearts and a pink scalloped collar. His interior is pink.

Clawdeen Wolf
The Clawdeen rag doll is light brown with brown yarn hair with strands of brick red highlights. She has two yellow earrings in each ear, yellow button eyes with the left eye surrounded by a purple saw blade outline, and a stitched mouth with white fangs.
Her peach top with black tiger print is under a black jacket with a furry white collar and purple trim. The shimmery purple skirt is complemented by a black belt with gold dots. On her feet are black peep-toe boots with buckled purple straps.
Crescent
Crescent is a purple cat and Clawdeen’s pet. The plush figure has lavender features, green button eyes, and a stitched mouth with white fangs.

Cleo de Nile
The Cleo rag doll is light beige with black and yellow yarn hair adorned with a yellow and turquoise headband. She has gold earrings, a dashed mouth, turquoise button eyes with the left surrounded by purple, and a turquoise gem on her cheek.
Her outfit is a sandy yellow jumper with a mummy bandage print under a blue crisscross with a sheer blue wrap. Matching the jumper is an arm wrap and black shoes with gold dots. Her left arm has a gold arm band and a gold bracelet.
Hissette
Hissette is Cleo’s cobra pet. The plush figure is turquoise with teal stripes on his body. He has a dashed mouth with a split tongue and purple button eyes with shiny gold surrounding the left one. A yellow crown is on his head and a golden pendant decorates his neck.

Deuce Gorgon
The Deuce rag doll is a light almond color with yellow yarn hair on the sides, light green yarn on top, and a green yarn mohawk. He has red and black sunglasses, a silver earring in his left ear, a dashed mouth, and green button eyes. The left eye is outlined by a dark green diamond.
He is wearing a red shirt with a skull and cassette graphic. Over it is a gray vest with shiny silver stripes and white trim. A white belt with a cassette buckle and silvery chains hold his black pants with white scale designs.
Accessories consist of a black glove and a black skull bracelet. On his feet are black and white checkered shoes.
Perseus
Perseus is Deuce’s pet rat. The plush figure is dark gray with a tiny orange mohawk, an orange belly, and two tails. He has a dashed red mouth with one fang and brown button eyes. The left eye is inside a yellow diamond.

Draculaura
The Draculaura rag doll is light pink with pink and black yarn hair worn in pigtails. She has silver earrings, a dashed smile with fangs, and lavender button eyes. The left eye is outlined with jagged magenta.
Her signature outfit has a shimmery pink vest with a white peplum and sheer black sleeves that have white cuffs. The pleated skirt is white with a black mesh under layer. Her shoes are black with straps, laces, and silver hearts.
Count Fabulous
Count Fabulous is Draculaura’s pet bat. The plush figure is black with a pink bow on the top of his head. He has reddish stitches on one ear and one wing, a dashed mouth with fangs, and yellow button eyes. The left eye is surrounded by a purple flower outline.

Frankie Stein
The Frankie rag doll is pale green with black, white, and gray yarn hair. She has silver screw earrings, a dashed mouth, a blue button eye, and a green button eye outlined in yellow with silver stitches. Silver stitches also decorate her arms, legs, and cheek.
She is wearing a black and blue plaid dress with white shoulders, sheer black sleeves, and a black mesh hem. Accessories include a black and white polka dot tie with Skullette and a studded belt with shimmery chains. On her feet are black and white striped shoes.
Watzit
Watzit is the dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. The plush figure is tan with one brown ear, a brown leg, and a stitched brown patch on his face. Silver-gray spikes top his head and silver-gray wings are on his back.
He has one green and one blue button eye, a stitched mouth with fangs, and black stitches on his body. Around his neck is a studded black collar.

Lagoona Blue
The Lagoona rag doll is light blue with light yellow and blue yarn hair accented by a pink flower. She has shiny gold earrings, a dashed smile, freckles, and green button eyes. The left eye has a pink flower outline.
She is wearing a pink fish scale top under a shiny turquoise fish scale jacket with black sleeves and turquoise trim. Her shorts are black with turquoise trim and blue fishnet leggings. On her feet are black and white striped sandals.
Neptuna
Neptuna is the pet piranha of Lagoona. The plush figure is light and dark pink with black stitches. She has a dashed pink smile with fangs and green button eyes. The left eye has a yellow flower outline.

Frankie is all dressed up and ready to learn how to cook and sew. She is wearing a mismatched blue & white striped top with red stitched edges and black & white crisscrossed tights. Her half & half apron has a blue ruffled hem and is half red with white circles and half white with black skulls.
Frankie comes with an extra dress that has black on top with a silver collar. The bottom half boasts a black & white pattern with blue lines. The dress is completed with a red and blue wide belt.
Accessories for the outfits include gray dangle earrings with scissors, a blue bracelet with black stitches, and a black & white skullette bracelet. Her high-heeled shoes are white with silver toes, red straps, and black heels.  
Also included with the doll is Frankie’s Home Ick book, a blue pen, a needle & spool of blue thread, a Watzit toy, stickers, a pink coffin-shaped locker with a skullette lock, a Home Ick survival guide, and a brush.

Ghoulia is wearing her gym clothes and is ready for some fun and exercise. Her white shirt has black sleeves, red trim, and features Monster High – Phys Dead – on the front. The shorts are black with a white waistband, black drawstring, and a pink hem. One leg has a skullette and the other has a pink & white zigzag. Under the shorts are a pair of red half tights.
The second outfit is a multicolored dress with red straps. It begins with black trim, red & white horizontal stripes on top, and black with white polka dots in the middle. The dress has a red stripe down the front and a red hem with white vertical stripes.
Her accessories are red stud earrings, a red & white bracelet, black cat-eye sports goggles with a red strap, and a pair of white glasses. Her red  & black sneakers have white tops, red laces, and black & white zigzags on the sides.
Included with the doll is Ghoulia’s Physical Deaducation book, a red pen, a red bottle, a black ball, stickers, a pink coffin-shaped locker with a skullette lock, a Physical Deaducation survival guide, and a brush.

Lagoona is on her way to class, ready to learn, and looks all scientific in her white lab coat. Under the coat she has a teal dress with black straps and a pattern of white bubbles and black anchors.
She also has a shirt and pants as a backup outfit. The top features a pattern of pink, white, and teal whorls. The pants are teal with a black waistband, pockets, and cuffs.
Her accessories are a pink necklace, pink bracelet, and yellow dangle earrings with black anchors. The shoes are black & teal with yellow straps that wind up her legs.
Also included with the doll is Lagoona’s Mad Science book, a blue pen, a three-eyed frog, a jar, an egg, stickers, a pink coffin-shaped locker with a skullette lock, a Mad Science survival guide, and a brush.

This reissue of Cleo is just like the previous doll. She is wearing the same amazing green & yellow dress, copper tights, and shiny green heels. She even has her fabulous bronze jewelry, copper pyramid purse, iCoffin phone, and teal brush.
The packaging for this release differs from the first and features a wraparound window box. It also includes a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD that was not found with the original doll.

Deuce is looking fantastic with his shiny silver themed wardrobe and gloriously green snake hawk swept to the side. He is wearing a black, white, and silver argyle vest with purple hood, buttons, and zippered pockets. Under the vest is a green shirt with green squares and a black tie.
His pants are shiny silver & gray pinstripes held by a black belt with gold buckle and white straps. His shoes are white-scale slip-ons with gray soles.
Accessories for the outfit are a black bracelet, gold-rimmed sunglasses, iCoffin phone, and a black rose. Deuce also comes with a doll stand and a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD.

Ghoulia is wearing an adorable outfit that goes wonderfully with her beautiful blue wavy hair. Her v-neck dress features white on top that flows into a sparkly pink skirt with a shredded hem. At the waist is a black & white belt with skullette buckle. Her white lace tights then flow into shiny red, black and silver open-toe shoes with bone-like heels. 
Accessories include earrings with red and white skulls, a yellow bracelet, a white choker, and red cat-eye glasses. Her evening bag is red with black accents and strap as well as three bone-like stripes on the flap. Ghoulia also comes with a yellow brush, doll stand, and a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD.

Lagoona’s long blonde & aqua blue hair is styled into a fin-like mohawk. She is decked out in an alluring pink and blue ensemble.
The aqua blue dress is sleeveless and form-fitting with sheer pink ruffles at the top and a flowing pink sheer hem. Around her hips is a sand colored lace wrap held with a gold seashell clasp. Her heels are a translucent pink and blue that is utterly breathtaking.
Accessories include a gold seaweed spiral band, pearl earrings, and a pearl necklace. Her pink seashell purse has blue stitching and a pearl strap. Lagoona also comes with her iCoffin phone, a yellow brush, doll stand, and a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD.

Cleo is wearing a turquoise pajama set decorated with a bandage pattern and yellow & green highlights. The outfit has one arm warmer, a top with yellow stitching along the edges, and pants with a yellow waistband and drawstring.
Cleo’s striped yellow & turquoise sleep mask has the Eye of Horus, a powerful Egyptian symbol of protection, over each eye patch. Her fuzzy turquoise monster slippers each have a gold crown, yellow eyes, and a mouth with a pink tongue. Also included with the doll is a gold choker, gold pyramid nightlight, turquoise brush, doll stand, and a Cleo de Nile card.

Draculaura is ready for a sleepover with her upright pigtails and pink & white PJs. Her top is pink with puffy white polka dot shoulders, a white lace jabot with black bow, and white mesh frills on the sleeves and the hem. The pink & white polka dot pants are knee length with a pink waistband and white mesh frills on the hems of the legs.
She accessorizes the outfit with a pink & white polka dot sleep mask and pink slippers. The slippers have fuzzy monster faces with eyes, fangs, and black bat wings.
Entertainment for the night is a DVD of “Scary Human Movies Vol. 1” packaged in a coffin-shaped case with a gray disc. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Dead Tired Draculaura card with her checklist on the back.

Frankie looks as cute as ever with her hair in a ponytail and wearing PJs. The outfit has a white tank top with blue trim and a blue lightning bolt on the front. The black & white striped pants have a blue lightning bolt pattern, a plaid waistband with blue drawstring, and plaid cuffs.
Frankie has a black & white striped sleep mask with blue trim. Her fuzzy monster slippers are blue with yellow eyes and silver neck bolts. She brings to the slumber party a iCoffin MP3 player with speaker dock. Also included with the doll is a blue brush, doll stand, and a Dead Tired Frankie Stein card.

For the sleepover, Ghoulia has her hair in a ponytail and is wearing a cute red & pink outfit. Her top is white with red spatter, two vertical black stripes in the front, and a pink bow by the neck. The pants are also white with red spatter and have red, black & white striped cuffs. Over the pants is a black miniskirt with a red, black & white striped waistband.
Ghoulia’s sleep mask has has the same red spatter as her pajamas. Her slippers are red fuzzy monsters with yellow eyes and black cat-eye glasses. Her treat for the night is a delicious box of red popcorn-like “Brain Puffs”. Also included with the doll is a red brush, doll stand, and a Ghoulia Yelps card.

This playset features Lagoona Blue wearing cute aquatic-themed PJs. It also has her Hydration Station where she rests and rehydrates.
Logoona has on a white tank top with blue stitched edges and a pattern of blue waves and pink flowers. Her pants are blue with a blue & white wave pattern, white stitching, and a white waistband with drawstring.
Lagoona’s sleep mask is white with a blue wave pattern and blue edges. Her pink fuzzy monster slippers each have yellow eyes, a mouth, and fins.
The Hydration Station is a tube with a transparent front, blue back door, and a black base with a blue seashell. The black top has a gray skullette, a blue scale roof, and a gray hand crank. The inside of the door has three bubble shelves to hold Lagoona’s essentials.
The station lights up with three different modes: flashing lights, extended flashing lights, and lights always on. When filled with water it can also creates streams of rising bubbles.
The playset includes Neptuna, Lagoona’s pet piranha, and many other items. There’s a blue bottle of H2O, a bottle of moisturizer, a journal & pen, a seashell compact, a doll stand, a brush, and a funnel.

dolls.character: Cleo de Nile, Draculaura & Ghoulia Yelps
dolls.description:
This Toys”R”Us exclusive has Cleo de Nile and Draculaura as fearleaders with Ghoulia Yelps cheering them on. Both Cleo and Draculaura are wearing a black one-piece cheerleading outfit with a pink v-neck, the Monster High logo featured on the front, and a pink & white line around the waist and on the hem of the skirt. Their shoes are white with pink & black accents, black laces, and lightning bolt heels. 
Cleo also wears a leg warmer, an arm warmer, a choker, and shorts made of mummy-like wrappings. She accessorizes with a pair of gold skullette earrings. She comes with a black megaphone with white & pink on the edge of the skullette shaped cone. Also included is a black duffel bag with white handles, a pink strap, and the Monster High logo.
Draculaura’s cheerleading outfit additionally has sheer white sleeves with pink cuffs. She completes her outfit with pink fishnet tights and pink skullette earrings. Also included is a pair of black, white, and pink pompoms.
Ghoulia is wearing a black zippered hoodie with a pink hood, pink pockets, white cuffs, and white hem. Under the hoodie is a red & black top with a brain wrinkle pattern and red straps. The shorts are black with red pockets and hem and are held with a silver & red holed belt with a Monster High buckle. Her knee-high socks are black with pink and white stripes at the top and her red sneakers each have black laces, white soles & toes, and black lightning-themed heels. 
Accessories for Ghoulia’s outfit feature a black & gold bracelet, pink glasses, and white skullette earrings. She supports the school with a pink, black, & white Monster High pennant and a black, pink, & white Monster High foam finger.
A black brush is also included with the 3-pack of dolls.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Ghoulia Yelps, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura & Frankie Stein
dolls.description:
This Target exclusive features Ghoulia Yelps who is only available in this 5-pack. She is wearing a one piece swimsuit with boyshort legs and red neck straps. The suit is black as well as red with white dots and blue skulls. Around the waist is an aqua blue belt with a white zigzag. Over the suit she has a red mesh jacket with black around the edges.
Ghoulia accessorizes the outfit with red sunglasses, white crossbones earrings, and a translucent red purse with white handles. Her shoes are red heels with black straps over the toes.
The other dolls are Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura, and Frankie Stein who were all previously released individually. They are wearing the same outfits as the originals and also include a black brush and a postcard of everyone on the beach.

Draculaura is wearing an adorable ensemble that boasts a multi-layered top, skirt, and tights. The v-neck shirt is primarily black with pink hearts, pink trim, and a white line with pink ruffles on the front. The sleeves and turtleneck are made of white fishnet. The skirt is double-layered with a light pink and a dark pink layer; both layers feature black mesh ruffles. Her tights are a combination of white fishnet and thigh high black stockings. Pink shoes with hearts on the heels and ankle strap bows complete the outfit.
She accessorizes with pink dangle skullette earrings. A doll stand, brush, and a keychain of her pet, Count Fabulous, are included with the doll.

Frankie has her hair in a ponytail and is wearing a casual outfit that features an extra-long light blue top with a red & white crisscross pattern. Over the shirt is a small silver vest with red stitching and a red lightning bolt. Under the shirt she has black tights with a crisscross pattern of silver stitches. Her shoes are black sneakers with silver laces and soles.
Frankie accessorizes with black lightning bolt earrings. A doll stand, brush, and a keychain of her pet, Watzit, are included with the doll.

Cleo’s gold vanity is beautiful and intricate with turquoise and black accents. Its legs are snakes in the back and feature the goddess Bastet in the front. Behind the oval mirror are gold snakes, translucent turquoise designs, black & gold flowers, and black & gold scarab wings. Above the mirror hangs a translucent turquoise chandelier. The front of the vanity has a drawer with black symbols.
The vanity’s gold chair has black legs with gold snakes wrapped around the front legs that form arm rests. The black seat has a gold pattern in the front and a tufted turquoise cushion. The back features a turquoise mummy skullette as well as gold snakes, gold & turquoise flowers, and gold scarab wings.
A variety of accessories are included with the playset, many of which can be stored in the drawer of the vanity. It has a jewelry box, perfume bottles, earrings, necklace, ring, make-up & case, and a sphinx iCoffin dock.

This awesome fashion pack features amazing outfits designed for Draculaura and Frankie Stein. It also has some extra items that are perfect for Clawdeen Wolf.
The first ensemble has a multi-layered black top with pink hearts, pink trim, and a white strip with pink ruffles on the front. The turtleneck and sleeves are made of white fishnet. The double-layered skirt has a light pink layer and a dark pink layer; both layers have black mesh frills. Under the skirt are tights that are a combination of white fishnet and black thigh high stockings with pink bows. The shoes are pink with bow ankle straps and silver heels with hearts.
Accessories for the outfit are a pink barrette and white skullette dangle earrings with pink bows. The pink heart-shaped purse has dark pink bows and a black strap. Also included is a pink cup with pink straws and a pink & white M&H shopping bag.
The second outfit sports an extra-long light blue top with a red & white crisscross pattern. To go with the shirt is a small silver vest with red stitching and a red lightning bolt. The pants are a pattern of black, red, and blue diamonds with a crisscross of silver stitches. The black & blue sneakers each boast silver laces and soles, red lightning bolts, and red bolts on the heels.
Accessories are a silver belt with a red nut-shaped buckle, black dangle earrings with silver lightning bolts, a black necklace with a blue nut pendant, a pink bracelet, and a blue lightning bolt ring. The square black purse has a silver handle and features a blue stripe with a silver a silver lightning bolt. Also included is a blue & black XIII shopping bag.
The extra items in the fashion pack include a wide gold & purple belt, a black necklace with gold claw pendant, and a purple & gold ring glove. There is also a purple & blue leopard print purse with gold accents.

This Ghoulia doll is an exclusive from the 2011 San Diego Comic-Con. Much like other attendees of the event, Ghoulia is dressed up as her favorite comic book hero.
Her outfit features a sparkly black jumpsuit with “DF” in a silver circle on the chest. The suit has a red collar, big red cuffs on the sleeves, and a red zigzag around the waist. The white & red zigzag belt has a buckle with “DF” in black. Each of the knee-high red boots have a white line down the front, white at the top, and horizontal black stripes at the top and heel.
Accessories for the outfit include red stud earrings, white glasses, and a red & black eye mask. Ghoulia comes with a red & white lanyard for the event, a Dead Fast tote bag, and a Dead Fast action figure. A red doll stand and a red brush are also included with the doll.

This playset includes Clawdeen with purple PJs and her purple & gold bunk bed. Clawdeen’s hair is long, straight and highlighted purple. Her top is white with purple leopard print sleeves, purple scratches on the front, and a ripped waist. The black pants have purple leopard print pockets, a purple hem, and a purple waistband. Her sleep mask is white with purple tiger stripes and her purple fuzzy monster slippers each have yellow eyes, gold ears, and a fanged mouth.
The bunk bed has a gold frame with ornate posts that each have a skull on the top. The back of the bottom bunk features a gold skullette in the frame and strings of hanging translucent purple beads. The bottom bunk also has black swing-out mirror on one post and a sheer black curtain held with a purple bow.
The deep dish purple beds have gold along the edges and the bottom bed also has gold feet. The beds have black tufted mattresses held with purple buttons and each comes with a black & gold leopard print blanket.
There are a variety of accessories for the playset. It has a hair straightener, razor, black brush, and make-up kit. There is also a coffin-shaped mini fridge, a can of Full Moon Energy, and a black & white skullette pillow with pink bow.

Everyone will know Ghoulia is a mega-fan when she wears this super cute outfit. It features a black tee with green stitched edges and an image of Dead Fast, her favorite superhero, on the front. The white skirt has red stitching on top, red & black brain wrinkles on the bottom, and black mesh frills on the hem. The sneakers each have black laces, a green tongue, red on the sides, and a black sole and toe.
Accessories for the outfit are green cat-eye glasses, a red hair band, a black choker, and four black bracelets. Also included is a Dead Fast comic book, a Dead Fast action figure still in the package, and a School Clubs card of Ghoulia Yelps.

Clawdeen will look ferociously spectacular in this fearsome ensemble. The outfit features a gold & black tiger striped top with black cuffs and collar. The front of the shirt is purple with two purple straps held by gold buckles. Below the top is a black skirt with a gold zipper design.
The outfit is accessorized by a gold pendant and black peep-toe pumps with gold stitching. Also included is a purple & black tiger striped notebook with yellow highlights and black skull, a blue briefcase with a gold tear in the middle, and a School Clubs card of Clawdeen Wolf.

Draculaura will be ready to report on the most terrorific stories when she’s wearing this newsworthy outfit. It features a pink & black pinstripe collared shirt with a white strip in the front and a pink bow tie. The burgundy shorts have black stitching and are held up with black suspenders. Under the shorts are white tights with pink newspaper print headlining “Monster High”, Scary Cute”, and “Creepy Cool”.
The outfit is completed by black & burgundy lace-up ankle boots and a pink fedora with a black strap. Also included is a pink & black camera with heart-shaped flash, a roll of film, and a School Clubs card of Draculaura.

This ultra-cool outfit will look amazing on Abbey as she rides the moguls. The outfit features a white long sleeve turtleneck sweater under a blue fur vest. The black compression tights have a blue hem, blue waistband, and purple striped padding on the sides. The boots are pink and blue with blue laces and black soles.
Accessories for the outfit are a translucent blue ice crystal necklace and blue snow goggles with purple lenses and a black strap. Also included is a transparent pink, blue & purple snowboard and a School Clubs card of Abbey Bominable.

Abbey outfit features a dress with white fur around the collar, white trim, and a mosaic pattern that is black, white, pink, and light blue. Under the dress is a pair of sheer pink tights. Her arms and legs have white fur warmers, on her head is a white fur headband, and she is wearing white hiking boots.
Accessories for the outfit include a pink snowflake earring, a blue icicle earring, a blue crystal necklace, and a bluish gray pouch with a white skullette key & chain. Also included with the doll is Shiver, her pet wooly mammoth, a light blue brush, light blue doll stand, and Abbey’s diary.

Cleo is wearing a purple off-the-shoulder tiger print sweater with a pattern of gold leopard spots, teal straps, and thick yellow trim. Around her waist she has a wide teal belt with a double row of gold grommets. Her purple pants lead into black & purple knee high boots that are covered with gold zippers and feature gold fangs for heels.
Accessories for the outfit include a black & gold zipper choker, two gold hoop earrings in one ear, two gold hoop earrings connected by a chain in the other ear, and a black multi-finger ring with gold spikes. Her black oval purse has a black & gold shoulder strap and a flap covered with purple straps and gold buckles.
Also included with the doll is a purple & teal binder, a purple brush, purple doll stand, and Clawdeen’s diary.

Cleo is wearing a turquoise strapless halter top with shiny green crisscrosses and a black & gold band across the top. Under her short gold & black skirt is a pair of black tights. Over the tights and on her arms are different length warmers with a pattern of black, yellow & white bandages. Her shoes are turquoise strappy cage sandals with gold studs on the front and gold hourglasses for heels.
Accessories for her outfit include a studded gold belt with loincloth, a gold & turquoise choker, a gold rope headband, and gold earrings. Her black purse has a gold strap, turquoise frills, gold & turquoise embroidery, and features the Eye of Horus on the sides.
Also included with the doll is a binder with a bandage pattern, a yellow brush, yellow doll stand, and Cleo’s diary.

Draculaura looks fabulous in her multi-patterned dress. It has white with pink hearts on top, a pink bow, puffy white sleeves with pink cuffs, and black in front with yellow buttons and pink & yellow crisscrosses. The rest of the dress is pink with black mesh frills along the hems of the double-layered skirt. 
Under the dress she wears yellow tights with pink polka dots. Her pink & black pumps have yellow soles and stacked pink buttons for heels.
Draculaura accessorizes with yellow earrings that have dangling red & black bats. She also has an open parasol with a pink bow on top, a pink center canopy, and a black spiderweb outer canopy. Her purse is black, coffin-shaped, and has a pink heart on the side.
Clawd is wearing a white button-down shirt with gold buttons and gold crossbones under a gold vest with a white collar. His black jeans lead into a pair of scuffed gold work boots with black laces and soles.
Accessories for the outfit include a teal cap, a teal scarf with black dots, a teal belt with gold buckle, a gold earring, and a gold watch. He also has his pet gargoyle bulldog, Rockseena.
Included with the dolls is a teal doll stand, a pink doll stand, a pink brush, and the diaries of Draculaura and Clawd. This 2-pack is sometimes referred to as “Forbitten Love” because of a blurb on the box.

Frankie is wearing a long blue shirt with pink vertical stripes, white crisscrosses, and white cuffs and collar. Over the shirt is a black sweater with blue trim and a blue & silver argyle pattern on the front. Under the shirt are tights with one long silver leg and one short black leg. Her black shoes have blue & silver crisscrosses on one half and silver bolts for heels.
She accessorizes the outfit with a silver triple-wrapped belt & lightning bolt buckle, a silver skullette hair clip, a silver & blue charm bracelet, and black earrings with silver lightning bolts. Her black hexagon purse has a silver strap and a blue & silver lightning bolt flap.
Also included with the doll is a blue brush, blue doll stand, and Frankie’s diary.

Lagoona is wearing a teal romper with pink along the top, black buttons, scalloped ruffles around the waist, and a gold rope belt. Under it she is wearing a black fishnet body suit with one leg, one sock, and one sleeve not attached. Her high heel sandals are translucent pink.
Accessories for the outfit include pink fish bone earrings, a gold headband, a gold multi-strand necklace, and a gold, pink & blue watch. She also has a pink translucent purse, a translucent blue folder, and a paper with images of seahorses and a skullette. 
The doll comes with a light blue brush, light blue doll stand, and Lagoona’s diary.

Spectra looks terrorific in her double layered dress that features a black top with purple and black straps and a sparkly purple front with three silver chains. To go with the bodice is a purple skirt with a black mesh overskirt. Her translucent purple shoes each have a silver ball for a heel that is connected to a chain that wraps around the shoe.
Accessories for the outfit include a silver belt with rings, ball & chain earrings that may be all black or have silver chains, a silver shackle bracelet, and a silver double chain necklace. Her handbag is a translucent purple pouch with a silver chain handle.
Spectra’s pet ferret, Rhuen, a purple brush, purple doll stand, and her diary are also included with the doll.

Toralei looks ferocious in her black leather jacket with red trim and gray studs on the collar. Under it she wears a red sleeveless top with jagged diagonal black & white stripes. The pants are black with with red showing through a variety of tears. Her black open-toe shoes have red red heels, red laces, and gray studs along the tops.
She accessorizes the outfit with an orange scarf, red fingerless gloves, and a gold grommeted belt with a silver skullette buckle. In each ear there is a silver stud and the left ear also has a silver hoop earring. Her purse is black & red with red scratches on the sides.
Extras for the doll include Sweet Fang, her pet saber-toothed cub, a black brush, doll stand, and her diary.

Abbey looks frostastic in her snow-inspired swimsuit. It is a black one-piece suit that features blue, white & pink snowflakes and a black halter strap that cinches at the bust. Around her waist she wears a purple netting wrap with a snowflake pattern and white fur waistband. On her feet are translucent purple sandals with icicle heels.
Abbey accessorizes the outfit with translucent blue icicle earrings, a purple skullette key charm bracelet, and a translucent purple hat. Her cocktail is pink shaved ice in a translucent blue cup. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and an Abbey Bominable card with a map of Skull Shores.

For the getaway, Ghoulia is wearing a black one-piece swimsuit with green spatter, green straps, a red waist, red around the top, and a white strip with red dots on the front. Over the suit she has a skirt made of red netting with patterns of white brain wrinkles. Her heeled sandals are translucent red with dripping ankle straps.
Accessories for the outfit feature green sunglasses, a red flower-shaped brain barrette, a white lungs earring, a red brain earring, and a red dripping bracelet. Ghoulia’s drink is a red smoothie in a coconut skull cup with a white bone umbrella and red straw. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Ghoulia Yelps card with a map of Skull Shores.

Gil is ready for a fun and exciting vacation at the beach. He is wearing a black sleeveless shirt with turquoise stitching and a red & white fish bone on the front. His swim shorts are turquoise with black stitching and a wave graphic on one leg. On his feet are black flip-flops with translucent turquoise straps.
Gil’s accessories include a clear dome helmet with a silver neck piece and a turquoise shell pendant. His drink is in a yellow pineapple cup with a yellow straw, green leaves, and a white fish bone cocktail pick. Also included with the doll is a doll stand and a Gil Webber card with a map of Skull Shores.

Lagoona looks absolutely amazing for her island getaway in her black two-piece bathing suit with pink and blue stitching. The top has pink straps and features a turquoise mesh cover. Hiding the shorts is a cover up with black & turquoise stripes and a pattern of pink scales. Her shoes are translucent blue sandals with winding ankle straps and bubbly heels.
Accessories for the ensemble include a black headband with pink flower, a pink tentacle bracelet, a pink octopus dangle earring, and a turquoise tentacle earring. Her greenish-brown beverage is in a tiki cup with a straw and pink umbrella. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Lagoona Blue card with a map of Skull Shores.

C.A. Cupid is wearing a black, white, and pink ensemble to Draculaura’s birthday party. Her strapless dress has a pink top and a black waist that flows into white blending into pink. The bottom of the skirt is adorned with black tulle and black hearts.
C.A.’s accessories feature a white heart-shaped purse with pink handles, a black tulle shawl, a bow & arrow ring, and white earrings – one a bow, the other an arrow. Her shoes are black with pink & white heart-shaped chains. One has a bow for the heel and the other has an arrow. A pink stand is included with this Walmart exclusive doll.

Clawd is dressed for the biggest birthday bash in the last thousand years. He’s wearing a black & teal patterned jacket with gold accents and collar over a black dress shirt and teal tie. His pants are black with gold stitching and his boots are gray. He accessorizes the outfit with sunglasses, a gold belt, and a gold earring in his left ear.
Clawd’s gifts for Draculaura are a pink necklace in a black jewelry box and a black & white dress with a pink bow. Also included with the doll is a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a black brush, and a black doll stand.

Clawdeen is sporting a wild, yet fancy, outfit for her BFF’s birthday party. She’s wearing a black tuxedo jacket, white shirt with black buttons, a purple bowtie, and purple gloves. Her purple leopard print pants have black & gold accents and a black & gold belt with a gold crescent moon buckle. The shoes are black and gold with fanged teeth as heels. Her purse is black & white with black buttons and fur handles.
Clawdeen’s gift for Draculaura is a black puff-sleeved dress with red stripes and white lace around the collar. The doll also has a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a black brush, and a black doll stand.
I can't believe Draculaura is finally turning 1600! It's been scary fun planning the party and it's definitely going to be a howling good time. Her dress is totally haunt couture and she'll definitely be the center of attention. I'm so excited for her that this may be the first time I'll ever want to walk into a party and not have all eyes on me. Now if I can just get Clawd to relax. You'd think he'd never escorted a ghoul to her sweet 1600th birthday before ;)

Draculaura is turning 1600 and to celebrate she is having a party. Her birthday outfit features a black dress with pink hearts & bows, white lace accents, and a pink waistband with a bow. 
She accessorizes with a white lace shawl, a pink heart tiara, and long pink earrings – one spells “sweet” and the other “1600”. Draculaura’s purse is sparkly pink lips with white fangs. Her frosting inspired shoes are black, white & pink with a bat-winged heart on each.
The doll also includes a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a Sweet 1600 birthday cake, a black brush, black doll stand, and an extra black skirt with a pink striped overskirt.

The Roadster is a gift for Draculaura’s 1600th birthday. The black and pink convertible features raised cobweb filigree designs on the sides & hood, pink heart-shaped headlights & grill, a pink interior, a pink windshield, and a personalized license plate.

Frankie Stein looks amazing for Draculaura’s birthday bash. Her outfit features a one-shoulder black & blue plaid dress with red & black lines and silver stitch accents. It has a puffy skirt with blue and black tulle underskirts.
She accessorizes the ensemble with stitched black bracelets, black stitches earrings, a silver lightning bolt purse, and black & blue patched & stitched shoes.
Frankie’s birthday gift is a black and pink dress with a white diamond pattern and white bow. The doll also includes a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a black brush, and a black doll stand.

This add-on lets you create an insect-like ghoul. It has black hands, black and yellow forearms, black and yellow calves, and translucent gray bug wings. Biceps, thighs, and a torso are not included. 
The head has blue compound eyes with green, orange, and blue shadow and violet lips. Her hair is black with a yellow under layer and black and yellow bangs.
She has a form-fitting dress with yellow-gold and black diagonal lines accented by magenta dots. The shoulder and sleeves are black mesh. Accessories consist of gray bug glasses with antennae and black pumps.

This add-on lets you create a skeletal ghoul. It has bone hands, forearms, and calves. Biceps, thighs, and a torso are not included.
The head is white with light purple eyes, blue and gray shadow, a gray nose, and blue lips with line accents. Her hair is a blend of blue and black.
She has a black turtleneck dress with elbow length sleeves, pink cuffs, and pink hem. It is decorated with a skeleton graphic that has a pink broken heart. Accessories consist of a bone hair bow and open-toe pumps with ankle straps and spines for heels.

This add-on lets you create a three-eyed ghoul. It has light blue hands, forearms, and calves. The forearms are speckled blue and the calves have swirls of dots. Biceps, thighs, and a torso are not included.
Her head has magenta eyes, purple and blue shadow, and slate blue lips. The hair is pink with streaks of light purple.
The outfit has a purple dress that is form-fitting and sleeveless. The waist is black with yellow dots and pink and purple helix stripes. Accessories include a purple beanie and strappy purple platform heels.

Build your own Monster High doll. The starter pack includes two sets of body parts and two outfits.
Doll Parts
The vampire is pale pink with parts for arms, legs, torso, and head. The head has long black hair with purple highlights, purple eyes with lavender shadow, and red fanged lips.
The sea monster is blue with arms, legs, and head. The forearms have squiggly tentacles, the calves have fins, and a torso is not included. The head has light green eyes, turquoise eyeshadow, and turquoise lips.
Clothing
The first outfit has a top with a purple halter neck, purple chest, and a gold bat wing accent. The bodice is black with purple helix stripes. The black skirt has sparkly black stripes and a ruffled purple hem.
Next is a one-shoulder black top with yellow bubbles and blue and purple splatter. It is complemented by a dark turquoise skirt with a print of wavy pink lines and orange circles.
For accessories there is a red bat wing barrette and black open-toe pumps with black and purple ankle straps.

This starter pack includes two sets of body parts and two outfits so you can build your own Monster High doll.
Doll Parts
The werewolf is gray with arms, legs, ears, torso, and head. The head has crimson pink hair, blue eyes with pink shadow, and red fanged lips.
The dragon body is a scaly light pink with arms, legs, and small green wings. It does not have a torso. The head has bluish green eyes with green scale shadow and purple fanged lips.
Clothing
The first outfit is a dress with a black form-fitting bodice and a violet skirt decorated with an intricate black and lavender print. Over the top is a frilly and sheer black jacket with a pattern of violet crescent moons.
The second outfit has a matching halterneck top and skirt. They have black trim and feature a split print. One is green speckled with black and white and the other is a chartreuse scale print.
The last item is a pair of black peep-toe wedges with crescent moon accents.

Abbey Bominable
The Abbey rag doll is light blue with a white headband and yarn hair that is white with streaks of pink, purple, and blue. She has a purple earring, a blue earring, a dashed smile with fangs, and purple eyes. The left eye is outlined by a magenta gem.
Her outfit has a geometric crystal print that is black, white, blue, and pink. It is accented by white strings, a furry white collar, and lavender pants. Furry white cuffs are on her wrists and her boots are furry white.
Shiver
Shiver is Abbey’s pet woolly mammoth. The plush figure is purple with a white body and white furry tufts on his head and chest. He has a black stitched mouth with tusks and red button eyes. The left eye has a light blue gem outline.

Ghoulia Yelps
The Ghoulia rag doll is light gray with a green headband that holds back yarn hair that is shades of blue. She has pink earrings, a stitched mouth, and blue button eyes. A jagged red outline surrounds the left eye.
She is wearing a cropped cherry print top over a black, red, and white shirt with black mesh cuffs. At her waist is a keyboard belt and her pants are red with small black dots. On her feet are black and white sneakers with red laces.
Sir Hoots A Lot
Sir Hoots A Lot is Ghoulia’s pet owl. The plush figure is turquoise with a blue face, white chest, and white feet. He has a stitched mouth and yellow button eyes. The left eye has a jagged red outline.

Spectra Vondergeist
The Spectra rag doll is off-white with long yarn hair that is purple and lavender. She has silver dangle earrings, a stitched mouth, and blue button eyes. The left eye has a silver chain outline.
She is wearing a black top that has pink and black straps and a pink front with silver chains. The pink skirt has a jagged hem and a black mesh top layer. She accessorizes with a wide bracelet and pink lace-up booties with silver chain accents.
Rhuen
Rhuen is Spectra’s pet ferret. The plush figure is purple with a light purple tail and dark blue accents. He has a blue ribbon on his head, a stitched nose, stitched mouth with fangs, and blue button eyes. The left eye has a chain outline.

Abbey will be icy hot when she wears this form-fitting dress. The off-the-shoulder light blue dress features rows of ice crystals pointing toward the center. The top of the dress, sleeves, and hem are all black mesh detailed with light blue trim.
Accessories include a translucent pink crystal necklace and a translucent blue bag with chain handle. The outfit is completed with translucent purple peep-toe pumps with cut-out sides.

Draculaura will look adorable in this pink & black ensemble. The black dress features rows of pink skullettes, crossbones, bows, and hearts. The top of the dress has a pink trim with a bow and is held by a lacy pink halter strap. The hem has a scalloped pink trim decorated with floral cut-outs.
The dress is accessorized with a black bangle, a pink bangle, and a heart-shaped top hat. The hat is pink with a pink bow and a black chin strap. Pink pumps complete the wardrobe with each shoe having a black platform and a cut-out heart for a heel.

Lagoona has an amazingly cute outfit with an aquatic theme. The dress features a black bodice detailed with a teal fish pattern, teal trim, and teal straps. The black skirt is decorated with a pattern of pink coral and teal seahorses.
Accessories consist of a white pearl bracelet, a translucent teal satchel, and translucent teal shoes. The shoes each have a translucent strap that winds up a leg and ends with a bow.

Spectra will be spook-tacular when she wears this breathtaking outfit. The black single-shoulder dress is detailed with a purple image of an ornate tower. Purple trim and a single purple tulle sleeve with a flared cuff accentuate the dress.
Silver accessories consist of chain-framed sunglasses, a belt, and shoes. The belt is ringed with triangles and has a dangling chain. The shoes feature cut-out platform heels with chain straps.

This reissue of Frankie is very similar to the original. The primary difference is it lacks the pink coffin-shaped locker and the survival guide.
Frankie’s outfit is the same and features a blue & white striped top with red stitched edges. Her tights are black with a white crisscross pattern. The apron has blue ruffles and is half red with white circles and half white with black skulls.
She also has a one-piece dress with black on top and a silver collar. The skirt is black & white with blue lines. A red & blue wide belt goes with the dress. 
Accessories are a blue & black bracelet, a black & white skullette bracelet, and gray dangle scissor earrings. The shoes are white with silver toes, red straps, and black high heels.
Extras for the doll include Frankie’s Home Ick book, a blue pen, a needle & spool of blue thread, a Watzit toy, and a brush.

This reissue of Ghoulia has the same outfits as the original but lacks some extras. The pink coffin-shaped locker and the survival guide are not included with this release.
She is still wearing a white tee with black sleeves and red trim that sports Monster High – Phys Dead – on the front. The shorts are black with a pink & white zigzag on one leg and a skullette on the other. Under the shorts is a pair of red half tights. Her shoes are red & black sneakers with red laces and white on top.
Ghoulia also has a dress that is a combination of black & white polka dots and red & white stripes. Her accessories include red earrings, a red & white bracelet, a red bottle, black sports goggles, and white glasses. 
Extras for the doll are a Physical Deaducation book, a red pen, a red bottle, a black ball, and a brush.

This version of Lagoona is almost identical to the original but lacks a few of the extras. The pink coffin-shaped locker and the survival guide are missing from the reissue.
Lagoona still has her white lab coat and teal dress with the pattern of white bubbles and black anchors. She also comes with an extra shirt and pants. The shirt has teal, pink and white whorls and the pants are teal with black pockets, waistband, and cuffs.
Accessories for the outfits are a pink necklace, pink bracelet, and yellow dangle earrings with black anchors. The shoes are teal & black with yellow winding straps.
The extras for the doll include a three-eyed frog, a jar, an egg, a Mad Science book, a blue pen, and a brush.

Howleen is a maniac on the floor. With her pink pompom hair and energetic leotard she can dance like a ghoul has never danced before.
Her single-shoulder leotard is powder blue with pink trim and a colorful diagram of dance steps. The attached tights are black with a pattern of pink and powder blue paw prints.
On her feet are baby blue high tops with pink laces and skullettes on the sides. Around her waist is a pink safety pin belt with attached headphones. She accessorizes with a yellow safety pin earring and a black boombox purse with pink accents.

Lagoona is a majestic beauty when she dances in her aquatic themed wardrobe. Her black leotard has squiggly pink straps and a pattern of pink coral and white bubbles. Over the leotard is a turquoise mesh skirt with a pink waist and a pattern of pink tentacles and blue-green seaweed.
Her shoes are pink with starfish on the front and seaweed winding up her calves. She has a pink bracelet and an aqua-blue purse that is a scuba tank covered with seaweed and seashells. The color of the purse matches the light blue highlights in her long blond hair.

Operetta is a cool cat on the dance floor with her rockabilly ensemble. She is wearing a black leotard with a pattern of white dice with red pips. It is held by a red halterneck and a black & white spiderweb skirt is worn over top.
On her feet are white shoes with black tips and piano key heels. Her red baguette bag is embellished with music notes and spiderwebs. Over one eye is a purple heart-shaped mask and holding her red & black hair is a white & purple mini check headscarf.

Robecca is a dancing machine with her amazing robot moves and outfit that goes perfectly with her lovely black & blue hair. She is wearing a collared blue & black leotard emblazoned with a pattern of steampunk filigree. Over the leotard is a purple & black waist cover-up that features a patchwork pattern of riveted sheet metal.
She wears bronze booties with purple bows at the tops and gears for heels. On her head is a small top hat attached to a bronze headband made up of gears. One wrist has a purple steampunk bracelet and she carries a purple steampunk purse. The tubular hinged purse is embellished with rivets, gauges, and gears.

For the sleepover, Abbey’s hair is long, straight and white with pink & blue highlights. She is wearing a blue sleeveless nightie covered in a pattern of white snowflakes. The nightie has black frills decorating the arm holes, a black hem, and around the neckline is a black bow with white pompoms on the ends.
Abbey has a white fur sleep mask and her shoes are blue fuzzy monster slippers with black eyes and mouth. The doll also has a pink tub of “I Scream” ice scream.

Clawdeen is wearing a ferociously cute outfit to the sleepover. It features a black tank top with with yellow stitched edges and a yellow paw print on the front. The shorts are purple leopard print with a black stitched waistband, yellow stitching, and a black hem.
Clawdeen’s sleep mask has the same purple print as her shorts and her slippers are yellow fuzzy monsters with ears, black eyes, and black mouth. Also included with the doll is a purple makeup kit in the shape of a paw print.

Draculaura is back again with her hair pulled back in a ponytail and a brand new outfit. For the sleepover she is wearing a pink nightie with a pattern of black bat-wing hearts. It has white & pink mesh frills decorating the chest and the hem.
Her slippers are pink fuzzy monsters with black eyes, a black fanged mouth, and pink bat-wings. She has a pink sleep mask with the same pattern as her nightie. Also included with the doll is a copy of “Monster Beat” magazine.

Two energizing outfits that are perfectly designed for Frankie. The first is a dress with silver straps, silver trim, and a blue bodice. The skirt features a red, white, and blue diagonal checkered pattern with black nuts in some squares.
The second outfit begins with a blue top detailed with horizontal black stitched lines and a diagonal blue stitched line. The top is complemented by a shiny silver skirt covered with a pattern of black nuts.
A half & half jacket and open-toe wedges are included with the dresses. The jacket is black and silver and features a large blue lightning shaped collar. One stitched shoe is white and the other is black; both are decorated with a silver lightning bolt.
Accessories for the wardrobe consist of blue dangling stitched-heart earrings, a red tie attached to a silver chain, and a silver riveted belt with two nuts. The silver purse has nut-shaped handles and a bag that is riveted sheet metal stitched to irregular black & silver stripes.

Ghoulia will be drop dead gorgeous when she wears one of these awesome outfits. The first is a lovely sleeveless dress that features rows of  interconnected gray and white cracked tombstomes separated by red or black.
The second outfit has a black top with white trim accentuated by a red & black brain wrinkle bow tie. Over the top is a white vest with a pattern of red cherries & black stems. The red pants have black cuffs and spots creating a dripping appearance.
Accessories include pink worm earrings, black horn-rimmed glasses, a diamond textured blue belt with skullette buckle, a purse, and shoes. The red purse is made up of eyeballs held by chain handles. The shoes are black peep-toe pumps with diamond textured blue platforms and heels.

Operetta will be a stunning sight while wearing one of these music-themed outfits. The first is a white rockabilly dress embellished with a shiny purple collar and detailed with a pattern of purple spiderwebs and musical filigree. Over the dress is a purple vest etched with a red music note heart.
The second outfit features a red off-the-shoulder top with a large white collar. The collar is decorated with black and red wavy lines and music notes. Accentuating the top is a black pencil skirt with four wavy white-stitched lines.
Red accessories consist of a dice belt, a swirling heart-shaped mask, and earrings with hearts shaped into music notes. The purse is purple with  four etched dots on the side and a black & white keyboard strap. Shoes for the outfits are a pair of red spiderweb peep-toe pumps with white soles and stacked dice for heels.

Robecca will look amazing in these fun steampunk emsembles. The first outfit is a sleeveless blue dress adorned with a light blue bow around the neck and a ruffled hem. It is decorated with a pattern of shiny bronze cogs & skulls and light blue gear-themed filigree.
The second outfit has a black shirt with a blue neckline and a pattern of interconnected blue grommet lines and bronze rings. Over the shirt is an underbust top that features a blue, pink & black diamond pattern. The black, blue & bronze striped shorts are decorated with bronze cogs and gears.
Accessories consist of a dangling bronze gear earring, a translucent blue eye patch monacle, and a bronze belt embellished with chains, rivets, and gauges. The riveted bronze purse is detailed with screws, blue dials, and blue gauges. For shoes the wardrobe has peep-toe riveted pumps that are blue with bronze platforms and heels.

This Walmart exclusive 3-pack features Draculaura, Abbey Bominable, and Ghoulia Yelps. They are wearing beautiful dot-inspired outfits to the polka dot dance.
Draculaura
Draculaura is wearing a lovely halter dress held by black lace straps and bow. The pink bodice has interchanging rows of white hearts and black dots with bows. The front is embellished with white lace frills. The skirt is pink with pink polka dots, has black bows at the hem, and is covered with a pattern of skullettes and hearts interlinked by black chains. Her pink dripping shoes each have a large heart in the front and a black bat wing wedge heel. Accessories consist of pink bow earrings and a pink beaded bracelet. She also has a black & pink iCoffin phone.
Abbey Bominable
Abbey’s single shoulder multihued dress is detailed with a pattern of blue & black snowflakes. The skirt has three layers with jagged hems. Two of the layers have the snowflake pattern and the middle layer is solid pink. Her translucent blue open-toe heels are made up of ice crystals with fur trim. Her translucent blue accessories consist of a snowflake earring, an icicle earring, an ice crystal necklace, and an ice crystal belt. She also has white fur bracelets, a translucent blue ice crystal purse, and a black & blue iCoffin phone.
Ghoulia Yelps
Ghoulia has on a single strap dress featuring a white bodice adorned with a pattern of blue eyeballs. A black waistband separates the bodice from the skirt. Both the skirt and the strap are red with a collage of white skullettes. Her wedge shoes are made up of white bones with red brain wrinkle heels. Accessories entail white cat-eye glasses, red crossbone earrings, and a gray dripping goo arm warmer. Her white bone purse is formed from a rib cage.
Included with the dolls is a white brush and a group photo trading card.

Lagoona will be swimming in complements when she arrives at the polka dot dance. She is wearing a sleeveless aqua blue dress that is trimmed in black and covered in a pattern of beautiful bubbles with rows of blue kelp. 
Separating the top of the dress from the skirt and its pink tulle overlay is a blue belt with a pink starfish buckle. Her translucent pink shell shoes each have a white pearl attached to the toe strap.
Additional trappings for the outfit feature a white pearl earring, a string of pearls earring, two pink necklaces, a blue necklace, a white charm bracelet, and a pink headband with an open clamshell containing a white pearl. On one arm is a blue mesh arm warmer and her purse is a translucent orange sand dollar with dangling kelp. She also has a black & teal iCoffin phone and a blue clamshell makeup case.
Included with the doll is a silver brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Lagoona.

Operetta will bedazzle everyone at the polka dot party with her cute and creative ensemble. Her sleeveless back & white polka dot dress is supported by red & black polka dot straps. The skirt is embellished with a red tulle top layer that is covered in a pattern of records. Her red wedges with black spiderweb heels have white dice with red dots on the toe straps and black spiders on the backs.
Accessories for the outfit consist of a silver spiderweb earring, a white heart-shaped mask, and a double-layered white pearl necklace with black music note charms. In her hair is a red & black polka dot bow and around her waist is a black & white keyboard belt. Her purse is a black & white jagged keyboard with black spiderweb sides and a black handle. She also has a black & red iCoffin phone and a red coffin-shaped makeup case.
Included with the doll is a silver brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Operetta.

Spectra looks stunning in her dots & chains ensemble for the polka dot dance. She is wearing a single shoulder sleeveless dress that is light purple with black polka dots. It features a pink tulle overlay that has a pattern of pink chains and large purple dots. Her purple shoes have cone heels and are covered in rows of chain links.
Accessories begin with a silver chain hairband, a silver heart-shaped lock earring, a white skullette key earring, and a silver chain necklace with layers down to her waist. On each wrist is a black band with a pink & black polka dot bow and on each ankle is a silver shackle. Her black handbag is wrapped in chains and has a silver handle. She also has a black & purple iCoffin phone and a purple padlock-shaped makeup compact.
Included with the doll is a silver brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Spectra.

Clawdeen is wearing a shiny gold top featuring black tiger print and a ruffled neck. Over the top is a black vest with a wide purple hem and a white faux fur collar. Her a-line skirt is shimmery purple with a black tulle hem.
On her feet are knee-high black sandals with purple straps and gold buckles. Accessories consist of gold hoop earrings, a gold necklace with purple pendant, and a gold studded black belt. 
This version is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When a lever on her back is depressed Clawdeen tilts her head back ,closes her eyes, raises her arms, and howls. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Frankie is wearing an adorable dress with a white top that features black fishnet sleeves. Around her neck is a black bow tie held by a silver skullette pin. The plaid skirt is black and blue with red and silver crisscrossed lines. The hem of the skirt is detailed with black fishnet.
She accessorizes with translucent blue dangling skullette earrings and a black belt. The belts is embellished with silver studs, chains, and a silver lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black & white striped ankle-strap pumps.
Frankie is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When her belly button is pressed she emits an electrifying buzz and her face and rib cage glow. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Spectra is wearing a lovely dress with black & purple straps. The bodice is black with a sparkly purple front detailed with three silver chains. The purple skirt has a shiny silver pattern of chains that form a chain link design. Over the skirt is a black mesh top layer.
Her translucent purple boots each have a silver ball & chain heel with the chain wrapping around the boot. Accessories for the outfit include a silver double chain necklace, a silver shackle, and a silver belt with dangling hoops.
Spectra is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When her belly button is pressed she emits a ghostly wail and lights up with a spooky blue glow. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Abbey is gorgeous as she sparkles in her icy Halloween dress that features a white bodice with silver dots and a triple-layered skirt. The shoulders and sleeves are shimmery white with the sleeves ending in white faux fur cuffs. The top skirt is white tulle with a silvery snowflake print, the middle is pink, and the bottom is black tulle. All three layers have shredded hems.
