Her boots are translucent white with blue crystal fur collars. Accessories begin with a white faux fur headband adorned with a translucent blue snowflake. On her shoulders are translucent blue snowball shoulder pads and around her waist is a translucent blue belt with hanging icicles. Her masquerade mask is a pair of translucent purple goggles covered in dripping ice. The frozen trick-or-treat pail is translucent purple with a skullette and snowflakes.
Abbey comes with a purple cake decorated with black spiderweb icing. It has a black cake topper presenting a spider with a top hat. The cake rests upon a pedestal made of skeletal hands attached to a black base. Also included with this Walmart exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Abbey.

Clawdeen has gone all out this Halloween with her werewolf inspired costume. She has even shaved the sides of her head and added animal print highlights.
The outfit features a purple & black honeycomb jumpsuit emblazoned with green leopard print and shiny gold zipper designs. To emphasize the werewolf motif the sleeves and leg warmers are covered in long black faux fur. On her feet are claw-heeled gold pumps covered in studded straps. 
The outfit is accessorized by a gold chest plate made up of studded straps, a gold belt with two rows of studs, and gold studded ankle bracelets.  Her masquerade mask is black with purple highlights and is held by stiff gold chains that end in crescent moons. In each ear are two green studded hoop earrings and on her hands are green fingerless gloves. Her trick-or-treat pail is purple with a skullette and spikes on the sides.
Clawdeen comes with a small black coffin detailed with a skullette, filigree, and spiderwebs. Inside the coffin is creepy green goo candy. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Clawdeen.

Cleo has taken the mummy theme to a whole new level with her enchanting Halloween costume. The wardrobe begins with a dress that features a tan bandage-style top adorned with shiny turquoise lines. The skirt is long black mesh with a turquoise top layer that is much shorter and trimmed with a jagged edge. On her feet are translucent turquoise shoes with ouroboros ankle straps and platforms made of gold pyramids.
Gold accessories for the ensemble consist of a snake earring, a stud earring, an ouroboros bracelet, and a wide bracelet with triangles. Around her neck is a gold snake necklace holding multiple black mesh bandages embellished with shiny golden lines. Her masquerade mask is also gold and covered in mummy wrappings. For a purse she is using a turquoise trick-or-treat pail with a bandaged mummy skull.
Cleo comes with a turquoise punch bowl with gold snake legs, a gold ladle, and gold cup. The bowl and cup are filled with a pink bubbly concoction. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Cleo.

Draculaura embraces her vampire heritage with an elaborate Halloween costume. It begins with an off-the-shoulder dress incorporating a white bunched bodice, black mesh bell sleeves, and a triple-layered skirt. The top skirt is black mesh with a patter of batwing hearts, the next layer is sparkly pink, and the bottom layer is pink. Each jagged layer gets progressively longer and all three are under a black mesh train adorned with shiny pink filigree.
Under the skirt is are tights that flow from pink to black matching her translucent gray spiderweb boots. The boots have black fang heels and pink & black laces up the sides that end with bat wing hearts.
Accessories consist of pink dripping heart-shaped earrings and a translucent pink spiderweb collar. Attached to her back are ornate spiderweb bat wings that are black on top and transition to pink on the bottom. Her masquerade mask is translucent pink with a filigree handle and black bat wing eyebrows. The trick-or-treat pail is pink with a skullette and bows.
Draculaura comes with a white skullette skeleton with two pink attachable bows. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Draculaura.

Frankie is portraying the bride of Frankenstein for Halloween and she is mesmerizing with her big hair and stunning black & white ensemble. The costume begins with a sheer mesh dress featuring a blue bodice and a skirt that transitions from white to gray. The hem of the skirt has shimmery silver lightning bolts and the trim and waist of the dress are detailed with black stitches. 
Under the dress is a black jumpsuit covered with strings of metallic blue nuts. Her black knee-high boots have stitches running down the sides and are glittery at the feet. Completing the outfit is a black cropped jacket with a shimmery silver pattern of interlinked nuts.
Accessories entail silver earring with dangling strings of nuts and two silver cuffs made from nuts. She has a blue masquerade mask that only covers one eye and is held with a lightning bolt handle. Her purse is a blue trick-or-treat pail with a skullette and neck bolts.
Frankie comes with a silver studded cauldron that is filled with a green brew. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Frankie.

Abbey looks amazing with straight white hair accentuated by a blue and pink underlayer highlights. This Toys”R”Us exclusive comes with a lovely pink  dress plus two additional outfits.
She is wearing a pink sleeveless turtleneck sweater dress that features black lacing down the front ending with two dangling draw strings. Black leg warmers cover her calves and the tops of her boots. The lace-up booties are black & purple with purple heels.
Her second outfit consists of a sleeveless pink dress with a purple fracture pattern. The dress has a top layer with a wide white faux fur waist and a black tulle skirt.
The last outfit has a single long sleeve shirt covered with pink, purple, and white angular shapes. The shirt is accompanied by white pants decorated with pink and purple sparkly snowflakes.
For shoes Abbey has white peep-toe heels with side cut-outs and a pair of black lace-up boots. Accessories include a variety of translucent items. She has a pink snowflake earring, a pink icicle earring, a purple pendant, two pink bangles, two  black bangles, and two purple bracelets. The doll’s ice crystal purse is translucent purple and her iCoffin phone is black & blue.
Abbey does not come with a brush or doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as”I Heart Fashion Abbey Bominable”.
On mountain, most important fashion is warm and clothes are kept in large trunk with aging cheese of the yak. here in the down below there is closet and styles are not desirable to smell like yak pizza topping. Fashion can also be stylish not just warm. Is nice also to have own closet without having to share with whole family as youngest must store clothes on bottom with cheese. Fashion never smelled so good.

xx Abbey

This Toys”R”Us exclusive of Frankie has a wide black stripe down the center of her long straight hair. She comes with a colorful argyle outfit plus two additional outfits. 
The outfit she is wearing has a red collared shirt, a blue tie with red & white crisscrossed lines, and a red leatherette underbust vest. The argyle skirt has black, blue, and gray diamonds with black and red intercrossing diagonal lines. Her white knee-high socks have yellow designs at the top; one has stitches and the other has lightning bolts. On her feet are red sandals with ankle and toe straps.
The second outfit features a top that is part red and part black with a blue chain link fence pattern. The skirt is blue with red stitching, black crisscrossed lines, and a frilly red hem. Around the waist is a silver double belt with hanging chains and a yellow lightning bolt buckle.
The final outfit has a shiny silver single-strap top and patchwork pants. The pants have red patches and black patches with white diagonal crisscrossed lines.
Extra shoes include half blue & half silver pumps with bolts for heels. She also has white high-top sneakers with silver soles, silver laces, and black lightning bolt emblems on the sides.
Accessories consist of yellow lightning bolt dangle earrings, silver lightning bolt dangle earrings, a black bolt pendant, two black and two white bangles, and a silver bracelet. The doll’s black purse is detailed with screws, lightning bolt handles, and red power outlets.
Frankie does not come with a brush or doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as”I Heart Fashion Frankie Stein”.
I got some kind of electrical bug that really shorted me out today and made me feel like I was running on half a charge. Some of the ghouls called to see if I wanted to go to the Maul but I didn't really feel up to leaving the house so I did the next best thing to shopping. I organized my closet! it may not sound glamorous but I fixed it to look like a store display so now when I get dressed it's almost as if I'm in my own private fashion boutique picking out styles for the day... well almost .)

xx Frankie

Clawdeen is fierce and fashionable with her brown & green hair and stunning sleeveless dress. The black gathered dress is covered with purple and yellow-green splatter. Over the dress she wears a yellow-green satin jacket with a purple faux fur collar.
She completes the outfit with gold open-toe wedges that have mesh-like sides and zippers on the front. Her purse is a gold wristlet held by a gold hoop handle.
Me + Fashion Show = A howling good time

Operetta is wearing a lovely black, white & red ensemble that goes wonderfully with her red and black hair. Her fitted black top features a black & white striped strip in the front, black & white striped straps, and purple top trim. The white pencil skirt has a pattern of black spots and music notes.
She accentuates the outfit with black & white wedges that feature leopard print toeboxes and red trim. Accessories consist of a red spiderweb brooch, a red spiderweb belt, and a translucent black heart-shaped eye mask. Her record purse is embellished with red trim and a red spiderweb.
The outfit was previously released, with some minor variations, as Operetta’s Maul Session fashion pack.
I love it when I can spend the day haunting old record stores

Abbey will be so cool in this icy blue ensemble. It begins with a lovely white top with long sleeves, a black collar, and light blue lines that create a crystal appearance. 
Paired with the top is a purple & snowflake print skirt. The skirt features two purple tulle top layers that form icicle frills. Holding the skirt is a black rope belt with translucent blue beads at the ends.
For Abbey’s feet there are knee-high ice skate boots. The boots have black laces and translucent blue blades.
To stay warm there is a cropped jacket covered in black faux fur. To carry essentials, the outfit comes with a translucent blue crystal purse.

Clawdeen is going to be freaky fabulous in these retro duds that begin with a black, blue, and yellow striped top. Over the top is a yellow jacket with a puffy purple faux fur collar. 
Continuing the crazy costume are black pants with blue and yellow speckles. The shoes are gold open-toe wedges with mesh-like sides and zippers on the front. Completing the outfit is a pair of translucent purple glasses with a gold zipper top bar.

Cleo will be dignified and magnificent in this mummy-themed wardrobe. It features a halterneck jumpsuit covered with a pattern of golden mummy wrappings as well as black & gold triangles covering the chest. Around the waist is a turquoise triangle chain belt with a dangling chain in the front.
Complementing the jumpsuit is an arm wrap and a leg wrap using the same pattern of golden wrappings. The ornate gold heels each have black straps and a wide gold ankle strap. Instead of a purse the outfit comes with a tan tote with mummy wrappings and an image of a canopic jar on the sides.
Also included in the fashion pack are a golden perfume bottle and a translucent green makeup jar with gold lid.

This outfit will be fabulous for Frankie when she spends the day shopping with her ghoulfriends. It begins with a light blue top with short red sleeves and red shoulders. To go with the top is a suspender skirt that features a shimmery pattern of red, white, black, blue, and silver nuts. The waist is black with red trim and the white suspenders have red and black crisscrossed lines.
Accessorizing the outfit are light blue cone heels with red straps. The silver metal-looking purse with a jagged lightning bolt handle has light blue on the sides, black horizontal straps, and two vertical silver straps held with screws.
Also included in the clothing pack is a slice of purple pie with green topping, a fork with a piece of pie, a blue plate, and a green drink with straw in an orange glass.

Lagoona will look swimmingly cute in her bubble-themed ensemble. The turquoise bubble-patterned sleeveless jumpsuit has pink trim and swatches of black fishnet sewn onto one side and one leg. Worn around the jumpsuit is a pink waist scarf with a fish scale pattern and translucent turquoise beads at the ends.
The outfit is accentuated with pink, turquoise, & black wedge sandals held by winding black straps. The bubble theme is continued with round pink bubble glasses and a clear bubble bag with a single pink shoulder strap.
Also included in the fashion pack is a translucent pink glass with a yellow-green drink and twisty straw.

Operetta will look extra sassy in this blend of gothic and rockabilly fashion. The fitted black top has purple top trim, a black & white strip in the front, and black & white striped straps. 
Complementing the top is a white pencil skirt covered in black music notes and splotches. The pumps have black & white leopard print toe boxes, red on the sides, black on the back, and black & white striped soles.
Gothic accessories for the outfit include a red spiderweb belt, a red spiderweb clip, and black sunglasses with red spiderweb tips. The black & red record-styled purse has double black straps and features a red spiderweb with a white skullette in the center.

Spectra’s ghoulfriends will be envious when she’s wearing this varicolored long sleeve sheath dress. Over the collage of blue, pink, and black is a pattern of interconnected silver chains.
Accessorizing the dress is a shimmery silver tulle headscarf and a pair of sunglasses made of chains. A ball & chain purse attaches to one wrist and features a translucent pink ball held by a silver chain. The shoes are translucent white boots wrapped in silver chains.
Also included in the fashion pack is a Monster Beat magazine full of creepy cool news and a gray tombstone-shaped phone.

Toralei will be ferociously fashionable in this black & orange outfit. It begins with a black top detailed with diagonal silver dots and a black miniskirt with shiny silver tiger stripes.
Intensifying the clothing is a black & orange checkered scarf and a wide silver studded belt. The shoes are black open-toe wedges with silver studs and orange scarves wrapped around the tops. A black and silver studded purse with three orange straps and silver buckles that form a cat face complete the outfit.
Also included in the fashion pack are two yellow coffin-shaped movie tickets, a blue box of candy with an image of a mouse, and triangular 3D glasses with one orange and one blue lens.

Abbey is always cozy and comfy in her translucent bed carved out of a block of ice. The shimmery bed has a tufted ice mattress and an igloo headboard. The edge of the igloo is adorned with white icicles and the top has a white skull with earmuffs. On each side of the headboard are frozen trees with snowflakes on the branches. At the foot of the bed is an ice TV with snowboarding on the screen.
Bedding consists of a pink pillow decorated with white snowflakes and a blanket. The blanket features a black, pink, and blue mosaic pattern with diagonal white icicle stripes.
Accessories for the playset include a translucent green alarm clock, a translucent pink snowflake lamp, a frozen drink in a purple mug, a pen, and a journal. There is also a small purple pet bed with white lining that is for Shiver, Abbey’s baby woolly mammoth.

This reissue of C.A. is almost identical to the original Sweet 1600 version. Her strapless dress has a pink top with a a black tulle shawl worn over it. The white skirt turns into pink at the bottom and is decorated with black hearts and black mesh along the hem. Her black soled pumps are made from a chain of pink and white hearts. One shoe has a bow for the heel and the other has an arrow.
Accessories for the outfit include white bow & arrow earrings, a pin wrist cuff, and a pink & white bow & arrow ring. her white heart-shaped purse has pink handles and black, pink & gray designs. Extras for the doll consist of a pink doll stand and her diary.

Clawdeen is at the Coffin Bean, the place where ghouls hang out after school. She is wearing a light and dark purple diagonal striped dress with gold buckles on the darker stripes. The dress is accentuated by a gold collar and a black & gold zipper stripe down the front. On her feet are purple shoes with gold laces and extra rows of eyelets.
Her outfit is accessorized with many gold items. Clawdeen wears two gold hoop earrings in each ear, a gold spiked headband holds her ponytail, and a double necklace with crescent moon pendant is around her neck. She also has a spiked bracelet and a triple-wrapped grommet belt.
The Coffin Bean has a couch, chair, and coffee table. The blue couch is etched with spiderweb patterns and the top is decorated with black curls and a spider. The black claw-foot chair is covered with ornate swirls, a skull with hands at the top, and red swirl-tufted cushions. The coffin-shaped coffee table is black and detailed with a skull on the top.
The shop also has a shelf full of delicious treats. The three black shelves are decorated with a black spiderweb and a purple back drop. The back drop features images of spiderwebs, cups, plates, mice and canisters of ghoulish goodies. Above the shelves is an illegible menu framed by swirls and skulls. The top of the frame has a coffin with an image of a dead bean. On the counter is a gray tombstone-shaped cash register with a purple screen.
A variety of small items are included with the playset. There is a Monster Beat magazine and a black apron with an image of a dead bean. Snacks consist of a gray skull cauldron with a green drink, a gray skull cauldron with a pink drink, a green spider cupcake, and a brown critter-shaped donut.

This Costco exclusive playset features Draculaura and Clawdeen hanging out and gossiping at the Coffin Bean. Draculaura is wearing a light & dark pink candy stripe top with a pink bow collar. Her black skirt has a black tulle hem and is decorated with a pattern of pink hearts and filigree squares made up of bat wings and swirls. In her ears are pink skullette earrings and on her feet are pink ankle-strap pumps.
Clawdeen has on a dress with light & dark purple diagonal stripes and gold buckles. The collar is gold and a black & gold zipper stripe runs down the front. Her shoes are purple with gold laces. Gold accessories consist of four hoop earrings, a studded ponytail headband, a crescent moon pendant, a studded bracelet, and a triple-wrapped grommet belt.
The Coffin Bean has a couch, chair, and coffee table. The blue spiderweb tufted couch has a black top edge with swirls and a spider. The black chair has claw feet, red cushions etched with swirls, and a skull with hands on top. The coffee table is black, coffin shaped, and features a raised etched skull.
Items sold at the shop are stored on the black shelf decorated with spiderwebs and a purple backdrop with images of plates, cups, and containers. On top of the shelves is a unreadable menu framed with swirls and skulls. The top of the frame has a coffin with a dead coffee bean. The countertop has a gray tombstone-shaped cash register to sell lots of ghoulish goodies.
Extras for the playset begin with a Monster Beat magazine and a black apron with an image of a dead bean. For drinks there are two gray skull cauldrons; one with a green drink and the other with a pink drink. Delicious deserts include a green spider cupcake and a brown critter-shaped donut.

The powder room has a vanity and bathtub where Draculaura can relax after a long night. The pink and black slipper tub features black claw feet and a white scalloped edge. The foot of the tub has a black faucet and a pink ribbon tied into a heart-shaped bow. The head has a heart and an animal head with big ears and a bow. The tub comes with a detachable pink shelf with claws and bat wings.
The black coffin-shaped vanity has ornate pink doors with white fang handles and white swirls. The pink spiderweb countertop has a white bowl sink with a pink faucet and bat wing handles. Black bat wings and swirls form the frame of the heart-shaped mirror. Since Draculaura doesn’t have a reflection the mirror only has an image of her clothes and earrings.
Accessories for the powder room begin with a black & pink pink towel embroidered with Draculaura’s crest. A white toothbrush, a white tube of toothpaste, a pink heart-shaped bottle, and makeup are also included.

Frankie’s amazing vanity has three silver bolt legs and a blue shelves shaped like a lightning bolt. The black counter top has a silver sheet-metal drawer decorated with a pink lightning bolt and a white skull knob. The lightning bolt mirror is framed in pink and accentuated with pink bolts. Surrounding the mirror is a backdrop of black and blue stitched trellises with coffin-shaped pictures of Frankie’s friends.
The matching chair has a black base, a pink tufted seat cushion, and rests upon a single silver bolt. The blue armrests and back use the same stitched trellis pattern as the vanity. A white skull with bolts decorates the center of the chair back.
Accessories for the playset consist of a black hair dryer with a pink cord, a perfume bottle, a lightning bolt makeup palette, a wrench applicator. and a battery train case. The case is blue with a black lid, pink lightning bolt handle, and a blue charging cable.

Ghoulia’s red and black scooter has a cute skeletal theme. The front sports a white stripe with a skull wearing goggles and a gray rib cage basket. The black mirrors are held by skeletal hands and the foot rest has a white spinal column running down the center. The red seat is covered with brain wrinkles and the red splattered license plate is personalized with “BRAINS”. The sides of the scooter has a white section decorated by a pattern of cherries with green stems. Gray skeletal hands hold the pink rimmed wheels and a white bone kickstand keeps the scooter upright.
Accessories include a cup, backpack, and two helmets. The cup is green, dripping, and has a white lid and straw. The gray tombstone backpack is detailed with a skull wearing goggles, a wrought iron gate design, and red straps. Ghoulia’s helmet is black with a white center stripe, red visor, black chin strap, and red goggles. The other helmet is black with red goggles. It is smaller and fits Sir Hoots A Lot, Ghoulia’s pet owl.

Monster High is where mansters and ghouls go to learn, socialize, and have fun. The high school features a classroom, the creepateria, and a  casketball court. 
The outside of the school is tan with many windows detailed with purple spiderweb-themed muntins. The arched entry doors are brown, decorated with the Monster High logo, and are guarded by two gargoyles reading books on pedestals. The casketball hoop is outside and comes with a white net, a black ball, and silver & teal bleachers.
Through the doors is the mad science classroom with purple walls, a blackboard, a green spiderweb clock, and a light & dark purple floor checkered with irregular shapes. The room has two school desks with black frames, purple chairs, and teal desks. It also has a blue cart and a three-eyed frog that is kept in a jar.
The creepateria has a light & dark pink floor checkered with irregular shapes, a pink wall with the Monster High crest, and a green wall with six pink  coffin-shaped lockers. Each of the working lockers has a white skull lock and can be used to store the two small pencils and notebooks. The room also has a lunch table, two drinks, two small black cauldrons with a red brew, a large black cauldron with a red brew, and two green bowls with green food.
Black stairs lead to the black DJ booth above the creepateria. The booth has a large black speaker comes with a laptop. When the creepateria is converted into the dance room it can be decorated with a hanging pink disco skull, spiderwebs, and pumpkin lanterns.

This Toys”R”Us exclusive playset features Draculaura and Count Fabulous relaxing in her powder room. The powder room includes a tub, vanity, and a bunch of accessories.
Draculaura has curly black hair with pink highlights that is pulled into a ponytail. She is wearing a short black robe detailed with a pattern of light and dark pink bats and moons. The robe is held closed by a pink ribbon tied around her waist. In her ears are pink or yellow bow earrings and on her feet are black fuzzy monster slippers with bat wings.
Count Fabulous is also wearing a robe. His is pink and matches the bow on his head.
The pink & black slipper tub has black claw feet, a black faucet, and a detachable pink bat wing shelf. The tub is decorated with white scalloped trim, a pink heart-shaped bow, and an animal face with a bow.
The black coffin-shaped vanity has pink doors, a pink spiderweb countertop with a white sink, and a heart-shaped mirror with bat wings. The mirror only has an image of Draculaura’s clothes and earrings since she doesn’t have a reflection.
Accessories consist of a white toothbrush, a white tube of toothpaste, a pink heart-shaped bottle, and a black towel. The towel has a pink image of Draculaura’s crest.

This JCPenney exclusive is just like the Sweet 1600 Roadster, but also includes a Draculaura doll. Draculaura is wearing a black dress with pink hearts and black lace accents as well as black high heel shoes with pink stripes. The dress has the same pattern as her Sweet 1600 party dress.

Scarah Screams
Scarah looks flawless with her 60’s retro look. She is wearing a grass green sleeveless turtleneck and a tawny green leatherette skirt with tan belt. On her feet are forest green pumps and holding her long black hair is a grass green headband.
Hoodude Voodoo
Hoodude, the living voodoo doll, is stitched with button eyes and blue strips of cloth for hair. His top half is made to look like a black jacket with a red heart on the chest, red buttons, and red & white stripes on the cuffs, hem, and shoulders. His legs, hands, and feet are made up of blue and white patches held together with black stitching.
Extras for the dolls include black doll stands, Scarah’s diary, and Hoodude’s diary. The 2-pack was an exclusive for the 2012 San Diego Comic-Con International.

This Toys”R”Us exclusive features Ghoulia and Sir Hoots A Lot having fun riding a scooter. Ghoulia is wearing a sleeveless dress that has red, gray, and white diagonal dripping stripes. Over the dress is a white vest with black & silver zipper-like trim. In her ears are white or red crossbone earrings. Her black knee-high boots have black straps with red skulls up the sides.
Ghoulia’s helmet is black with a white stripe and red goggles. Her tombstone backpack is gray with wrought iron designs, a skull wearing goggles, and red straps. If she gets thirsty she has a green cup with a white lid and straw.
Sir Hoots A Lot also needs to be safe when they are on the scooter. He has a black helmet with red goggles.
The red and black scooter fits Ghoulia’s undead style. It has a variety of skulls, a gray rib cage basket, a white spinal column on the foot rest, and skeletal hands holding the mirrors. Cherries decorate the sides, red & black streamers are on the handles, the seat is red with brain wrinkles, and the license plate is personalized with “BRAINS”.

Abbey looks chillerific with her cool clothing and icy accoutrements. She is wearing a long light blue top tie-dyed with purple & pink triangles. Around the neck are shiny rounded icicles and over the shirt is a black fur shawl. The white leggings have a crystal pattern formed by black, light blue, pink, and purple triangles. Her boots are translucent gray with skullette buckles and ice crystal trim. 
The outfit is accentuated with a pink crystal multi-finger ring, a single pink crystal earring, and an onyx crystal belt. Her translucent pink backpack has pink straps and a black key ring with skullette keys.
Extras for the doll consist of a light blue binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Abbey’s Fearbook.

Cleo is magnificent in her Picture Day ensemble. She is wearing a long shirt with a pattern blue bandage wrappings highlighted with black, teal, and shiny gold. Under the top are black & shiny gold striped tights. On her feet are gold wedge sandals with multiple blue straps.
The outfit is made even more dazzling by a wide gold belt and gold bracelet; both featuring a black scarab emblem. Her translucent teal purse is embellished with the outline of a gold scarab.
Extras for the doll consist of a gold binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Cleo’s Fearbook.

Draculaura looks fangtastic in her black, white, and pink ensemble. Her white under black mesh top has a black collar with white frills and a large pink bow in the front. The pink skirt has a black waist, Victorian designs with bats & carriages at the bottom, and black tulle along the hem. Her black wedges have white skullette clasps and knee-high straps that are tied into a bow at the top.
Accessories for the outfit feature pink & white skullette and crossbones earrings and a pink headband with a bow. Her pink heart-shaped purse has a black handle and is embellished with black bats.
Extras for the doll consist of a pink binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Draculaura’s Fearbook.

Spectra is unstoppable in her spooktacular chain-themed garb. Her shades of purple top features a chain-link pattern, black mesh sleeves, and an asymmetrical hem. Under the top is a black leather miniskirt and purple tights with a pattern of different sized chains. Her silver heels are held with ankle straps and chains.
Accessories for the outfit consist of a white skullette key earring, a silver heart-shape lock earring, a black multi-chain necklace, and a black wrapped-chain bracelet. Her purse is a silver clutch wrapped with black chains.
Extras for the doll consist of a pink chain binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Abbey’s Fearbook.

Clawdeen is dressed as Little Dead Riding Hood, a fairy tail ghoul with a nose for trouble. She is wearing a red sleeveless dress that features black laces up the front and a black tulle under layer. The dress has multiple purple strips that run from the top to the hem and end with gold buckles. Two of the strips create should straps and have gold crossbones by the waist. 
Over the dress she wears a red cape with a hood. The inside of the cape is covered with black leopard print. Weaved purple boots with large collars, multiple straps, and gold buckles complete the outfit. 
Accessories consist of two gold hoop earrings in each ear, a black picnic basket, and a purple arm warmer with a black tulle cuff. Also included with this Target exclusive is a black brush, doll stand, and a Little Dead Riding Hood trading card.
Little Dead Riding Hood stood hooded in red, a bright full moon in the sky overhead.

A casket of goodies held in one paw, for her granwolf who was feeling kind of down in the claw.

"Now stick to the path, talk to none on the way; go straight to gran's house without delay."

"Yes mother," she said as she left with a bounce, little knowing another monster was waiting to pounce.

Draculaura is dressed as Snow Bite, a lovely fairy tale ghoul. She is wearing an off-the-shoulder dress featuring a green top layer with a puffed bust and an uneven dripping hem. Around the waist is a white bow with a pink dripping apple pattern. Under the green is a pink skirt with an outline of small black apple-skulls and larger shiny green apple-skulls. The skirt’s hem is serrated and embellished with black tulle.
Black pumps complete the ensemble. Each shoe has a pink bow wrapped around the toebox, a green leaf counter, and a translucent green dripping heel.
Translucent green accessories comprise of apple-skull earrings, an apple-skull barette, and a necklace. Her hinged purse is a translucent green apple-skull with dripping goo. Also included with this Target exclusive is a green brush, doll stand, and a Snow Bite trading card.
Once there was a kingdom where the ghouls were wondrous fair yet none could hold a candle to Snow Bite of the raven hair.

In manner she was proper and graceful, in attitude generous and kind; that she was considered fairest never crossed her mind.

For she shared a gothic cottage deep in a primeval wood with seven friends who were zombies and for the eight of them unlife was good.

Frankie is dressed as Threadarella, a sweet fairy tale ghoul with dreams of a better life. She is wearing a patchwork formal dress that has one puffy blue sleeve and a shiny silver shoulder strap. The bodice and skirt are blue with red diagonal crisscrossed lines. The skirt has a silver strip by the waist, a short blue top layer, and a black fishnet under layer. Connecting portions of the skirt is a hanging blue strip and hanging silver strip.
Light blue shoes are the last piece of the wardrobe. They have reddish-pink laces that are wrapped around the ankles and feature silver scissors for heels.
Accessories for the outfit consist of silver needle earrings, a tiara, and a purse. The tiara is made of silver needles, reddish-pink thread, and light blue accents. Her purse is a silver spool of reddish-pink thread and light blue beads. Also included with this Target exclusive is a black brush, doll stand, and a Threadarella trading card.
Once there was a lovely ghoul whose heart was sweet and kind she sewed all day with no time for play but for a better unlife she pined.

Her name was Threadarella and she lived with her step sisters three, who were totally catty and even quite bratty, not nearly as nice as she.

One day Threadarella told them about her grandest dreams but they shook their heads and laughed as they said, "You'll just fall apart at the seams."

Abbey is dressed for an international adventure. She is wearing a single shoulder dress covered with a pattern of purple & pink shapes. The angular shapes are of various sizes and create an ice crystal appearance. The bottom of the dress is adorned with a white faux fur hem.
Her white ice crystal wedges have crystal flowers on the toe and ankle straps. Translucent purple accessories consist of crystal earrings and a crystal necklace. Around her waist is a translucent blue belt made of icicles. Her handbag is made of translucent blue bricks with black handles.

The rolling cafe cart is etched magenta outlined by black wrought iron and detailed with swirls and spiderwebs. On the side of the cart is a black sign with “Cafe” and the Eiffel Terror in white with skullettes and swirls in the background.
The wheels and posts are teal and on two of the posts are illegible menus. On top of the translucent teal canopy rests a black bat. The cart has a black & gray coffinccino maker and a purple shelf where pastries are displayed.
A wrought iron table, chair, and bench is provided for ghouls to sit and enjoy their pastries and coffinccino. The purple table has a spiderweb design and a translucent pink umbrella with yellow dangling skulls. The chair is magenta with a spiderweb design and a skull seat. The teal bench has a skull on the back rest and a spiderweb design.
Accessories include a translucent blue glass and bottle, a coffinccino cup, a black vase with yellow dripping flowers, and a variety of pastries.

Clawdeen is ferociously fashionable for her visit to the City of Frights. She is wearing a sleeveless purple dress with black straps and an over-skirt. The dress is decorated with interconnected hexes and claw-like fleurs-de-lis. The skirt is black mesh with shiny gold leopard print and a black lace hem. Over the dress is a black faux fur vest.
On her feet are studded gold pumps with serrated claw heels. Gold accessories for the outfit include an Eiffel Terror earring, two studded hoop earrings, and a bracelet made up of four studded straps. Her gold triple-belt has a pyramid studded belt, a grommet belt, and a grommet belt with dangling crescent moons.
Clawdeen’s suitcase is purple with a gold serrated handle. The studded case is adorned with three straps held by gold crescent moons. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Clawdeen’s travel journal, and a mini journal.

The ghouls of Monster High will look freak-tastic as they drive around in this ornate purple convertible. It’s body, headlights, silver windshield frame, and black styling bar are all detailed with filigree designs and cut-outs. The front of the car has a skull emblem and a gray spiderweb grill. The back features a Scaris license plate and silver werewolf taillights. Each of the tires is decorated by a skull surrounded by silver filigree.
The dark purple interior has a spiderweb design. The seat belts, steering wheel, gargoyle shifter, and console are light blue. Under the rear-facing back seat is a trunk detailed with a large skullette.

Deuce has dressed for comfort during his travels abroad. He is wearing a green sleeveless hoodie with yellow scaly spots and black drawstrings. His argyle shorts are white with gray and green diamonds intersected by black diagonal lines.
Each of his black loafers feature a graphic of a green skeletal snake looped around a skull. He accessorizes with green sport sunglasses and a travel bag. The black scale bag has a skullette on the side and is held by a green frame with handles.

Draculaura is ready to experience the City of Frights. She is wearing an off-the-shoulder pink top covered in black printed chandeliers. The sleeves are black and the top is trimmed with pink. Her short skirt is light pink with pink & black zigzag stitching and a black tulle hem.
She accessorizes with black rounded-toe pumps and pink dripping heart earrings. Draculaura’s rounded travel bag is light pink and features a dark pink lid with a bow and skullette.

Frankie is ready for a shockingly good trip with her flowing black & white hair and energizing wardrobe. She is wearing a blue puffy sleeve top with black cuffs, black waist, and pink trim. A pattern of black nuts, screws, and Eiffel Terrors cover the top. Her silver pencil skirt features diagonal  blue stitched stripes and a black hem.
For shoes she has black knee-high boots with lightning bolt heels and yellow lightning bolts down the sides. She accessorizes with yellow sunglasses, a yellow earring with dangling nuts, and a blue screw earring.
Frankie’s suitcase is baby blue with a yellow lightning bolt handle. The case is covered with screws, gauges, lightning bolts, and a central pink rectangle with a baby blue lightning bolt. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Frankie’s travel journal.

Ghoulia is dressed for comfort as she embarks on her trip abroad. She has on a black hoodie dress with an image of a blue skeletal rib cage on the front. The front also has deep red pockets with black brain wrinkles. The hood is shadow striped in red, white, and black and the hem of the dress is red.
On her feet are blue sneakers that feature high heels and white skullettes on the sides. She accessorizes with red horn-rimmed glasses and red zipper slider earrings. Her red box handbag is detailed with dripping goo, a skull with sunglasses, and has a black lid with handle.

Jinafire is a creature of beauty with her long black & green hair, gold scale skin, and elegant wardrobe. She is wearing a purple dress covered with red flames and blue and black clouds. The collared dress has one long black mesh sleeve adorned with red scales. Around her waist is a gold belt that holds a black mesh cover-up with red scales.
Her pumps are red with ankle straps and gold heels. The bottom of the shoes are gold claws holding orbs. Accessories consist of red dangle earrings, a red bracelet, and a black hairstick. The stick has red tassels on each end and a large gold flower in the middle.
Jinafire has a red suitcase detailed with lavish designs, gold flames at the top, and a retractable black handle. The front of the case is adorned with a magnificent Chinese dragon. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Jinafire’s travel journal.

Rochelle’s pink & blue hair is pulled back into a ponytail for her exciting excursion. She is wearing a pink & black dress with black straps. The bodice is covered with a decorative scroll pattern and pink lace circles that run down the front. A black waist separates the bodice from the splotchy pink skirt which features a large image of the Eiffel Terror.
Light and dark gray striped tights lead into pink shoes. The shoes and their heels are made up of ornamental scrolls. On her head is a gray beret with a pink bow. She accessorizes the outfit with two black and two blue bangles.
Rochelle’s suitcase is gray with a pink handle made of decorative scrolls. The case is adorned with chains, fleurs-de-lis, and ornamental scrolls giving it a wrought iron appearance. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Rochelle’s travel journal.

Skelita is as lovely as ever with her long black hair, brown highlights, and colorful wardrobe. She is wearing a black halterneck top with purple and pink piping along the top trim. It is covered with a pattern of gray flowers and curled designs. The triple-layered skirt has jagged trim and multiple sections featuring different colors and prints. The prints include graphics of bats, spiders, safety pins, flowers, moons, hearts, and more.
On her feet are green wedge sandals with brown heels. Accessories consist of an ornate orange necklace, a brown etched belt, and a brown etched bracelet.
For travel she has a pink tombstone-shaped suitcase with a spinal column handle. The case is covered with elaborate curling patterns with a white skull in the center. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Skelita’s travel journal.

This 2-pack has a couple of cute and sassy werewolf sisters who look amazing.
Clawdeen is wearing a sleeveless high-waist dress that features a shiny green top half with purple leopard print. The bottom is black with two columns of horizontal gold stripes. One leg has a gold and purple tiger striped knee-high sock and her shoes are gold open-toed cut out heels.
Accessories for the outfit include four gold bangles on one wrist and two gold hoop earrings in each ear. Clawdeen’s hair is purple with black & green striped highlights in the front.
Howleen has on a half black & half orange tank top with yellow moons and blue clouds on the black half. Over the top she has a blue sleeveless hoodie with patterns of different colored paw prints. Her black shorts have a single blue suspender with yellow grommets and one leg also has blue trim with yellow grommets. On each leg she has a different type of sock. The short sock is pink mesh and the thigh high sock has blue, yellow & orange horizontal stripes. Her black shoes are accentuated by blue straps with yellow buckles.
Her accessories comprise of an orange paw print pendant and a yellow safety pin earring. On one wrist she has a blue, black & pink triple bracelet and on the other is a yellow vambrace with three yellow straps and blue buckles. Howleen’s hair is orange and styled into a frohawk. Also included with the doll is a blue & yellow paw print backpack with orange straps and Cushion, her pet hedgehog.

This 2-pack features twin werecat sisters wearing ferociously fabulous outfits.
Meowlody is wearing a sleeveless black top with white tiger print and a short red skirt with black stitching. Over the top she has a sleeveless black jacket with red trim and two wide horizontal silver stripes. On her feet are black open-toed knee-high boots with red heels and tied with black bows up the front.
Purrsephone has a sleeveless white top with black tiger print and the same short red skirt as Meowlody. The jacket is red with silver trim, six silver strips, and a wide horizontal black stripe with silver studs. Her open-toed boots are also black with red heels, but are tied with laces up the front.
Both sisters have matching accessories that include a red studded bracelet, a black & red studded bracelet, and a red fingerless glove. Their purses are red balls of yarn.
Included with the dolls is a shared diary. Journal entries of Meowlody and Purrsephone are differentiated by ink color.

Nefera looks absolutely stunning in her single-sleeved top and layered skirt. The top features a pattern of mummy bandages with pink and turquoise highlights. The skirt has a combination of ruffle strips that are black or have the bandage pattern. Attached to the skirt is a turquoise mesh sash that drapes over one shoulder. 
Around each ankle are leg warmers with the same wrappings pattern as her top. Her gold sandals each have black on the sides, pink & turquoise on the band, and a turquoise cobra for the heel.
She enriches her wardrobe with a translucent blue ring, a gold bracelet, and a gold snake necklace with a red disc pendant. One gold earring is a triangle and the other is a snake. Around her waist is a wide gold belt encircled by a golden snake and on her head is a gold head piece. Her gold wedge purse has turquoise on the sides and a gold snake handle.
Extras for the doll include a black brush, doll stand, her diary, and Azura, her pet scarab beetle.

Operetta resonates a creative beauty with her white jacket that features black spiderwebs, puffy sleeves and keyboard cuffs, a black collar, and a skullette button. Under the jacket is a black & purple patterned sleeveless top with white buttons. Her pants are blue jeans with red stitching and wide folded cuffs. The black & white shoes have white laces, a spiderweb pattern, and black treble clefs for heels.
Her outfit is accentuated with a variety of black & white accessories. She has a black die ring and a keyboard bracelet. Her white belt has black musical notes and black chains with even more notes. There are two different dice earrings: a white die earring with five black dots and a black die earring with six white dots. Over one eye she has a translucent black heart-shaped mask.
Extras for the doll include a black brush, doll stand, her diary, and Memphis “Daddy O” Longlegs, her pet spider. She also has a black & red guitar case adorned with white spiderwebs and black treble clefs.

Jackson looks knowledgeable and handsome in his academic attire. He is wearing a yellow dress shirt with a blue bow tie and over the shirt is a black, gray & green sweater vest with a black hem. His gray pants with white stitching lead to his blue & green sneakers with white laces and soles.
He carries a green satchel with a peace symbol on the flap. His glasses are black and he has a silver piercing in his left eyebrow. Jackson’s hair is short and black with yellow bangs.
Extras for the doll consist of a doll stand, his diary, and Crossfade, his pet chameleon.

Robecca looks technologically beautiful in her retro-futuristic ensemble. She is wearing a black pleather power shoulder jacket with gold trim along the edges of the short sleeves. Under the jacket is a a half pleather and half fabric sleeveless dress.
The top of the dress has blue straps and blue fabric with a pattern of tan & copper dots and diamonds. The rest of the dress is black pleather with blue horizontal stripes and a pattern of gears and mechanical parts in the middle. Over the skirt is a riveted blue cage. On her feet are copper knee-high rocket boots with laces up the front, tubing on the sides, and small wings. 
Accessories encompass copper goggles, dangling copper gears for earrings, and a blue & yellow vambrace on one forearm. Her round blue purse has a hinged clock face with a skull in the center. Robecca’s long wavy hair is black with blue highlights.
Extras for the doll consist of a brush, doll stand, her diary, and Captain Penny, her robotic penguin.

Rochelle looks delightful in her black & white striped top with crossed shoulder straps. Complementing the top is a black & silver puffy skirt with a pattern of fleurs-de-lis, lines, ribbons, and other images. She is wearing pink mesh socks and open-toed ankle strap heels that are gray stone with spiral designs.
Accessories for the outfit consist of a black tiara, necklace, earrings, and armband. Her gray stone purse has various carvings, a pink fleur-de-lis clasp on the flap, and a stone chain handle. Rochelle’s long lovely hair is pink with streaks of blue.
Extras for the doll consist of a brush, doll stand, her diary, and Roux, her pet gargoyle griffin.

Venus is sporting a black t-shirt with a yellow & pink collage that includes skullettes, hearts, “eco punk”, and other designs. Over the tee is a sleeveless jean jacket with yellow stitching and a pink & yellow image of a skullette with “eco punk”. Under the short black skirt are pink, black & yellow capri leggings. Each of her pink boots have green ivy laces and a large mouth full of green teeth.
Accessories include three hook-like earrings in one ear, a dangling green vine in the other, and a variety of green vine adornments. Around her neck is a vine necklace, vines on each forearm, and vines wrapped around her calves. Her canvas tote bag has a pattern of three images: “I”, a heart, and a skullette shaped Earth. Venus’s very long and straight hair is pink with green streaks.
Extras for the doll consist of a brush, doll stand, her diary, and Chewlian, her pet venus flytrap.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura, Frankie Stein & Ghoulia Yelps
dolls.description:
This Target exclusive 5-pack features Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, and a colorized version of Frankie Stein. The other dolls are Draculaura and Ghoulia Yelps who were previously released individually.
Clawdeen’s hair is long, purple, and has a streak of green. She is wearing a green one-piece bathing suit with black tiger stripes and a black waist. Over the suit is a green and purple tiger striped cover up with green and purple flowers. It attaches to her neck with a purple loop and black strap. Her purple sandals and triangle earrings are translucent. Two earrings are green and two are purple.
Cleo has her hair short with blue bangs. Her swimsuit is a a gold one-piece with turquoise straps. Wide-leg and high-waist cover up pants are over the suit. The cover up is brown and yellow with green palm leaves. Her sandals are translucent turquoise with each being supported by an Anubis heel. Her accessories include translucent turquoise wing earrings and a black & turquoise armband.
Frankie is wearing a blue monokini with blue straps, a pattern of clouds & yellow lightning on top, and a blue & white bottom. Over the suit is a blue cover up with the same cloud & lightning pattern. Her shoes are translucent blue with nuts for straps and heels. Her accessories are blue nuts for earrings and a bracelet.
The reissues of Draculaura and Ghoulia lack the tiki glasses and cards found with the individually packaged dolls. Also included with the 5-pack is a black brush.

This grayscale edition of Frankie may lack color, but not style. Her hair is cut into an adorable bob and she is wearing a fabulous black and shiny silver monokini. It has a pattern of clouds & lightning on top, silver on the bottom, and black straps. Around her waist she has a black cover up with the same cloud & lightning pattern. Her translucent gray sandals feature nuts for the heels and the straps.
Frankie accessorizes her outfit with a translucent gray nut-shaped bracelet and earrings. A doll stand is also included with the doll.

Draculaura is ready to sail away in her nautical themed outfit. Her pink & white striped one-piece swimsuit has boy leg style bottoms, a black mesh collar with white trim, and a pink bow in the front. Around her waist she wears a black mesh cover up with a pattern of pink anchors and other colorful images. Her pink sandals are adorned with anchor shaped heels.
Accessories for the outfit features a white sailor cap with black strap, a pink anchor bracelet, and pink anchor earrings. Her beverage is kept in a red flower glass with a white pistil and straw. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Draculaura card with a map of Skull Shores.

Abbey is super cool in her frosty Roller Maze wardrobe. She’s wearing a light blue dress with pink & white lines that give it a fractured ice appearance. Neon green trims the top of the dress and attaches a jagged over-layer of black fishnet.
Accenting the outfit is a variety of translucent items. There are pink skull knee pads, a pink necklace, a blue igloo helmet, and pink roller skates. The skates have snowy white soles with black and green wheels.
This version differs from the doll in the 2-pack due to a lack of tinsel in the hair. Included with the doll is a stand and a trading card of Abbey.

Abbey and Ghoulia are teaming up for the Roller Maze. Together they will be unstoppable while also looking freaky fabulous.
Abbey’s wearing a light blue dress with pink & white lines and neon green trim at the top. A black fishnet over-layer with jagged trim covers the top part of the dress.
Her translucent accessories consist of pink skull knee pads, a pink necklace, a blue igloo helmet, and pink roller skates. The skates have white soles with  hanging snow and black and green wheels.
Ghoulia has on a black, white, and green striped dress. It is adorned with a jagged frill collar, pink mesh sleeves, and covered in pink and black splotches.
Accessories comprise of a yellow dripping bracelet, translucent green glasses, pink knee pads with skulls, a pink brain-shaped helmet, and roller skates. The black skates have pink soles with green and blue translucent wheels.
This Kmart exclusive is almost identical to the individual releases. Abbey’s hair has tinsel which the other doll lacks and some versions have knee pads that are solid instead of translucent. Trading cards for both ghouls are included in the 2-pack.

Clawdeen looks ferocious wearing her wild Roller Maze outfit. It features a dress where half is black with two purple stripes down the front. The rest is green with black leopard print that is emphasized be a neon green mesh sleeve.
Skating accessories comprise neon green knee pads with helmeted skulls, a neon green helmet with leopard print and spikes, and purple skates. The skates also have leopard print and spikes as well as green soles with black and green wheels.
Included with the doll is a green stand and a trading card of Clawdeen.

For her Roller Maze debut, Frankie is sporting an amazing black dress embellished with a pattern of colorful neon nuts and one shoulder made of light blue mesh. A neon pink stripe runs down one side of the dress and a neon green stripe down the other. 
Her skater gear entails light blue knee pads with skulls, a light blue helmet etched with lightning bolts, and roller skates. The skates are light blue with lightning bolts, have black soles, and feature translucent green and yellow wheels.
Included with the doll is a neon green stand and a trading card of Frankie.

Ghoulia looks simply sweet in her black, white, and green striped dress. It features a jagged black collar, pink mesh sleeves, and pink and black splotches all over the dress.
Skating accessories consist of a yellow dripping bracelet, translucent green glasses, pink knee pads with skulls, a pink brain-shaped helmet, and roller skates. The black skates have pink soles with green and blue translucent wheels.
Included with the doll is a neon green stand and a trading card of Ghoulia.

Lagoona is ready to roll in her adorable Roller Maze ensemble. She is wearing a black dress with one teal strap, a pink stripe along the bottom, and an attached crop top. The single sleeve yellow top has a jagged hem and a pattern of pink and black piranha.
Her teal skating gear consists of knee pads with helmeted skulls, a fish scale helmet with dorsal fin, and skates. The fish scale skates are teal with black tail fins and pink and yellow translucent wheels.
Included with the doll is a teal stand and a trading card of Lagoona.

Operetta looks spectacular in her black & white halterneck dress. It features a pattern of colorful records, a black collar, and a black strip down the front with pink dots. Around her waist is a black belt with a record buckle.
Skater accessories include black knee pads with helmeted skulls, a black helmet with music notes, and a white heart-shaped eye mask attached to the helmet. Her white spiderweb skates have purple music note heels with translucent red and green wheels.
Included with the doll is a neon green stand and a trading card of Operetta.

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair with golden highlights. She has light brown skin, purple eyeshadow, black eyeliner, and fanged lips.
Her outfit features a gold top with a purple jacket that has a gold lapel collar. It is complemented by a short purple skirt with a studded gold waist.
She accessorizes with gold hoop earrings and a studded purple choker with a beaded pendant. On her feet are purple wedge boots with lots of straps and golden buckles.
Clawdeen is about 3 inches tall and stands upon a purple and black pedestal. The base has claw mark accents and “Monster High” with a Skullette.

Draculaura has long pig-tailed hair that is streaked black and pink. Her pale pink complexion is complemented by pink eyeshadow, dark eyeliner, red fanged lips, and a pink heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a silver top under a pink vest embellished with a silver jabot and a pink bow. Her short skirt has a tulle hem and matches her silver tights. On her feet are pink knee-high boots with black straps and laces.
Draculaura is about 3 inches tall and stands on a pink and black base. It is decorated with winged hearts and “Monster High” with a Skullette.

Frankie has long silver hair with streaks of black. She has a pale complexion, one blue and one green eye, dark eyeliner, purple eyeshadow, and deep red lips. Blue earrings decorate her ears and silver bolts protrude from her neck.
She is wearing a light blue dress with a silver chest, shoulders with puffy sleeves, and a light blue tie with a silver Skullette. Around her waist is a studded silver belt with hanging chains and a lightning bolt buckle.
Her legs are covered by silver tights and on her feet are striped black pumps. She is about 3 inches tall and stands on a black and blue base embellished with stitches, “Monster High”, and a Skullette.

Lagoona has wavy golden hair with streaks of light blue. In her hair are turquoise accents and a coral pink flower. She has pale turquoise skin, purple eyeshadow, teal freckles, and red lips.
Her gold top is embellished with a gold bead necklace with a seahorse pendant. Over the top is a 3/4 sleeve turquoise jacket. Turquoise shorts with gold fishnet and gold tights complete the outfit. On her feet are turquoise wedge sandals.
Lagoona is about 3 inches tall and stands on a black and turquoise base. It is decorated with etched waves and “Monster High” with a Skullette.

The pack supplied torsos that were not included in some of the early starter and add-on packs. They were offered for a short while at the Mattel Shop.
The pink torso was for the Dragon and the blue one completes the Sea Monster.
The other three torsos include upper arms and thighs. The yellow torso is for the Insect, the Skeleton has the white torso, and the Three-Eyed Ghoul is completed by the light blue torso.

This add-on lets you create a ghostly ghoul. It has white forearms and calves that transition to translucent hands and feet. Biceps, thighs, and a torso are not included.
The white head has yellow and gray eyes with a gray eyeshadow mask and red lips. Her short hair is a deep pink with purple highlights.
She has a halterneck dress with a jagged hem and a diamond print. The print has rows of skulls complemented by dripping black, white, and purple. Accessories consist of a dripping pink belt with lavender chains and translucent pink open-toe pumps with lavender chains.

This add-on creates a bird-like ghoul. She has pink forearms, pink calves, three-toed feet, purple hands, and purple wing forearms trimmed with black.
Her light pink head has green eyes, pink shadow, blue eyebrows, and pink lips. The hair is long and curly with pink highlights.
She has a strapless dress with an asymmetrical hem and a feather print that is black with shades of purple and pink. It is accessorized with magenta peep-toe wedges covered in feathers.

This add-on lets you create a manster with puma features. It has light blue forearms, hands, calves, feet, a tail, and a head. Biceps, thighs, and a torso are not included.
The head has a pale blue patch on the face, orange-brown eyes, a black nose, black whisker spots, and light blue lips. He has short black hair.
His outfit has a dark blue tank top with a sky blue claw mark graphic. Black shorts and black high tops with blue laces and blue claw marks complete the look.

This add-on creates a mermaid-like ghoul. It has light blue forearms with pink fins and hands with pink webbing. Instead of legs there is a turquoise fish tail with pink side and tail fins.
The head has purple eyes with turquoise shadow, purple eyeliner, teal eyebrows, and pink lips. Her hair is a curly blue with yellow streaks.
She has a black string halterneck top with a pink, black, blue, and light blue print. It is accessorized with two rope and scale belts. The blue belt has an anchor accent and the pink belt is decorated with a starfish and seashell.

The Mystical add-on has doll parts to create a pearly pink ghoul. It comes with hands, forearms, calves, feet, and a head. Upper limbs, hair, or clothing are not included.
There is a headband with a spiral unicorn horn and an extra head that is pearly green. The 75 face and body tattoos are glittery.

The Nocturnal add-on has doll parts to create a custom ghoul. Parts include orange hands, forearms, calves and feet, a tail, clip-on ears, and a head. Upper limbs, hair, or clothing are not included. 
There is an extra head that is green and 75 tattoos. The face and body tattoos are glow-in-the-dark.

Lab
The lab has a black base adorned with strings of gray chains. The pink lid has ornate embossed designs, a black Monster High crest, and is trimmed with pyramid studs. It has a Skullette and chain handle and is held shut by a pink Skullette padlock.
The inside of the lab has a blue work area with spiderweb etchings and cutouts for various doll parts. Attached to the lid is a black tattoo device with a water tube. When water is pumped and the lever is pressed a tattoo is transferred to the doll. A pink Skullette applicator is included for touch-ups.
Over 100 face and body tattoos come with the playset. Tattoos can be removed from the doll with warm soapy water. 
Doll
There are limbs, torso, and a head to create a light green ghoul. Her purple hair is long with blunt bangs. She does not have any facial features. 
Her short dress features wide black and gray stripes and pink sleeves with wavy black stripes. It is complemented by black pumps with Skullette ankle straps and pink stripes on the platforms and heels.

This starter pack lets you build your own Monster High dolls. It has two sets of body parts and two outfits.
Doll Parts
The cat is light pink with arms, legs, torso, cat ears, tail, and head. The forearms and calves are adorned with black stripes. 
Her head has blue cat eyes, green shadow, a pink nose, whiskers, and dark red lips. The hair is streaked blue and purple and styled in a bob cut with bangs.
The witch has light green arms, legs, torso, and a head. The head has green eyes, purple eyeshadow, and green lips.
Clothing
The first outfit is a black sleeveless dress with yellow ruffles along the neckline and hem. The ruffles are decorated with black stitch stripes.
Next is a black shirt with a dead green bird graphic. The shirt is complemented by a blue skirt with black tiger stripes.
Accessories consist of a black mini-hat, a black belt with a green Skullette buckle, and a pair of black open-toe pumps with winding straps. There is also a black Skullette brush.

This starter pack lets you build Monster High mansters. It has two sets of body parts and two outfits.
Doll Parts
The Gargoyle is speckled gray with arms, legs, torso, small wings, and a head. The head has knobby pointed ears, yellow eyes with gray shadow, and gray lips. 
The vampire is light pink with arms, legs, torso, and a head. On one forearm is a black bat tattoo. His head has red eyes highlighted with yellow and a fanged mouth. The hair is black, side swept, and has a patch of red on top.
Clothing
The first outfit is a classic Monster High uniform. The white athletic shirt has a pink collar, black sleeves, and a Monster High emblem. It is matched with black shorts trimmed with a jagged pink and white hem.
The second ensemble begins with a sleeveless black shirt that has red shoulders and dripping red horizontal stripes. It is completed with red cargo shorts.
Accessories include a black Skullette brush and black high tops with red tongues, brown laces, and serrated details.

This starter pack lets you build two Monster High dolls. It includes two sets of body parts and outfits.
Body Parts
The Ice ghoul has translucent blue arms, legs, and torso. The blue head has crystal-like eyes with light purple shadow and pink lips. Her long pink and blue hair is straight with blunt bangs.
The Blob has translucent pink and sparkly arms, legs, and torso. The sparkly pink head has orange eyes with pink and lavender shadow, blue eyeliner, and red lips. Her molded short pink hair has a drippy style with curled ends.
Clothing
The halterneck dress is black with a decorative print. It has pink icicle stripes, blue diamond stripes with Skullette snowflakes, and pink details.
Next is a form-fitting light blue dress with short sleeves. It has a print made up of pink drips and splatter. 
The last item is a pair of translucent pink pumps. They have ankle straps, gooey accents, and dripping heels.

This starter pack lets you build two Monster High dolls. It includes two sets of body parts and two outfits.
Body Parts
The mummy has gray colored arms, legs, torso, and a head. Most of the body parts are bandage wrapped with golden highlights. Her head has turquoise eyes with copper shadow, Eye of Horus eyeliner, and red lips. Her straight hair is purple and black with blunt bangs.
The gorgon is light green with scaly arms, legs, torso, and a head. Her head has yellow eyes with vertical pupils, orange eyeshadow, purple eyeliner, and red lips. Her green molded hair is scaly with a green mass of writhing snakes.
Clothing
The Egyptian-themed dress is pink with a single shoulder strap and a black waist. It features a print with a variety of pink and turquoise hieroglyphs.
The second dress has a purple diamond scale print, a black halterneck strap, and a jagged green hem.
One pair of shoes are included. They are gold peep-toe pumps decorated with brick-like rows and straps.

The starter pack includes two sets of body parts and two outfits. It is an updated version of Vampire & Sea Monster that includes a torso for the sea monster.
Doll Parts
To create a vampire there are pale pink arms, legs, torso, and head. The head has long black hair with purple highlights, purple eyes with lavender shadow, and red fanged lips.
The sea monster is blue with arms, legs, torso, and head. Squiggly tentacles are on the forearms and the calves have fins. The head has light green eyes, turquoise eyeshadow, and turquoise lips.
Clothing
The first outfit has a top with a purple halter neck, purple chest, and a gold bat wing accent. The bodice is black with purple helix stripes. The black skirt has sparkly black stripes and a ruffled purple hem.
Next is a one-shoulder black top with yellow bubbles and blue and purple splatter. It is complemented by a dark turquoise skirt with a print of wavy pink lines and orange circles.
For accessories there is a red bat wing barrette and black open-toe pumps with black and purple ankle straps.

This starter pack includes two sets of body parts and two outfits so you can build your own Monster High doll. It is a reissue of Werewolf & Dragon with an added torso for the dragon body.
Doll Parts
The werewolf is gray with arms, legs, ears, torso, and head. The head has crimson pink hair, blue eyes with pink shadow, and red fanged lips.
The dragon body is a scaly light pink with arms, legs, torso, and small green wings. The head has bluish green eyes with green scale shadow and purple fanged lips.
Clothing
The first dress has a black form-fitting bodice and a violet skirt decorated with an intricate black and lavender print. Over the top is sheer black jacket. It is frilly with a pattern of violet crescent moons.
The second outfit has a matching halterneck top and skirt. They have black trim and feature a split print. One is green speckled with black and white and the other is a chartreuse scale print.
Finally, there is a pair of black peep-toe wedges with crescent moon accents.

Abbey looks like an icy princess with her stunning outfit and shimmery strands accentuating her long white hair. She’s wearing an off-the-shoulder dress with a black bodice and serrated collar decorated with golden designs. The skirt features multiple layers that include black holed-mesh, blue tulle, purple tulle, black tulle, and a white tulle top layer embellished with gold snowflakes and a multi-pointed hem.
Shiny gold accessories consist of an icicle & snowflake circlet, ice crystal earrings, a snowflake pendant, an ice crystal belt, and icy wrist cuffs. On her feet are golden pumps with icicle designs and translucent white straps. Also included with this Walmart exclusive doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent white lantern.

Clawdeen looks magnificent with her long brown hair and stunning black mini dress. The dress features a pattern of gold crescent moons, a gold mesh halterneck, and a triple-layered open over-skirt. The skirt’s sheer purple top layer is embellished with gold crescent moons and zipper-like accents. The middle layer is white with black leopard print and the last layer is black holed-mesh.
Accessories consist of a dangling gold crescent moon earring, a gold zippered headband, a gold belt, and wrapped around each forearm is a gold zippered armband. On her feet are translucent purple wedges with purple zipper straps and gold platforms. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent purple lantern.

This playset includes Cleo de Nile sporting a ponytail full of long black hair and blue highlights. She’s wearing a one-piece swimsuit with a gold halter strap and intricate designs using black, gold, pink, and turquoise. Around her waist is a blue wrap with black & pink mummy bandage pattern.  Accessories for the outfit consist of a gold hair clip, gold dangle earrings, and gold ankle-strapped pumps.
The oasis features a hot tub, cabana, two lounge chairs, and a fire pit. The black skullette-shaped hot tub has two gold cut-out palm trees with turquoise leaves. An ornate gold shelf rests on the edge of the tub for delicious snacks. Snacks include a pink bat wing cocktail, a purple frozen beverage, and a bowl of peach colored fruit.
The cabana has a black wrought iron frame with ornate spider web designs. The cut-out roof is pink with translucent blue trim. A gold skull with a genie ponytail decorates the peak.
The gold lounge chairs feature similar cut-out patterns as the cabana and hot tub shelf. The black fire pit has spiderweb designs and rests upon spider-like legs. Covering the red flame is a removable light blue dome with decorative cut-outs and a spider resting on the top.

Draculaura is dazzling with her pink & black hair, pointed bangs, and golden strands. She is wearing a high-low dress that has a black bodice embellished with pink polka dots, pink trim, and gold string laced up the front. The triple-layered skirt begins with a sheer black layer decorated with spiderwebs and bat wing hearts. The middle layer is black holed-mesh with a serrated hem and the innermost layer is solid pink.
Golden accessories feature a spiderweb and bat wing circlet with matching necklace. Other golden accessories include two flared spiderweb bracelets and fanged heart earrings. On her feet are gold diamond-patterned wedges with translucent pink spiderweb straps. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent pink lantern.

Frankie looks priceless with her black, white & blue hair that is long and straight with sparkly gold streaks. She is wearing a sleeveless dress held by a turquoise tulle strap attached to a black tulle choker. The bodice is a split of dotted white cloth and black leatherette. The open-front dress has a triple tulle skirt with a layer of turquoise and two layers of black. The long double overlay features black holed-mesh over turquoise cloth decorated with a pattern of golden hex nuts and lightning.
Golden accessories for the ensemble include hex nut dangle earrings, two hex nut bracelets, a hex nut headband, and a lightning bolt chest piece. On her feet are gold wedges with translucent turquoise straps. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent blue lantern.

Gigi looks magical with pink & orange hair pulled into a high multi-banded ponytail. She’s wearing a lovely jumpsuit with a shiny top that is half blue, half pink, and detailed with black strips. The glittery black cummerbund-like waist leads into black knee-length harem pants. The pants are decorated with shimmery gold swirls and scorpion styled patterns.
The outfit is accessorized with gold scorpion earrings, a gold scorpion bracelet, and an ornate gold lantern that is held by a hook. On her feet are pink gravity wedges with curled tips and gold buckles. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Gigi’s diary, and Sultan Sting, her pet scorpion.

Howleen is adorable with her pointy ears poking through her black beanie. Her hair is long, straight and pink with blunt bangs. She is wearing a black dress covered with pink and blue paw prints, a yellow ladder-like zigzag, and a wide neon green hem. Over the dress is a dark purple leatherette jacket with silver accents. Hot pink fishnet tights are worn under the dress.
She accessorizes the outfit with a gold stud earring, black bangle, purple bangle, and a light blue belt with gold pyramid studs. On one hand is a black fishnet glove and on her feet are black lace-up knee-high boots with a double row of gold pyramid studs along the tops.  Her gold purse features light blue accent straps and a gold chain handle.
Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Howleen’s diary, and Cushion, her pet hedgehog.

Lagoona looks remarkable with her yellow hair, cute bangs, banded ponytail, and pink flower barrette. She’s wearing a strapless magenta dress with a serrated hem and pattern of black scale-like lines. The single sleeve and top layer of the dress are sheer turquoise. The sleeve is decorated with black trim and black frills along the neckline.
Translucent accessories for the outfit consist of pink dragonfly earrings, a green sea turtle pendant, and a green sea turtle bracelet. On her feet are translucent turquoise wedges with green seaweed straps and heels. She also has green seaweed goggles and a translucent blue fishbowl purse that holds Neptuna, her pet piranha.
Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Lagoona’s diary.

Spectra is ready to party in her sleeveless purple mini dress that matches her hair. The dress is worn under a purple tulle cover-up that features a black & gold neckline, bell sleeves, and a pattern of gold chains. It is held around her waist by a gold chain belt. On her feet are gold wedges wrapped in gold chains.
The party lounge has a light blue base and a center black backdrop that features an image of ghouls dancing under a skullette disco ball. Gold spiderweb ornaments with bat wings hang from the top. On each side of the backdrop are pink walls with decorative cut-outs and fold-out shelves. Further out are larger black walls decorated with spiderweb designs, cut-outs, and fold-out shelves that can hold the two translucent blue cocktails.
For music there is an ornate gold DJ table decorated with spiderweb and filigree designs. The table has black turntables, gold headphones, and white skeleton hands to hold the black coffin-shaped laptop. A matching gold pedestal chair accompanies the DJ table. Two pink coffins with black speakers and spiderweb accents are also included.
This playset folds into a carrying case with the black parts forming a decorative skullette with a pink cut-out bow on the front. The back of the case has an image of an oasis at night. An MP3 player can be connected to the built-in speakers in the base to play music.

Twyla is wearing a lovely ensemble that complements her wavy pastel green hair with blue stripes. She has on a 3/4 sleeve top that is dark purple with black vertical stripes dotted with spiders. The top’s black collar is accentuated by a black bow. 
Continuing the outfit is a black triple-tiered skirt decorated with seafoam green squiggles & swirls. Each tier of the skirt is trimmed with purple tulle.
Accessories consist of silver doorknob earrings, two lavender bangles, a black bangle, and a seafoam green bracelet with a dangling spiderweb dreamcatcher in the shape of a Skullette. Around her waist is a seafoam green belt with a skullette buckle and dangling spider. 
Her rounded blue bag has a black handle and features a seafoam green spiderweb dreamcatcher on the side. On her feet are purple Oxford pumps with seafoam green laces, black platforms, and swirling heels.
Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Twyla’s diary, and Dustin, her pet dust bunny.

Abbey is artistic and beautiful with her long white hair, pink & blue highlights, and silvery strands. She is wearing a short sleeve  black dress covered in a pattern of white ice crystals with blue or pink outer glows. The collar and hem are trimmed with blue faux fur.
Accessories consist of translucent blue skullette earrings, pink ski goggles, and a white icicle belt. On her feet are blue lace-up boots with dripping ice platforms and white frosted icy cuffs.
To create her white ice castle sculpture, Abbey has a blue chainsaw decorated with snowflakes. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

Draculaura has a pink and yellow streak in her black hair that is styled into a ponytail with bangs. She is wearing a yellow top with horizontal stripes of dripping pink. The neck has a pink bow and the sleeves are trimmed with pink tulle. The skirt is black with yellow and pink splatter and decorated with a yellow tulle hem.
