Tied around her waist is a pink apron with black crisscrossed lines and a serrated hem.
Accessories consist of pink skullette earrings and a yellow headband with bows. On her feet are white waffle textured booties adorned with studs. A pink skullette with crossed pink-tipped paintbrushes decorate the tops. The heels are pink paint tubes that squirt out the swirled pink platforms.
To paint, Draculaura has a pink heart-shaped palette and a white brush with a pink tip. Her artwork is a Picasso styled self portrait that is in an ornate pink frame bedecked with spiderwebs, hearts, a bat, and fangs. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

Robecca’s hair is black & blue with streaks of purple. She’s wearing a purple striped shirt with short puffy sleeves and two buttons on the front. Her black high-waist suspender skirt is decorated with a shimmery print of interconnected purple, blue, and silver wires, gears, and skullette sprockets. The suspenders are shiny blue and the hem is adorned with purple tulle.
Accessories consist of dangling copper clock earrings and copper welding goggles with a bow on top. On her feet are blue knee high boots with many rows of studded straps, copper platforms, and copper heels.
To create a metalworking masterpiece, Robecca has an old copper blowlamp. She has designed a robotic clock with a copper face. The mismatched creation has a copper leg, silver leg, silver arm, gold arm, and a gold crank. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

Skelita’s dress features a purple bodice with a swirly white rib cage print. The wraparound skirt is black and covered with a pattern of skullette flowers that are pink, purple, turquoise, or orange. The hem is trimmed with a scalloped pink lace. Over the dress she has on a black & turquoise striped vest.
Accessories begin with an orange-brown belt with a skullette flower. A matching headband with a turquoise skullette flower is worn in her black hair with streaks of brown and turquoise. On her feet are orange-brown sandals adorned skullette flowers, skullette pedestal heels, and turquoise skullette flowers on the foot straps.
Skelita is a talented sculptor who has created an ornate skull shaped urn. It is pink with three orange skullette flowers and sits upon a turquoise spiderweb-styled pottery wheel. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

The Art Class studio is designed to let the ghouls of Monster High be as creative as monstrously possible. There is an easel, kiln, and other art supplies for painting, pottery, and ice carving.
The black skeletal easel has a spinal column and three legs. The legs extend from the pelvis and are connected by a spiderweb. Skeletal hands hold the purple framed painting of Draculaura, Abbey Bominable, Robecca Steam, and Skelita Calaveras.
A pink cart and chair accompany the easel. The cart is pink with three shelves, a black top with inset cup, and black wheels. Resting on the cart is a skullette palette, a brush, and a pen. The chair is a pink skeletal hand with webbed fingers forming the backrest. It rests upon a black column with a pink pedestal.
The kiln is gray brick with a purple coffin-shaped door decorated with the Monster High crest and blue splatter. The top of the kiln has purple coffin-themed shelves with spiderweb backing. A purple wood shelf sits on the side of the kiln and is adorned with spiderweb accents.
Other art supplies consist of an orange vase sitting in a green pottery wheel, three red apples with worms, and a purple bowl of yellow eyeballs. A hammer and chisel is included to use on the translucent blue skullette ice sculpture.

Abbey Bominable
Abbey and Heath make a great team while learning how to cook. Together they make devilishly good foods that can be eaten hot or cold.
Abbey is wearing a short black dress with a black fur collar with black bow, short fur sleeves, a colorful pattern of crystal lines, and a pink mesh overskirt. To protect the dress she has on a blue apron with the Monster High logo and black mesh frills.
She accessorizes with a pink earring made of measuring spoons, a blue spatula earring, and a pink bead bracelet. Her shoes are translucent purple heels with bluish-white spots.
Heath Burns
Heath is wearing a black jacket with pink & white on the collar, shoulders, hem, and cuffs. The sleeves also have orange & yellow flames rising from the cuffs. Under the coat is a gray tee with an image of orange & yellow flames. 
Over his blue jeans he has a red apron with the Monster High logo. His shoes are black with red & orange flames on top and white soles. He protects his hand with a red spiderweb oven mitt.
Extras for the dolls include a pink bone spoon, black bone tongs, a measuring cup with green liquid, a half blue & half red plate, a purple canister with a green lid and an eyeball, a plate of yak cheese, a Home Ick notebook, and a brush.

This 2-pack features Cleo and Ghoulia wearing lab coats while studying to be mad scientists.
Cleo De Nile
Cleo’s white lab coat is trimmed with yellow bandages, has bandages hanging from the right sleeve, and has images of gems on the right side. Under the coat is a short strapless dress made of turquoise wrappings and a yellow mesh overskirt. For each leg there is a leg warmer with the same turquoise wrappings as the dress. Her shoes are turquoise sandals with gold straps and gold studs around the edges.
She accessorizes the outfit with a gold snake-shaped necklace, gold earrings with symbols from the periodic table, a gold bracelet, and a black triangle bracelet. Cleo also has gold safety goggles with a black strap and the head of a cobra on one side.
Ghoulia Yelps
Ghoulia’s white lab coat has a red & black brain wrinkle pattern on the collar and cuffs. Under the coat is a black dress with red trim and a colorful pattern of squares and symbols from the periodic table. Her white shoes have skullettes on the sides, blue laces, black toes, and red brain-wrinkled soles.
Her accessories are white cat-eye glasses, a black hair band with a red brain, red earrings with symbols from the periodic table, a red bracelet, and a black bracelet.
Accessories for the dolls include a beaker, flasks, skullette-shaped tubing, a Mad Science notebook, and a brush.

dolls.character: Lagoona Blue, Operetta, Robecca Steam, Rochelle Goyle & Gillington Webber
dolls.description:
This Target exclusive 5-pack features Gil Webber and Rochelle Goyle. It also includes Lagoona Blue, Operetta, and Robecca Steam who were previously released individually.
Gil Webber
Gil is wearing a teal tank top embellished with scales and black trim. His shorts are gray with a teal & white waistband, black drawstring, and teal elastic cuffs. On his feet are black shoes with white tongues, teal laces, and white soles with serrated teal edges. He has a clear dome helmet and a black duffel bag detailed with waves.
Rochelle Goyle
Rochelle’s purple leotard is adorned with pink fleurs-de-lis and other decorative designs. Around her waist is a black & white striped skirt with a black bow. Her black ballet slippers have white socks, black bows, and pink wedge heels. She also has a black headband and an ornate pink filigree purse. 
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona is wearing a black leotard with pink coral and white bubbles. Her mesh skirt is turquoise with seaweed and pink tentacles. She has pink seaweed shoes, a pink bracelet, and an aqua-blue scuba tank purse.
Operetta
Operetta has a black leotard covered with white & red dice. Over the leotard is a black & white spiderweb skirt. She has black & white piano key shoes, a red baguette bag, a purple heart-shaped mask, and a purple & white mini check headscarf.
Robecca Steam
Robecca has on a blue leotard with black steampunk filigree and a purple sheet metal waist cover-up. On her feet are bronze booties and in her hair is a bronze headband with a mini top hat. Purple accessories include a steampunk purse and wristband.

For the sleepover, Lagoona has straightened her long blonde hair with light blue highlights. She is wearing a black top with pink stitching on the edges. On the front, it is decorated with an image of a skullette wearing a sleep mask. Her shorts are aqua blue scales with a pink hem, pink waistband, and pink drawstring.
Lagoona’s sleep mask is aqua blue with pink and white outlined bubbles. Her turquoise fuzzy monster slippers each have yellow eyes, a fanged mouth, and pink fins. She also has a pink cup filled with a white drink, marshmallows, and seaweed hanging over the sides.

Robecca looks relaxed wearing her pajamas and her hair in a ponytail. She has on a light blue tank top with black straps, black frills, and images of gears on the front. Her blue shorts have a black & blue gear pattern, black frill accents, and a black bow at the waist.
Robecca’s brown sleep mask is designed to resemble steampunk goggles. Her copper monster slippers each have eyes, a mouth, and Victorian welding glasses. For the slumber party she has her iCoffin phone and gramophone dock so everyone can listen to music.

Spectra is looking spectacular for the sleepover with her long purple hair and purple outfit. Her light purple nightgown has puffy mesh sleeves, dark purple trim, and a purple bow by the neckline. The nightgown’s multi-point skirt is layered mesh with a pattern of light & dark purple chains.
Spectra’s sleep mask is purple and detailed with a pattern of chains. Her translucent purple slippers are fuzzy monsters with blue eyes and silver chains. The doll also comes with a purple tombstone-shaped tablet.

This Toys”R”Us exclusive has Toralei Stripe, Meowlody, and Purrsephone all dressed as fearleaders. The three werecats are each wearing a black one-piece cheerleading outfit with pink & white stripes at the hem and the waist. The front of the outfit features a pink & white Monster High logo. Their shoes are white, pink and black with black laces and white lightning bolt heels.
Toralei accessorizes with a silver stud earring in one ear and a pair of silver hoop earrings in the other. She come with a pink skullette megaphone. Meowlody has a black skullette megaphone and Purrsephone has a white one.
Also included with the dolls is a black brush and a black duffel bag with the Monster High logo, white handles, and a pink strap.

The Dressing Room playset includes a vanity, room divider, and two director’s chairs.
Vanity
The double vanity is black with a spider-embossed top, a spiderweb cutout back, and red and silver spiderweb accents. The front is turquoise with hanging strands and a red Skullette.
Above the countertop is a double mirror framed in black with silver bulbs. Outlining the frame are studded silver embellishments with magenta webbing. The mirrors can be removed and used as a coffin-shaped compact.
Vanity accessories consist of a turquoise perfume bottle, silver brush, a three-pack of hair rollers, and a red coffin-shaped compact.
Room Divider
The room divider has three turquoise panels. The panels are decorated with Skullettes, wings, and web-like cutouts along the tops.
Director’s Chairs
The chair frames are white and made up of bones with hands on the armrests. The rest of the chairs are red and the backs are shaped like bats.

The Premiere Party playset has a display case & photo backdrop, podium, settee, tall table, and stanchions & ropes.
Display Case & Photo Backdrop
The display case is pink with spiderweb etching and is trimmed with pyramid studs. The case is attached to a black wrought iron divider adorned with strings of turquoise beads and pink Skullette motifs.
The back of the case has a photo backdrop surrounded by pink Skullette motifs. The black backdrop has a pattern with the Monster High emblem, a coffin bean, “Monster High” and a smiling vampire.
Podium
The turquoise podium has a wrought iron design made up of beaded strings and spiderweb shapes. The front is decorated with a pink Skullette motif.
Settee
The seat is black with Skullette feet and ornate designs made up of studs and cutouts. The pink cushion has a scalloped edge and spiderweb tufts.
Tall Table
The tabletop is black with a studded edge and spiderweb cutouts. It rests on a turquoise pedestal with winding beads and web-like feet.
Stanchions & Ropes
The three stanchions are silver with spiderweb bases and black Skullette tops. They are connected by pink snake-like ropes.
Accessories
Accessories include a black microphone, a coffin-camera with a pink web bulb, and a “VIM” (Very Important Monster) badge and lanyard. Refreshments are in a tall batty glass, a silver cup with icy drips, and ridged sippy cups. Creepy snacks consist of a spidery treat and a bowl of monstrous goop.

Clawdeen hair is purple & brown and pulled to the side. She is wearing a form-fitting black dress with a pattern of purple claw marks, crescent moons, and gold star-like dots. The top of the dress and 3/4 sleeves are purple & black leopard print. The angled hem is adorned with layers of frilled purple mesh.
Accessories begin with a spiked crescent moon gold earring and an intricate gold necklace. The necklace is a choker connected to rows of beads with crescent moon charms that hang on her shoulders. Around her waist is a studded gold belt with additional rows of beads and a variety of charms. 
On her feet are gold peep-toe pumps decorated with wide ankle straps, rows of beads, studs, and a black crescent moon on each foot strap. Clawdeen’s light purple purse is a crescent moon with rows of dangling beads that end in little crescent moons.
It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Cleo’s hair is black with turquoise streaks. She is wearing a stunning off-the-shoulder dress that features a pattern of black & turquoise streaked strips highlighted by gold dots. Gold-flecked black tulle graces the top of the dress and trims the hem of the draped skirt.
Accessories start with a gold headpiece with three studded rows and snake and scarab accents. Around her waist is an ornate gold belt with rising snakes and hanging beaded strands adorned with Egyptian charms. 
On her feet are gold peep-toe pumps with studded platforms and heels. Each foot strap is enhanced by a black gem and the ankle straps are formed by intertwined snakes. Cleo’s gold purse features a scarab, intricate detailing, a beaded handle, and strings of dangling beads.
It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Draculaura’s hair is pink & black and worn in a high ponytail. She is wearing a black dress with a pattern of pink bats with white dotted wings. The sleeveless dress has pink bow straps, a serrated diagonal hem, and a shimmery pink underlayer with a serrated hem. 
Accessories begin with dangling black beaded earrings and a beaded necklace with rows of dangling beads. Around her waist is an elaborate pink belt with a row of pink beads with diamonds, a beaded middle row, and bottom chain with hanging beads and charms. 
On her feet are pink peep-toe heels decorated with strings of beads, a row of lips, and a black heart with bat wings on each foot strap.  Her pink beaded purse is in the shape of lips with fangs and is accentuated by strings of hanging beads.
It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Lagoona’s hair is long and blonde with pronounced blue streaks. She is wearing a lovely dress with a swirled pattern of black, pink, and turquoise. The sleeveless dress has wide silver straps and a black waist band. The tiered skirt features scalloped hems with a shimmery pink middle layer and a black bottom tier.
Accessories begin with a black beaded headband adorned with a nautilus and its wiggling tentacles. Around her neck is a beaded turquoise necklace with multiple strands and a variety of aquatic charms. On her feet are pink peep-toe seashell heels with strings of beads, a black pearl on each foot strap, and spiral seashell heels. Lagoona’s purse is a black jellyfish decorated with a beaded strap and tentacles.
It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Clawdia is adorable with her wavy yellow hair and golden ensemble. She is wearing a metallic gold dress with patterns of black stripes, moons, and stars. Over the sleeveless dress is a red suit jacket held by two black buttons and trimmed in black.
Accessories consist of two black hoop earrings, a black crossbones earring, black glasses, a black studded bracelet, and a gold necklace with a cutout circle. On her feet are red knee high socks accentuated by golden pumps covered with pyramid studs.
Included with the doll is a red iCoffin tablet, a red notebook, and black skullette pen. There is also a black brush, doll stand, and Clawdia’s diary.
Age: 19

Monster Parents: The Werewolf

Killer Style: Tribal Prep: I love to mix graphic tribal prints with some scholarly flair, and because Londoom is fangsolutely undead with fashion and literary history, both my brain and my wardrobe benefit. To paraphrase Spookspheare, "this is the stuff as screams are made on."

Freaky Flaw: Whenever I think, I chew. Pencils, pens, paper clips, gum... the corner of my iCoffin. One year Clawdeen got me a manicure for my birthday, but on the way home from the nail salon I got an idea for a story and well - let's just say little sis was not happy with what I chewed on that day.

Elissabat has lovely straight black hair with purple highlights. She is wearing a corseted dress with a purple top and a purple-laced black bodice. The ruffled skirt has a purple top layer and black mesh under layers. Over the sleeveless dress is a cropped top that is black & purple with sleeves that end in purple bell cuffs.
Accessories consist of one short and one long pair of purple dangling earrings and a translucent purple bat wing heart bracelet. On her feet are black knee-high lace-up boots with platform heels and rows of ruffled bands.
Included with the doll is coffin-shaped case with a DVD of her latest feature and a clawesome award. The gray trophy is a hand reaching from a movie reel. There is also a black brush, doll stand, and Elissabat’s diary.
Age: 1,601

Monster Parents: A Vampire

Killer Style: I am fangsolutely in love with lace, ruffles, silk and satin, as long as it's frilly and it's black or deep purple.

Freaky Flaw: I have terrible stage fright, so I must be completely prepared before I ever stand in front of an audience. I've been told I'm a natural on stage and in front of a camera, but that's only because I spend hours making sure I have my lines down. It's the only way I can do what I do.

Honey is awesome with her big & beautiful teal & light green spiral curl afro. She is wearing a lovely dress with a purple top, black lace collar, and black accents. Her teal & white skirt features a pink & purple floral print, a shredded hem, and a shredded black under layer.
Accessories consist of a black headband with an attached pink hat, pearl white stud earrings, a pearl bracelet, and a pink swamp moss belt. On her feet are pink ankle-strap pumps. Each scaled pump has eyes, nostrils, a snaggle toothed mouth, and a spiked tail for a heel giving them a gator-like appearance.
Included with the doll is a gray dual reel camera with spiderweb accents and a black clapperboard with “Monster High”, coffin outlines, and other designs in white. There is also a black brush, doll stand, and Honey’s diary.
Age: 115 in swamp monster years

Monster Parents: The Honey Island Swamp Monster

Killer Style: I am sweet in disposition, polite in manners, feminine in appearance and sociable in company. In short, I epitomize the modern southern ghoul. I am also strong, independent and capable - don't y'all forget it.

Freaky Flaw: I am a perfectionist. I believe there is always time to do something the right way and yes, I realize this can be tiresome for other monsters.

Viperine is fangtastic with her long pink & blond hair accentuated by the pink snakes that sprout from the back of her head. She is wearing a busy dress with a light blue top that features a black & pink floral & paisley print. The skirt is black with a pink, blue, and off-white print of Gorgon heads, flowers, and other designs. The bottom of the skirt has pink trim with a light blue ruffled hem.
Accessories consist of a pink snake headband, translucent pink snake glasses, and a pink necklace formed by a writhing ball of snakes. On her feet are pink knee-high lace-up boots decorated with waffle-like platforms, white fangs on the toes, and wiggling snakes at the tops.
Included with the doll is a light blue scaled case adorned with white fangs and a kissing snakes handle. There is also a pink makeup brush, a black makeup palette with eight skullette-shaped colors, a black brush, doll stand, and Viperine’s diary.
Age: 17

Monster Parents: Stheno [steth-an-uh] - Sister of Medusa

Killer Style: Hippie Boho Chic. I like to be comfortable AND I never like scaling back when it comes to mixing different colors, patterns and fabrics together.

Freaky Flaw: Some people are huggers. I'm a biter. I just can't help myself - it's the way I show affection. I try to remember to just shake hands, but sometimes I forget.

Frankie’s hair is long, straight, and worn in a ponytail. The bangs and front are streaked black & white while the rest of her hair is white with a big blue streak. She is wearing a black shirt with the Monster High crest surrounded by white stitches. It is trimmed with yellow and sleeves are blue with black and white crisscrossed lines and stitches. Her miniskirt features the same pattern as her sleeves.
Accessories for the outfit consist of black lightning bolt earrings, black and blue skullette-shaped bangles, and inverse gravity shoes. One shoe is black with a blue platform and the other is blue with a black platform. Frankie shows off her school spirit with an over-sized black & white hand. It has pink fingernails, the Monster High logo on the palm, and “#1” on the pointing index finger.

Slo Mo’s hair features blue spikes on top and the sides shaved short.He is wearing a purple t-shirt with the Monster High crest surrounded by black dripping goo. His shorts are blue and stitched with white. 
On his feet are black high-top sneakers with white toe caps and soles. Slo Mo cheers for his school by waving a pennant. It is black & pink with white zigzag lines and the Monster High crest.

Spectra’s long straight hair is made up of varying streaks of purple and is held back with a blue headband. She is wearing a black top with pink trim that sports the Monster High crest wrapped in a pink chain. Her blended skirt is pink & purple with a reverse scalloped hem and a pattern of overlapping chains. 
She accessorizes with dangling black skullette earrings, two blue skullette-shaped bangles, and two black ankle shackles. On her feet are pink pumps that are decorated with a chain link texture. A pink & white pompom helps Spectra cheer for her school.

Venus has very long and lovely pink hair that is streaked with green and shaved on one side. She is wearing a black tee decorated with the Monster High crest and a green vine. The collar is pink and the sleeves and hem are serrated. The front of the shirt has a pocket with a green & pink floral vine print. Her miniskirt is trimmed in pink and has the same print as the shirt pocket.
Accessories consist of a black ivy earring, a green ivy earring, and green ivy arm wraps. On her feet are pink peep-toe boots with studded straps and wedge heels decorated with ivy. Venus cheers for her school with a blue skullette-shaped megaphone.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Ghoulia Yelps, Rochelle Goyle & Venus McFlytrap
dolls.description:
This 4-pack features a group of ghouls dressed to thrill. Clawdeen, Ghoulia, and Venus are only available in this Walmart exclusive.
Clawdeen is wearing a lovely form fitting black dress with a gold zipper pattern and gold neck strap. Over the dress is a purple & black tiger stripe crop top with matching arm warmers. On her feet are purple peep-toe platform wedges. Accessories for the outfit consist of a gold spiked headband, two gold & two black hoop earrings, a spiked black bracelet, a yellow bracelet, and a black & purple iCoffin phone. Her purse is a yellow paw print with a gold handle.
Ghoulia has on shimmery blue dress with a red collar, black bow, and black mesh puffy sleeves with red trim. The shorter overskirt is black with a print of red and white cat eye glasses. It has a red waistband and is held by white suspenders. On her feet are wedges made with interlocking white bones resting on red brain wrinkle platforms. She accessorizes with a red headband, red earrings, red & white bangles, and a red & black iCoffin phone. Her quilted brain purse is red with two handles.
Rochelle’s one-shoulder dress has a black & white filigree print embellished with shiny purple designs. The folded neck has pink ribbon trim and the three irregular ruffles are pink leatherette. Accentuating the dress is a black & white striped scarf, shiny pink arm warmers, and pink peep-toe pumps with fleur-de-lis accents and silver fleur-de-lis heels. Other accessories include two silver fleur-de-lis hair clips and a pink & black iCoffin phone. Her black & pink wrought iron purse has two pink handles held by silver fleurs-de-lis.
Venus is in a lovely dress that features a pink bodice decorated with a print of black ivy. The skirt is layered pink ruffles. The top of the dress, single sleeve, and short overskirt are sparkly black. Sparkly black leg warmers lead into green pumps adorned with pink flowers and twisted vine heels. Accessories include green ivy arm wraps, a studded green belt, and a yellow & black iCoffin phone. In one ear she has three pink rose earrings and the other has a green ivy earring. Her purse is a pink flower with a green ivy handle.

Lagoona’s long hair is blonde with blue streaks and pulled into a ponytail. She is wearing an adorable black dress decorated with pink sharks and shiny pink & blue bubbles. Over the dress is a shiny blue tie-front crop top with pink accents. Around her waist is a pink scale belt with a silver shark buckle and on each wrist is a shimmery pink & blue cuff. Her turquoise wedges have seaweed accents, shark bite heels, and three pink fish scale straps with seashell buckles.
Other accessories consist of silver shark earrings, a turquoise seashell necklace, a silver compact, a black & turquoise iCoffin phone, and a silver & pink shark perfume bottle. Her black purse has a turquoise shoulder strap and is decorated with turquoise seaweed. The white & pink mouth-like flap features a black fish. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Lagoona’s diary.

Rochelle is beautiful wearing her one-shoulder party dress that is black decorated with a white filigree print and shiny purple designs. The folded neck has pink ribbon trim and the three irregular ruffles are pink leatherette.
Around her neck is a black & white striped scarf and on each arm is a shimmery pink arm warmer with black trim. On her feet are pink peep-toe pumps that feature fleur-de-lis accents and silver fleur-de-lis heels.
The pink & black wrought iron styled purse has double handles held by silver fleurs-de-lis. Other accessories consists of a pink fleur-de-lis bracelet, a pink compact, and a pink & black iCoffin phone. Silver fleur-de-lis clips keep her long pink hair with teal streaks out of her face. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Rochelle’s diary.

Spectra is gorgeous with her long purple hair, magenta streaks, and adorable top hat. The small black hat is decorated with a bow that is purple with black chain links.
She is wearing a black sleeveless dress covered in a pattern of shiny silver and purple chains. Around her waist is a purple ribbon belt with silver buckle. Over the dress is a sleeveless trench coat that is translucent purple. On her hands are purple keyhole gloves and on her feet are silver pumps that feature purple platforms, multi-chain ankle straps, and chain link heels.
Accessories consist of silver chain & padlock earrings, a multi-layered silver chain necklace, a silver compact, and a black & purple iCoffin phone. Her silver purse has a purple stripe on the sides, double ring handles, and is wrapped in silver chains. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Spectra’s diary.

Clawdeen looks fabulous with her two tone hair that is brown with a black underlayer. She is a Toys”R”Us exclusive that comes with three different ferocious outfits.
She is wearing a green sleeveless tee with black tiger print and gold trim. Over the shirt is a black leatherette vest with a purple collar, purple hem, and gold zipper. Around her waist is a black belt with gold hoops that accentuate her purple capri pants. The pants lead into gold knee-high peep-toe  boots with black heels.
The second outfit is a shimmery purple & black bandage dress; the black portions feature a golden leopard print. The dress has black & gold straps and a frilly black & gold hem.
Lastly she has a purple long sleeve shirt with an image of a wolf on the front. It has a green & black tiger print collar, cuffs, and hem. Completing the wardrobe are dark blue shorts covered with shiny gold splatter.
Clawdeen has two extra pairs of shoes. They are studded black pumps with fang-shaped heels and purple lace-up booties that have white skulls on the sides.
Accessories consist of a black armband, green armband, black studded bracelets, gold bangles, green bangles, a gold multi-finger ring, and a purple fingerless glove on her right hand. Two translucent purple hoops are in her right ear and two translucent green hoops are in her left ear. The doll’s green purse resembles a boombox with black speakers and knobs.
Clawdeen comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Clawdeen Wolf”.
It's no secret that I love all things fashion related, and even though lately I've been designing my own line I still like to go to the maul, especially to check out the shoes. I must confess that shoe design is the weak part of my game. I think it's because they're kind of like ice cream to me. I know the ingredients, I know how it's made, but sometimes I'd rather just enjoy instead of focusing on all the details.

xx Clawdeen

Scarah has plenty of choices when she wants to look specter-ific, This Toys”R”Us exclusive comes with three outfits, three pairs of shoes, and lots of extras.
Scarah is wearing a pink shirt with a skullette pattern and a pair of black shorts. Over the outfit is a white leatherette knee-length coat with a green belt. On her feet are white knee-high boots embellished with silver heels and silver zippers up the sides.
The next ensemble is a shimmery green dress with a halterneck. The dress is accentuated with a white double chain necklace.
Her third outfit features a patchwork top. Part of the top and one sleeve is a black skullette pattern. Another part is white with a pattern of pink, green, and black safety pins. One sleeve, the stripe down the front, and the rest of the top is pink. Covering her legs are black & light green tights with random small skullettes and a torn appearance.
Shoes for the outfits include green wedges and silver heels. Accessories consist of white sunglasses, a black molecular necklace, two white square bracelets, two green square bracelets, and a pink bangle. The doll’s green tufted purse has a white up the side with a green skullette and white dots on the handles.
Scarah comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Scarah Screams”.
Sure, now being a more traditional ghoul my own self I'm not one to be chasing after every fashion will-o-wisp that comes floating over the moor, don't you know. But every once in a green moon I like to carry myself over to the maul and do a bit of looking around. I usually end up though at a fashionably frightening little boutique where the owner can practically read me mind, which is a good thing, since it's terribly hard to ask for help when the store lurk interprets every question as a pronouncement of doom.

xx Scarah

Cleo is lovely with her black bob cut hair and turquoise streaks. She’s wearing a sleeveless turquoise leotard covered with yellow and darker turquoise squiggly lines. Gold ribbons wrap around the top and one forms a single shoulder strap. Complwmenting the leotard are teal knee-length harem pants with the same squiggly line pattern.
Accessories consist of dark gray sunglasses, turquoise triangle earrings, purple wing earrings, a purple studded choker,  a black ouroboros bracelet, and a purple cuff. Around her waist is a pyramid studded gold belt with a pointed front piece. 
As the name suggests, Cleo has multiple pairs of shoes. The first pair are gold cage sandals with hourglass heels. The next are gold wedges with turquoise bandage wraps. The final pair are black wedge sandals with multiple purple straps. 
To carry all her extras, Cleo has a turquoise tote decorated with black stars, yellow diamonds, and yellow bandage wrapped hearts. Also included with the doll is a black brush and doll stand.

Draculaura’s beautiful black has pink streaks and is worn in a side ponytail. Her outfit begins with a yellow spaghetti strap top and a pink damask print pencil skirt with four black buttons at the waist. Over the top is a black, pink, & yellow plaid capelet with white lace trim and a black ribbon fastener.
Accessories consist of black sunglasses, yellow skullette earrings with bow cut-outs, pink skullete & crossbones earrings, and a black bracelet.
Multiple pairs of shoes are included with the outfit. The first are black wedges with ankle straps and heart cut-outs in the heels. Next up are pink pumps with black platforms and heart shaped heels. The last pair are yellow wedges adorned with pink hearts.
For all her accessories, Draculaura has a a pink & black striped tote decorated with fanged hearts and lips. The center of the bag has a black & white bat wing heart inside a white circle with pink polka dot hearts. Also included with the doll is a black brush and doll stand.

Catty looks glamorous wearing her elegant ensemble inspired by her Friday the 13th debut. Her single shoulder dress has a silver bodice held by a black tulle strap. The shimmery bodice is adorned with a black crack pattern and “13” in pink. 
The long and shredded double-layered skirt is embellished with silvery white mesh around the waist. The solid pink layer of skirt complements the pink tulle over-layer that is enriched by shiny silver speckles.
Accessories for the dress consist of two translucent pink hoop earrings, a translucent pink “13” earring, and an elaborate shiny magenta necklace. On her wrists are three studded magenta bracelets and one silver bracelet. For shoes she wears shiny silver knee-high boots etched with a cracked pattern. 
Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, magenta microphone, and Catty’s diary.

The Die-ner is where all the ghouls love to hang out and eat some spook-tacular treats. The playset includes Draculaura, a bar & kitchen, two chairs, a dining table, and a bench.
Draculaura
Draculaura has straight black hair with pink streaks and bangs. She is wearing a black halter strap dress with a pink front that features a row of black hearts and a bat silhouette. The hem of the dress is embellished with a black mesh trim.
Accessories consist of a pink headband with heart cutouts, pink bow earrings, a pink scarf with black heart-shaped polka dots, and a pink bracelet with heart charms. On her feet are black knee highs with pink cuffs and pink & white oxford pumps.
Die-ner
The bar & kitchen is a silver tabletop with red & white diamond designs and black claw legs with spiderweb accents. The top of the table features a red counter with a black window frame. 
Hanging from the frame is a spiderweb order wheel and two pink & yellow spiderweb lights. At the top of the frame is a pink coffin-shaped clock and sticking out the side is a pink and black skull & crossbones sign with the bones replaced by a fork and spoon. 
Behind the counter is the grill and oven. Complementing the bar are two black pedestal chairs with spiderweb etchings and cutouts.
The coffin-shaped dining table is silver, outlined with studs, and features a skull & crossbones with a fork and spoon replacing the bones. The table rests upon three black claw legs with wing accents. With the table is a red tufted bench that sits on a black stand. The stand has spiderweb etchings and is trimmed with studs.
Accessories consist of a black coffin register, a blue mini-jukebox, a blue milkshake mixer, a coffin-shaped tray, two red cups, a black cauldron, a yellow sandwich, a winged bowl, and a black cake stand with cover.
There are two versions of the Die-ner; this one and a playset that also includes Operetta.

If you want food that is to die for, the Die-ner is where you need to go. This playset includes Draculaura, Operetta, a bar & kitchen, two chairs, a dining table, and a bench.
Draculaura
Draculaura has long black hair with streaks of pink and bangs. Her halter strap dress is black with a pink front decorated with a row of black hearts and a bat silhouette The hem of her dress is black mesh.
She accessorizes with a pink heart cutout headband, pink bow earrings, a pink charm bracelet, and a pink & black heart polka dot scarf. Accentuating  her pink & white oxford pumps are black knee highs with pink cuffs.
Operetta
Operetta has wavy red hair with a streak of black. She is wearing a black & white diagonal gingham check top with skullettes in the black squares. Complementing the top is a black pencil skirt with swatches of the gingham check along the flared hem.
Red accessories consist of a heart-shaped eye mask, a spiderweb earring, and a piano key belt. Tied around her neck is a black & white polka dot scarf. Her red peep-toe wedges have black tips and piano key platforms.
Die-ner
The bar & kitchen has a silver tabletop with red & white diamond designs and black claw legs with spiderweb accents. The red counter has a black window frame with a spiderweb order wheel and two pink & yellow spiderweb lights. The top of the frame has a pink coffin-shaped clock and sticking out the side is a pink and black skull & crossbones sign with the bones replaced by a fork and spoon. 
Behind the counter is the grill and oven. Two black pedestal chairs with spiderweb etchings and cutouts come with the bar.
The coffin-shaped dining table is silver, outlined with studs, and features a skull & crossbones with a fork and spoon replacing the bones. The table rests upon three black claw legs with wing accents. With the table is a red tufted bench that sits on a black stand. The stand has spiderweb etchings and is trimmed with studs.
Accessories consist of a black coffin register, a blue mini-jukebox, a blue milkshake mixer, a coffin-shaped tray, two red cups, a black cauldron, a yellow sandwich, a winged bowl, and a black cake stand with cover.
There are two versions of the Die-ner; this Walmart exclusive and a playset with only Draculaura.

Headmistress Bloodgood always looks her best when overseeing the students of Monster High. She keeps her black & purple streaked hair in a bun which allows her to easily remove and reattach her head depending on her mood.
Her outfit begins with a white collared shirt, pink tie, shiny black leggings, and black riding boots. Over top is a long purple overcoat held closed by two gold buttons. The coat is embellished with black shoulder bands and pink strips that run from the collar to the sides. White ruffles decorate the collar and the pink cuffs.
Nightmare, Bloodgood’s trusty companion, is always nearby. The horse is blue with dark bluish gray hooves and red eyes. His mane and tail are purple streaked with magenta. He wears a purple bridle and removable saddle. Each side of the saddle is decorated by a white skullette with pink bow.

The Home Ick classroom is where monsters learn how to make the most terrifying recipes. The classroom has a refrigerator, work station, stools, and lots of accessories.
The purple refrigerator is coffin-shaped with four storage shelves. The clear door has a pale green bone handle and features etchings of the Monster High crest and spiderweb trim.
The work station has a magenta counter top with black spiderweb burners, a black shelf, and a sink with a black dragon faucet. The counter top rests upon black legs and a purple oven. The oven has skullette-shaped knobs and a windowed black door with a pale green bone handle and spiderweb etchings.
Two stools accompany the work station. The pink seats and tall black pedestals are decorated with spiderweb designs.
Food and ingredients consist of a clear canister with teal eyeballs, a beaker with peach goo, a pot with bubbly green goop, a light green egg carton, and a bundt cake on a black stand. Cooking supplies include a bundt cake pan, a blue mixing bowl, a purple hand utensil, a light green spoon, and a lavender stand with a recipe book.

Jane looks magnificent with her black hair, pink highlights, and wild wardrobe. Her hair is pulled into a pony tail with a hair bump and is held by a red hairband adorned with a skullette surrounded by feathers.
She is wearing a purple & blue leaf print top with black faux fur shoulders and an asymmetrical hem. Beneath the top is a dress that features a pink bodice with diagonal stripes and a light blue mesh skirt. Under the skirt are black capri leggings with a serrated hem. Completing the outfit are mismatched blue wedges; the right is a gladiator sandal and the left is a winding snake-strap sandal.
Jane loves to accessorize. She has a light blue bone with feathers in one ear and a light blue claw in the other. Around her neck is a red three ring choker attached to a statement necklace with claws. On one arm is a dark blue bracelet and the other has a black fishnet sleeve, pink bangle, and light blue bangle. Around her waist is a dark blue belt decorated with three skullettes; the center one is larger with a red bow and hanging feathers. 
She carries a dark blue purse and walking stick. The quilted handbag has a red handle, feather, and skullette clasp. Inside the bag are three pieces of paper. The walking stick features blue feathers around a skullette knob with pink bow. The stick is also a working pen. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Jane’s diary, and Needles, her pet sloth.
Age: 15 or 16

Monster Parents: Doctor Boolittle

Killer Style: I suppose one would call my style jungle chic. I simply adore faux fur, animal prints and feathers. I also have an absolutely smashing walking stick I cannot stand to be without.

Freaky Flaw: Spending my formative fears on a jungle island with only the companionship of animals did little to prepare me for the company of other monsters in large groups. When I find myself in that situation my pulse races, I breathe very fast and I start looking for places to hide.

Pet: Needles is my pet voodoo sloth. I love him dearly but he is always getting stuck so I constantly must make a point of telling him to be scareful.

Favorite Activity: I love a good trek. There's nothing quite as peaceful and invigorating as exploring the wilderness and meeting the creatures that live there.

This playset combines two previously released items: Dead Tired Draculaura and the Jewelry Box Coffin. Draculaura is wearing a cute polka dot pajama set. The shirt is pink with white polka dots on the shoulders, a white jabot with black bow, and white frills on the hem and sleeves. Her knee length pants are pink with white polka dots and white frills. She also has pink monster slippers with black wings.
The black coffin has black & pink filigree, pink tufting on the lid, and pink rails. When opened by the hinge there is a pink jewelry compartment where trinkets can be stored. When the lid is raised vertically it forms a four-poster bed with a pink tufted interior. The bed comes with a pink pillow, a pink & black blanket with white, a white heart-shaped tray, a pink cup & saucer, and a journal with a white pen.

This playset includes a vanity, chair, and shower. Everything a ghoul needs to help make herself beautiful.
Vanity
The vanity has three black squirmy tentacle legs that hold a translucent blue shelf and a coral pink sink. The faucet and handles on the sink are silver seahorses.
Above the sink is a mirror outlined by an aqua blue octopus. Hanging from two of the tentacles are translucent purple jellyfish accents.
Chair
The chair has three legs made up of intertwined aqua blue tentacles. The seat is black coral with a pink Skullette emblem on the back.
Shower
The stand-up shower has a coral pink seashell tub with a light blue doll stand and a black tentacle pipe. The pipe has a translucent blue basket, silver knobs, and a translucent purple jellyfish shower head.
A round rod is at the top of the pipe and it holds a translucent blue curtain. The curtain is decorated with a print of seahorses and seashells.
Accessories
Bathroom accessories include a blue fish bottle, a pink seahorse bottle, and a purple loofah.

The playset includes Spectra’s bed and a bed for her pet ferret, Rhuen.
Bed
The floating bed has a magenta mattress decorated with crisscrossed chains and a Skullette. The jagged hem is trimmed with translucent lavender chains and the bed “floats” with the help of translucent pedestals.
The headboard and footboard are black wrought iron with skull topped posts. The footboard has a built-in magenta TV with an image of a spooky house.
Translucent lavender chains hang from the headboard and a magenta skull rests at the top. A small candle also sits on the headboard.
Accessories
Covering the bed is a blanket that has shades of pink and purple with a hoop and chain link print. The pillow has diagonal stripes of black and pink outlined in white.
Bed time accessories consist of a pink tombstone tablet, a purple sippy cup, and Spectra’s journal. Everything fits on a fuchsia breakfast tray with wrought iron designs.
Pet Bed
Rhuen’s bed is a basket formed by translucent lavender chains. The inside of the basket is magenta with a quilted bottom.

Abbey is ready to have fun at the festival with her hip sixties style. It begins with her straight white hair, pink and blue streaks, and blunt bangs. Wrapped around head is a black headband scarf decorated with beaded lines. Her groovy getup features a peasant top with a purple & light blue gradient, bell sleeves, and a serrated hem. Completing the outfit is a purple & light blue splattered miniskirt with a frayed hem.
Translucent accessories consist of a blue snowflake earring, a purple ice crystal earring, and a blue icicle belt. On her feet are translucent blue knee-high boots made of dripping ice. Purple diamond-studded straps adorn the insteps and ankles. Around Abbey’s neck is a V.I.M. pass that gives her backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival.

Clawdeen is ready to boogie in her fabulous purple jumpsuit. The sleeveless suit features black trimmed armholes, a black collar, and a yellow design outlined in orange running down one side. The design is made up of skullettes, dots, diamonds, and crescent moons. The ensemble is completed by a pair of gold knee-high boots decorated with zippers, cut-outs, and black claw heels.
Accessories for the outfit begin with four earrings: two gold hoops, a gold oval earring, and a gold hoop with three dangling chains. Two gold and one black bangle are on one wrist and a fingerless black glove is on the opposite hand. Around her waist is a black triple wrapped grommet belt. A V.I.M. badge hangs from a lanyard around her neck which gives Clawdeen backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival.

Draculaura
Draculaura is pink perfection with her high ponytail and pink highlights. She’s wearing a sleeveless pink leatherette dress embellished with a pink tulle overskirt. Over the dress is a sheer black crop top with long sleeves and a pattern of hearts and heart outlines. 
On her feet are pink wedges with bows in the back and heart cut-outs in the heels. Accessories consist of pink dangling bat earrings and a black bat-wing heart belt.
Clawd Wolf
Clawd is wearing a comfortable outfit that complements his brown & teal streaked mohawk. His tank top is black with teal trim and a pattern of teal outlined crossbones. 
Black jean shorts with teal stitching and teal flip-flops complete the ensemble. Accessories consist of yellow shutter glasses, a teal watch, and a gold hoop earring.
Draculaura and Clawd each have a V.I.M. badge that gives them backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival. Two black doll stands are also included with this Kmart exclusive.

Venus is punk perfection in a concert outfit that accentuates her long pink hair and unique style. She’s wearing a black one-shoulder dress decorated with irregular wedges of pink, purple, and green patterns. The hem is adorned with a black mesh frill. Over the dress is a pink crop top with a jagged hem and a print of light pink skullettes.
The outfit is accessorized with a translucent green ivy earring, a translucent green spiked belt, and a pink studded bracelet. Wrapped around her forearms and calves are green ivy wraps. On her feet are black lace-up booties with folded cuffs and ornate pink soles and heels. Around her neck is a V.I.M. pass that gives Venus backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival.

Catrine looks purr-fect in her back-to-school outfit that complements her light purple hair with pink and purple streaks. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that features irregular black stripes separated by pink, blue, or shimmery purple. 
Around the pink waist and along the hem are black scalloped ruffles detailed with shimmery purple. The dress’s blue ribbon straps are hidden by a black sweater shrug.
Accessories consist of a black bracelet, lavender bracelet, a light blue tulle scarf around her neck, and a black bow on her tail. Her pink bag is adorned with black bows, side pockets, and two black handles secured by skullettes. On her feet are lavender peep-toe platform heels made up of a filigree of swirls.
Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, Catrine’s Scaremester diary, and a lavender coffin-shaped compact. Inside the compact are four ring pastels of different colors: aqua, pink, black, and white.

Clawdeen is ready to go back to school with her fabulous multi-colored hairdo and matching outfit. Her shoulder length brown hair has bright green highlights on one side and purple highlights on the other.
Her outfit begins with a sleeveless green leopard print dress embellished with a wide black hem. The hem features a sparkly purple pattern and is trimmed with black tulle. Over the dress is a black leatherette jacket adorned with a gold zipper and a gold stripe down each side. On her feet are black knee-high boots accentuated by purple soles with upward claw-like heels.
Accessories begin with a gold studded hoop earring, a black studded hoop earring, a gold zipper earring, a black zipper earring, a gold zipper necklace, two black bangles, and a gold studded bracelet. Around her waist is a gold zipper belt with a pull tab buckle. Clawdeen’s black purse is an oblong hexagon decorated with a zipper pattern and held by two gold pull tab handles.
Also included with the doll is a purple iCoffin phone, a black brush, doll stand, and Clawdeen’s Scaremester diary.

Jinafire is stunning with her back-to-school ensemble and ponytail full of green & black hair. She is wearing a halterneck top that features a green and purple flame-like pattern. Wrapping around her neck and waist is a black strip decorated with gold skeletal dragons. Her shiny pants are red and accentuated with a long tapered hem that is a black & gold scale pattern. On her feet are jade pumps with Chinese guardian lions for heels.
Accessories consist of red paper lantern earrings, a jade bead bracelet, and a red purse. The paper fan purse is embellished with gold and is held by a black shoulder strap. Also included with the doll is a red binder detailed with a golden dragon; a brush, doll stand, and Jinafire’s Scaremester diary.

Clawdeen is wearing her signature outfit that includes a black & purple jacket, skirt, and boots as well as a tiger-striped peach shirt. Her accessories and extras are a brush, doll stand, diary, and Crescent, her cat.
O.F. Clawdeen is a reissue of the doll found in the Basic series with the same outfit and accessories. The primary difference between the two releases is the packaging. The Original Favorites box features a window that wraps around the side.

This resissue of Draculaura is just like the one from the Basic series. She is wearing the same signature pink, black, and white outfit and accessories. She also inlcudes the same extras like Count Fabulous, her pet bat, a pink brush, pink doll stand, and her diary.
The main difference between the two releases is the packaging. The Original Favorites box features a window that wraps around the side.

Frankie is wearing a black & purple plaid dress with black & silver accessories. She comes with a brush, doll stand, her diary, and her dog-like pet, Watzit. 
O.F. Frankie is a reissue of the doll found in the Basic series that includes the same outfit and accessories. The primary difference between the two releases is the packaging. The Original Favorites box features a window that wraps around the side.

Frankie is electrifying in her Picture Day wardrobe. She is wearing a lovely dress with black & white diagonal stripes and blue lightning bolts. It is embellished with a yellow collar, a yellow lightning bolt on the chest, and a short overskirt with a patter of black, blue & silver diamonds as well as blue bolts. Over the dress is a blue leatherette jacket with black cuffs, a yellow pocket, and a black and a yellow stripe on one sleeve. Her shoes with black heels and images of nuts are opposites; one is white with a blue toe and the other is blue with a white toe.
Accessories comprise of a blue bracelet, black bracelet, silver screws for earrings, and a yellow belt with nut-shaped grommets and skullette buckle. Her blue & yellow purse has a black flap and a silver safety pin for a handle.
Extras for the doll include a blue binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Frankie’s Fearbook.

Lagoona looks divine in her aquatic-themed attire. Her teal sleeveless dress features a colorful pattern of sea horses and aquatic plants. It is adorned with a shimmery pink seashell halter top and green tulle trim. Under the dress are shimmery pink fishnet capris and on her feet are translucent blue wedges made of bubbles.
She accessorizes the outfit with a gold pearl bracelet, a pink bracelet, a gold rope belt, a translucent pink shell earring, and a translucent yellow semi-coiled earring. Her purse is a pink sea anemone with a yellow handle.
Extras for the doll consist of a aqua blue binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Lagoona’s Fearbook.

Operetta looks stunning for her Fearbook picture. She is wearing a beautiful red dress spotted with black music notes and accentuated with a mesh polka dot over-layer and purple tulle on the trim. Around her waist is a black corset held with white laces and over the dress is a purple & white school jacket with the Monster High logo. On her feet are black fishnet socks under black & white oxford heels detailed with a vertical red stripe on each side.
She accessorizes with a black earring made of dangling records, a red bead bracelet, and a black & red dripping heart-shaped purse. Over one eye is a black heart-shaped mask. There is also a variation where she wears a black spiderweb mask.
Extras for the doll consist of a purple binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Operetta’s Fearbook.

Clawdeen is dressed up as the super strong, super fast, and super fashionable Wonder Wolf. Her hair is long and brown with lots of green highlights. She is wearing a shiny purple halterneck top with a green collar and a golden wolf skullette emblazoned on the front. Attached to the top are purple shorts covered with a variety black, white, yellow, and green comic book themed graphics. On her feet are gold knee-high boots decorated with pyramid studs, purple trim, and purple platforms and heels. 
The costume is accessorized with two gold studded hoop earrings, two gold starburst earrings, a purple studded headband, a purple studded bracelet, and a purple studded armband. Around her waist is a gold belt that features the phases of the moon. Her golden shield features a purple wolf surrounded by the phases of the moon and a skullette.
Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Wonder Wolf mini comic book.

Frankie is dressed up as Voltageous, the superhero that battles evil with the power of electricity. Her hair is streaked black & white and she wears a shimmery silver dress with a blue Frankie Skullette on the chest. The black sleeves and triangular wrap have blue polka dots and black lightning bolts outlined in yellow. 
Complementing the dress is a hard wing-like cape made up of yellow lightning bolts. Her lightning bolt boots are silver, trimmed with light blue, and have Tesla coil heels with spur-like lightning bolts.
Accessories for the outfit consist of a light blue lightning bolt headband, light blue starburst earrings, and two silver wrist cuffs. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Voltageous mini comic book.

Spectra is dressed up as Polterghoul, the superhero that goes bump in the night. She wears a purple mask of eyeshadow and her hair is long, straight, and purple. 
The costume begins with a black sleeveless dress covered with gray polka dots and shiny silver trim. Over the dots are purple starbursts and a silver skull on the chest. The costume’s cape is made up of strings of purple chains that are held by a neck choker and shackles at the wrists.
Accessories consist of a purple chain headband, purple starburst earrings, and a silver ball & chain belt. The outfit is completed with silver knee-high boots that are wrapped with purple chains and accentuated by purple chain platforms and heels. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Polterghoul mini comic book.

Toralei is dressed up as Cat Tastrophe, the crafty kitty of chaos. The villainous troublemaker has long orange hair and hides her identity by wearing  a black cat-eye mask with whiskers. Her black & gray spotted jumpsuit is covered with jagged horizontal orange stripes. It has a black collar and a cat-like skullette emblazoned on the chest.
The suit is accessorized with black fingerless gloves, a red studded collar, silver studded armband, silver studded mouse bracelet, two black stud earrings, and a black hoop earring. Worn around the waist is a silver pyramid-studded utility belt with dangling orange feathers. The red zippered knee-high boots have black platforms and claw-like heels. 
Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Cat Tastrophe mini comic book.

Wydowna is going to Comic Con as Webarella, her favorite comic book superheroine. The cosplay costume begins with a shiny silver sleeveless top detailed with a red spiderweb. 
Under the top is a red skirt held by a white belt with a skull buckle featuring six red spider eyes. Attached to the belt is Webarella’s silver lasso. On her feet are silver studded knee-high spiderweb boots with red heels.
The costume is accessorized with silver spiderweb earrings, a red fingerless glove, and six bracelets, one for each arm. The bracelets consist of two white double hoops, a silver double hoop, a red double hoop, a spiked red band, and a spiked silver band.
Wydowna has also brought a change of clothes to the event. She has a white, red & black sleeveless dress with a collage of comic book phrases like “Boom!”, “Pow!”, and “Bamm!”. To complement the dress there is a wide black spiderweb belt, silver pants, and red & black spiderweb heels.
This exclusive of the 2013 San Diego Comic-Con also includes a black brush, Wydowna’s diary, a mini Webarella comic, and Shoo, her pet fly.

Catrine is a lovely sight with her inventive and artistic ensemble. She has on a top made up of black, blue, pink, purple, and white uneven horizontal lines. Wrapped around her neck is a pink scarf decorated with a pattern of interconnected black swirls and scrolls. Her circle skirt is two-thirds black with purple, white, and blue spatter; the bottom third uses the same pattern as her top.
She wears wrapped purple pumps with flowers and bows on the back, pink platforms, and pink paintbrush heels. She accessorizes with black sunglasses and a pink double belt. The belt has pouches holding paint brushes and supplies. Her black decorative purse features a purple skyline of Scaris, France and a handle made of ornate scrolls. Also included with this Walmart exclusive is a doll stand, artwork, and Catrine’s sketchbook.

Lagoona is wearing a light blue tank dress covered with shimmery bubbles. Over the dress she has on a semi-sheer black top with pink coral stripes and a pink hem. Each of her pink wedges have an ankle strap and a light blue octopus on the front.
Accessories for the outfit consist of a light blue octopus ponytail holder, a light blue octopus pendant, and a pink tentacle bracelet. Her translucent blue bubble purse has pink tentacle handles. Tied to the purse is a black scarf with a pattern white bubbles and pink coral. Lagoona’s spare shoes are translucent blue multi-strap pumps with bubbles for heels.
Cleo is also wearing a tank dress, but hers is black with a crisscross pattern of shimmery turquoise, yellow, and red mummy bandages. Around her neck is a beige mummy wrap scarf with light blue and red highlights. Each of her wedge sandals have a gold platform etched with a pyramid pattern and an opulent turquoise strap with a scarab on top.
She accessorizes with a gold scarab hair clip, dangling turquoise earrings, three gold triangle bangles, a wide turquoise bead bracelet, a gold studded armband, and a wide gold beaded anklet. Her ornate purse is gold & black and detailed with an elegant floral design. Cleo’s second pair of shoes are gold pumps. Each shoe has a cat laying on top whose tail forms the ankle strap.
The ghouls come with two tote bags. The blue tote has black filigree, spiderwebs, and a pink skullette wearing a beret inside a black diamond. The other tote is black and detailed with gray skullettes, filigree, and a pink Eiffel Terror. 
Also included with the Toys”R”Us exclusive 2-pack are two black doll stands, a trading card of Cleo & Deuce; and a card of Lagoona, Draculaura, Frankie, and Rochelle.

This Clawdeen is the Walmart exclusive reissue of the Sweet 1600 doll. She is wearing the same amazing black & purple outfit that features a tuxedo jacket, leopard print pants, and fanged shoes.
Many of the accessories from the original are not included, but it does have a new purse. The black purse features purple straps, gold buckles, and gold accents.

This is a Walmart exclusive reissue of the original Sweet 1600 Draculaura doll. She is wearing her stunning black, pink, and white lace birthday dress, pink tiara, and frosting-themed shoes. The shoes are mostly pink and lack the white frosting accents of the original.
She is lacking many of the accessories from the original, but does include a new purse. The heart-shaped purse is pink with dark pink bows and a black strap.

This Walmart exclusive is a reissue of the Sweet 1600 Frankie doll. She is wearing the same black & blue plaid party dress and similar stitched shoes. One shoe is black and the other is blue whereas the original shoes were black & blue. 
The doll lacks many of the accessories from the original, but does include a different purse. The black hexagon purse features a blue & silver lightning bolt flap and silver strap.

Draculaura is in a crazy candy-themed frightmare. Her pink & black hair has a black licorice bow and features two long ponytails wrapped in black licorice.
She is wearing an elaborate sleeveless dress that begins with a black bodice trimmed with pink lace. Below the bodice are black & pink stripes with diagonal black lines inside the pink. Next are wider black & pink stripes that lead into a tiered skirt. The leatherette skirt has two dripping black layers and a dripping pink middle layer. Over the dress is a black mesh cropped jacket decorated with pink trim, a pink bow, and gooey pink leatherette shoulder accents.
Candy accessories consist of a pink dangle earring, a black dangle earring, a black licorice belt with a swirl, a black armband, and a winding pink armband. Long dripping striped gloves cover her hands; the right glove is pink and the left is black. On her feet are pink fishnet socks and black ankle-strap wedges with gooey pink cut-out heels. Her black purse is a dripping heart with a fanged face and a pink twisted bow handle.
With this Target exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a Sweet Screams diary that tells the tale. Also included is Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat who has been transformed into hard candy.

Frankie has been pulled into a candy-themed frightmare and looks super sweet. Her very long white hair is white with black striped bangs and red streaks. Decorating her hair is a black & white swirled candy barrette with red & black hard candy accents.
She is wearing an adorable white dress with dripping black diagonal stripes. The sleeveless dress has black straps and a black faux fur hem. Over the dress is a red leatherette jacket with a wide collar, black cuffs, and an irregular dripping hem.
Candy accessories consist of dripping black hard candy earrings, a black & red striped tie necklace, a black belt with dripping swirls, a red beaded bracelet, and a winding red bracelet. A red fingerless glove is on her right hand and a black fingerless glove is on the left. On her feet are peep-toe heels with gooey black wedges and dripping red straps that wind up her legs. Her purse is a piece of wrapped red dripping candy that features a face with a zigzag mouth and candy eyes.
With this Target exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a Sweet Screams diary that tells the tale. Also included is Watzit, Frankie’s pet who has been transformed into a candy pet with candy cane legs.

Draculaura is ready for some scary cool fun in the sun. She’s wearing a lovely black & white striped swimsuit embellished with splatter and pink bat outlines. The suit has pink ruffles at the leg holes and a pink ruffled halterneck that flows down to a translucent pink belt with a bow.
Her hair is black with pink bangs, pink streaks, and pig tails. She accessorizes with translucent pink sunglasses and translucent pink wedges with ankle straps.
Her swimming supplies include a pink bottle of SPF 500 sunscreen and a towel. The towel features irregular black & white stripes and pink outlines of bats and hearts. Draculaura carries everything in a translucent pink cutout bag shaped like a bat.

Frankie has her black & white hair pulled into a ponytail and even added a blue under layer that matches her swimming ensemble. She’s wearing a one-piece swimsuit that features a yellow & black hex nut print. The suit is accentuated by a lightning bolt halter strap that is translucent blue, extra long, and hangs down the front.
Translucent accessorizes include yellow lightning bolt sunglasses, a four-bangle blue bracelet on each wrist, and stitched yellow shoes. Frankie’s bag is made up of translucent yellow hex nuts. Her towel matches her swimsuit but also has a pattern blue lightning bolts.

Holt may have flaming hair but he isn’t afraid to spend some time in the water. He’s wearing a red sleeveless shirt emblazoned with flames and a black & white checkered skullette on the front. His swim shorts are gray with black flame outlines and feature a translucent orange & yellow flame protruding from each leg.
Holt’s translucent orange accessories consist of flaming sunglasses, sandals with flame-like straps, and a single-strap turntable backpack. His black beach towel is decorated with a pattern of orange & yellow flames.

Lagoona is adorable with her teal highlighted blond hair and tentacle themed ensemble. She is wearing a one piece swimsuit that features a filigree print made up of light blue & pink tentacles. The suit is trimmed with pink plastic and the single shoulder strap is embellished by light blue ruffles with pink polka dots.
She accessorizes with translucent teal tentacle sunglasses and a translucent pink tentacle headband. On her feet are translucent pink wedge sandals and she carries a translucent teal seashell bag. Lagoona’s white beach towel is decorated with a pattern of intertwined light blue tentacles.

Rochelle’s one-piece swimsuit accentuates her pink hair and teal highlights. The pink striped suit features a sweetheart neckline, black halter strap, and a strip of decorative scrolls down the front. Around the waist is a double layer of teal ruffles.
Translucent teal accessories consist of sunglasses, a bracelet, and heels adorned with swirls, spirals, and fleurs-de-lis on the ankle straps. Her bag features cut-outs and swirls that create a wrought iron fence appearance. Rochelle’s pink towel is decorated with a pattern of wrought iron swirls.

Venus is wearing a wild one-piece swimsuit that features black, white, pink, yellow, and green vertical zigzags. The suit’s neckline is a translucent green collar decorated by a white zigzag outlined in black.
Her long straight hair is green & pink and kept in a ponytail with a hair bump on top. Translucent green accessories consist of triangular sunglasses, ivy arm wraps, and ivy leg wraps. On her feet are translucent pink wedges etched with zigzags.
Venus’s towel features black, white, pink, green, and green teeth-like zigzags. She carries the towel in a translucent pink bag decorated with pointy teeth and ivy handles.

The Skultimate set creates four dolls with clothes and accessories. There is also a black Skullette brush and four black doll stands.
The ghouls are Ice, Gorgon, Vampire, and Insect. They were previously released in starter or add-on packs.
Ice
The ice ghoul has translucent blue limbs and torso. The head has crystal-like eyes, light purple shadow, and pink lips. Her pink and blue hair is long and straight with blunt bangs. 
Her dress is light blue with short sleeves and a pink print with drips and splatter. She has translucent pink pumps with ankle straps and gooey heels.
Gorgon
The gorgon has scaly green limbs, torso, and head. She has yellow eyes with vertical pupils, orange eyeshadow, purple eyeliner, and red lips. Her green molded hair is scaly with a ponytail of snakes.
She has a purple diamond scale print, a black halterneck strap, and a jagged green hem. It is accessorized with gold peep-toe pumps that have brick-like rows and straps.
Vampire
The vampire is pale pink with arms, legs, torso, and head. She has purple eyes with lavender shadow, red fanged lips, and clip-on ears. Her molded short pink hair has drips and curled ends.
She wears a black sleeveless dress with yellow ruffles along the neckline and hem. The ruffles are decorated with black stitch stripes. Her shoes are pink open-toe pumps with chains.
Insect
The insect-like ghoul has translucent gray bug wings and yellow body parts that transition to black at the hands and feet. She has compound eyes with green, orange, and blue shadow and violet lips. Her bob cut is streaked blue and purple.
She has a form-fitting dress with yellow-gold and black diagonal lines accented by magenta dots. The shoulder and sleeves are black mesh. Accessories consist of gray bug glasses with antennae and black pumps.

The Design Chamber has shelving, a lab table, cart, tumbler, accessories, doll parts, and clothing. The playset lets you create a ghoul and customize it with color-changing technology.
Shelving
The shelves are black with a lavender backdrop that has spiderweb cutouts, swirls, and a Skullette topper. At the base is a tufted black bench with a red front decorated with a winged Skullette. On each side of the case are spiral holders for the color-change styluses. 
Lab Table
The table has a purple tufted top with a black studded frame. It has a black base with gray wrought iron trim and a gray levered mechanism that raises and lowers the table.
Cart
The cart has a gray body with a black top, black stand, and purple wheels. It is decorated with dials, gauges, and spiderwebs. 
Tumbler
The tumbler is a translucent blue cylinder with a Skullette graphic and a gray base and lid. The lid is attached to a spiderweb basket inside the tumbler.
Color-Change Accessories
Create color-change effects with a a light-up stylus and cold stylus or use cold water and the spray mister and Skullette applicator. Water can be kept in the clear beaker and body parts can be placed in the water-filled tumbler with skeletal tongs.
Doll
The doll has pink limbs, torso, head and hair with color-changing features. The head has blue eyes with light pink shadow, pink designs, and pink lips. Her dark turquoise hair has streaks of light purple.
Clothing
She wears a color-changing dress that is a purple-gray with a cobblestone print. It has black shoulder straps and a black asymmetrical skirt with a serrated hem. 
Accessories consist of blue wedge sandals and arm and leg sleeves. The sleeves are made up of scale cutouts with spiked scale accents.

This add-on has color-changing clothes and accessories for the Sea Monster.
The first dress is pink with black mesh shoulders and sleeves. It has an asymmetrical black patch with wavy white lines, and a shredded hem. The one-shoulder dress is black with a front patch, blue waist, and a shredded purple hem.
Accessories include pink arm and leg sleeves that have fins and cutouts. For shoes there is a pair of bubbly blue wedges.
Color-change accessories consist of a pink friction pen and a clear Skullette beaker.

This starter pack has a color-changing ghoul with color-changing clothes and accessories.
Sea Monster
The Sea Monster has light blue limbs, torso, and head. Her molded hair is purple with a pink streak in the front, blue fins on top, and a swoop on the back. She has light green eyes with pink shadow, purple eyebrows, and chartreuse lips.
Clothing
She wears a one shoulder dress with a rainbow of colors, a black tentacle print, and a scalloped hem. It is complemented by two sets of arm and leg sleeves. The first set is translucent aquamarine with fin accents and the second set is made up of chartreuse tentacles. For shoes she has a pair of purple open-toe pumps.
Accessories
To use the color-change technology there is a blue ice pen and a red friction pen. There is also a black stand with a clear pedestal.

This add-on has color-changing clothes and accessories for the Werewolf.
The one shoulder dress is black with a ruffled purple hem and a patch in the front with squiggly white lines. Next is a gray dress with black straps, a tattered asymmetrical hem, and a pink sash.
Accessories include furry pink arm and leg sleeves with cutouts. For shoes there are purple peep-toe wedges with crescent moon cutouts in the heels.
Color-change accessories consist of a pink friction pen and a clear Skullette beaker.

This starter pack has a color-changing ghoul with color-changing clothes and accessories.
Werewolf
The Werewolf has limbs, torso, and a head. She has pale turquoise eyes, teal eyeshadow, blue eyebrows, and magenta fanged lips. Her molded hair is pink with a turquoise streak in the front, purple ears, and a bob cut. 
Clothing
She has a slate blue dress with black straps and a serrated hem. It is decorated with yellow moons and stars and cloudy magenta shapes. 
With the dress are two sets of arm and leg sleeves. The first is translucent black with cutouts and the second set is a furry fuchsia. Her shoes are open-toe pumps with crescent moon heels.
Accessories
To use the color-change technology there is a blue ice pen and a red friction pen. There is also a black stand with a clear pedestal.

Clawdeen has lots of wavy brown hair and a brown complexion. She has yellow eyes, purple eyeshadow, and fanged pink lips.
Her signature outfit has a pink tiger striped top under a black jacket with purple cuffs and a pink fur collar. The purple skirt has a black under layer.
Accessories consist of a gold studded black belt and pink thigh high stockings. On her feet are black peep-toe boots with purple straps.
She is about six inches tall with a pen on the bottom of one foot. Clawdeen comes with a purple pedestal stand decorated with a werewolf Skullette.

Cleo has long brown hair with blunt bangs and tinsel highlights. Her tan complexion is complemented by blue eyes, dark red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
She is wearing a wrap tank top that is turquoise with sparkles and decorative black designs. Her outfit is completed by yellow and orange mummy bandage capris.
Accessories entail a gold arm band, gold bracelet, mummy arm wrap, and a gold belt. On her feet are wedge sandals that match her pants.
She is about six inches tall with a pen on the bottom of one foot. Cleo comes with a yellow pedestal stand decorated with a mummy Skullette.

Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights, blunt bangs, and pig tails. She has pale pink skin, dark lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her outfit has a pink vest with black sleeves, frilly white cuffs, and an ascot with pink ribbon. Completing the look is a white skirt and black tights. On her feet are pink boots with black laces, black straps, and silver accents.
She is about six inches tall with a pen on the bottom of one foot. Draculaura comes with a pink pedestal stand decorated with a vampire Skullette.

Frankie has silvery white hair with streaks of black. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, purple eyeshadow, red lips, and a stitches on her cheek.
Her signature blue dress has a white collar and chest, puffy gray sleeves, and a black under layer. She accessorizes with a black tie and a studded black belt with silver chains and a lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black and white striped pumps.
