She is about six inches tall with a pen on the bottom of one foot. Frankie comes with a blue pedestal stand decorated with a Frankie Skullette.

The Abbey ornament has long white hair with a furry white headband and an under layer of pink, purple, and blue. She has light blue skin, blue eyes, and magenta lips.
Her purple dress is trimmed with white fur and is wrapped with a string belt. She accessorizes with a blue necklace and furry white boots.
On Abbey’s right is a snowman with black eyes, an orange carrot nose, and brown branch arms. Around his neck is a black tie with white polka dots and a silver Skullette.

The Draculaura ornament has pink and black streaked hair with blunt bangs and pigtails. She has pale pink skin, bright pink eyes, pink eyeshadow, pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her pink top has purple sleeves and a white ascot with a pink bow. Complementing the top is a white skirt with a black hem and purple tights. On her feet are hot pink boots with black laces and straps.
Draculaura is holding a large green wreath. It is decorated with snowflakes, ribbon, winged hearts, and a big red bow.

Frankie has long flowing hair that is streaked black and white. She has green tinted skin accented by pink eyeshadow and pink lips.
Her blue plaid dress features wide black stripes with thin magenta stripes. It has a white chest, black and white puffy sleeves, and a black tie with a Skullette.
Accessories consist of blue earrings, a silver bracelet, and a studded black belt with a lightning buckle. On her head is an adorable Santa hat.
She is popping out of a present filled with blue tissue paper. The box is purple decorated with snowflakes and wrapped with a red stitched ribbon.

Plush Draculaura is light pink and about ten inches tall. Her hair is pink and black ribbon worn in pigtails. She has lavender eyes with pink shadow, silver earrings, a pink dashed smile with fangs, and a heart on her cheek.
She wears a pink top with buttons, stitches, and a white peplum. Its sleeves are black mesh with white cuffs. The white skirt has an under layer of black mesh with black mesh shorts. Her pink vinyl boots have black laces, black straps, and shimmery silver heart accents.
I love to splash my black outfits with some cheery pink and I even carry a frilly umbrella so I can take an occasional walk in the sun.

Plush Frankie is about ten inches tall and is light green with silver stitch accents. Her hair is black and white striped ribbon that is pulled to the back on top. She has one green and one blue eye, pink eyshadow, a dashed red smile, and silver earrings.
Her classic outfit is a black and blue plaid dress with red lines. The shoulders and collar are white and the sleeves are black mesh. The skirt has an under layer of black mesh with black mesh shorts. 
The dress is accessorized by a black and white polka dot tie with a Skullette. On her feet are black and white striped vinyl pumps.
Sometimes my stitches come loose at the worst moments. Like the day my arm flew off at the fearleading tryouts and landed in front of the most creeparific guy at Monster High. I was mortalfied.

Plush Ghoulia is about ten inches tall and light gray in color. Her hair is different shades of blue ribbon that is held back by a green headband. She has a thin stitched smile, blue eyes with green shadow, white glasses, and pink earrings. 
Her red top has a cherry print, Skullette accent, and sleeves that are striped black, red, and white. Black mesh gloves cover her hands.
Around her waist is a piano key belt with Skullette buckle. The baggy pants are shimmery red with small black dots and black at the knees. On her feet are black peep-toe sneakers with red laces.
Ghoulia is an invaluable friend, often using her brains to come up with out-of-the-coffin solutions to her friends' problems.

Plush Lagoona is light turquoise with  yellow ribbon bangs and a long mane of yellow ribbon hair. On her head is a blue scale cap with green fins and a pink mesh accent. 
She has green eyes with pink shadow, purple eyebrows, a thin pink smile, and turquoise freckles. Green fins protrude from her arms and legs and she is about 10 inches tall.
Her outfit begins with a blue scale jacket that has black sleeves and silver trim. The shirt is black above a pink fish scale print. Long blue mesh is under black shorts decorated with colorful bubbles and dotted lines.
Accessories consist of silver earring and a yellow seahorse necklace. Lagoona’s shoes are black and white striped sandals.
My skin tends to dry out if I spend too much time out of the water so I go through a fright of moisturizer. Chlorine from the Monster High pool also has a tendency to turn my blonde hair blue but it's a creeperific look don't you think?

Purrsephone and Meowlody are twin werecat sisters. Each plush figure is about ten inches tall, has a long tail, and is gray with a lighter patch on the face. They have yellow eyes with blue shadow, little black noses, and dashed orange mouths.
Purrsephone
Purrsephone has black ribbon hair with a streak of jagged black and white. White stripes appear on her left arm and right leg.
Her outfit has a white top with black tiger stripes, an orange jacket, and an orange skirt. On her right hand are dotted black bracelets and an orange fingerless glove. Her shoes are orange and black peep-toe boots with studs.
Meowlody
Meowlody has white ribbon hair with a streak of jagged black and white. White stripes appear on her right arm and left leg.
She wears a black top with white tiger stripes, a black jacket with silver accents, and an orange skirt. On her left hand are dotted black bracelets and an orange fingerless glove. Her shoes are studded, orange, and decorated with black bow straps.

Count Fabulous is the pet bat of Draculaura. The plush figure is about six inches tall and has black fur, wings with black vinyl, and black vinyl feet.
He has pink stitched ears and a thin pink mouth with small white fangs. His right eye is a solid yellow circle and the left is a yellow “x” inside a squiggly pink circle.
On his head is a shimmery pink bow and he wears a shirt. The shirt is white with pink hearts, a pink scalloped neckline, and a pink hem.
Count Fabulous is a very proud and proper bat, but Draculaura just can't help dressing him up in the cutest little outfits. His best friends are Crescent and Watzit.

Crescent is Clawdeen Wolf’s pet cat. The plush figure is about six inches tall with purple fur. There is a crescent moon tuft on the top of her head as well as tufts on the sides. She has shimmery pink ears, a puffy pink patch of fur on her chest, white claws, and shimmery pink paw pads.
Her face has a pink bang line, a black triangle nose, and a white fanged smile. Crescent’s left eye is a green “x” and the right is a solid green circle with a purple scratch above and below.
Crescent is a scary cute little kitten who's just as fierce and fuzzy as Clawdeen. Her best friends are Count Fabulous and Watzit.

Rhuen is the pet ferret of Spectra Vondergeist. The plush figure is about six inches tall with blue fur that transitions to white down his body.
On his head are shimmery silver ears, a fluffy white tuft, and a sparkly purple bow. His right eye is a solid magenta circle and his left is a “+” surrounded by a squiggly blue circle. He has a heart-shaped nose and a thin mouth with long fangs.
A blue tuft decorates his neck, he has black line claws, and silver paw pads on his back feet. His tail is white at the base and becomes fluffy blue.
Rhuen is Spectra Vondergeists's ghost ferret. Did you know that the name ferret comes from the Latin furittus, which means "little thief?" Of course you didn't until I told you! Best friends? Everyone loves Rhuen!

Sir Hoots A Lot is the pet owl of Ghoulia Yelps. The plush figure is about six inches tall and is a furry light blue with white on the back of his head. He has feathers sticking out of the sides and top of his head, outstretched wings, a shimmery white chest, and white feet with black claw lines. 
His face is blue vinyl with a white beak and two different eyes. The right eye is a solid yellow circle and the left is a yellow “x” inside a serrated red circle.
Sir Hoots A Lot is the perfect companion even though he absolutely refuses to be a message courier for Ghoulia Yelps. His best friends are Hissette & Count Fabulous.

Watzit is the dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. The plush figure is about six inches tall and has tan fur. One ear, three legs, and a silver-stitched patch around his left eye are brown vinyl.
He has silver spikes on his head, a collar with silver dots, stitches on his chest, black line claws, and shimmery silver foot pads. On his back are silver wings.
His face features two different eyes. The left eye is a green “x” and the right is a solid blue circle with a thin eyebrow. He has a black nose and a thin mouth with silver fangs.
No one's sure of all the things Watzit is made from, but his pet license is 10 pages long. His best friends are Count Fabulous and Crescent.

The Crypt is a playset for Secret Creepers Pets and Critters. It has lots of places to hide secrets and comes with Crescent, Clawdeen Wolf’s pet cat.
Crypt
The Crypt features a purple doghouse with a black roof and a Monster High crest with crossbones at the peak. It has a white wrought iron door that can be locked with a key.
Turquoise pipes extend from the doghouse. Connected to one side is a fish tank and on the other side is a pink swing held by a black spider. Below the swing is a green compact that can be used as a pet stool.
Above the doghouse is a black wrought iron throne. Chains with hooks connect the throne to the turquoise pipes.
Two gargoyle statues stand guard. Their columns have compartments that can store secret scrolls.
The final piece of furniture is a chaise lounge chair. It is black with clawed feet and a pink tufted cushion. The base of the chair has a drawer with a secret compartment.
Crescent
Crescent is purple with a spade-tipped tail and light green eyes with green irises. He is also a motion detector and will “shriek” when anyone comes near.

Nefera has long and beautiful teal hair with black & white streaks and gold tinsel highlights. Her lipstick is red and her eyeshadow is light teal and gold with black swirl accents.
She is wearing a form-fitting dress that is a shimmery black & blue with a pattern of twisting teal snake-like lines. The dress has an asymmetrical hem and two black straps with one strap forming a long decorative strip down the front. Over the dress is a metallic gold chest piece with snake accents and a large city skyline epaulet.
Accessories begin with an ornate black headband made of snakes and crystals. Her matching gold earrings are dangling snakes with crystals. She wears elbow length fingerless teal gloves and translucent teal wedges. The wedges have crystal shard platforms and snake straps that wind up her legs.
Nefera comes with a brush, doll stand, and a piece of the comet. The piece is translucent purple crystals shaped like a pyramid.
As the Night of the Comet approaches, Nefera scares-up a terror-ible scheme and uses its powers to entomb Catty's voice forever!!

Nefera de Nile doll 
Daughter of the Mummy

The monsters take a MUSICAL bite out of the city. When Cleo is invited to attend a fancy gala celebrating the return of a magical comet, she brings her beast friends along! But it's not all fun and frightseeing when Nefera uses the comet's powers in a die-abolical plot against Catty! Can the monsters and their new city ghoulfriends unwrap the mystery of the comet in time to help her?

Abbey’s lovely white hair is in a ponytail with a pink & blue streak. She is wearing a form-fitting black dress decorated with a print of white sparkly stars and black snowflakes inside dripping diagonal pink lines. The short sleeves are black mesh and the hem is light blue.
Translucent accessories consist of a purple ice crystal belt and a dripping blue ice bangle. On her feet are translucent purple boots with jagged wedge heels and ice crystal cuffs. She comes with a black mug overflowing with a frosty pink beverage.

Frankie’s straight white hair has blunt bangs and streaks of black. She is wearing a patchwork top with a half black and half blue collar. Parts of the top are blue with black hex nuts and diagonal white stitches. Other parts are black with white hex nuts and diagonal blue stitches. Her black trimmed skirt features lightning bolt stripes of black, white, yellow, and blue.
Accessories consist of a yellow stitched bracelet and a blue bangle. On her feet are strappy platform heels with one pump black and the other white. Her hot beverage is in a blue to-go cup with a white lid and white sleeve with handle.

Robecca’s long hair is black & blue. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that features a black & yellow striped top with copper gears in the yellow and frilled white armholes. The skirt is blue with designs made up of decorative pink, black, and blue cogs and gears.
Copper accessories consist of a red gem pendant and a wrist cuff. Both pieces are made up of cogs, gears, wires, and other mechanical parts. On her feet are cream peep-toe pumps with black platforms and heels and decorated with rows of studs. Her light blue mason jar mug features a skullette on the side.

Toralei’s red & orange hair has an asymmetrical cut, an under layer of black, and striped bangs. She is wearing a wild pink & black zebra print tank top and a red & black houndstooth miniskirt.
Accessories consist of a red belt with two rows of pyramid studs and a pink studded bracelet. On her feet are platform pumps decorated with straps, pyramid studs, and claw-like heels. Her pink beverage is inside of a silver cauldron with a handle.

Twyla’s hair is a lovely bluish purple with big streaks of light teal. She is wearing a purple romper with a pattern of light blue spiderwebs and black spiders. A black bow is tied around the collar and under it is a square of light blue tulle.
Accessories consist of a light blue beaded bracelet, a purple bracelet, and a black belt with a light blue buckle. On her feet are light blue Mary Janes trimmed with rows of studs and wedge heels. Her blue spiderweb mug has three ghostly marshmallows floating in hot cocoa.

Venus’s curls are blended pink & green with one side shaved short and colored pink. She is wearing a form-fitting sleeveless pink dress decorated with a print of black thorny vines, light pink ivy, and light green leaves. Over the dress is a sleeveless black top with four large cutouts in the front.
Accessories consist of green vines wrapped around each of her forearms and calves. On her feet are pink pumps with ivy laces, ivy wrapped heels, and platforms with mouth-like teeth. Her translucent green mug with a gray lid is filled with a green seedling.

Cleo’s long black hair is highlighted with streaks of turquoise and purple. She is wearing a form-fitting black dress decorated with triangles made up of blue, pink, purple, and gold bandage wrappings. The sleeveless dress has a simple blue strap and a black strap adorned with turquoise tulle.
She accessorizes with a purple scarab choker pendant, a turquoise triangle bangle, and a turquoise belt with rows of gem-like studs. On her feet are gold strappy wedge sandals with gem-like studs. Cleo comes with a golden coffin-shaped tray with a turquoise goblet and blue bowl. Inside the bowl is bunch of delicious pink grapes.

Draculaura’s dark hair has pink streaks and a ponytail on each side of her head. She is wearing a black sleeveless top trimmed in yellow and decorated with a pattern of light and dark pink bats. Her pink skirt has a yellow hem and a pattern of white fanged lips.
Accessories consist of a yellow winged heart necklace and attached ascot, two yellow double bangles, and a pink dripping bracelet. On her feet are pink peep-toe pumps with winged hearts, and heels dripping into hearts. Draculaura comes with a pink coffin-shaped tray, a bat-winged grilled cheese, and a goblet. The goblet has a pink spiderweb cup and a clear stem.

Howleen’s bright pink hair has light blue streaks and is worn in a high ponytail. She is wearing a purple shirt with short black sleeves, yellow trim, and a pattern of black claw marks and yellow paw prints. Her black skirt has blue trim and features a pattern of crossbones that transition from purple to blue.
She accessorizes with a spiked pink wrist cuff. On her feet are pink high tops with blue laces and etchings of skullettes, hearts, flowers, and paw prints. Howleen comes with a blue coffin-shaped tray, a yellow milk carton, and a winged haunt dog.

The Creepateria comes with a food station, a table and benches, Cleo de Nile, and Howleen Wolf. The food station is black with a wrought iron spiderweb pattern, purple goo, and the Monster High crest on the front. It has a blue shelf, a silver counter, and a working guillotine. The guillotine has wood columns, a silver serrated blade, and a magenta top adorned with a skull and skeletal hands.
The pink coffin-shaped table is decorated with a skullette, spiderweb cutouts, and a studded outline. The wrought iron legs are black and connected by skullettes surrounded by spiderweb designs. The matching pink benches have spiderweb cutouts, studded outlines, and black legs just like the table.
Creepateria accessories begin with two coffin-shaped lunch trays; one is gold and the other is blue. There is a silver tray with gooey green and gooey magenta food, a half green and half pink sub sandwich, a blue bowl with magenta grapes, and a plate with desserts. For beverages there is a yellow milk carton, a pink and a green cup with straws and lids, and a turquoise goblet.
Cleo is wearing a black dress made up of colorful bandage wrap triangles and a turquoise tulle shoulder accent. She accessorizes with a purple scarab pendant, a turquoise triangle bangle, and a studded turquoise belt. Her shoes are gold strappy wedge sandals with gem-like studs.
Howleen has on a purple shirt with black sleeves, claw marks, and yellow paw prints. Her black skirt has a crossbones print that transitions from purple to blue. She accessorizes with a spiked pink wrist cuff and pink high tops with blue laces.
Cleo and Howleen were previously released individually. There is an alternate version of this playset known as the Social Spots Creepateria that does not include dolls, but does have a drink station.

This Walmart exclusive features Draculaura who is only available in this 3-pack. It also includes two previously released dolls, Clawdeen Wolf and Frankie Stein.
Draculaura is wearing her black & pink hair in a side ponytail. Her strapless dress is thin stripes of pink, white, gray, and black. It has pink ruffles at the top and white ruffles for the hem. She accentuates the dress with a pink ribbon-like shawl and black shoes with shiny pink heels in the shape of hearts.
Draculaura accessorizes the outfit with a small white heart-shaped top hat, white cuffs & collar, and pink dangle heart earrings. Her purse is a sparkly pink bow with a black strap.
The Clawdeen and Frankie reissues have the same hairstyles and outfits as the originals and also include their iCoffin phones. Extras for the group include a black brush, doll stand, and party photos.

This is the third release of Cleo in the series. She is very similar to the previous dolls, but lacks many of the extras.
Cleo still has her green & yellow dress, copper tights, and shiny green heels. Her accessories include a bronze armband and a bronze scarab necklace. She is packaged in a small window box which includes her party photos.

This reissue of Frankie features the same fabulous outfit as the original. She is wearing a pink jacket over a black & white zigzag dress. Her tights are pink fishnets and one shoe is black with a gray sole and the other is gray with a black sole.
Cleo’s accessories include blue lightning bolt earrings, a black & white pearl bracelet, and a black necklace with silver pendant. Many of the extras from the original are not included with this release. She is packaged in a small window box which includes her party photos.

This Lagoona reissue features the same dazzling outfit and fin-like hairdo as the original. She has a darling blue sleeveless dress with pink frills at the top and a flowing pink hem. Around her waist is a sand colored lace wrap and her shoes are a translucent blue and pink.
Lagoona’s accessories include a gold seaweed arm wrap, pearl earrings, and a pearl necklace. Many of the extras from the original are not included with this release. She is packaged in a small window box which does include her party photos.

Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with an amazing streak of purple. She is wearing a form-fitting sleeveless black dress that is decorated with a print of orange, green, and purple fossils. A green saw tooth strap runs diagonally from the hem and over one shoulder.
She accessorizes with a golden arm cuff made from a spinal column and ribs. On her feet are purple lace-up booties with toothy soles and spinal columns for heels.
Included with the doll is a white dinosaur skull and a green folder with “Monster High” on the side. She does not have a stand or brush.
Field trips are a clawsome opportunity to learn something new through interactive exhibits, guided tours and historical artifacts. They're also a creepy cool way to get a perspective on the past, present or future, and did we also mention it gets you out of class for the day?

Clawdeen thinks the Haunted History Museum is a scream.

Gigi has lovely pink hair with a streak of orange that has been tied into a ponytail. She is wearing a a short purple & magenta sleeveless dress decorated with images Scorpio and other constellations. Around the waist of her dress is an asymmetrical piece of blue tulle. 
She accessorizes with a gold necklace that has intertwined beaded strands, star accents, and a scorpion pendant. On her feet are golden pumps with telescope heels, intertwined ankle straps, and scorpion adornments.
Included with the doll is a gold telescope and a purple lunch bag with the Monster High crest. She does not have a stand or brush.
Field trips are a clawsome opportunity to learn something new through interactive exhibits, guided tours and historical artifacts. They're also a creepy cool way to get a perspective on the past, present or future, and did we also mention it gets you out of class for the day?

Gigi totes has the stars in her eyes at the planetscarium!

Toralei’s bob cut hair is dark orange with a teal streak accentuated with black stripes. She is wearing a a form-fitting sleeveless red dress decorated with a print of black fish skeletons and teal claw marks. On her feet are translucent teal peep-toe shoes with skeletal cutouts, fish accents, and large teeth-filled mouths for heels.
Included with the doll is a white anglerfish skeleton on a purple base and a translucent teal shark head water bottle. She does not have a stand or brush.
Field trips are a clawsome opportunity to learn something new through interactive exhibits, guided tours and historical artifacts. They're also a creepy cool way to get a perspective on the past, present or future, and did we also mention it gets you out of class for the day?

Toralei thinks the ascarium is purrfect fun even if they don't give samples.

The catacombs are located under Monster High and include many rooms and passageways. The playset has three levels, a variety of furniture and accessories, and fifteen clips to hold and display dolls.
The top level is the Monster High courtyard that features a purple building with ivy covered bricks, ornate windows, and black wrought iron fences and gates. The windows and wrought iron have spiderweb & swirl designs with skullette accents. The courtyard has a green grass floor, a gray tombstone elevator, and a light blue stairwell.
The middle level has magenta flooring, light blue pillars with yellow torches, and one cracked pillar with ghostly apparitions. There are purple & blue cave backdrops and a blue wrought iron wall behind a light blue dragon statue.
The bottom level is a party room with flooring etched with spiderwebs & swirls, blue skeletal pillars, and a cave backdrop with dinosaur fossils. The back wall is an awesome cutout of a skullette surrounded by swirls and spiderwebs. A yellow chandelier hangs from the ceiling and there is a yellow clock with orange hands above a magenta door. When the hands are set to “1” and “3” the door opens to reveal the underground lab.
The lab has a back wall with coffin-shaped bookcases topped with chains and tubing. The bookcases are decorated with images of books, beakers, skulls, and lab equipment.
Accessories consist of two lab tables, lab chair, two dining chairs, two settee chairs, lab container, laptop, textbook, notebook, feather pen, two candelabras, one candle, two skeleton torches, one bowl, one mug, one magazine, tray of cupcakes, and extra doll clips.

This playset features Frankie and the Recharge Chamber where she can recoup her energy. Frankie lacks the typical white in her hair and instead has straight blue hair with yellow and black highlights. The stitches on her body are also different; they are blue instead of silver.
She is wearing a short sleeveless black dress decorated with blue and yellow streaks of lightning. She accessorizes with blue lightning bolt earrings and yellow pumps with lightning bolt cutouts and heels. Around her waist is a silver belt with a double row of holed hex nuts and a dangling chain. Pink, blue, or purple skullette lightning charms can be added to the belt.
The Recharge Chamber is a blue coffin-shaped chamber resting on a black circular pedestal. The inside is tufted gray with lightning bolt accents. It has neck and leg clips to hold Frankie in place. The clear doors of the chamber are etched with lightning bolts and sparks. The doors are framed in pink and topped with a heart. Beneath the doors is gray with a black skullette button outlined in pink.
The top of the chamber has twisting translucent magenta tubing and the back is etched with a stitched skullette surrounded by lightning. On either side and supporting the chamber are yellow lightning rods topped with skullettes.
When Frankie is inside the chamber and the skullette button on the front is pressed, her hair stands up on end. The chamber requires 3 AA batteries to light up and create hair-raising static electricity. A brush is also included with the playset.

Frankie has very long white hair with streaks of black. Her inspiration is Clawdeen Wolf and she creates the look with a wolf ears headband, removable white fangs, and an ferocious outfit.
She is wearing a piecework jumpsuit with one arm, one leg, and half the top all black. The rest of the jumpsuit is yellow with a pattern of yellow & blue crossbones outlined in black.
Accessories consist of a studded blue bracelet and a shiny silver belt decorated with bolts. On her feet are shiny silver knee-high boots embellished with hex nut grommet straps and yellow platforms with a lightning bolt reverse heel.
Included with Frankie is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Ghoulia has lovely light blue hair with darker streaks. It is long and straight and styled with bangs and two ponytails.
Her inspiration is Draculaura and she begins the vampire motif with a cute blue dress that features a pattern of red brains with black bat wings. The puffy black sleeves have red trim by the neckline and a red ribbon bow is tied around the waist. The wrapped skirt has a ruffled hem and a black underskirt.
Accessories consist of a black headband with bat wings, black cat-eye glasses, removable white fangs, and a red bloody heart bangle. On her feet are  blue wedges with red skullette accents and straps that wind up her calves and end in bows. Her parasol has a blue canopy and skull tip, a black shaft, and a black bat handle.
Included with Ghoulia is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Operetta has beautiful red hair that is long and straight with a wide black streak down the middle. Her inspiration is Frankie Stein which creates an electrifying rockabilly ensemble. 
She is wearing a sleeveless plaid dress created from crisscrossed lines of music. One half of the dress is pink with black music and the other half is black with pink music. Running down the front is a shiny white strip with buttons and decorating the hem is black tulle. Under the dress are legging with one black leg and one pink leg.
Accessories consist of a silver headband with riveted lightning bolts, a black face mask adorned with stitches, a silver choker with neck bolts, and a red hex nut bangle. Around her waist is a red & black polka dot belt with a hanging necktie. On her feet are red double strap pumps with black tips and bolt accents. Her quilted pink purse has studded handles and features a silver skullette inside a silver circle. 
Included with Operetta is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Scarah has light green skin and bob cut black hair with a streak of orange that features black stripes. Inspired by Toralei Stripe, she has created a wild werecat wardrobe.
She is wearing a white leatherette vest decorated with a shiny silver stripe. One half of the collar is embellished with an orange & gray checkered pattern outlined in black. Her black pants have a print of interconnected skullette safety pins plus orange & gray checkered patches.
Accessories consists of a black headband with light green & orange cat ears and an orange studded bracelet. Around her waist is an orange belt with three rows of pyramid studs. Attached to the back of the belt is a removable light green tail. On her feet are white peep-toe wedges adorned with rows of studs and orange straps. Her black studded purse features three orange straps with buckles that create a cat face.
Included with Scarah is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Clawdeen’s brown hair has purple highlights and is worn in a ponytail. She is showing her support of Frankie by wearing a black tank top featuring a green image of Frankie with “Save Frankie” in yellow rectangles. Her purple capri pants have a pattern of green and black hex nuts.
Accessories consist of yellow bolt earrings, dangling black & yellow stitch earrings, a yellow lightning bolt headband, a black arm warmer, a purple stitched bracelet, and a gold multi-bangle bracelet. On her feet are gold booties with fur cuffs and purple claw cutouts for heels. She carries a purple “Save Frankie” sign with an image of Frankie and a lightning bolt handle.
Included with Clawdeen is a yellow brush, doll stand, and a wearable purple bracelet decorated with stitches, “Monster High” and a skullette.

Draculaura’s hair is black with pink highlights and is worn in a high ponytail with a yellow bow. She is wearing a black shirt that sports a pink image of Frankie with “Save Frankie” in white rectangles. The collar and short sleeves are trimmed with pink frilled lace. Her pink plaid skirt has a yellow waist, yellow & black lines, blue lightning bolts, and random polka dot patches.
Accessories consist of blue lightning bolt earrings, a pink stitched bangle, and a blue multi-bangle bracelet. On her feet are yellow wedges with side cutouts and stitches holding together the shoes and platforms. In her hand is a pink “Save Frankie” sign with an image of Frankie and a lightning bolt handle.
Included with Draculaura is a yellow brush, doll stand, and a wearable pink bracelet decorated with stitches, “Monster High” and a skullette.

Jackson’s black hair is combed to one side with streaks of yellow blonde. His yellow collared shirt is black and features “Save Frankie” in blue rectangles. The front also has blue, yellow, and white images of lightning bolts, stitched hearts, yin-yangs, and hands. His shorts are plaid with black, blue, and yellow.
He accessorizes with blue hex nut glasses, a blue stitched bangle, and a black multi-bangle bracelet. On his feet are blue loafers with yellow soles. His “Save Frankie” sign is blue with a lightning bolt handle and an image of Frankie.
Included with Jackson is a yellow brush, doll stand, and a wearable blue bracelet decorated with stitches, “Monster High” and a skullette.

Avea’s mane of hair and tail are bright blue with blue streaks. Her horse ears and torso are light purple and her forearms are feathered. On her back are cute feathered wings that transition from black to turquoise at the the tips. Her purple horse body is decorated with a couple patches of light purple skullette spots.
She is wearing a a sleeveless blue top with a big ruffled collar. Over the top is a red plaid satiny jacket with puffed shoulders and short sleeves.
She accessorizes with a red bracelet, a multi-strapped purple bracelet, a long black tail band, black gloves, and a top hat. The black hat has a neck strap and features a red band around the cylinder with a red feather sticking out.
Around her waist is an elaborate black belt with a hanging chain & horseshoe charm. Attached to the belt are interconnected black chains, rings, studded straps, and dangling horseshoes that form a decorative harness. On all four legs are black leg warmers with multiple rows of straps and buckles. 
Included with the doll is a yellow brush and Avea’s diary. Avea is able to stand unassisted.

Bonita is a lovely hybrid with long white hair that features a long streak of pink and black. Her chest and arms are skeletal and her torso and legs are covered with exoskeleton segments. Her removable wings are beautiful cutouts that transition from pink to black with sections of translucent yellow.
She is wearing a black dress decorated with a print of colorful moths and butterflies. The neckline has pink mesh and her nibbled long sleeves have pink mesh stripes and pink mesh bell cuffs. The skirt has a pink mesh top layer and both layers have shredded hems.
Accessories consist of a yellow headband with pink moths and a yellow caterpillar belt with a moth buckle. Her yellow shoes and heels are covered with cutouts in the shape of hearts and other designs. 
Included with the doll is a brush and Bonita’s diary. A doll stand is not included. She is able to stand unassisted.

Sirena is stunning with her blue & purple hair. It is curled and worn in a high ponytail with three long braids on one side. Her ghostly pallor is offset by fin-like ears, webbed fingers, cutout fins on her forearms, and a beautiful mermaid tail.
She is wearing a sleeveless light green top with a print of dark green tentacles and strings of pearls. Covering the top’s translucent straps is a short black fishnet sash that drapes over one shoulder. On each wrist are black fishnet cuffs with long dangling looped tassels.
Accessories consist of a silver pearl earring, a double-hoop earring made from chains and pearls, a triple-chain necklace, and a black belt. Attached to the belt is silver chain netting with scale-like hoops. The netting wraps around her tail all the way down to her fins. 
Included with the doll is a yellow brush and Sirena’s diary. A doll stand is not included. She is able to stand unassisted.
Age: 17

Killer Style: I like to combine fashions from both sides of my heritage like intertwining strings of pearls with my chains. I mean, if you're going to rattle around, you might as well be fashionable while you're doing so.

Freaky Flaw: I guess some monsters think I'm a bit of an air fin, but what I actually am is a daydreamer. I'm always floating away in my thoughts, on land or sea.

Favorite Activity: I'm super curious, so I love to treasure hunt in the sea and go to antique stores on land. I love scaring up unique and special freaky findings.

Favorite School Subject: Archaeology. It's like a new adventure every day because you never know what's going to wash up with the tide.

Clawvenus is a fusion of Clawdeen Wolf and Venus McFlytrap making her a werewolf plant monster. Her multicolored hair is pink and shaved in the front. Three bright green rows form a ponytail full of long purple hair and a strip of bright green. She has olive brown skin with leafy wolf ears and ivy veins in her hands.
She is wearing a wild dress that has a black mesh neckline and a shimmery purple bodice with black leopard print. The black & green floral skirt features flytraps and leaves. Over the dress is a vest with very long faux fur that is bright green, pink, and purple.
Gold accessories consist of a studded hoop earring, a twisted vine earring, a studded bracelet, and a winding arm wrap. Her massive gold belt has a solid “V” etched front with four pyramid studded straps. On her feet are black peep-toe boots with claw-like heels and pink vines wrapped around the ankles. Her green handbag is etched leopard print with prickly vine accents.
Included with the doll is a yellow brush, doll stand, and Clawvenus’s diary.

Cleolei is a fusion of Cleo de Nile and Toralei Stripe making her a mummy werecat. Her straight hair is all black except for an orange streak with black stripes. She has cat ears, vertical pupils, and a long tail. Multiple parts of her body and tail are wrapped in linen bandages.
She is wearing a sleeveless jumpsuit with a turquoise neckline and a hieroglyphic print. The print features yellow cats with intertwined tails plus pink and turquoise accents. Over the jumpsuit is a shimmery turquoise jacket. The cropped jacket has black diamond lines, black trim, and 3/4 sleeves.
Accessories begin with a gold cat faced headband, gold stud earrings, and a black lace scarf tied around her neck. On her left hand is a gold fingerless glove and around her waist is a turquoise grommet belt with an orange cat buckle. On her feet are black ankle strap wedges decorated with pyramid studs. The orange platforms have etched lines and serrated soles. Her golden handbag has pyramid etched handles and turquoise cat face accents.
Included with the doll is a yellow brush, doll stand, and Cleolei’s diary.

Dracubecca is a fusion of Draculaura and Robecca Steam making her a vampire robot. Her black wavy hair features streaks of blue and pink. She has gear-shaped irides, fangs, and pink skin held together by small heart-shaped rivets.
She is wearing a dress with a pink top and a midriff adorned with blue stripes outlined in black. The sleeves are black lace and the neckline has black lace accents. The blue print skirt features rows of copper dots with fancy hearts, purple swirly designs, and a pink ruffled hem with black lace trim.
Copper accessories begin with heart-shaped goggles and earrings made of gears and winged hearts. On her back are removable cutout wings decorated with swirls and rivets. Around her waist is an elaborate peplum belt with riveted bat wing cutouts. 
She also has on black knee-high rocket boots that lace up the front. The pink platforms and heels are made up of rocket exhaust nozzles. Her last accessory is a parasol with a twisted black handle, winged accents, and a copper canopy. The cutout canopy has rivets, swirls, and a mechanical heart at the finial.
Included with the doll is a yellow brush, doll stand, and Dracubecca’s diary.

Lagoonafire is the fusion of Lagoona Blue and Jinafire Long making her a blend of sea monster and Chinese dragon. Her hair is bright yellow with green highlights and a bright green curl in the front. She has scaled blue-gray skin, fin-like ears, webbed fingers, golden fins on her forearms and calves, and a long tail with a flowing golden tip.
She is wearing a pink top with an upturned collar and tiny sleeves accentuated by black tulle. Her black skirt features a pink & turquoise print of jellyfish and sand dollars. A gold waist band with a short turquoise tulle overskirt completes the outfit.
Accessories begin with an elaborate pink head piece made up of pearls, coral, and aquatic accents. Across her front is a golden chest piece with three decorative leafy wing-like rows. On her feet are pink booties with swirly heels and designs like the chest piece. Her purse is a translucent pink jellyfish with hanging tentacles.
Included with the doll is a yellow brush, doll stand, and Lagoonafire’s diary.

Neighthan is a unicorn zombie with very long black mane of hair that features streaks of red, blue, and yellow. He has a translucent blue spiral horn poking out of his hair, horse ears, gray skin, and sections of exposed muscle striations on his face and body.
He is wearing a shirt with a red sleeve, a blue sleeve, a black back, and a black collar. The front is a blue & white skeletal image with yellow and red internal organs. His pants are black with the front of one leg decorated by an abstract pattern of red, yellow, and blue outlined in black.
He accessorizes with a yellow baseball cap with blue speckles, ear & horn cutouts, and a row of spiral unicorn horns. His shoes are yellow high-tops with tiny blue speckles and rows of little studs. 
Included with the doll is a yellow brush, doll stand, and Neighthan’s diary.

Operetta is amazing with her red & black hair and rockabilly style. She is wearing a wonderful sleeveless dress with black straps and a shimmery red bodice trimmed with red tulle ruffles. The waist is black with a piano key design and the skirt is white with an abstract piano key print. Under the skirt is a red tulle layer trimmed with a black sheet music pattern.
Black & white accessories consist of piano key earrings, a piano key bracelet, and a half mask. The white dripping heart mask has five black pips and is accentuated by a black fishnet veil and a black ribbon. Her fan shaped purse is made up of piano keys with strands of dangling black beads. 
Evening gloves cover her hands; the right one is white and the left is black. On her feet are black peep-toe pumps decorated with spiderwebs, a bow on each foot strap, and stacked dice for heels.
Included with the doll is a black coffin shaped camera with a silver spiderweb flash bulb and a black lanyard with a V.I.M. badge. There is also a black brush, doll stand, and Operetta’s diary.
Age: 16...in phantom years

Monster Parents: The Phantom of the Opera

Killer Style: From the top of my hotrod red victory roll hairdo to the souls in my shoes - don't step on 'em - I'm a high-octane rockabilly phantom de force. I've also got this pitch perfect beauty mark that starts on my face and ends in the ginchiest tat ever.

Freaky Flaw:  I'm a bit of a diva and a perfectionist...okay, more than a bit. Mostly it's just about my music though which causes monsters to kinda lose their minds for a few days if they hear me sing live. My voice doesn't have the same effect when you listen to it recorded.

Abbey’s straight white hair is pulled into a ponytail and features a triple streak of purple, magenta, and blue. She is wearing a short form-fitting dress with elbow length sleeves, a pink neckline, and black trim. The dress is elaborately decorated with dripping rows of light blue and black; rows of pink and white triangles; purple rows with DNA strands; and rows of white or black snowflakes and atom symbols.
Translucent purple accessories consist of glasses with snowflake accents and crystal pumps with furry cuffs. Abbey does not include a brush or doll stand.
"Geek Shreik" - Noun. \ɡēk shrēk\

The unique art of combining style and smarts into a scary-cool look, monsterality, and way of unlife.

Synonym: Brainy Monsterista.
Antonym: Booring.

Frankie’s black & white streaked hair is long and straight with bangs. She is wearing a short form-fitting argyle dress with black elbow length sleeves, blue trim, and a red bow at the neckline. The argyle pattern has black and blue diamonds, red dashed lines, and red lightning bolt accents.
Accessories consist of blue glasses with lightning bolts along the top and blue pumps. The pumps feature rows of studs, cutouts with lightning bolts, and lightning bolt heels. Frankie does not include a brush or doll stand.
"Geek Shreik" - Noun. \ɡēk shrēk\

The unique art of combining style and smarts into a scary-cool look, monsterality, and way of unlife.

Synonym: Brainy Monsterista.
Antonym: Booring.

Howleen has lots of wavy pink hair with orange highlights. She is wearing a yellow baseball tee with black sleeves. The front of the shirt features an image of Cushion, her pet hedgehog, wearing glasses and a bow tie. Her short skirt is blue with a print of red and yellow symbols and tools that include Pi, addition, division, a compass, a light bulb, and more.
Accessories consist of yellow compass glasses and yellow lace-up booties with compasses for heels. Howleen does not include a brush or doll stand.
"Geek Shreik" - Noun. \ɡēk shrēk\

The unique art of combining style and smarts into a scary-cool look, monsterality, and way of unlife.

Synonym: Brainy Monsterista.
Antonym: Booring.

Clawdeen is in it to win it! She’s wearing a purple baseball cap trimmed with studs and etched with leopard print. The front of the hat is white with the Monster High crest and holes allow her ears to poke through. Under the hat her hair is brown with purple streaks and worn in a side ponytail. She has purple hoops in her ears and a translucent pink bubblegum bubble in her mouth.
Her outfit is a white uniform with black pinstripes and purple zipper stripes. The shirt’s sleeves are black mesh and pink trims the neckline and runs down the front. The shorts have a black waistband and the legs are hemmed with pink. Her white knee high socks are attached to black peep-toe pumps with spiked straps, serrated cleats, and claw-like heels.
Accessories consist of a white bone bat, a translucent green glove, and a ball that looks like an eyeball. She stores her equipment in a purple coffin-shaped sports bag that is decorated with “Monster High” zippers, and leopard print. Included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Clawdeen’s Physical Deaducation diary.

Spectra is ready for the big game. Her purple hair is in a high ponytail and she is wearing a white tennis dress decorated with a pattern of crisscrossing pink chains. The top of the dress has shredded black tulle with the Monster High crest and a translucent yellow stripe. Under the skirt is a layer of shredded black tulle and under that is shredded yellow mesh.
Translucent yellow accessories feature a chain link visor, two shackle bracelets, and a chain belt with extra hanging chains. On her feet are white tennis shoes with attached white socks, yellow soles, and chain accents.
Her equipment consists of a yellow ball and a yellow skullette racket. The racket has a white bone handle and black & white strings. She stores her racket in a translucent yellow skullette case with a chain handle. Included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Spectra’s Physical Deaducation diary.

Toralei is going to take the field by storm with her ponytailed red hair with black & orange streaks. She’s wearing a light blue shirt with white stripes and translucent straps. Over the shirt is a black mesh crop top with a white skullette inside of a dripping pink “9”. Her shorts are black with a jagged waistband that is checkered black and pink.
Accessories consist of pink stud earrings, a pink ribbon tied in her ponytail, a black fingerless glove, and black cat-like studded shin guards. On her feet are pink shoes that have serrated cleats and are covered with studs.
Her equipment features a light blue soccer ball and a translucent blue water bottle with a straw. She carries the ball in a pink net bag adorned with the Monster High crest. Included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Toralei’s Physical Deaducation diary.

Toralei looks fierce in her red sleeveless top with jagged diagonal black stripes.  Accentuating the top is an orange scarf worn around her neck. Completing the ensemble is a black mini skirt decorated with red outlined splotches.
Accessories consist of silver stud earrings, a silver hoop earring, a gold grommet belt, and a red fingerless glove on her right hand. Her red peep-toe shoes have laces up the fronts and studs along the tops and sides.
This version is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When a lever on her back is depressed she “claws” her arm, moves her tail, meows, and her eyes light up. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Deuce is wearing a vest with horizontal gray and white stripes. Under the vest is a red t-shirt with a graphic of a a skull and cassette tape. His black pants are detailed with an intermittent pattern of gray outlined diamond-shaped scales. He accessorizes with translucent red sunglasses and black & white checkered loafers.
This version is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When a lever on his back is depressed the snakes in his hair move, he raises his glasses, his eyes glow, and he emits a hypnotic turn-to-stone sound. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Robecca has wavy black & blue hair and riveted bronze skin. She has gear-shaped irises, purple eyeshadow, and dark lips.
Her ornate dress features a blouse with black and copper sleeves. The top half is a blue pattern of copper dots and diamonds. The midriff is black and decorated with blue stripes and copper gears. Completing the look is a black skirt under a blue cage.
Copper accessories consist of welder goggles and dangling earrings. On her wrist is a blue wrist cuff. Her lace-up copper boots have tubing on the sides and rockets on the soles.
Robecca is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. Her chest opens, her heart glows, gears spin, and her rocket boots “fire”.

Catrine has long wavy lavender hair with darker streaks of purple. It is pulled into a side ponytail and decorated with a dark blue lily headband with light blue monster-faced flowers.
She is wearing a light purple dress with a floral print featuring purple lilies. The top of the dress is sheer blue mesh and around the waist is a blue ribbon belt. The underskirt is blue with black leafy vines.
Accessories consist of a chartreuse bow choker, a dark blue bangle, and a pink bangle. On her feet are light blue pumps with fleur-de-lis straps and vine heels. Complementing the shoes are anklets adorned with dark purple lilies and pink monster-faced flowers.
Included with Catrine is a lavender gardening claw and a chartreuse pot holding a dark purple floral arrangement with pink monster-faced flowers. She also has her diary, a black brush, and a doll stand.
The Corpse Flower only blooms once every 1,300 years, and it's happening at Monster High! So, what do you do to celebrate an opening that is a millennium in the making? You throw a party, of corpse; and now the ghouls are ready to blossom in their fangtasticly floral fashions. Hey, this is no time to be a wall flower - get out on the floor and dance the fright away.

Cleo has wavy black hair with streaks of blue and shimmery black. It is styled with bangs, a side ponytail, and a blue headband with a blue and yellow lotus flower.
She is wearing a lovely sleeveless dress with a shimmery blue lotus print and black & gold trim. Over the dress is a long sheer shawl that is striped with black and gold. Tied around her waist is a blue, black, and gold striped belt with a blue lily accent.
Accessories consist of dangling blue lotus earrings, a gold necklace, a black asp bracelet, a gold triangle bangle, and a blue bracelet. On her feet are gold sandals with zigzag etched platforms and snake heels. Decorating her ankles are light and dark blue lotus flower anklets. Her rectangular handbag is gold with hieroglyphic accents.
Included with Cleo is a blue gardening claw, a blue trowel, and a gold vase. The vase has blue lotus flowers with big green leaves and snake roots. She also comes with her diary, a black brush, and a doll stand.

You throw a party, of corpse; and now the ghouls are ready to blossom in their fangtasticly floral fashions. Hey, this is no time to be a wall flower - get out on the floor and dance the fright away.

Jane has long dark purple hair with streaks of pink. One side is pulled back and held by a red flower clip with a black pistil.  
She is wearing a beautiful red top decorated with a black and purple floral and skullette print. The neckline and cuffs are adorned with black tulle trim. Complementing the top is a fluffy black faux fur skirt with a leatherette waistband.
Light blue accessories consist of skullette feather earrings, a beaded bracelet, and a belt with a skullette and feather buckle. On her feet are dark blue strappy pumps with stacked skull heels and anklets adorned with large red flowers.
Included with Jane is a blue trowel and a purple vase with a light blue floral arrangement. She also has her diary, a black brush, and a doll stand.
The Corpse Flower only blooms once every 1,300 years, and it's happening at Monster High! So, what do you do to celebrate an opening that is a millennium in the making? You throw a party, of corpse; and now the ghouls are ready to blossom in their fangtasticly floral fashions. Hey, this is no time to be a wall flower - get out on the floor and dance the fright away.

Jinafire’s green and black hair is long and wavy with a bun on top. The bun is accentuated by a reddish pink flower clip. 
She is wearing a lovely sleeveless wrap dress that features shimmery purple scales with a print of black and yellow flowers. The dress has shiny red trim, red shoulder frills, and an overskirt. The red overskirt has a shimmery gold dragon print, a black lace under layer, and a red waist with a black tassel belt.
Accessories consist of black fan tassel earrings, a green beaded bracelet, a black leafy bracelet, and a green bangle. On her feet are jade green pumps with ivy etching and dragon heels. Decorating her ankles are black anklets with fans, floral branches, and reddish pink flowers. Her fan-shaped purse is reddish pink with filigree etchings and black handles.
Included with Jinafire is a gold trowel, gold dragon-handled pruning shears, and a gold vase with a black and reddish pink floral arrangement. She also has her diary, a black brush, and a doll stand.
The Corpse Flower only blooms once every 1,300 years, and it's happening at Monster High! So, what do you do to celebrate an opening that is a millennium in the making? You throw a party, of corpse; and now the ghouls are ready to blossom in their fangtasticly floral fashions. Hey, this is no time to be a wall flower - get out on the floor and dance the fright away.

Venus has pink and green hair with dark streaks. It is pulled into a ponytail and decorated with a green and pink Venus flytrap hair clip.
She is wearing a wonderful dress that features a print of pink and green Venus flytraps. The sleeves are black mesh and the front of the bodice is pink embellished with curling black vines. Around the waist is a black belt with a twisting vine that creeps to one shoulder and part way down the skirt.
Vine accessories consist of dangling black earrings, a black necklace, two green bracelets, and two ankle wraps with green and pink Venus flytraps. On her feet are black booties with serrated heels.
Included with Venus is a turquoise watering can and a round orange pot with green Venus flytraps. She also has her diary, a black brush, and a doll stand.
The Corpse Flower only blooms once every 1,300 years, and it's happening at Monster High! So, what do you do to celebrate an opening that is a millennium in the making? You throw a party, of corpse; and now the ghouls are ready to blossom in their fangtasticly floral fashions. Hey, this is no time to be a wall flower - get out on the floor and dance the fright away.

Clawdeen’s has lots of wavy purple hair with bangs and a small ponytail on top. Her translucent skin is light brown and a purple mask is painted onto her face. 
She is wearing a sleeveless magenta dress with a purple print of crescent moons and angular lines and shapes. One should and a portion of the neckline is purple tulle. Purple tulle ruffles also decorate the hem of the dress.
She accessorizes with gold chains embellished with crescent moon charms and links. One set of chains dangle from her shoulders and another set is wrapped around her waist. On her feet are strappy platforms made entirely of gold chains and cutout crescent moon heels. On one wrist is a translucent blue bracelet with an hourglass charm.
Included with Clawdeen is a translucent blue brush and doll stand. The chain stand gives her the appearance of floating.
When Spectra Vondergeist goes back to her old school to find out why MH is being haunted, the other ghouls use Boogey Sand to transform into ghosts so they can follow her. There, they die-scover that spirits are low because the Principal weighs students down with ghastly rules and detention chains. It's up to the ghouls and their new ghost friends to unbury the mystery of the hauntings and the secrets of the ghost school!

Draculaura’s hair is streaked black and pink and worn in a side ponytail. Her skin is light glowy pink and an orange mask is painted on her face.
She is wearing a short sleeveless pink dress with a pattern of black spiderwebs and splotches. On her forearms and attached to the sides of the dress are pink tulle wings.
Accessories consist of a translucent blue bracelet with an hourglass charm and a silver harness with swirly bat designs, dangling chains, and winged locks. On her feet are translucent black pumps with chain accents and fang-like heels.
Included with Draculaura is a translucent blue brush and doll stand. The chain stand gives her the appearance of floating.
When Spectra Vondergeist goes back to her old school to find out why MH is being haunted, the other ghouls use Boogey Sand to transform into ghosts so they can follow her. There, they die-scover that spirits are low because the Principal weighs students down with ghastly rules and detention chains. It's up to the ghouls and their new ghost friends to unbury the mystery of the hauntings and the secrets of the ghost school!

Spectra has highlighted purple hair with half pulled into a ponytail and the rest hanging in curly waves. Her skin is a glowy iridescent white that creates a ghostly tone.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress that features a pattern of squiggly gray, plum, and deep pink patches with various chain link patterns. It has a sweetheart neckline with a single deep pink mesh shoulder strap and a sawtooth hemline. 
The dress is accessorized with an elaborate silver chain wrapping adorned with skullette accents, padlocks, and balls. On her feet are matching silver wedges with locks and chains winding up her calves.
Included with Spectra is a brush and translucent blue chain doll stand that gives her the appearance of floating.
When Spectra Vondergeist goes back to her old school to find out why MH is being haunted, the other ghouls use Boogey Sand to transform into ghosts so they can follow her. There, they die-scover that spirits are low because the Principal weighs students down with ghastly rules and detention chains. It's up to the ghouls and their new ghost friends to unbury the mystery of the hauntings and the secrets of the ghost school!

Twyla has seafoam green hair with streaks of light purple and a seafoam green mask painted on her face. She is wearing a pale teal sleeveless dress decorated with a pattern of lavender spiderwebs and bugs. Across the neckline and covering the skirt are lavender tulle accents. Both the dress and tulle overskirt have a jagged hem.
Accessories begin with a silver headband with bow, a translucent blue bracelet with an hourglass charm, and a silver chain belt with twisting and dangling chains. On her feet are translucent teal wedges with ankle straps.
Included with Twyla is a brush and translucent blue chain doll stand that gives her the appearance of floating.
When Spectra Vondergeist goes back to her old school to find out why MH is being haunted, the other ghouls use Boogey Sand to transform into ghosts so they can follow her. There, they die-scover that spirits are low because the Principal weighs students down with ghastly rules and detention chains. It's up to the ghouls and their new ghost friends to unbury the mystery of the hauntings and the secrets of the ghost school!

Kiyomi has long hair colored with streaks of magenta, pink, and purple. Some of her hair is pulled into a high ponytail with the rest hanging loose.   She has shimmery facial features and ghostly light blue skin.
She is wearing a purple dress with a pattern of black, pink, lavender, and light blue crisscrossed lines. The dress has a purple tulle overskirt as well as sheer billowy sleeves and an asymmetrical top skirt decorated with shiny magenta floral accents.
Accessories consist of a light blue hair clip with eyes and chains, a pink chain bracelet, and an elaborate lavender collar with studs and chains. Around her waist is a pink grommet belt with long hanging chains. On her feet are sheer pink socks with dark gray translucent platforms trimmed with round studs and faces for heels. Her translucent purple purse has chain handles and a pink face on the sides.
Included with Kiyomi is her diary, a translucent blue brush, and doll stand. The chain link stand gives her the appearance of floating.
Age: 16

Killer Style: I like fashions that are comfortable and "floaty." They are very practical if you are going to be doing a lot of hovering.

Freaky Flaw: I have always been a reserved and quiet spirit, preferring to allow my appearance to say what needs saying. However, I do change shades of color based on what emotion I am currently feeling.

Favorite Activity: I love to observe other creatures going about their daily unlives. I also find it enjoyable to see their reaction when I match my face to theirs.

Porter has a mop of light greenish brown hair and glowy skin with a greenish tint. He is wearing a gray collared shirt covered with a dripping paint design. The pink painted sleeve transitions across the top of the chest and collar and ends with the light blue painted sleeve. His gray brick patterned shorts are decorated with pink, yellow, and light blue paint splatter.
He accessorizes with a silver chain shoulder harness that holds his translucent magenta and translucent blue spray paint cans. On one wrist is a silver shackle & lock and around his waist are wrapped silver chains with hanging loops of chains. His shoes are translucent teal.
Included with Porter is his diary, a translucent blue brush, and doll stand. The chain link stand gives her the appearance of floating.
Age: 16

Killer Style: I like to wear my art. It creates a fashion statement that is uniquely me. I strive to be an original monsterpiece.

Freaky Flaw: I tend to express myself through my art, which some critics don't always appreciate. I guess you could say I don't say it, I spray it.

Favorite Activity: Painting. I'll make anything a canvas! A wall, a floor, my shoes... If it's blank, I'll paint on it! But only with ghost paint, of course!

River is too cute with her wavy hair and bangs. It is light blue with lavender and pink streaks in the back. Her lavender skin has translucent forearms and calves that expose her bones.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress with shades of purple, pink, green, and blue. The pastel colors are covered with a shimmery print of skullettes and flowers. Over the dress is a sheer black hooded cape.
Accessories consist of a pink chain necklace with cutout bow, a blue bow bracelet, and a light blue chain bracelet with skull charm. Wrapped around her waist are lots of purple chains with a cutout bow and skull. At the small of her back the chains form a large purple bow with long strands of billowing chains. On her feet are translucent blue boots wrapped with purple chains and bows. Her gray staff is topped with a purple skull, a large bow, and wrapped chains.
Included with River is her diary, a translucent blue brush, and doll stand. The chain link stand gives her the appearance of floating.
Age: 14

Killer Style: So sweet it'll make your bones hurt. I love candy colors swirled together.

Freaky Flaw: I have a lot of energy, which makes it hard for me to float still, and I pop in and out, which tends to make monsters jump... a lot. Especially when I pop in right behind them. I don't really think it's as big a flaw as some other monsters do.

Favorite Activity: Party Planning! Food, decorations, entertainment - I love everything that goes into a well-executed... hehe... party.

Vandala has long turquoise hair with streaks of white and her skin is a ghostly blue. Her removable peg leg is translucent coral pink and etched with chains and wave-like swirls. 
She is wearing a dress that features wave-like streaks of white, seafoam green, turquoise, and black. Complementing the streaks are images of sinking ships, ship wheels, tentacles, and other nautical items. The sleeves and underskirt are black tulle decorated with shimmery pink fishnet accents. The dress and underskirt have asymmetrical hems and around the waist is a gray striped sash.
Accessories begin with a coral pink hat with a wide brim and a blue pirate ship & feather adornment. Over her dress is an elaborate coral pink overlay with epaulets, buttons, tentacles, chains, and anchor and key accents. She has silver tentacle hook earrings and a silver wrist cuff.  
On her foot is a translucent turquoise shoe with chains, beads, and a heel formed by a chest filled with golden treasure. Her turquoise anchor purse has a chain handle, seaweed accents, and a pirate skullette.
Included with Vandala is her diary, a translucent blue brush, and doll stand. The chain link stand gives her the appearance of floating.
Age: 16

Killer Style: Nautical Yo-Ho Bo-Ho Chic. Flowing silhouettes remind me of bow spray on the open sea and a fair wind in my sails.

Freaky Flaw: Arrgh, this is so embarrassing, but sometimes I get seasick... I'm a ghost - how does that even happen? Also, sometimes the lure of adventure capsizes my ability to consider the consequences.

Favorite Activity: Exploring uncharted areas of the deep boo sea. Ya never know what new lands you'll discover or what treasures you'll dig up.

Cleo is a majestic beauty in this Toys”R”Us exclusive. Her long black hair with turquoise highlights is pulled into a ponytail and she comes with three fantastic outfits.
Cleo is wearing a full body suit with only one sleeve. The black, pink, and beige suit has a mummy wrap appearance with a sheer dress over top. The dress is turquoise mesh with gold cross straps and a black chest wrap. It is held around the waist by a translucent black belt. On her feet are turquoise knee-high boots embellished with gold skulls up the sides.
Her second outfit is a long sleeve dress with vertical black and turquoise stripes. The turquoise stripes have a pattern of mummy wrappings. Around the waist is a gold belt with triangle spacers and a dangling chain.
Lastly, she has a cream top covered with colorful hieroglyphics. Around the waist is a golden sash which leads to a shimmery pink skirt with a bandage pattern. A black cropped jacket is worn over the top. It has long sleeves and features gold squares along the trim. 
Two additional pairs of shoes are included with the doll. The gold platform heels have ouroboros ankle straps and pyramids for soles. The translucent black shoes are held up by Anubis heels.
Accessories consist of translucent black sunglasses, translucent turquoise triangle earrings, gold earrings, a translucent black snake necklace, three gold triangle bangles, and a translucent turquoise ouroboros bracelet. Her purse is gold with a scarab on the side.
Cleo comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Cleo de Nile”.
Most ghouls have lots of misconceptions about me, like they think I have hoards of servants who go out and do all my shopping for me. Okay, well, that is actually true, but sometimes I like to go to the maul myself and do my own shopping, especially for shoes and accessories. Regardless, even if I did have a servant whose foot was as perfectly formed as my own, I still wouldn't let her choose my shoes because just because it fits doesn't mean it's comfortable, and there are some things even a princess must do for herself.

xx Cleo

Venus has gone all out for this Toys”R”Us exclusive. One side of her pink and green hair has been shaved short and then checkered with pink and black. She comes with three awesome outfits, three pairs of shoes, and lots of accessories.
Venus is wearing a long black top covered with a green ivy pattern and pink & white graphics. One sleeve and part of the top is made of black lace. Her capri pants are a pattern of tiny pink squares and black spatter. On her feet are black lace-up boots with ivy filigree.
Her second outfit is a black & white checkered sleeveless dress covered with pink & green Venus flytraps. A black choker strap with silver circles goes down the front of the dress to the waist. The hem is trimmed with two layers of tulle; one is black and the other is pink.
The final ensemble begins with a pink top under a black & green ivy vest. Across the front of the top is serrated black fishnet held by a green strip. Completing the outfit is a mini skirt covered with pink & white splatter.
Additional shoes include pink boots with large cuffs and black pumps with twisty heels. Accessories consist of translucent pink sunglasses, black hook earrings, black safety pin earrings, green square earrings, a green studded bracelet, a white studded bracelet, a wide pink studded bracelet, a wide white studded bracelet, and a white studded belt. 
She also has translucent black ivy wraps for her forearms and calves. The doll’s pink purse has a pink with white zipper on the side, green ivy edging, and green ivy handles.
Venus comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Venus McFlytrap”.
It often takes a while for certain fashions to grow on me, so sometimes I like to go to the maul, find a nice boutique and just soak up the style; and although I don't have the same kind of cultivated fashion sense as everyone else, I do like planting myself in every pair of shoes in the place. I mean seriously though, if a ghoul is going to fashionably bloom, her roots need to be solidly grounded in some freakishly fab footwear, especially if you don't want to spend your unlife as wallflower.

xx Venus

Wydowna has an incredible wardrobe for this Toys”R”Us exclusive. She comes with three comic book themed outfits, plenty of shoes, and lots of amazing accessories.
Wydowna is wearing a sleeveless dress covered with a collage of Spiderella comic book pages. The dress has a red collar, a red strip down the front, and a wide shiny silver waistband. On her feet are silver spiderweb boots with red spiderweb spurs in the heels.
Her second outfit has a large white tee featuring a black & red “SPLAT!” comic explosion and rows of yellow dots. Under the shirt is a short skirt with black, white, red, yellow, and gray uneven horizontal lines.
Lastly, she has a yellow one-shoulder top with a pair of pants underneath. The pants are covered with a spectacular night time cityscape pattern.
Extra shoes include yellow spiderweb pumps and white knee-high boots. The lace-up boots have patterns of red dots, skullette emblems on the sides, and stiletto heels.
Accessories consist of silver spiderweb earrings, a blue double chain necklace, blue and silver bangles, red and white square bangles, yellow and white studded bracelets, plus blue and yellow wide studded bracelets. She also has a silver grommet belt with a skullette buckle and a yellow fingerless glove on one hand. The doll’s white purse has a long strap and a pattern of black dots and red spiderwebs on the flap.
Wydowna comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Wydowna Spider”.
I usually like to take a spin at making my own clothes, but I don't always have a lot of time on my hands, so sometimes I like to swing down to the maul and see if I can find fashions that really stick. it's not always easy, though, since most places don't usually carry my size... in the six arm version, anyway.

xx Wydowna

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Clawdia Wolf, Howleen Wolf & Clawd Wolf
dolls.description:
This 4-pack features Clawd, Clawdeen, Clawdia, and Howleen Wolf wearing similar outfits. The Wolf family of werewolves have gotten together for a family photo. 
Clawd has dark brown hair shaved short with a mohawk on top. He is wearing a polo shirt with a white collar, blue & black claw marked stripes, and yellow highlights. His shorts are gray and his purple sneakers have blue claw mark accents.
Clawdeen has curly brown hair with purple streaks. Her sleeveless top has a white collar, black & green claw marked stripes, and purple highlights. The high-waisted skirt is purple leopard print with a purple tulle top skirt. Over her shoulders is a black faux fur shawl. Accessories include three studded gold hoop earrings and a studded gold wrist cuff. On her feet are gold strappy platform wedges.
Clawdia has bright yellow hair worn in a ponytail. She has on a white sleeveless collared blouse decorated with pink crossbones. Over the top is a 3/4 sleeve jacket with black & yellow claw marked stripes and red highlights. Her red shorts have a turquoise ribbon belt and feature an elaborate print of crossbones and triangles. She accessorizes with brown glasses and a pyramid studded gold bracelet. One her feet are yellow pumps decorated with studs.
Howleen has shoulder length pink hair with orange accents. She is wearing a pink claw marked shirt under a 3/4 sleeve cropped top. The black & orange striped top has light purple claw marks and a white collar. Her pants are blue with a pattern of black paw prints. Accessories consist of two wide pink bracelets, a black beaded bracelet, and black wedge booties. 
This Walmart exclusive does not include doll stands.

Casta has long black hair with a streak of orange and purple down the center. It is styled with a big front puff and the rest pulled to the back. Her skin is light green with a mole above her lip and a gold beauty mark under one eye.
She is wearing a sleeveless glittery dress with an orange bodice that transitions to purple. The bottom of the dress has a flared trim made of glittery black mesh that is accentuated by a wide black belt with a silver buckle and studs. Over the dress is an ultra-cropped black leatherette jacket with puffy orange mesh sleeves.
Accessories consist of a silver studded ball earrings, a black mesh arm warmer, a silver bracelet, and two studded purple bangles. On her shoulders is a black harness with a neck collar, arm cuffs, and studded straps over her puffy sleeves. Her purple high heel boots boots are decorated with studs and straps with silver studs and buckles.
Included with Casta is her concert program, a black brush, a shiny purple microphone, and her broom. The broom has shiny purple bristles and a silver handle adorned with a black ribbon and a thinner orange ribbon with buckles. The broom can be used as a microphone stand.
Name Casta Fierce

Age: 19

Monster Parents: Daughter of Circe

Killer Style: I like lots of buckles and straps crisscrossed over black and purple fashions splashed with glitter.

Freaky Flaw: I have to make sure to work the lyrics of my songs in just the right way, or I run the risk of turning my audience into... well... let's just say frogs don't usually ask for an encore.

Pet: I can't have a pet because I don't think I could stand being constantly asked, "Oh, how cute... was this a fan of yours?"

Favorite School Subject: When I was in school, it was drama. I could always play and sing, but drama class taught me how to be an entertainer. It's also where I learned the spellcial effects and flyrotechnics I use in my concerts.

Favorite Color: Black and purple.

Favorite Food: Tomatoes and monsterella cheese with balsamic vinegrrr.

BFF's: Catty Noir, Operetta

Once a year on Alll Hallows Eve, Casta Fierce and her band perform a concert. It is the most exclusive ticket in the monster world, and this year they have chosen Monster High as their concert venue.

The Draculocker playset features the locker/carrying case, lots of accessories, and a Draculaura doll.
Draculocker
The coffin-shaped case is black with a Monster High crest on the front and a pink bow handle on top. It is hinged and held closed by a Skullette lock.
Inside, the left half has lots of shelves and two drawers with pink Skullette knobs. The magenta background has images of items made to look like they are sitting on the shelves.
The right half is more open with only a couple of shelves. It has a pink bar to hold Count Fabulous and a pink Skullette clothes rack with 10 silver batty hangars. The background is pattern of pink tufts with bow accents.
With the locker is a blue tufted chair that rests upon a pedestal with a spiderweb base. Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat, is also inside. He is black with a pink bow and a pink shirt. 
Draculaura 
Draculaura has straight black hair with a streak of pink that is pulled into a ponytail. She has pale skin, gray eyeshadow, black fanged lips, and a pink heart on her cheek.
Her outfit features a long sleeveless top that is pink with polka dots and winged hearts. The pants are black and shiny.
She accessorizes with pink zipper earrings and a gray necklace. On her feet are pink peep-toe pumps with bow straps.
Accessories
Additional accessories begin with a sleeveless dress. It is pink with crinkled black lines. For shoes, there are white pumps with ankle strap bows and pink high tops. 
There also is a pink parasol with a batty handle, bat wing sunglasses, and black bow and heart earrings. Bags include a black heart-shaped purse, a pink coffin-shaped purse, and a gray cutout tote.

Ghouls need to keep up with all of the juicy rumors and gossip surrounding the students of Monster High. This 2-pack features Rochelle and Catrine sharing secrets on their coffin phones.
Rochelle Goyle
Rochelle’s hair is pink with light blue streaks, has bangs, and is pulled into a ponytail. She is wearing an adorable dress with a pink, gray, and light blue stained glass print with black outlines and trim. The short sleeves and neckline are made of dotted black lace. Her turquoise shoes have  intricate cutout swirls and scrolls that form the platforms and heels.
Catrine DeMew
Catrine has lovely lavender hair with light pink highlights. Her sleeveless dress has a ruffled top decorated with blue lines and dripping purple lines outlined in black. The skirt is a purple print that features mustached cats with berets interconnected by squiggly blue lines. On her feet are lavender cat-faced shoes with ruffled ankles and string-like wedges.
Accessories consist of two iCoffin phones, one turquoise and one lavender. Each phone has a handset attached to a spine-like cord that has a heart-shaped twist. Included with the 2-pack is a black brush and two black doll stands.

Iris is a one-eyed beauty with her long sleeve pink dress with black waist. Over the dress is a white & pink filigree vest with a jagged black collar and under the dress is a pair of black half-tights. On her feet are pink ankle-strap heels covered with a pattern of green eyes.
She accessorizes with pink safety pin earrings as well as two black & two white bangles on one wrist. Her circular pink purse features a green eye surrounded by pink filigree on white. Iris also has a green binder.
