Manny is wearing a red t-shirt with a red labyrinth imprinted on the chest. He also has on blue jeans and brown boots with red laces. His accessories include a gold nose ring, a black casketball with “Monster High” in purple, a gray single-strap backpack with a purple labyrinth, and a red binder.
Manny’s does have a varsity jacket, but it was packaged and sold separately. The jacket is black with white & pink stripes by the shoulders; has black, white & pink striped cuffs and trim; and has a labyrinth pattern at the end of the sleeves.
Also included with the dolls are two doll stands, Manny’s diary, Iris’s diary, and a note to Manny from Iris. The 2-pack was an exclusive for the 2014 San Diego Comic-Con International.

Sometimes a manster has to do what a manster has to do. Spending a night rolling dice and playing games is just what a manster needs. Gil and Deuce are ready for a game night with no ghouls allowed.
Gillington “Gil” Webber
Gil has light blue scaly hair with a drooping translucent blue fin-hawk. He also has translucent fins on his forearms and calves and translucent gills on his neck.
He is wearing a lavender shirt with 3/4 turquoise sleeves. Along the hem of the shirt are swirled turquoise waves with a black fin sticking out. He completes the outfit with long black shorts, purple flip-flops, and his dome helmet.
Deuce Gorgon
Deuce has scaly green hair with an upright snake-hawk. He has on a black sleeveless tee with gray shoulders and a shiny silver image of a skeletal snake. His green pants are angled plaid that highlight the scaled stripes. He accessorizes with a black hoop earring, black glasses with red lenses, and white sneakers with black laces.
Game night accessories feature a green game board with colored squares and trails, a smaller tan game board with the manster’s images, a red die, two game cards, and two monster game pieces, one green and the other turquoise. Also included are two brainy cans of soda, two two black doll stands, Gil’s diary, and Deuce’s diary.
Sometimes a manster has to do what a manster has to do, and if that means ditching the ghouls for a night in order to save the world, then so be it. Now, just because the world in question exists only in the manster's mind and basement, or that its fate is determined by a series of opposing dice rolls, doesn't mean bragging rights aren't at stake, and dude, you are so going down!

Frankie and Jackson are spending the day together.  Even ghouls love a romantic picnic when it’s with a handsome manster.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has added a little yellow tint to her black & white streaked hair. She is wearing a sleeveless dress with a black top that has an interlocking pattern of hex nuts. The collar and ribbon belt are yellow and the blue skirt features crisscrossed black and light blue stitches. Over the dress is a cute gray sweater with shimmery pink trim and two bands of black stitches on one sleeve. She accessorizes with yellow lightning bolt earrings and black pumps with pink bolts for heels.
Jackson Jekyll
Jackson is very handsome with his black hair and yellow hairline. He is wearing a sleeveless blue tee with a green neckline and a green yin-yang symbol on top of a blue checkered pattern. Over the tee is a black & gray checkered jacket with two green bands on one arm. His pants are yellow and match his glasses. His black slip-on shoes feature green yin-yang symbols.
For the picnic they have two gooey green cakes on black plates, a blue skullette-topped bottle, a pink skullette-topped bottle, and a silver coffin-shaped basket. Also included with the dolls is a brush and two doll stands.
It's a bootiful day for a picnic so Frankie and Jackson have thrown together a casket full of goodies and they're off to find a nice spot that's quiet, shady and music free. Is this just a friendly get together for lunch or is there a real spark in the air between these two fangtastic friends?

dolls.character:
Cleo de Nile,
 Gilda Goldstag,
 Lagoona Blue,
 Scarah Screams
 & Sloman Slo Mo Mortavitch
dolls.description:
The Student Disembody Council has five members: Sloman “Slo Mo” Mortavitch as president, Lagoona Blue as vice president, Cleo de Nile as social chair, Gilda Goldstag as treasurer, and Scarah Screams as secretary.
Sloman “Slo Mo” Mortavitch
Slo Mo has blue hair on top and shaved gray hair on the sides. He is wearing a purple shirt that sports rows of Dead Fast, the comic book hero, running with black streaks in his wake. His pants are blue and black sneakers complete his outfit.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has straight blonde hair with blue highlights. She has on a sleeveless black dress with a pattern of purple & blue tentacles. Around her neck is a turquoise beaded necklace with a seahorse pendant and on her feet are purple high-top sneakers.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo’s black hair has an adorable bob cut with sparkly red strands. She’s wearing a form-fitting dress with a gold trimmed neckline and a pattern of yellow & black mummy bandages. She accessorizes with a red choker necklace and a red pair of pumps.
Gilda Goldstag
Gilda has gold skin, pink hair styled into a point, and brown horns on her forehead. She is wearing a green tank top and brown pants. Over the top is a tan leatherette jacket with a yellow & orange bullseye on one sleeve. Her accessories consist of yellow hoop earrings, an orange belt, and tan knee-high boots.
Scarah Screams
Scarah has straight black hair worn in a high ponytail. Her outfit features a sleevelees green dress decorated with images of a screaming woman’s face. She accessorizes with a white belt and pink ankle strap pumps.
Additional items consist of two pink Monster High pennants and two black & white Monster High foam fingers. This Target Exclusive does not include brushes or doll stands.

Draculaura’s straight hair is black with pink highlights. It is styled into a bun with bangs and a long ponytail.
She is wearing a pink kimono top with a black collar and arm cuffs. It features a pattern of cherry blossoms and paper fans. The top half of her skirt is white with a black spiderweb print. The bottom half and scalloped hem are decorated with black, white, and pink paper fans. Under the skirt is a layer of black tulle.
Accessories begin with a pink fan-like bow accentuated by a batty gray branch. Around her waist is a wide pink belt with wavy edges and on her feet are pink getas decorated with black straps, black fans, and spiderweb etched platforms. Her black purse has an angular hear shape with pink tufted sides adorned with a bow formed by a heart and fans.
Included with Draculaura is a black brush, doll stand, black skullette passport, and a passport diary. 
This year Monster High will be participating in the student Monster Exchange program and extending its haunted hospitality to ghouls all over the world. Of course, it wouldn’t truly be an “exchange” if some of our ghouls weren’t participating, too. That’s why Draculaura is totes excited to haunt East where she’ll be spending her time away from Monster High in the city of Shibooya. New friends, new experiences and a new culture await, but will she miss the old too much to enjoy the new? Probably not, this is Draculaura, after all, and if she misses anything it’s being able to share her stories and adventures with her friends.

Lagoona has achieved a big and bold new hairstyle for her trip abroad. Her blonde and turquoise hair now has lots and lots of tight curls. 
She is wearing a sleeveless white dress decorated with pink & black double circles outlined in a turquoise glow. The asymmetric peplum has two black trimmed layers; a white layer with black polka dots and a pink bottom layer. Over the dress is a shimmery black jacket with a pattern of double circles and pink and turquoise accents.
Accessories consist of a decorative turquoise hair comb, a black rose for her hair, and dangly pink octopus earrings. On her feet are translcuent black gravity wedges with pink rose accents. Her pink seashell purse has a tentacle handle and an octopus and rose motif on the sides.
Included with Lagoona is a black brush, doll stand, black skullette passport, and a passport diary. 
This year Monster High will be participating in the student Monster Exchange program and extending its haunted hospitality to ghouls all over the world. Of course, it wouldn’t truly be an “exchange” if some of our ghouls weren’t participating, too. That’s why Lagoona is getting ready for a dive into uncharted waters as she heads to the hauntingly bootiful, yet scarily landlocked, city of Madread. The only question that remains is - which will she miss more, the surf or Gil?

Lorna has beautiful curly orange hair that is accentuated by streaks of highlights. She has aqua blue scaled skin, webbed fingers, and fins protruding from her forearms, calves, and tail.
Her outfit begins with red top with a pattern crisscrossed black dotted lines, puffy sleeves, and a square of black mesh at the neckline. Her light blue kilt is made up of squares formed by red lines decorated with hearts and black diamonds. Inside the squares are white capped waves full of black sea monsters.
Accessories consist of a red plaid tam o’ shanter cap, a black sea monster earring, and a wide black knotted belt with a diagonal strap over one shoulder. On her feet are black lace-up shoes with high platforms made of gray castle-like bricks. Her sporran styled bag is coral pink and decorated with studs, Celtic knots, and a sea monster on the flap.
Included with Lagoona is a black brush, doll stand, black skullette passport, and a Rotland passport diary. 
Killer Style: Being a ghoul from the Highlands, I'd be doing a disservice to ma clan if I didna wear ma plaid, and since it can also get shivering Baltic in Rotland, I also like tae wear wool skirts and scarfs tae keep the cold at bay.

Freaky Flaw: I never met a photo I didna want tae be a part of, much tae the consternation of ma parents, who are notoriously photo shy. It's not like I want tae ruin a shot, but it's just so much fun.

Favorite Activity: Aye, it's photo bombing, but not just the ordinary kind. I like tae find ways tae get into a shot that are not so obvious, so ya might not see me when you look at a picture the first time.

Pet: I always wanted a dry land pet like a Highland cow, but when you live in a loch there's nae place tae keep one.

Marisol has bright pink hair with two bright green braided pigtails at the sides. She is taller than the average ghoul with oversized feet, lavender gray skin, and fur on her forearms and ankles.
Her colorful outfit begins with a pink strapless top under a cropped jacket. The orange jacket is decorated with green footprints and squiggly lines made up of blue, pink, and black. Her double skirt features a black top layer with intricate pink and green zigzag designs and rows of colorful flora and footprints. The underskirt is longer and bright green.
Accessories consist of a headband with a bright green bowler hat and orange tassels at the ends of her pigtails. On her feet are pink peep-toe wedges adorned with zigzags, triangle cutouts, braids, and bright green tassels. Her bright green bag is trimmed with zigzags and etched with monstrous footprints.
Included with Marisol is a black brush, doll stand, black skullette passport, and a Monster Picchu passport diary. 
Killer Style: I like BIG & LOUD! Colors, fashions, music, hair - everything goes to "12" with me except my feet; they're way off the chart because they're simply too gore-geous to be measured. So when you see me coming, and I can't be missed, in my colorful modern take on traditional Monster Picchu fashions, just remember #BigHairDon'tScare.

Favorite Activity: I love getting new nail art! It is the most perfect way to accent my best features, and what ghoul doesn't like getting a mani-pedi?

Freaky Flaw: My parents say that even when I whisper I'm still about as quiet as an avalanche, but I am simply larger than unlife and I cannot hide, not that I would want to, what I am feeling inside.

Pet: I love llamas, even though I do not have one as a pet. I mean, how could I not love them? They are fuzzy and quirky and are as much a part of Monster Picchu as I am.

Catty looks ferociously sweet with her long straight pink hair and shimmery dress. The form-fitting silver dress is covered with a random pink design creating a fractured appearance. Highlighting the dress is a crisscrossed black belt with a white buckle and shimmery pink tights with white frill trim. On her feet are dark pink wedges with shiny silver cracked heels.
Accessorizes consist of pink fingerless gloves with with white frill cuffs, three earrings (white, dark pink, and silver), a dark pink choker with “13”, and a dark pink purse. The skullette purse is tufted and held by two white handles. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, Catty’s Scaremester diary, and a dark pink binder.

Gigi looks magical with her ultra-high pink ponytail and long orange hair. She is wearing a black shirt decorated with a shiny gold scorpion. One sleeve is pink and the other is turquoise. Accentuating the top is a pink and turquoise wrap skirt with a black waist and gold buckle. Under the skirt are sheer white tights with a black interlocking chain pattern. On her feet are gold scorpion booties with cutouts to form legs, pincers, and curled stingers for heels.
Accessories for the outfit feature black drop earrings, a black ponytail holder, a gold belt, and a purse. The elaborate belt is made up of multiple hanging chains and chain loops. The pink purse has a turquoise flap, a gold scorpion emblem, and a gold handle. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, Gigi’s Scaremester diary, and a turquoise binder.

Invisi Billy looks terror-ific with his black & blue wardrobe that matches his black hair and blue highlights. He is wearing a hoodie with horizontal blue stripes and a color gradient from blue to black. 
Complementing the hoodie are light & dark blue long shorts with random white pixels. On his feet are white loafers with black patches.
He accessorizes with a light blue beanie, silver stud earrings, a silver necklace, silver bracelet, and silver watch. Around his waist is a white pyramid studded belt and over one shoulder he carries a translucent black pouch bandolier. 
Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, Invisi Billy’s diary, and a translucent black binder.

Twyla is scary cute in her back-to-school outfit that accentuates her light teal and blue hair. She is wearing a light purple dress decorated with a pattern of shiny blue and turquoise spiders, moths, dragonflies, bees, and ladybugs. The dress is detailed with a black bow at the collar, a black strip down the front, and a black pocket. Her shoes are turquoise Mary Jane wedges with black toes and heels.
The outfit is accessorized with two white bracelets, a turquoise bead bracelet, and a black purse molded with spiders. The purse has a turquoise handle and flap decorated with a ladybug, spider, and bee. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, Twyla’s Scaremester diary, and a translucent purple binder.

This reissue of Clawdeen is wearing her signature purple, black, and peach outfit. It is a less detailed version of the outfit worn by the doll in the Basic series.
The black jacket has a fur collar, gold stitching, and purple stitching on the cuffs and hem. Under the jacket is a peach top with black tiger stripes. Her skirt is purple with black tulle at the hem and her sandal boots are purple with gold buckles.
She accessorizes the outfit with a gold-studded black belt, gold necklace, and two gold hoop earrings in each ear. Also included with Clawdeen is a doll stand.

This reissue of Cleo is wearing her classic mummy inspired outfit. It is similar to the one worn by the doll in the Basic series 2-pack.
She is wearing a fabulous turquoise and black top that is both sparkly and sheer. Under the top is a jumpsuit of sandy bandages and a bandage sleeve. Cleo’s shoes are gold wedges with gold wrappings.
Her accessories feature a gold pearl belt, gold bracelet, gold armband, gold earrings, and a gold tiara. Also included with Cleo is a doll stand.

This reissue of Draculaura is wearing her classic black, white, and pink outfit. It consists of a vest, skirt, and boots and is less detailed than the one in the Basic series.
The pink vest has black stitching, faux black buttons, a white mesh jabot, and black fishnet sleeves with white mesh cuffs. She has a short white skirt with pink stitching, black fishnet tights, and pink knee-high boots with black laces and hearts.
Her accessories feature a pink flower necklace and gray safety pin earrings. Also included with Draculaura is a doll stand.

This reissue of Frankie is wearing her classic plaid dress. It is a less detailed version of the dress worn by the doll in the Basic series.
The dress is black & blue plaid with red and white stripes. It has a white collar, black mesh sleeves, and a black tulle hem. Accents include a black polka dot tie with a silver skullette pin and a silver-studded black belt with lightning bolt buckle.
She completes the outfit with black & white striped shoes and blue skullette earrings. Also included with Frankie is a doll stand.

Operetta is awesome with her big red hair, big bangs, big hair bump, and big ponytail with streaks of black. She is wearing a black top with a magenta collar, a red & white design on the chest, and a magenta bow by the waist. Her white capri pants have checkered pink lines and four black pips in each white square creating a dice-like appearance.
Accessories begin with a white heart-shaped mask that covers one eye, a white music note earring, and a purple lace headband scarf. Around her waist is a belt made of all black dice. On her feet are purple wedges decorated with straps, treble clefs, and white platforms.
Operetta has two bags. Her purse is purple with a music note handle and black piano key accents. The duffel bag is white with spiderwebs and red music note designs. 
Included with the doll is a brush and doll stand.

Skelita has lovely black hair with two streaks in the front; one is magenta and the other is turquoise. Covering her bony figure is a loose patterned black top with turquoise trim. The pattern has pink & turquoise flowers and bony white skeletons wearing pink luchador masks. Her short skirt has multicolored stripes and features random dripping black lines.
Accessories begin with a bony white headband decorated with a turquoise flower between two pink flowers. The dripping flowers have skullettes in the centers. She has translucent turquoise sunglasses that resemble a luchador mask and around her waist is a white bone belt. On her feet are pink wedges adorned with turquoise luchador masks. Her bone handled purse is turquoise with a luchador mask and magenta flower accents.
Included with Skelita is a brush and doll stand.

The Social Spots Creepateria includes a food station, a microwave & drink station, a table, and benches. The black food station has a spiderweb pattern, purple goo, and the Monster High crest. It has a blue inner shelf, a silver counter, and a guillotine. The wood guillotine has a silver serrated blade and an ornate magenta top with a skull and skeletal hands.
The microwave & drink station is black with a blue front and rounded top adorned with a pink skullette. The front has a studded outline and a skull and spiderweb design connecting the legs. The drink display is a column with pink shelves and a clear spiderweb-etched window. The station has a silver counter, pink spiderweb accents, blue shelves, and a microwave with a green spiderweb door.
The table and benches are pink with black wrought iron legs connected by skullettes and spiderweb designs. The table top is coffin-shaped and features a skullette, spiderweb cutouts, and studded edges. The benches also have the spiderweb cutouts and studs, but lack the skullette.
The pink coffin-shaped table is decorated with a skullette, spiderweb cutouts, and a studded outline. The wrought iron legs are black and connected by skullettes surrounded by spiderweb designs. The matching pink benches have spiderweb cutouts, studded outlines, and black legs just like the table.
Accessories begin with two coffin-shaped trays; one pink and one blue. For food there is a silver tray with green and magenta goo, a half green and half pink sub sandwich, a plate with desserts, and a pizza-like food. It also has a blue milk carton, a pink and a green cup with straws and lids, a green fork, and a blue fork.
There is an alternate version of the Creepateria that includes Cleo de Nile and Howleen Wolf, but lacks the microwave & drink station.

The Student Lounge includes a game table, couch, and vending machine. The silver coffin-shaped oozeball table is outlined with studs, has spiderweb cutouts, a pink field, and black spiderweb styled wrought iron legs. The table has two rods of green zombie players, two rods of magenta zombie players, and comes with two brain balls.
The pink couch has spiderweb tufted cushions with skullette buttons. The frame is black wrought iron decorated with rows of studs, a spider skull at the top, and an ornate spiderweb design in the front.
The coffin-shaped vending machine is black with spiderweb cutouts in the back, pink shelves and cranks, and a magenta front. The front has a quilted design that is outlined with studs and has vending buttons and controls. It has green goo at the top, the Monster High crest, a spiderweb-etched clear door, and a low blue door decorated with skullettes. 
The machine is filled with a bag of piranha crackers, a red cherry juice bottle, a green sour apple juice box, a blue sour apple juice box, crunchy mouse tails, and two studded soda cans; one red and one blue. Also included with the playset is a green laptop and a purple tombstone shaped tablet.

Abbey’s frightmare is an ice cream adventure. Her black & white streaked hair features pink and purple highlights. Decorating her hair is a purple headband tiara formed by dripping magenta ice cream and four black cones.
She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress with black straps and a white leatherette bodice adorned with a light blue dripping waffle cone pattern. The puffy purple skirt features a print of colorful sprinkles. Worn over the dress is a purple faux fur shawl.
Accessories begin with upside down ice cream cone earrings; one is magenta and the other is blue. Around her neck is a light blue waffle cone styled cut-out collar. Her belt is a dripping light blue cut-out like the collar but also has dripping black goo and a row of purple, magenta, black, and light blue skullettes. She wears long purple gloves with a winding magenta bracelet on one wrist and a light blue bracelet on the other.
On her feet are white fishnet knee-high socks and peep-toe heels formed by dripping black ice cream cones. One shoe has a light blue ice cream platform and magenta  ice cream skullette scoop accents. The opposite shoe has a magenta platform and light blue ice cream skullette scoops. Her purse is a translucent purple ice cream float with a twisted straw-like handle.
With this Target exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a Sweet Screams diary that tells the tale. Also included is Shiver, Abbey’s pet wooly mammoth who has been transformed into a translucent treat.

Ghoulia’s frightmare experience is a gummy delight. Her hair is long, wavy, and streaked with varying shades of blue. In her hair is a translucent headband made up of a red gummy brain surrounded by wiggling green gummy worms and a gummy bear.
She is wearing a delightful dress that has a black striped bodice and mismatched dripping-style sleeves and collar. The  collar is half red and half blue and one sleeve is red and the other is blue. The blue skirt has a colorful gummy worm print, an irregular dripping hem, and a blue tulle under layer.
Accessories consist of translucent blue gummy worm glasses with red accents, translucent red gummy worm earrings with blue tips, and a black necklace with black, red & blue beads. She also has a translucent green gummy worm wrist wrap, black gloves, and black, blue, and red beaded bracelets. 
Around her waist is a translucent green gummy worm belt with red & blue dots and dripping blue goo. On her feet are peep-toe wedges with red gummy worm heels and translucent red & green gummy worms winding up her legs. Her purse is a translucent green & red gummy bear with a blue handle.
With this Target exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a Sweet Screams diary that tells the tale. Also included is Sir Hoots-A-Lot, Ghoulia’s owl who has been transformed into a gummy treat.

Clawdeen looks fiercely fabulous with her purple streaked brown hair and shimmery purple two-piece swimsuit. The top features translucent purple straps with a green & black leopard print ruffle along the top trim. The bikini bottom has a front-split top layer that is also green & black leopard print.
Translucent accessories include a green spiked headband, two purple studded hoop earrings, green sunglasses, and a purple studded wristband. On her feet are translucent purple studded pumps with claw-like heels. Her crescent moon bag is translucent purple and covered with studs and spikes. Clawdeen’s towel is purple with a green & black leopard print.

Jinafire looks fierce and fabulous with her green hair pulled into a vertical ponytail that is shaped like a fan. She’s wearing a pink swimsuit decorated with a print of purple fans and green dragons. Translucent green flame-like scales trim the leg holes and create a single shoulder strap.
She accessorizes with several translucent pink items that include flaming sunglasses, tassel earrings, a paper fan purse, and ankle strap heels. Each of the heels feature a platform created by a claw holding an orb. To dry off Jinafire has a beach towel that matches her swimsuit.

Spectra plans to look amazing while she has some fun in the water. Her purple & blue hair is pulled into a ponytail and she’s wearing an awesome one-piece swimsuit. The suit is light blue with two V-shaped stripes and a pattern of black & purple chains. Jagged black mesh with pink stitching trims the neckline.
Translucent accessories consist of blue chain sunglasses, blue ball & chain earrings, a magenta chain armband, and blue heels adorned with chains and shackles. Her translucent magenta bag features hanging chains with a chain handle. Spectra’s beach towel is light blue and decorated with chains made up of magenta and black links.

Meowlody’s white hair has black stripes in the bangs and is worn in a ponytail. In her hair is a red sewing needle that has two balls of blue yarn with multiple dangling strands.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress with a pattern of irregular red, white, and light blue stripes accented with shimmery blue lines. The hem is adorned with strips of shredded black mesh. Over the dress is a black leatherette jacket with red trim and red stitch stripes.
She accessorizes with a black fish skeleton earring, a studded blue collar with a fish skeleton, a studded blue bracelet, and a red winding wrist wrap. Around her waist is a studded black belt with multiple hanging straps. On her feet are red fish skeleton peep-toe pumps with black black platforms and heels. Her black clutch has a red zipper and a small blue mouse.
Purrsephone’s black hais has white stripes in the bangs and is worn in a ponytail. A yellow sewing needle with two balls of yarn and dangling strands decorate her hair.
Like her sister she is wearing a sleeveless dress, but it has black, white, and light blue stripes with shimmery red lines. Her dress also has strips of shredded black mesh on the hem. Over the dress is a red leatherette jacket with black trim and black stitch stripes. 
Accessories for her outfit consist of a white fish skeleton earring, a blue fish skeleton collar, a studded blue bracelet, and a yellow winding wrist wrap. Around her waist is a studded black belt with multiple hanging straps. Her fish skeleton peep-toe pumps are white with red platforms and heels. The clutch is light blue with a yellow zipper and a small red mouse.
Also included with the dolls is a black brush, two doll stands, and a diary shared by Meowlody & Purrsephone.
It's the biggest dance of the year at Monster High and every ghoul and manster at MH can't wait to show up in their finest zombie shriek fashions for this creeporificilly cool chance to show off their most uhhhh-mazing moves. It will surely be a party rocking in the house to fright, and every monster is going to have a ghoul time.

Venus has pink & green hair with streaks of black. One pink side is shaved short and colored with a brain outline. The rest of her hair is in a high ponytail and adorned with a translucent green headdress made up of wiggly vines. She is wearing a sleeveless black dress decorated with jagged metallic green stripes and small white stripes. The dress has a serrated hem and a pink tulle top layer.
Translucent green ivy accessories consist of an earring, a necklace, an arm wrap, and two leg wraps. She also has a spiked black wrist cuff and a jagged green belt. On her feet are pink wedges with mouth-like fronts and teeth on the heels. Her clutch is translucent green with a silver zipper.
Rochelle’s pink & blue curls are worn in a ponytail. She wears a black headband with a light blue brain and black tulle accents. Her collared black dress features a metallic purple print made up of fleur-de-lys and skullettes. The dress is sleeveless, has a jagged hem, and is embellished with a black tulle top layer.
She accessorizes with a black cuff, a light blue cuff, and a light blue belt with swirls and a fleur-de-lis. On her feet are peep-toe pumps with shackle ankle straps and cathedral window etchings on the sides. Her black hand bag features ornate light blue designs.
Also included with the dolls is a black brush, two doll stands, and a diary shared by Rochelle & Venus.
It's the biggest dance of the year at Monster High and every ghoul and manster at MH can't wait to show up in their finest zombie shriek fashions for this creeporificilly cool chance to show off their most uhhhh-mazing moves. It will surely be a party rocking in the house to fright, and every monster is going to have a ghoul time.

The deluxe pack has a light purple ghoul with interchangeable parts and a wide variety of accessories.
Doll
The doll has an exposed orange brain that changes her eyes when pressed. She has blue eyes, purple eyes, and pink & magenta eyes with star accents.
There are two types of hair. The first is purple with a magenta under layer and the second is molded opaque purple with a twisted genie ponytail.
Her lavender torso can be replaced with a translucent one that has a light blue skeleton. The skeleton can be decorated with the twelve included emoticons that feature Skullettes, hearts, a balloon animal, and more.
A genie-like lower half can replace the legs. It is magenta with a green waist and looks like a tendril of smoke with a billowy base.
Yellow moth-like wings can be attached to her back. They have tattered cutouts and orange details.
She has four face masks; one simple and three detailed. The first has orange and pink shadow, colorful stars, starry eye details, and hot pink lips. The next one has a dark yellow eyeshadow mask with bubble accents and a smiling mouth with pink lips. The last mask has purple eyeliner, a swirly aqua blue makeup mask, and a frowning mouth with bright pink lips.
Clothes
The two-piece green dress has a sweetheart neckline with a single purple strap that goes from the shoulder to the short skirt. The outfit is decorated with a fun print that has spiderwebs, stars, balloon animals, and lightning.
There is also a second shirt. The one shoulder top is blue with a black mesh neckline. It features tears, clouds, sad faces, broken hearts, and Skullettes.
Accessories consist of translucent purple arm wraps, a molded purple chain overskirt, and a black Skullette with a violet bow. Her shoes are black peep-toe booties decorated with straps and studs.
Also included is a black Skullette brush, a clear doll stand with a black Skullette base, and a blank diary.

This add-on has a fiery theme that includes a face mask, hair, emoticons, and clothing.
Doll Parts
The face mask is light pink with red and orange flames for eyeshadow and red lips. The fiery molded hair is an opaque yellow that transitions to orange in the back. There are four emoticons; a red and orange sacred heart, a pineapple, monster marshmallows on a stick, and a stick of dynamite with a lit fuse.
Clothing
The dress has a sweetheart neckline, black straps, a red waist, and a jagged hem. It features a black and blue flame print with flaming Skullettes, red dynamite, red sacred hearts, and monster-like marshmallows.
Accessories consist of arm and leg wraps made up of red and orange flames. For shoes, there are translucent orange fiery pumps with blue sacred heart heels.

This add-on has a monstrously fun theme that includes a face mask, hair, emoticons, and clothing.
Doll Parts
The face mask is a light orange with purple and yellow eyeshadow, light blue eyeliner, and hot pink lips with a tongue poking out. The molded green hair has two buns, bangs, and hanging side curls. There are four orange emoticons; a Skullette jack-in-the-box, an ice cream sundae, a jester hat, and a heart with glasses.
Clothing
The halterneck dress has a big sheer purple ruffled collar, a purple waist, and a double layered skirt. It features a pink, yellow, and gray diamond print decorated with Skullettes with their tongues out, Skullettes with jester hats, spiderwebs, and hearts.
Accessories consist of winding arm and leg wraps made from purple tentacles. For shoes, there is a pair of green pumps with tentacle heels and purple and orange flowers on the toes.

This add-on has a candy themed face mask, hair, emoticons, and clothing.
Doll Parts
The face mask is light blue with a whip cream shadow mask, colorful sprinkles, and peppermint candy lips. The molded hair is a dripping yellow with a dollop swirl on top. There are four emoticons; a pink Skullette, a pink sugar skull, turquoise and purple candy, and a purple heart with ruffles.
Clothing
The halterneck dress has a black collar, black waist, and a puffy skirt. It features a very busy print with pink candy skulls, yellow drips, hard candy, and hearts.
Accessories consist of dripping pink arm and legs wraps with white candy accents. For shoes, there are yellow open-toe pumps with lollipop heels.

This starter pack includes a ghoul with interchangeable parts and lots of accessories.
Doll
The doll is light pink with an exposed pink brain, a translucent pink torso, and removable face plates. Drippy heart birthmarks cover the lower half of her limbs. She has straight hair with blunt bangs that is pink with black streaks.
When you press her brain her eyes change. She has blue eyes with slit pupils, pink and turquoise heart-shaped eyes, and fiery orange and red eyes with slit pupils.
The torso opens to reveal her skeletal insides which can be decorated with a variety of emoticons. The eight emoticons include multiple Skullettes, a heart & arrow, a heart cluster, orange intestines, and a hot pepper.
She has two face masks; one simple and one detailed. The detailed mask has drippy blue heart-shaped eyeshadow, pink and blue hearts, and pink and blue lips.
Two sets of wings can be attached to her back. The first is made up of bug-like pink bones and the second has fiery orange feathery wings with black clips.
Clothes
The blue dress has a sweetheart top with a black mesh halterneck and a translucent pink collar. It features a print with pink and red hearts and Skullettes. At the waist is a ruffled double peplum that is pink and yellow translucent plastic.
Accessories consist of pink glasses with heart-shaped lenses, a black Skullette purse with a pink bow, and two pairs of shoes. The first pair are orange gravity wedges with black heart chains and the second pair are translucent orange peep-toe wedges with feather details.
Also included is a black Skullette brush, a clear doll stand with a black Skullette base, and a blank diary.

This starter pack has a light orange ghoul with interchangeable parts and accessories.
Doll
The doll has an exposed green brain, a translucent torso, removable face plates, and purple hair with blunt bangs and highlights. When you press her brain her eyes change. She has blue eyes, green & yellow mesmerizing swirls, and lined eyes that are orange & yellow with slit pupils.
The torso opens to reveal her light blue skeletal insides which can be decorated with a variety of emoticons. The eight emoticons include two Skullettes, a flower, turtle, heart, bone, funny glasses, and worms.
She has two face masks; one simple and one detailed. The detailed mask has blue and lavender shadow, pistil accents, and a flower detail around the right eye.
Two appendages can be attached to her back. The first one has eight purple tentacles with orange suckers and the second appendage is comprised of  turquoise leaves and twisting vines that can wrap around her body.
Clothes
The two-piece lavender dress has a one-shoulder top with a sea green puff, a turquoise waist, and a double layered skirt. It is decorated with a print that has purple vines, turquoise flowers, black ivy, worms, and other cute critters.
Accessories consist of sea green glasses, a black Skullette purse with a turquoise bow, and two pairs of shoes. The first are open-toe pumps made from purple tentacles and the second pair are turquoise peep-toe pumps made of leaves and vines.
Also included is a black Skullette brush, a clear doll stand with a black Skullette base, and a blank diary.

This starter pack has a light blue ghoul with interchangeable parts and lots of accessories.
Doll
The doll has an exposed purple brain, a translucent torso, removable face plates, and bright blue hair. When you press her brain her eyes change. She has blue eyes with white highlights, magenta hearts with heart details, and green and purple flower-like eyes.
The torso opens to reveal her yellow skeletal insides which can be decorated with a variety of emoticons. The eight emoticons include two Skullettes, a heart with a mohawk, a blue shoe, a cupcake, purple lips, a pink tooth, and a pink bow.
She has two face masks; one simple and one detailed. The detailed mask has a diagonal pink stripe between yellow stripes and a mesh design across the eyes.
Two appendages can be attached to her back. The first is a pair of pink bat wings and the second is a blue peacock-like tail with decorative cutouts and pink and yellow accents.
Clothes
The halterneck dress has a pink collar and a pink skirt. The bodice and peplum are black with pink polka dots decorated with yellow stars, blue Skullettes, light blue splatter, and other designs.
Accessories begin with a purple headband that has three blue antennae adorned with yellow hearts. Next is a black Skullette purse and two pairs of pumps. The first are pink with yellow bat candy accents and the second pair are purple with feather details.
Also included is a black Skullette brush, a clear doll stand with a black Skullette base, and a blank diary.

The Draculaura bust has black hair with pink stripes that is worn in pig tails. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, pink lips, safety pin earrings, and a light pink heart on her cheek. 
Her outfit is a purple shirt with white cuffs and an ascot. She rests on a Monster High crest that is pink and blue with a Skullette accent.
Draculaura may also be referred to as a Carlton Cards ornament.

The Frankie bust has long black and white striped hair. She has pale turquoise skin, one blue and one green eye, red lips, and silver Skullette earrings.
Her shirt is blue with a white chest, puffy black sleeves, and a black tie. She rests on a “goregeous” banner that is pink and black with a Skullette replacing the first “O’.
Frankie Stein may also be referred to as a Carlton Cards ornament.

Frankie has long black and white streaked hair with blunt bangs. She has light green skin with gold stitches, one blue and one green eye, gold eyeshadow, and pink lips. 
Her elaborate dress is silver and black with a sweetheart neckline, blue halterneck, and gold lightning bolt accents. The layered skirt is blue and black with a blue train under a black mesh train with flecks of gold.
Golden accessories consist of a hex nut headband, earrings, and bracelets. On her feet are gold wedges with blue straps.
Frankie Stein may also be referred to as a Carlton Cards ornament.

The Skullette ornament has a black and white skeletal face with eyelash accented sockets and a magenta bow. She is wearing a red Santa hat with stitches by the fold.
The Skullette may also be referred to as a Carlton Cards ornament.

The Clawdeen ornament has long wavy brown hair with tan highlights. She has a tan complexion with yellow eyes, purple eyeshadow, and red lips.
Her signature outfit has a pink top and a dark purple pleated skirt with a black under layer. Over the top is a black jacket with purple cuffs and a purple fur collar.
Accessories consist of a gold-studded choker with a gold pendant, a gold-studded belt, and pink knee highs. On her feet are black peep-toe boots with purple straps and gold buckles.
Next to Clawdeen is a red bag with the Monster High crest, snowflakes, and a white string bow. Sticking out of the top is a purple present with a green bow.

The Draculaura ornament has long pigtailed hair that is striped pink and black. She has a pale pink complexion with purple eyes, pink eyeshadow, pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her outfit features a pink vest over a white shirt with frilly cuffs and medium purple sleeves. She also has a white peplum with pink bow and a white skirt with a black under layer.
She accessorizes with a Santa hat, silver safety pin earrings, and medium purple tights. On her feet are pink boots with black straps and laces.
Next to Draculaura is a green present with the Monster High crest. It has a black and red striped lid with a red bow.

The Frankie ornament has long white hair with streaks of black. She has a pale green complexion, one blue and one green eye, and pink lips.
Her signature dress is blue with a pattern of black squares and a black under skirt. The chest is white with puffy sleeves that have black lines.
She accessorizes with blue earrings, a black and white polka dot tie with a Skullette, and black and white striped pumps. Around her waist is a studded belt with chains and a lightning bolt buckle.
Frankie is holding a red ornament and next to her is a present. The blue present has snowflakes, red ribbon, and bulb ornaments on top.

Crescent is Clawdeen Wolf’s pet cat. The medium plush figure is about ten inches tall with purple fur and tufts on the top and sides of her head. She has shimmery pink ears, a puffy pink patch of fur on her chest, white claws, and shimmery pink paw pads.
Her face has a pink bang line, a black triangle nose, and a white fanged smile. Crescent’s left eye is a green “x” and the right is a solid green circle with a purple scratch above and below.
Crescent is a scary cute little kitten who's just as fierce and fuzzy as Clawdeen. Her best friends are Count Fabulous and Watzit.

Watzit is the dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. This version is like the regular Watzit, but with additional clothing.
He has tan fur with patches of brown vinyl and silver details that include stitches, spikes, paw pads, and wings. His left eye is a green “x” and his right is a blue circle. He has a black nose and a mouth with silver fangs.
Clothing entails a black collar with silver dots and a black shirt. The shirt features a “Save Frankie” graphic and black mesh sleeves.
During the Bite-Centennial, the ghouls discover an old scientist's workshop and travel back 200 years to the beginning of Monster High. But when they try to get home, they go through a vortex that fuses some of the ghouls together! With the help of the Hybrids, the new monsters in school, they learn how to control their combined flaws and together face their greatest challenge... to Save Frankie!

Sir Hoots A Lot is the pet owl of Ghoulia Yelps. The medium plush figure is about ten inches tall and is a furry light blue with white on the back of his head. He has feathers sticking out of the sides and top of his head, outstretched wings, a shimmery white chest, and white feet with black claw lines.
His face is blue vinyl with a white beak and two different eyes. The left eye is a yellow “x” and the right eye is a solid yellow circle surrounded by a serrated red circle.
Sir Hoots A Lot is the perfect companion even though he absolutely refuses to be a message courier for Ghoulia Yelps. His best friends are Hissette & Count Fabulous.

Watzit is the dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. The medium plush figure is about ten inches tall and has tan fur. One ear, three legs, and a silver-stitched patch around his left eye are brown vinyl.
He has silver spikes on his head, a collar with silver dots, stitches on his chest, black line claws, and shimmery silver foot pads. On his back are silver wings.
His face features two different eyes. The left eye is a green “x” and the right is a solid blue circle with a thin eyebrow. He has a black nose and a thin mouth with silver fangs.
No one's sure of all the things Watzit is made from, but his pet license is 10 pages long. His best friends are Count Fabulous and Crescent.

Abbey has long white hair with an under layer of lavender, blue, and magenta. She has light blue skin, purple eyes with purple shadow, and red lips.
Her off-the-shoulder dress is purple with a furry white neckline, black string belt, and a white hem. She accessorizes with a blue necklace, furry white arm warmers, and lavender tights.
On her feet are furry white boots. She stands on a black base detailed with a Skullette and a Monster High emblem.
Variations
Abbey has also been packaged as Valentine’s Figures and Howl-oween Figures.

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair and a brown complexion. She has coppery orange eyes, purple eyeshadow, and dark fanged lips.
Her cropped purple jacket covers a gold top and matches the pleated purple skirt. She accessorizes with a silver choker and pendant, a gold studded belt, and gold tights. 
On her feet are purple boots with gold buckle straps. She stands on a black base detailed with a Skullette and a Monster High emblem.
Variations
Clawdeen has been packaged as Valentine’s Figures, Howl-oween Figures, and one version has been released with Crescent, her pet cat. Crescent is purple with yellow eyes that have green irises.

Draculaura has long pig-tailed hair that is streaked pink and black. She has pink skin, pink eyes, pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her outfit has a pink top with ruffled silver accents and silver sleeves with flared cuffs. It is complemented by a silver skirt and silver tights. 
On her feet are pink knee-high boots with silver laces. She stands on a black Monster High base detailed with a Skullette.
Variations
Draculaura has been packaged as Valentine’s Figures, Howl-oween Figures, and one version has been released with Count Fabulous, her pet bat. Count Fabulous is black with a pink bow and is wearing a pink and white top with hearts.

Frankie has long silver hair with stripes of black. Her pale green complexion is complemented by deep red lips and one blue and one green eye. Stitches are on her right cheek.
She is wearing a blue dress with short puffy silver sleeves. Around her waist is a silver belt with a dangling chain accents and a lightning bolt buckle.
On her feet are black and white striped pumps. She stands on a black Monster High base with a Skullette emblem.
Variations
Frankie has been packaged as Valentine’s Figures, Howl-oween Figures, and one version has been released with Watzit, Frankie’s pet. The dog-like figure is tan with stitched brown patches, one blue and one green eye, and a studded black collar.

Lagoona has long and wavy gold hair with a streak of blue, a pink flower, and turquoise accents. She has pale turquoise skin, green eyes with pink shadow, red lips, and freckles.
Her outfit has a cropped turquoise jacket, a gold top, and turquoise shorts with gold tights. She accessorizes with a gold pendant.
On her feet are turquoise sandal wedges. She stands on a black base with a Monster High emblem and a Skullette.
Variations
Lagoona has also been packaged as Valentine’s Figures and Howl-oween Figures.

dolls.character: Abbey Bominable, Clawdeen Wolf, Draculaura, Frankie Stein & Lagoona Blue
dolls.description:
The Howliday 5-Pack includes figures of Abbey Bominable, Clawdeen Wolf, Draculaura, Frankie Stein, and Lagoona Blue in holiday themed settings.
Abbey Bominable
Abbey wears a lovely purple outfit with furry white accents. She stands on a base with a snowman and a snowflake.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has on a purple ensemble with a gold top and tights. She holds a present and has a stand with a tote decorated with sprinkles.
Draculaura
Draculaura has a pink and silver outfit with lavender wrist cuffs. Her stand features a snow mound with a tombstone and a candy cane.
Frankie Stein
Frankie wears a blue dress wrapped with a string of colored lights. At her feet are a gift wrapped tombstone and a pink present.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has on a gold top and gold tights complemented by a turquoise jacket and shorts. Her stand has a Christmas tree decorated with strings of colored lights.

Abbey has white hair decorated with mistletoe berries and an under layer of lavender, blue, and magenta. She has light blue skin, purple eyes with purple shadow, and red lips.
Her purple dress has a furry white off-the-shoulder neckline and a white hem. Accessories consist of a blue necklace, furry white arm warmers, lavender tights, and furry white boots.
The black base has a snowflake motif and a snowman. The snowman wears a Santa hat and a blue scarf.

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair and a brown complexion. She has coppery orange eyes, purple eyeshadow, and dark fanged lips.
Her outfit has a gold top, a cropped purple jacket, and a purple skirt. Accessories consist of a silver pendant, a studded gold belt, gold tights, and purple boots with gold buckle straps. 
She is holding a purple present with a pink Skullette bow. On the black base is a black tote decorated with colorful sprinkles and purple tissue paper.

Draculaura has pink and black striped hair that is worn in pig-tails. She has pink skin, pink eyes, pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her pink top has silver ruffles and silver sleeves. It is complemented by a silver skirt and matching tights.
Accessories consist of a pink top hat and lavender wrist cuffs. On her feet are pink knee-high boots with silver laces. 
She stands on a black Monster High base detailed with a Skullette. On the base is a snow pile with a black tombstone and a candy cane decorated by a Skullette bow.

Frankie has long silver hair with stripes of black. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, and dark red lips.
Her blue dress has short puffy silver sleeves and a silver belt with chains and a lightning bolt buckle. Accessories consist of blue earrings and black and white striped pumps.
Frankie is wrapped in a string of colored lights and holds a Skullette decoration. She stands on a black base with a tombstone wrapped in silver ribbon and a pink present with a lavender bow.

Lagoona has long wavy gold hair with a streak of blue, a pink flower, and turquoise accents. Her pale turquoise skin is complemented by green eyes with pink shadow, red lips, and freckles.
She wears a gold top with a cropped turquoise jacket and turquoise shorts with gold tights. She accessorizes with a gold pendant, turquoise sandal wedges, and is holding a Skullette. 
Her black base features a Christmas tree decorated with strings of colored lights.

Azura is a scarab beetle and Nefera de Nile’s pet. He is teal blue with gold antennae, legs, and accents. When you press a button on his back his wings open to reveal a secret compartment.
He comes with turquoise strips of paper. After writing a message, a paper strip can be rolled onto a golden scroll and hidden under Azura’s wings.

Captain Penny is a mechanical penguin and the pet of Robecca Steam. He has a riveted copper body, gear accents, an orange beak, and green eyes surrounded by white. On his back is a bronze rocket pack.
He comes with a pen, a round blue container, and note strips decorated with gears and sprockets. Push him forward and a note can be fed into the backpack. Raise Captain Penny’s wing and his belly opens to reveal the hidden note.

Chewlian is the pet of Venus McFlytrap. He is a green Venus Flytrap with black eyes, white teeth, and a leaf mohawk. He lives in a maroon flower pot.
He comes with strips of paper for secret notes. When you are done with a note it can be fed to Chewlian. Crank his vine and he will chomp the note and shred it.

Count Fabulous is a bat and Draculaura’s pet. He is all black with yellow eyes and pointy fangs. He wears a bow on his head and a pink shirt with light pink hearts and a scalloped neckline.
He comes with an invisible ink pen and pink paper strips decorated with filigree hearts and bats. When you press his bow a black light on his chest shines to reveal any secret messages you have written in invisible ink.

Dustin is a dust bunny and Twyla’s pet. He is lavender with a silver button and a turquoise curl for eyes. His head raises to reveal a compartment in his neck.
He comes with strips of paper. After writing a message, a paper strip can be rolled onto a turquoise scroll and hidden in Dustin’s neck. When you pull his tail he will “hop” to deliver the message.

Hissette is a cobra and Cle de Nile’s pet. He is turquoise with purple eyes and wears a golden crown and gold jewelry. When a button on his back is pressed his mouth opens.
He comes with yellow strips of paper decorated with gem designs. After writing a message, a paper strip can be rolled onto a purple scroll and hidden in Hissette’s mouth.

Neptuna is the pet piranha of Lagoona Blue. She is pink with darker pink scales, turquoise eyes, and a pointy-toothed underbite.
She comes with an invisible ink pen and paper strips decorated with seashells. The top of Neptuna’s head is removable and exposes a special marker that can reveal the secrets written in invisible ink.

Cushion is a hedgehog and the pet of Howleen Wolf. He is beige with blue eyes, a black nose, black claws, and a back of pink quills.
His head pops open to reveal a blue brain. When his brain is pressed, it lights up and you can record a message that he will repeat.
Cushion will only record and play back a message when the included leash/charm bracelet is attached. When removed, he only speaks in animal sounds.
Secret messages can be passed from pet to pet by pressing the brain, then connecting their feet together.

Shiver is a woolly mammoth and Abbey Bominable’s pet. He is furry white with lavender feet, a lavender face, curled tusks, and magenta eyes. Around his neck is a blue collar.
His head pops open to reveal a blue brain. When his brain is pressed, it lights up and you can record a message that he will repeat.
Shiver will only record and play back a message when the included leash/charm bracelet is attached. When removed, he only speaks in animal sounds.
Secret messages can be passed from pet to pet by pressing the brain, then connecting their feet together.

Sir Hoots A Lot is the pet owl of Ghoulia Yelps. He is light blue with a white chest and feet. His eyes are a sparkly yellow with big pupils and he wears a red collar.
His head pops open to reveal a red brain. When his brain is pressed, you can record a message that he will repeat. 
Sir Hoots A Lot will only record and play back a message when the included leash/charm bracelet is attached. When removed, he only speaks in animal sounds.
Secret messages can be passed from pet to pet by pressing the brain, then connecting their feet together.

Sweet Fang is a saber-tooth tiger and Toralei Stripe’s pet. He is orange with brown stripes, a white chest, and big green eyes. Around his neck is a black ascot collar.
His head pops open to reveal a green brain. When his brain is pressed, it lights up and you can record a message that he will repeat.
Sweet Fang will only record and play back a message when the included leash/charm bracelet is attached. When removed, he only speaks in animal sounds.
Secret messages can be passed from pet to pet by pressing the brain, then connecting their feet together.

Watzit is the dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. His is a stitched collection of brown and tan patches with silver spikes on his head and silver wings on his back. He has one green eye and one blue eye and wears a studded collar.
His head pops open to reveal a green brain that when pressed allows you to record a message. Messages can only be recorded and played back when the included leash/charm bracelet is attached. When removed, Watzit only speaks in animal sounds.
Secret messages can be passed from pet to pet by pressing the brain, then connecting their feet together.

This amazing Clawdeen figure features long brown hair that is flowing to the ground. She is posed with one outstretched hand and one on her hip while  wearing her classic purple & black outfit.
She has a gold choker, a black long-sleeve shirt with purple & gold accents, and a purple skirt. The outfit is completed with black peep-toe sandal boots with bands of purple straps.

The Cleo figure has magnificent long brown hair with gold stripes and a gold & turquoise headband. Her hands are in a classic Egyptian pose while she is wearing her signature mummy-inspired outfit.
She has on a sparkly turquoise top over a golden jumpsuit. Her right arm has a long golden glove and a golden armband is on her left. Cleo’s shoes are black & gold wedges with golden wrappings up to her knees.

The Draculaura figure is looking adorable with her cute pose and wink. Her classic outfit fits perfectly with her extra-long black & pink pigtails.
Draculaura’s wearing a pink vest with white jabot, black fishnet sleeves, and white cuffs. Her short skirt is white with black fishnet tights underneath. She completes the outfit with knee-high pink & black boots.

The stunning Frankie Stein figure is posed with one hand on her hip while wearing her signature outfit. This goes perfectly with her beautiful extra-long black & white striped hair.
Frankie’s finery includes a black & blue plaid dress with a white collar and short fishnet sleeves. She accentuates the dress with a silver-studded black belt with lightning bolt buckle and a black polka-dotted tie with a skullette. The outfit is completed with a pair of black & white striped shoes.

The fabulous Ghoulia figure has long flowing light blue hair with blue highlights. She is posed with an inquisitive look while wearing her signature outfit.
Ghoulia’s wardrobe features a black, white & red striped shirt with 3/4 length sleeves and fishnet cuffs under a white & red camisole with a cherry pattern. She has red pants with black dots and black knee-high boots with red laces. She accessorizes with a green headband, white cat-eye glasses, and a piano key belt with Skullette buckle.

The adorable Lagoona figure features long curly blond hair with teal streaks. Her skin is a pale green with teal fins protruding from her forearms and calves. She is in a darling pose while wearing her signature outfit.
Lagoona’s sea-inspired ensemble includes a pink scale bathing suit under a black & teal scale jacket, black & teal shorts with white fishnet tights, and black & white striped flip-flops. Her accessories include a gold beaded bracelet, gold beaded necklace with seahorse pendant, and a pink flower barette in her hair.

Clawdeen’s hair is a beautiful brown with streaks of purple. She is wearing a one-shoulder dress that features diagonal purple and magenta stripes. The purple stripes are accented with gold buckle designs. The entire back of the dress is magenta and is trimmed in black.
Accessories consist of a gold hoop earring, a studded green belt, and green knee high boots. The boots are embellished with claw-like heels and lots of zippers, some of which are unzipped. Clawdeen does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Draculaura has long straight hair that is black with red highlights. She is wearing a wonderful pink dress that features vertical rows of light pink hearts and dotted black lines with bat accents. The top has a white v-cut and frilly white arm holes. Separating the top from the skirt is a yellow belt. The entire back of the dress is pink.
Accessories consist of a pink heart & jabot necklace, a yellow bead bracelet, and pink lace-up booties. Draculaura does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Frankie has long straight black & white hair with a streak of blue. She is wearing a lovely dress with a black top under blue mesh. At the waist is a shiny silver belt which leads to the plaid skirt that is made if black, white, and blue diamonds with diagonal red lines. The entire back of the dress is black.
Accessories consist of a red necktie necklace and a red wrist cuff. On her feet are red ankle strap pumps decorated with ridged lines. Frankie does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Gigi has adorable pink hair with streaks of orange that is pulled into a ponytail with a black band. She has freckled cheeks, a scorpion tattoo at her neck, and segmented limbs. 
Her high-waisted dress has a sparkly black bodice with a shiny gold belt. The skirt is half pink and half blue with a black outlined pattern. She accessorizes with a gold scorpion bracelet and gold platform shoes. The shoes feature gravity heels and curled pointy toes.
Gigi does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.
Killer Style: Natural fabrics, especially silk, in bright colors. I'm also big on halter-tops, baggy pants and slippers. Basically I'm all about comfort. Of course I can't be a total slob 'cause I never know when I'm going to have to pop out for a meeting with the new boss.

Freaky Flaw: It's not a real stretch to guess that I'm claustrophobic. Being stuck in a lantern for millennia will do that to you.

Favorite Activity: I love to go sightseeing. It's always a bonus when a monster wishes to take a trip to someplace I haven't already been.

dolls.character: Elle Eedee, Luna Mothews & Mouscedes King
dolls.description:
This 3-pack features the ghouls of Boo York wearing their daytime fashion.
Luna Mothews
Luna has lovely black hair with streaks of red that is pulled into pigtails. She has yellow segmented skin, black antennae, red eyes with hexagonal pupils, gray eyeshadow, and black lipstick. On her back are translucent cerise wings with black vein accents.
She is wearing a strapless dress with a black bodice adorned with two shimmery silver strips. The skirt is decorated with a black & yellow cityscape below a red sky with yellow stars and moons. She accessorizes with red moth glasses and black booties with cocoon heels.
Mouscedes King
Mouscedes has wavy pink hair with her mouse ears poking through. She has turquoise eyeshadow, pink lipstick, gray skin, and a mouse tail.
She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress with a yellow polka dot bodice. The shimmery turquoise skirt has a black waist, accordion pleats, and diagonal lines formed by black triangle outlines. Accessories consist of a turquoise headband with bow and pink lace-up pumps with bow accents.
Elle Eedee
Elle has black hair with blue and purple streaks that is twisted into a high ponytail. She has gray robotic skin, lavender eyebrows and lipstick, and turquoise eyeshadow.
She is wearing a futuristic dress with colorful blurred dots and a white circuit board print. Over the dress is a cropped purple jacket with pink & white stitching. Accessories include a blue multi-screw choker and amazing purple knee high boots with robotic designs and platforms held by blue tubes.
Stands or brushes are not included with the dolls.

The Comet-Crossed Couple 2-pack features Cleo de Nile and Deuce Gorgon.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has long black hair with streaks of blue and glittery gold. It is held to the back with a gold and blue headband of Isis, the Egyptian goddess. Her makeup features dark red lipstick, blue and yellow eyeshadow, and one eye decorated to look like the Eye of Horus.
She is wearing a beautiful form-fitting dress with a blue, turquoise, and lavender mummy bandage print. The upper chest and sleeves are black fishnet and the entire dress is adorned with shimmery gold bandages. She accessorizes with gold bandage earrings, gold draping wrist wraps, and copper and blue sandals. The sandals have a Sphinx-like appearance with snakes winding up her legs.
Deuce Gorgon
Deuce has scaly green hair with his snake-hawk hanging to one side. He is wearing a green & chartreuse scale print sweater with green trim, green cuffs, and a black snake design around the collar. His pants are black leatherette with a snakeskin pattern. Accessories consist of gold crystal sunglasses, a copper hoop earring, and copper high tops with side cutouts and crystal accents.
Included with the 2-pack are two doll stands, a brush, and diaries for Cleo and Deuce.
A romantic trip has unexpected consequences for fave-couple Cleo and Deuce when Nefera schemes to split them up. Will the promise of the comet mean undying love... or royal heartbreak?

The monsters take a MUSICAL bite out of the city. When Cleo is invited to attend a fancy gala celebrating the return of a magical comet, she brings her beast friends along! But it's not all fun and frightseeing when Nefera uses the comet's powers in a die-abolical plot against Catty! Can the monsters and their new city ghoulfriends unwrap the mystery of the comet in time to help her?

Floatation Station
The station has a white base with swirls and a black wrought iron skyline backdrop. The central pillar has cutouts and crystal accents. It is topped by a silver rod with cutout wings. 
The rod holds a curved white beam that holds a purple crystal ball. The ball lights up and will flash to the beat of music. It is magnetized and enables Astranova to float under it.
Astranova
Astranova has a light blue crystal head piece with an ornate metallic crystal microphone and earpiece. She has dark blue hair with tinsel streaks and starry features on her face. There are two versions; one is light purple and the other is darker.
Her halterneck dress is white with a fuchsia print of constellation lines. On the back are layered capes that are sheer white and lavender.
Over the dress is a dark magenta crystal chest piece that flares at the shoulders and wraps her waist. She has metallic wrist cuffs and magenta crystal shoes that rise up to her knees. Her musical instrument is a magenta crystal guitar.
Comet fever has infected the city! A magical comet returns after a 1300-year orbit, bringing with it a surprise that's out-of-this-world!

Astranova doll 
Daughter of the Comet Aliens

Age: 15 (space years)

Killer Style: I love glam rock. The more sparkle and out-of-this-world shine the better. My quest is to be the most dazzling object in a universe full of stars!

Freaky Flaw: After traveling for lightyears, sometimes I have difficulty navigating Monster High. What I'm trying to say gets lost in translation, or I don't get my new ghoulfriends' fangisms, and then I feel like our conversations just orbit 'round and 'round.

Favorite Activity: Singing. Music is common ground - and space. It is the language understood by all monsters.

The Out-of-Tombers was exclusive to Costco Canada and includes Draculaura, Catty Noir, and Clawdeen Wolf. Catty is only available in this 3-pack, but Draculaura and Clawdeen are also in the Frightseers series.
Draculaura
Draculaura has straight hair with pink streaks and blunt bangs. Her light skin is accentuated by pink and silver eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a pink heart on her left cheek.
She is wearing a short dress with a colorful graffiti print that features fanged lips, hearts, and lettering. The dress has shimmery silver ruffled sleeves and a short shimmery silver overskirt with a skyline hem. She gray crystal accessories sunglasses with fanged mouth lenses and booties with large bat wings on the sides. 
Catty Noir
Catty has pink hair that is long, straight, and pulled into a ponytail. Contrasting her black skin is purple & silver eyeshadow and pink lipstick.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress with white & fuschia abstract designs and a black strip down the front. The dress is decorated with a turquoise trim and a ruffled turquoise hem. Over the dress is a shimmery purple cropped jacket. Accessories features teal cat-eye glasses, a gray belt with a cat-faced buckle, and pink booties with studded strap accents.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has brown hair with bangs, purple streaks, and portions of the sides pulled to the back. Her light brown skin is complemented with purple and lavender eyeshadow and dark purple lipstick.

Age: 15

Freaky Flaw: I'm a rat ghoul who is lactose intolerant - which sounds like some kind of cheesy joke. I try not to be a pest, but I can't help it if I need to order my extra-cream, extra-whip, no-dairy latte: substitute soy, hold the cream and easy on the foam.

Favorite Activity: Any kind of dancing. Even my tail has some monster moves.

Batsy has very pale pink skin, pointy ears, and long lime green hair with white blonde highlights. On her back are removable bat-like wings with a bony tribal appearance.
She is wearing a jumper that features an off-the-shoulder top with a green & yellow woven print and a fluttery layer with black trim. The shorts are black with a pink, green, yellow, and white abstract jungle pattern. At the waist is a white bat accent and three scrunchy strips of mesh; one black, one pink, and one green.
Accessories consist of a green woven headband with a leafy white bat embellishment and leafy white bat earrings. On her feet are knee-high peep-toe wedges with palm frond heels and a basket weave running up her legs. Her green woven bag has a square angled handle and a bat-like palm frond design.
Batsy also comes with a black brush, doll stand, and her diary.
Killer Style: I take my fashion inspiration from the jungle around me; like the green woven palm fronds and the fright colors of orchids and other native flowers. They help me blend in and stand out all the same time.

Favorite Activity: Introducing monsters to the jungle for the first time. Seeing their faces fright up at the unnatural wonder of it never gets old.

Freaky Flaw: I have a real hang up with monsters who choose to stay in the dark when it comes to protecting the world where we unlive. This is the only world we have and we shouldn't be turning a blind eye when it comes to taking care of it.

Pet: Pet? Perish the thought.

Isi has lovely brown skin with a white patch on her face. Her deer-like features include doe eyes, hoofed feet, and pointed ears poking through her long straight blue hair.
She is wearing a tribal outfit that begins with a sleeveless black unitard that has a colorful skullette and tribal lined print. Over the unitard is a baggy red top with black trim and a tribal print made up of black, white, and turquoise zigzags and geometric shapes.
Accessories begin with a pink dreamcatcher headband that features deer antlers. She also has a pink angular earring, two pink triangle bangles, two turquoise triangle bangles, and a double strand gold beaded necklace with a crescent moon. On her feet are turquoise peep-toe moccasins with three fringe layers, pink dreamcatcher straps, and tribal etched platforms. Her turquoise dreamcatcher bag has a beaded handle, gold bead trim, and feather accents.
Isi also comes with a black brush, doll stand, and her diary.
Killer Style: I love to mix tribal patterns with fringe and eye popping colors to create a modern look that stays true to my monster heritage. I also like my fashions to be flexible and comfy because I'm prone to breaking out in spontaneous dance.

Favorite Activity: I love to dance above all other things and any excuse to dance is a good one.

Freaky Flaw: It is kind of embarrassing, but I have this effect on mansters that makes them fall hoof over antler for me. Unfortunately, they usually end up falling on their heart.

Pet: The birds of the air and beasts of the field are all my friends. I would not want to cause jealousy by picking one over the other.

Kjersti is an adorable troll with pink skin, pointy ears, and eyes with pixelated irises. Her hair is a blend of blue and magenta streaks. It is long and curly and pulled into side ponytails.
She is wearing a black top with a white image of a pixelated skullette viking. The top has a purple strap and short colorful sleeves made up of various shades of blue and purple pixels. Her layered skirt features pointed panels reminiscent of armor. The panels are shimmery purple, outlined in black, and trimmed with black mesh. The longer bottom layer matches the sleeves of her top and has an irregular pixelated hem.
Accessories for the outfit consist of a teal knit cap with horns, pixelated magenta glasses, blue pixelated skullette viking earrings, and a black bracelet. On her feet are pastel teal socks complementing pastel purple boots with pixelated soles, game controller accents, and skullettes on the sides. Her zippered gray bag is shaped like a video game controller with pink buttons and a black handle.
Kjersti also comes with a black brush, doll stand, and her diary.
Killer Style: I'm a gamer and I like giving my wardrobe a turbo boost of cute with scary-sweet, game-themed skirts, t-shirts and shoes. I think it's nice to feel fashionable, especially when I'm kicking another gamer's character all over the screen.

Favorite Activity: I love playing video games with monsters from all over the world. Even though we've never met face to face, I feel like they're my friends.

Freaky Flaw: I'm a control freak. I think that's why I like gaming, because I can make the characters I'm playing do whatever I "tell" them to do and if they don't, I can always reset the game. Alas, there are no reset buttons in real unlife.

Pet: Would it be weird if I said my video game console?

Rochelle Goyle
Rochelle has curly pink hair with black highlights in the back. Her hair is pulled to the sides with big puffs of curls. She has pink and blue eyeshadow, dotted accents around her eyes, and pink lipstick. Her skin and gargoyle wings have a speckled stone-like appearance.
She is wearing a fanciful dress with pink straps and a black & white striped bodice. Blue trim separates the bodice from the black skirt that is decorated with rows of pink, white, and blue swirly diamonds. Complementing the skirt is a sheer red & black striped layer with a shredded hem.
Rochelle accessorizes with a black jester’s cap headband, a blue ruff necklace, and a pink flower boutonniere. On her feet are pink pumps with big strappy bows and swirled designs. 
Scaregrounds
The Scaregrounds has a pedestal swing and a photo booth. The swing is black with a wrought iron appearance. It has a black pedestal with golden posts and white curtain-like pillars held by black ropes and swirled rods. 
The top of the swing frame has a Monster High sign with spiderweb accents and a white carnival tent top with a black flag finial. A black flag pole sits on top of one pillar and a red balloon with a black spiderweb string sticks out of the other. 
The photo booth has a black & white striped platform and resembles an ornate wrought iron fence. Hanging from the bars is a gold framed poster of Rochelle Goyle. The top of the booth has two white tent tops adorned with black flag finials. A white balloon and a red balloon with black spiderweb string also adorn the top. 
One side of the booth has a white curtain column held by black ropes. The other side has a strong man image of Manny Taur with his face cut out.
The swing and the photo booth are connected by a red tightrope. Accessories for the playset include a red funhouse mirror, a black mustache stick mask, a purple masquerade stick mask, yellow clown nose glasses, and a black camera.

Clawdeen has straight lavender hair with streaks of black. Holding her hair is a black headband with a small top hat decorated with a white flower. She wears purple and gray makeup which complements her light gray skin.
She is wearing an amazing top with a white bodice and a black brocade corset adorned with white plastic rope laces. The back of the corset features pointed tails accentuated by a long black & white strip of cloth. Around her waist is a ruffled gray peplum with white trim and completing the ensemble are zebra striped pant.
Accessories consist of a black double-strand chain necklace, black (painted) elbow length gloves, and a purple faux fur stole. On her feet are knee-high platform boots adorned with rows of studs.
For her circus act she performs as a lion tamer. In one hand she holds a fiery translucent purple ring which Crescent, her pet cat, is to jump through. For the performance Crescent is wearing a light purple lion’s mane.
Clawdeen comes with a doll stand and a mini Freak du Chic poster.

Killer Style: Being somewhat larger than unlife makes it impossible to buy my clothes "off the rack" so everything I wear has to be stitched together by claw from material found around the Freak Du Chic. That's not to say my circus chic is not freak du fangtastic because it certainly is.
