Accessories for the outfit consist of white safety pink earrings and a silver & pink gem necklace. On her feet are pink knee high boots adorned with black straps, black laces, and black heart accents.
Included with Draculaura is a black doll stand.
Killer Style: I love to splash my black outfits with some cherry pink, and I even carry a frilly umbrella so I can take an occasional walk in the sun.

Freaky Flaw: Since I can't see my reflection in a mirror, I have to leave the house not knowing if my clothes are just right. Of course, after 1,600 years of practice I've gotten pretty good at it.

Pet: Count Fabulous is my BFF (Bat Friend Forever). He's a very proud and proper bat, but I just can't help dressing him in the cutest little outfits.

Favorite Activity: I love smiling, laughing, and encouraging my friends.

Elissabat has straight black hair with purple highlights and blunt bangs. This 17 inch Elissabat is just as stunning as her shorter Hauntlywood version and is wearing the same outfit.
Her ensemble begins with a corseted dress that features a purple top and a purple-laced black bodice. The skirt has frilly layers of black mesh that are topped with a purple peplum. Over the dress is a cropped top with a black & purple print and sleeves that end in flared purple mesh cuffs.
Accessories consist of a translucent purple bracelet and two pairs of purple tear drop earrings; one pair short and the other pair long. On her feet are black knee high boots with rows of ruffled bands and wedge heels.
Included with Elissabat is a black doll stand.
Killer Style: I am fangsolutely in love with lace, ruffles, silk, and satin... as long as it's frilly and it's black or deep purple.

Freaky Flaw: I have terrible stage fright so I must be completely prepared before I ever stand in front of an audience. I've been told I'm a natural on stage and in front of a camera, but that's only because I spend hours making sure I have my lines down. It's the only way I can do what I do.

Pet: I played the part of a dragon whisperer in a film once. It was a great role but I've never translated that into a real unlife pet.

Favorite Activity: Acting! It might seem strange that I like acting if I have stage fright, but I love inhabiting the characters I play.

Frankie is fabulous as a 17 inch tall ghoul. She has straight black & white streaked hair and is wearing her classic plaid outfit.
Her dress is black & blue plaid with white, red, and gray lines. The collar and shoulders are white with black stitch accents. The dress features and a black & white polka dot tie adorned with a silver skullette clip. The short sleeves and trim of the skirt are made of black mesh.
Accessories consist of silver dangle earrings with blue skullette charms, a silver & blue striped bangle, and a black belt. The belt is decorated with a double row of silver studs, hanging chains, and a silver lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black & white striped pumps.
Included with Frankie is a black doll stand.
Killer Style: My friends say I have the perfect figure for fashion. I'm not really sure what that means yet, but they've taken me shopping for some scary cute clothes that are absolutely to die for.

Freaky Flaw: Sometimes my stitches come loose at the worst possible moments. Yes, it's still happening.

Pet: Wazit - I'm not sure all of the things he's made from, but his pet license is 10 pages long.

Favorite Activity: Anything that I get to do with my friends.

Catty is absolutely stunning with her dark complexion and contrasting pink hair pulled into a high ponytail. She is wearing short white dress with short sleeves, a long cracked gray collar, and an argyle print. The print has black dashed lines, gray cracked diamonds, and pink cat face diamonds
She accessorizes with white cat eye glasses and white platform wedges with a cracked appearance. Catty does not include a brush or doll stand.

Antonym: Booring.

Daughter of the Hydra

Age: 16

Killer Style: Our motto is: "Double the baubles is twice as nice." We love to accessorize, and we're always on the hunt for hidden gems to bling-up our 2-of-a-kind outfits.

Freaky Flaw: We constantly butt heads! Just because we're this close, doesn't mean we see eye to eye. But we are sisters and beasties, so we always have each other's back.

Favorite Activity: Fanging out with each other! Which is a good thing, don't you think?

The ghouls are swimming in troubled waters after a whirlpool pulls them from Monster High all the way to Lagoona's home in the Great Scarrier Reef. But that's only the beginning of their aquatic adventures! Now, the ghouls find themselves with fintastic fishy forms, and Lagoona must face her childhood bully... and her worst fear! Will they continue to make waves, or reveal their true bravery and make their way back to stand on dry ground?

Kala has dark blue hair with orange highlights that is worn in a short ponytail. She has purple skin, four segmented arms, suckers on her fingers, and small spines running down her chest and back. Below the chest her body is much darker with a wavy squid-like stripe down the front accentuated by circles and dots. Protruding from her hips are pink fins and at the end her body there are four yellow tentacles and two pink glow-in-the-dark tendrils.
She is wearing a blue tube top adorned with a pink and yellow coral print. Over the top is a black & yellow squid print cover-up trimmed in pink. Around her waist is a dark blue belt made up of knobby rows. Accessories consist of spiked blue hoop earrings and two coral arm cuffs; one orange and one yellow.
Kala is able to stand on her tentacles and does not have a brush or doll stand. She does come with her diary.
Kala Mer'ri doll
Daughter of Oxxxxxxxxx Shhh! it's a secret!

Killer Style: I like bold, bright colors that allow me to stand out in a sea of monsters. I don't want to be just another drop in the ocean; I want to be the visual eye of the storm. 

Freaky Flaw: I need to have my tentacles on everything. Some of my beasties say it's because I'm a control shriek, but I just like to feel secure and in charge of my unlife.

Favorite Activity: I am a natural performer and love to dance all my scares away!

She is wearing a sleeveless purple top adorned with a green hem and an aquatic print. The print has black, red, and green, erratic lines accented with red and green nautilus shells. Accessories consist of blue coral earrings, green seaweed arm wraps. and a magenta coral chest piece.

Posea Reef doll

Freaky Flaw: I know a lot about... a lot! But my knowledge can get tangled like kelp in my head. I know it's there somewhere, but I can't always fish it out.

Favorite Activity: Gardening. I love being out in the seashine, tending my bootiful aquatic plants.

Rochelle’s wavy hair is soft pink with light blue streaks. Her speckled skin and wings have a glowy translucent appearance and a light blue mask is painted on her face.

Age: 415

Killer Style: Being from Scaris, I love to mix the rot iron and stained glass together. It gives my look a certain timeless quality, does it not?

Freaky Flaw: I am very protective of my friends and sometimes I get in the way when they do not have a need for my protection. I also have the... how do you say... "chip on the shoulder."

Iris has long straight hair that has shades of green and brown. It is pulled into a ponytail in the back and has a pink streaked braid that wraps around her head.
She is wearing a colorful 3/4 sleeve top that features an image of an eye with a rainbow iris. Her white pants are decorated with a pattern of eyeballs that have blue, green, yellow, and pink irises. Worn around her waist is a green rope belt and on her feet are turquoise booties with eye accents.
The second outfit has a sleeveless pink top with a one-eyed Skullette outline. The black skirt is decorated with a white cracked print embellished with pink-bowed Skullettes. Complementing the outfit is a big-buckled turquoise belt and black ankle-strap pumps.
The final outfit begins with a form-fitting strapless black dress with a print of colorful batwing eyeball outlines and a sparkly peplum. Over the dress is a magenta jacked with a black fractured print. Completing the ensemble are knee-high magenta boots with black wedges, bow straps, and stud accents.
Additional accessories consist of eyeball earrings, a white chain necklace with a batwng eyeball, and multiple bracelets. There is an orange bracelet, a studded magenta bracelet, and four bangles that are green, yellow, pink, and blue. Her purse is black, double-handled, and made up of black eyeballs. 
Iris comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Iris Clops”.
The maul is okay for other ghouls, but when Iris has her eye on expanding her wardrobe, she heads to the planetscarium gift shop where the fashions are surprisingly stellar! Whenever she gazes upon an out-of-this-world outfit, she grips it fright so even her clumsy hands won't drop... oops!

Amanita is a sight to behold with her stunning features and amazing ensemble. Her curly hair is dark purple with hints of blue and her skin is a wonderful luminous green.
She is wearing a semi-sheer lavender dress with frilly sleeves, black shoulder guards, a frilly black lace neckline, and two black bands around the waist. The skirt transitions from lavender to a green and black floral print with a jagged hem. The print features leaves with prickly ivy and is accentuated by strips of purple lace ruffles.
Under the dress is a tube top and miniskirt. The top is green with a leafy black ivy print and the skirt is black leatherette.
Black accessories consist of a Corpse Flower hair clip, dangle earrings, a vine necklace, and a spiked bangle. On her feet are black peep-toe pumps with leaf straps and flower bulb heels. Complementing the shoes are green vine anklets with purple flower accents. Her black purse features a floral design and a vine shoulder strap.
Included with Amanita is a brush, doll stand, iCoffin phone, a purple modeling portfolio with her headshot, and her diary.
Killer Style: Amanita Nightshade's carefully cultivated look makes every other flower in the garden of style look like a weed by comparison. It isn't as if they are lacking in color, but their arrangement appears merely budding when planted next to Amanita's full bloom of fashion.

Favorite Activity: Amanita loves being adored and celebrated for her inherent beauty - both inside and out.

Freaky Flaw: Amanita believes there's nothing so wonderful as the sound of her own melodic voice, but there are many who feel that perhaps their voices are equally important. Amanita spent many years pondering this and yet still sees little merit in the argument.

Pet: Amanita has an adoring maggot that is die-ring as both pet and accessory.

The Deadluxe High School playset has three stories, eight rooms, doll clips, and multiple accessories. When completely opened it is five feet wide and four feet tall.
Outside
The outside of the school is gray with lots of wrought iron designs, trellis work, and bricks overgrown with ivy. Leading to the tall entrance doors are purple steps and pillars guarded by cute gargoyles.
First Floor
On the first floor is the event area, library, and Creepateria. The event area and entrance way has lavender stairs on each side, lavender pillars, and purple coffin lockers. It is furnished with a tall Skullette table with a spiderweb pedestal and a clawfoot couch that is blue with a tufted purple seat.
The library is small and decorated with images of ornate shelves full of books. The outer wall is a secret door that rotates to the outside.
The Creepateria has a lavender pillar and big coffin-shaped windows. It is furnished with a lunch counter and a picnic table with a swirled silver frame.
Second Floor
The second floor has the bathroom, radio station, vampire lounge, and classroom. The bathroom is at the top of the stairs and has a sink and mirror.
The next staircase leads to the radio station. It has a black DJ table adorned with a pink Monster High crest. On the table is a laptop and microphone.
Everything is upside down in the vampire lounge. There is even an upside down black and pink throne that can seat a doll.
The classroom is decorated with pink bookshelves and has a hanging chalkboard. It is furnished with purple pedestal chairs and a school desk.
Third Floor
At the top is a clock tower with purple bricks and a green clock. It folds open to create an office with a black desk for Headmistress Bloodgood.

Design amazing outfits for Frankie with dresses, stencils, stickers, and markers.
Frankie has straight black & white streaked hair that is pulled back on top. Makeup features purple eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She has stitches on one cheek, grayish-white skin, raised stitches on her arms, legs and neck, silver neck bolts, and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.
She is wearing a cute dress with a blue sleeveless top and an asymmetrical skirt. A black & white houndstooth print with skullette accents decorate the skirt. Around her waist is a silver double belt adorned with rivets and a lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black Mary Jane platform pumps with double straps.
Frankie comes with four additional dresses. The first two are simple sleeveless dresses. One is light blue with a yellow neckline and a shredded hem. The other is yellow with a light blue neckline and a v-hem. The third is a pink one-shoulder dress with an asymmetrical hem. Completing the collection is a one-shoulder dress with pink trim and a black & white print filled with cogs, gears, and skullettes.
Included with the doll is a brush, 4 cardboard hangar forms, 2 stencils, 1 sticker sheet, and 3 fabric markers; the markers are pink, blue, and black.
Use stencils or draw freehand to create dress patterns!

Apply stickers for a clawesome finishing touch!

Frankie looks Voltageous in dresses you designed!

Draculaura has light pink and black streaked hair that is wavy and styled with a long side curl. On top of her head is a black cutout hat with bat designs and a spiderweb brim. It is held in place with a long hair pin. 
Complementing her light pink skin and big purple eyes are rooted eyelashes, shimmery eyeshadow, dark red lips, and her signature heart under her left eye. Draculaura stands about a head taller than a typical doll.
She is wearing a stunning black trumpet dress with a sweetheart neckline and sheer black shoulders and sleeves. The front of the fitted bodice has an intricate embroidered pink lace design. Black & white piping separates the bodice from the shimmery pink layered skirt. The layers have a serrated hem and are topped by a black lace spiderweb peplum with batty accents. Around her neck is a pink tulle ascot held by a black & white striped bow. Her sheer black spiderweb cape attaches at her neck and wrists.
Draculaura carries a pink parasol with black embroidered spiderwebs and bats. The working parasol can be opened and closed. On her feet are adorable pink and white booties with black knobby heels. She comes with her diary and a black stand decorated with bats and spiderwebs.
She is a hopeless romantic with the soul of a poet. A gentle hearted friend who is kind and loyal to a fault. Her favorite accent color is pink and she loves the warmth and light of a sunny day. You almost wouldn't know that she's a vampire... except that she is.

Draculaura, student, Fear Squad Member, friend of werewolves, fan of days at the beach, daughter of Dracula himself, and in all ways heir to his legacy save for one. She is a riddle, wrapped in sweetness, inside an infectious laugh.

This is Draculaura like you have never seen her before, resplendent in a satin and lace embroidered dress. Every detail painstakingly crafted to represent the height of Victorian vampire fashion in the late 19th Century. Take a stroll with her through the foggy streets of Old Londoom and rediscover an old friend or make a new one.

Finnegan has light blue skin and a streaked translucent blue mohawk. On his right bicep is a tattoo of a skull with a checkered flag and flames. On his left forearm is a tattoo of black flames. From the waist down he is scaled, darker blue, and has a translucent tail fin.
He wears a yellow racer tank with gold trim, a gold double stripe, and a white circle with “01” in red. He accessorizes with clear racing goggles, black fingerless gloves, and a gray arm wrap.
His wheelchair is black with translucent reddish orange flame spokes on the large rear wheels. Hanging from the back of the chair is his brown backpack. Also included with the doll is Finnegan’s diary.
Finnegan was chosen to be made into a doll in a contest held on the Monster High website. Voting was from September 2 to September 14. Fans could vote for Quill Talyntino, daughter of a harpy; Finnegan Wake, son of a mermaid; or Gory Fangtel, daughter of a vampire.
Killer Style: My blue mohawk and clawesome tats may say punk rocker, but my fierce fashions are scary-cool race wear.

Favorite Activity: When I'm not wheeling around school in my chair, you can find me working out in the school pool, at Gloom Beach or in the ocean. Water workouts really keep my fins fit.

Freaky Flaw: I'm a scaredevil who doesn't like to be told, "That's too dangerous." Though, sometimes I may dive headfirst too quickly!

Pet Peeve: monster who think that because I'm in a chair, my handicap will hold me back. I may be a fish of of water, but I know what I can - and can't - do.

Ghoulebrities in Londoom features Elissabat, Catty Noir, and Viperine Gorgon on an exciting trip of sightseeing and shopping.
Elissabat
Elissabat has long black and purple streaked hair with a bumped ponytail. Her eyeshadow is purple with pink eyeliner and her lips are red.
She is wearing lovely sleeveless dress that is a purple plaid with magenta lines. The plaid is complemented by a red ruffled neckline and a red ribbon tied around her waist. 
Accessories include a red bow headband and lavender knee high boots with white skullette accents. Her round black bag is adorned with a drippy purple, pink ,and white Union Jack.
Catty Noir
Catty has long pink hair with a streak of black. She wears silver eyeshadow, gray and pink eyeliner, and pink lips.
Her form-fitting sleeveless dress is purple with a cracked pink & white Union Jack design. Around her waist is a cracked pink belt with a silver “13” buckle. 
She accessorizes with a pink bracelet and white knee high boots with silver soles. Her pink suitcase features a fish skeleton handle and a white skullette on the side.
Viperine Gorgon
Viperine has straight pink hair with streaks of blonde and pink snakes curling down the back. Her makeup includes blue eyeshadow and pink lipstick. 
She is wearing a pink strapped tube top decorated with wavy lines of pink, blue, white, and magenta. Her short skirt is a swirled Union Jack using magenta, white, and blue.
Accessories consist of translucent pink glasses and blue skullette-shaped peace symbol earrings. On her feet are blue wedge booties with squiggly snake cuffs. Matching her booties is her blue bag with snakes on the sides.
This Toys”R”Us exclusive does not include doll stands.
Elissabat, Catty Noir and Viperine Gorgon - the queen, the pop star and the ghoul that makes them look good - are taking a haunt across the pond. This isn't a business trip, however, because even though it may look like it, the unlife of a ghoulebrity isn't easy. It requires hard work, dedication, and hours of prepurration. So, sometimes you need to round up your beasties and just have a ghoul time together. The vacation deadstination they've chosen this time is the uhhhmazing city of Londoom. It's a city full of history, mystery and killer shopping districts. Plus, when you hear Londoom calling, you have to answer.

Djinni has amazing purple hair with streaks of blue and is worn in a big vertical genie ponytail. Her skin is lavender with purple tattoos on her arms and chest and wispy gray tendrils on her legs. Djinni also has a shadow form. Her legs are removable and can be replaced by a black tail decorated with wispy purple filigree by the hips.
She is wearing a black and sparkly gold bodice with gold stitched straps. The chest and shoulders of the top are half & half; one side is sparkly pink and the other is sparkly blue. Her black capri-length harem pants are adorned with wispy metallic purple filigree.
Her accessories consist translucent pink zigzag earrings and purple platform gravity shoes with pointy toes.
Kieran is very handsome with his shaggy black hair streaked with red. His eyes are bright pink and his skin is a light pink.
He is wearing a black jacket with red stitching, red & gold cuff accents, and red satin trim. Stitched on one lapel and one cuff are lovely red & gold roses. Under the jacket is a burgundy satin vest with three double buttons and a white shirt with a sheer white ascot and flared ruffled cuffs. His black leatherette pants have a gold chain hanging from one hip. 
He accessorizes with gold stud earrings and a pair of black glasses. On his feet are black lace-up boots with buckle straps and silver accents. 
Included with Kieran and Djinni are two doll stands, a brush, their diaries, and Djinni’s golden lamp. The 2-pack was an exclusive for the 2015 San Diego Comic-Con International.
How many years has it been? One? A thousand and one? It is easy to lose track of time when there is no sun to rise or set, when the seasons do not change and when there are no celebrations marked by a date.

Is my lantern falling forever through the abyss, or maybe swimming through the ocean depths within the belly of a monstrous beast? What does it mean if a djinn is never found?

It is not for the djinn to dwell overmuch on such things. As the pondering of the unknowable is a distraction for the words which will call me to service... You are summoned!

I am Djinni of the lanter.

What is your wish?

Love in Scaris features Garrott and Rochelle rekindling their romance in the City of Frights.
Garrott du Roque
Garrott has blue hair, mottled gray skin, teal around his eyes, bluish lips, and a gold earring in his left ear. Protruding from his back are small gargoyle wings.
He is wearing a black leatherette jacket with an upright collar and a mint green shirt poking out the bottom. Around his neck is a dark red scarf decorated with a black rose and spiderweb print. 
His pants are dark blue and his brown boots have black laces and skull accents. He holds a black rose as a gift for Rochelle.
Rochelle Goyle
Rochelle has light green and pink streaked hair pulled into a side ponytail. In her hair is a turquoise dripping headband with a large black skull-centered rose. Complementing her speckled skin is light turquoise eyeshadow and light pink lipstick. Gargoyle wings protrude from her back.
She is wearing an off-the-shoulder dress that has a pink & black striped bodice with a ruffled turquoise tulle neckline. The skirt has black stripes with a scroll print and white stripes with a turquoise and pink swirl print. 
On her feet are turquoise peep-toe pumps with ankle straps and spiral designs. Her pink bag has swirls and cutouts creating a wrought iron design.
Included in this Toys”R”Us exclusive are two doll stands and Garrott’s diary.
Rochelle is going back to Scaris, relax it's just for a visit, where she'll get to hang out with her true love Garrott du Roque. Although long distance relationships can even the most rock solid romance, there appear to be no cracks in the foundation of their affection for each other. For even a monster with a heart of stone cannot help but be in love while strolling through the City of Frights. C'est tellement romantique!

dolls.character: Ghoulia Yelps & Sloman Slo Mo Mortavitch
dolls.description:
It is time for the Monster High prom and Slo Mo is taking Ghoulia. Together they will have an exciting night full of fun and dancing.
Ghoulia Yelps
Ghoulia’s blue hair is styled into a beehive with a black & red brain barrette. Her makeup includes gray eyeshadow, pink and blue eyeliner, and red lipstick.
She is wearing a single strap dress with a black fishnet neckline. The black dress has a sweetheart bodice, a red waist, a dripping hem, and a print of white skeletal hearts and red zombie arms. Under the skirt is blue mesh layer with a dripping hem.
Red accessories consists of cat eye glasses, zombie hand earrings, and a choker with dangling skullette cherry charms. on her feet are red wedge heels with dripping straps.
Sloman “Slo Mo” Mortavitch
Slo Mo has dark blue spike hair with streaks of black. The sides are his head are shaved short and colored gray. 
He is wearing a long sleeve purple shirt with a shredded hem and a tuxedo print. The print has a rib cage with a red bow tie under a tuxedo jacket. One jacket pocked has a skeletal hand and a spider dangles from another pocket with a red pocket square. His pants are black with purple stripes on the sides and his dress shoes are purple. He carries a black bouquet of red brains.
There is a shared diary but this Toys”R”Us exclusive does not include doll stands.
Ghoulia and Slo Mo are ready to shuffle off into the sunset where they'll meet their classmates at the Monster High prom. It's a fright of passage that every monster, well, almost every monster, "cough-Slo Mo-cough", is excited to embark upon. But even if Slo Mo may not exactly be excited about the journey, he couldn't be more excited that Ghoulia will be along as his traveling companion. Not the only thing left is for Ghoulia to remind Slo Mo that the prom is strictly DOA - Dance On Arrival.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Draculaura, Gigi Grant, Spectra Vondergeist & Invisi Billy
dolls.description:
Maul Monsteristas features Draculaura, Billy, Spectra, Gigi, and Clawdeen hanging out at the mall. It’s always a good time when ghouls hang out with friends.
Draculaura
Draculaura wears a black bow headband in her long straight pink hair with black undertones. She has light blue eyeshadow, dark pink lipstick, and a pink heart on one cheek. Her single shoulder dress is black & red with an image of Elissabat, the Vampire Heart, and “Vampire Heart” in a strange font. On her feet are pink high tops with skullette accents.
Invisi Billy
Billy has black & blue streaked slicked-back hair and his body is a translucent blue. He is wearing a sleeveless tee with black mesh shoulders and a black & blue print made up of houndstooth, zigzags, wavy lines, and other designs. His pants are gray and his black boots are covered with pyramid studs.
Spectra Vondergeist
Spectra has straight plum colored hair, pink eyeshadow, lavender eyeliner, and dark pink lips. Her pale skin becomes translucent at her hands and feet. She is wearing a black dress that features rows purple & white chains with various styles of links. The dress has a sweetheart neckline and silver chain straps. On her feet are dark gray pumps with chain link etchings.
Gigi Grant
Gigi has long orange hair pulled to the back with pink and blue streaked under layers. She wears pink eyeshadow, light blue eyeliner, pink lipstick, and has pink segmented skin. Her floor length dress is strapless and decorated with a pink, purple, turquoise, yellow, and white print. The print has skullettes, scorpions, lines, triangles, and other geometric shapes. On her feet are turquoise scorpion pumps with stingers for heels.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen’s hair is half lavender and half bright green and styled into a bob cut. She has lavender and light blue eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, and bright green lips. Her black dress is short and sleeveless with a green, blue, and purple splatter print stripe down the front. Around her waist is a light blue grommet belt and on her feet are purple boots with multiple skullette straps.
Doll stands are not included in the 5-pack. The set was initially announced to be a Target exclusive but never appeared in the U.S. It was an exclusive for Toys”R”Us Canada.

Scare N Makeup features Clawdeen and Viperine getting ready for an amazing night out. Looking your best doesn’t have to be work. It should be fun while you hang with friends and give each other makeovers.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has long purple and green hair that is pulled into a ponytail. Her makeup includes purple lipstick and purple and gold eyeshadow with moon and star accents.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress with a print of green leopard print and black striped yellow lines. The ruffled hem is black with pink, purple, and teal striped designs. She accessorizes with a black zipper belt and spiked purple pumps with lipstick heels.
Viperine Gorgon
Viperine has pink and white streaked hair with light blue snakes that form a headband. She has light blue lipstick and light blue eyeshadow with scale accents.
Her outfit is a pink dress with blue trim and a pattern of snakes, flowers, and makeup compacts. On her feet are light blue sandals with hairdryer heels.
Fashion accessories for the ghouls consist of a blue coffin-shaped makeup compact with a white bone brush, a pink lipstick, and a purple hairdryer. The 2-pack does not include doll stands or brushes.
So many scary-fun makeovers to give, so little time! Just kidding - there's always time for a makeover! Makeup is the perfect medium for creating a face of art, and to-die-for hair that completes the picture. But the beast part about giving and receiving makeovers? Fanging out with clawsome friends!

It’s the anniversary of Lagoona and Gil’s first date and they are celebrating with a night at the roller rink.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoon has curly blond hair with a streak of pink that is pulled into a puffy ponytail. Makeup entails blue and pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick.
She is wearing a black romper with a ruffled halterneck and a shimmery teal print of dots and seashells. Accessories consist of gold pearl bracelets and a pink rope belt. Her golden skater gear includes a scaled helmet with dorsal fin, Skullette knee & elbow pads, and skates with turquoise tail fins. 
Gillington “Gil” Webber
Gil is wearing a shirt with black mesh sleeves and neckline. The rest of the shirt is a blue and turquoise design of swirled watery waves. Complementing the top are dark blue scale shorts. 
Instead of a domed helmet he wears turquoise goggles with a breathing tube and a translucent bluish-purple helmet with an opening for his translucent turquoise head fin. Skating accessories also include black Skullette elbow and knee pads. On his feet are black scaled skates with turquoise bottoms and triple wheels. 
The 2-pack comes with two black doll stands.

The Wheelin’ Werecats playset features Meowlody and Purrsephone riding their scooter. The black scooter is decorated with a white skull and tiger print down the front as well as tiger print on the sides. It has a red headlight, pink grips with streamers, and pink skeletal mirrors. A gray rib cage basket is on the front and the foot rest has a white spinal column running down the center. The sccooter has a yellow seat, gray exhaust pipes, pink wheels, a bony white kickstand, and a personalized license plate with “MEOW2”.
Meowlody
Meowlody has long white hair with one streak decorated by black stripes. She has yellow eyes with yellow eyeshadow and pink lipstick. Her gray skin has white stripes on her left arm and right leg.
She is wearing a black and pink animal print jumper with multiple neck and shoulder straps. A molded black fingerless glove is on her right hand and on her feet are black knee high boots with yellow soles with fanged mouth heels. She has a black cat-eared helmet with yellow goggles and a yellow purse with a black & gold strap.
Purrsephone
Purrsephone has long black hair with a black striped white streak. She has yellow eyes, pink eyeshadow, and yellow lipstick. Her gray skin has white stripes on her right arm and left leg.
Her jumper is just like Meowlody’s except that it is yellow and black. She has a molded fingerless glove on her left hand and her black knee high boots have pink soles and bows on the platform heels. Purrsephone’s cat-eared helmet is yellow with pink goggles and her purse is pink with a black & gold strap.
Also included with the playset are two teal travel cups with white straws and lids.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura, Frankie Stein, Ghoulia Yelps & Lagoona Blue
dolls.description: This multi-pack includes six dolls wearing their signature outfits. The characters include Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura, Frankie Stein,  Ghoulia Yelps, and Lagoona Blue. They were all previously released as part of the Signature series.

Clawd has soft and velvety brown hair that is shaved short. Covering his hair is a turquoise cap with holes where his ears poke out.
He is wearing a sleeveless yellow top with faded black lines and dashed white lines. His plaid shorts are teal with bright green lines, black claw marks, and black suspenders. On his feet are brown slip-on loafers.
His carnival fundraiser is the strongman game. The mini high striker is red with a winged bell at the top and the lever is struck with a star etched turquoise mallet. The prize for ringing the bell is a pink flower with a translucent yellow stem.
Clawd does not come with a brush or doll stand.
Step fright up, Boos and Ghouls!

The school dance has been cancelled, so the student body is putting on a spooktacular fair to raise money. The costumes will be clawesome, the games freaky-fun, and the prizes to die for - but the beast prize will be saving the dance.

Draculaura has lovely straight black hair blended with lots of pink highlights. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that features a top with black, white, and light blue irregular stripes. The pink skirt is decorated with an intricate black print of filigree hearts and bats.
She accessorizes with a big bow around her neck that matches the print of her skirt. On her feet are pink pumps with light blue platforms and cutout hearts for heels.
Her carnival fundraiser is a balloon pop game. It has a black dart board and four balloons; two pink, one magenta, and one light blue. To pop the balloons she has a pink heart-adorned dart. For a prize there is a fuzzy pink stuffed-bat with black wings, a black face, and pink button eyes.
Draculaura does not come with a brush or doll stand.
Step fright up, Boos and Ghouls!

The school dance has been cancelled, so the student body is putting on a spooktacular fair to raise money. The costumes will be clawesome, the games freaky-fun, and the prizes to die for - but the beast prize will be saving the dance.

Skelita has wavy black hair with a streak of turquoise. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that complements her skeletal figure. The bodice is orange with a white rose print and a ruffled striped layer that is turquoise, orange, red, black, and white. 
The skirt is striped like the ruffles, but also has an orange & white floral print as well as a intermittent flowers and turquoise skullettes. On her feet are red sandal wedges with woven straps.
Her carnival fundraiser is a down-a-clown game with three colorful targets; one orange, one red, and one blue. The targets are knocked over with a masked red ball and the prize is a fuzzy turquoise pinata.
Skelita does not come with a brush or doll stand.
Step fright up, Boos and Ghouls!

The school dance has been cancelled, so the student body is putting on a spooktacular fair to raise money. The costumes will be clawesome, the games freaky-fun, and the prizes to die for - but the beast prize will be saving the dance.

The teal green gore-geous ghoul has long red hair with streaks of black and teal. Her makeup features lots of gold eyeshadow, glittery eyeliner, and red lipstick. She stands 28 inches tall and has a button on the back of her head that when pressed will change the color and look of her eyes.
She is wearing a lovely dress with a black bodice decorated by dark red lines. The bodice has a black and red lapel-like strap that is held at the waist by a yellow ribbon belt. The shiny black skirt has a subtle heart print and a red tulle hem.
Her accessories consist of a cat ear headband with gold hoop earrings, dangling red Skullette earrings, and pink glasses. She also has a yellow  heart-shaped eye mask and hair extensions that are yellow & green. For her legs there are green ivy wraps and gray wrought iron wraps. Her shoes are coral wedges with swirly designs that have optional gray covers with studs and chains. She carries a clear case that holds a beige face mask. The mask has purple eyebrows, red eye makeup, and dark plum lips.
Purple wings can be attached to her back and purple webbed hands can replace her regular teal hands. She comes with a variety of tattoo-like stickers and pink and yellow markers. Designs can be drawn on her arms, legs, and face and can be removed with a damp cloth.
Gore-geous Ghoul
Beast Freaky Friend

Give your Beast Freaky Friend a complete spook-over! She's always got her eye on the newest trends - watch her transform her look, and eye color, with just a wink. Style your ghoul with plug & play accessories and doodle deadly designs using creeptastic chalk pens.

The purple gore-geous ghoul has long black hair with streaks of pink and blue. Her makeup entails gold eyeshadow, glittery gold eyeliner, and pink lipstick. She is 28 inches tall and has a button on the back of her head that when pressed will change the color and look of her eyes.
Her dress has a black & white diagonal striped bodice with a turquoise high-necked collar. Around her waist is a shimmery pink sash with a black belt and a light blue tulle peplum. The skirt is black with a ruffled pink hem.
The many accessories begin with a cat ear headband with gold hoop earrings. She has dangling Skullette earrings, white glasses, a pink heart-shaped eye mask, and pink & blue hair extensions. For her legs there are green ivy wraps and black wrought iron wraps. On her feet are pink wedges with swirly designs. The shoes have optional black covers with studs and chains. She carries a clear case that holds a turquoise face mask. The mask has purple eye makeup and magenta lips. 
Turquoise wings can be attached to her back and her hands can be replaced with a pair of light green webbed hands. There are a variety of tattoo-like stickers that can be applied to the doll. Pink and yellow markers are used to create artwork on her arms, legs, and face. The drawings can be removed with a damp cloth.
Gore-geous Ghoul
Beast Freaky Friend

Give your Beast Freaky Friend a complete spook-over! She's always got her eye on the newest trends - watch her transform her look, and eye color, with just a wink. Style your ghoul with plug & play accessories and doodle deadly designs using creeptastic chalk pens.

Aery is a skeleton hybrid with long hair that is half pink and half black. She has horns poking out of her hair, bluish skin, and white bone wings on her back. Her face features blue eyes with pink and blue eyeshadow, thorny lavender eyebrows, and hot pink lips. 
She is wearing a strapless blue top that has a sweetheart neckline and a fiery pink design on the front. Around her waist is a white skeletal belt. Her equine body is purple with a lavender tail and a starry constellation pattern is on her back leg. Covering her front legs are lace-up hot pink warmers with fiery accents.
The darkest nights bring out the brightest stars, and there's nothing better than to watch the twinkling herd galloping across a midnight sky.

Bay is a sea monster hybrid with long teal hair and a turquoise fin on the top of her head. Her skin is seafoam green and her wings are fin-like and transition from coral pink to aquamarine. She has teal eyebrows, aquamarine eyes, coral pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, blue lips, and blue dots that run down the bridge of her nose.
She is wearing a coral pink strappy top with a teal seahorse graphic. Around her waist is a gold multi-strand belt with coral charms. Her horse body is blue with an aquamarine fin-like tail. A coral pink aquatic design decorates her back leg and golden wraps with seaweed accents cover her front legs.
I unlive for the ocean wind in my mane and the waves on my hoofs. I mean, is there anything better than to gallop on the beach at dawn?

Caprice is a dragonfly hybrid with magenta hair that has a teal streak, purple highlights, curled bangs, and is pulled high into a puffy bunch. Curled black antennae poke through her hair. She has light blue skin with magenta eyebrows, blue eyes, teal and purple eyeshadow, magenta lips, and a treble clef on her left cheek. Her translucent purple dragonfly wings are embossed with music notes and black sheet music.
She is wearing a blue strapless top with a black print on the front. Covering her eyes are teal glasses and around her neck is a magenta collar with music notes and a scalloped hem. Her horse body is pearlescent green with a bushy magenta tail.  Blue violet leg wraps with musical accents cover her front legs and black sheet music with lavender dragonflies decorate her back leg.
I travel to the flap of my own wings, always humming the tune in my heart. Unlife is filled with whimsy and music, and I want to enjoy every note!

Fawntine is a deer hybrid with long white blonde hair with a streak of green. Large antlers are on top of her head and they are decorated with pink flowers, bird skulls, and two skeletal birds. Her beige skin is complemented by antler-like eyebrows, green eyes with mint green and pink eyeshadow, pink lips, and mint green freckles on her cheeks.
She is wearing a pink tank top with an image of green leafy ivy. Around her waist is a green ivy belt with multiple strands that connect to a bird skull in the front. Her deer body is brown with leafy green spots at the back and a white tail. Green ivy is printed on her left legs and green wraps with leafy vines cover her front legs.
My friends say I'm a little bit quiet and a little bit shy, and I suppose they're a little bit right. Although I prefer to think of myself as gentle, which suits me right down to the ground.

Flara is a phoenix hybrid with coral pink hair that has orange highlights and a wild purple mohawk. She has yellow skin with purple eyebrows and violet eyes. Her makeup entails orange streaked eyeshadow, purple eyeshadow, and purple lipstick.
She is wearing a violet top with an orange feather print. Over the top are feathery purple epaulettes and on her back are golden feathered wings. Her equine body is a shiny violet red with a fiery orange tail. Feathery orange wraps cover her front legs and fiery orange feathers decorate her back leg.
Even though I've often been accused of fanning the flames of chaos, I like to think what I really do is provide the sparks of transformation that turn old sticks in the mud into Roman candles of celebration.

Frets is a gargoyle hybrid with long reddish pink hair with streaks of black. She has small horns, gray skin, and bony gargoyle wings. Facial features include dark eyebrows, blue twinkly eyes, gray eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, dots under her eyes, and salmon pink lips.
Her outfit is a pink tank top with black horizontal stripes and a shimmery silver peplum belt. Her horse-like body is a dark speckled gray with a pink fan-like tail. Wavy pink stripes are on her back leg and a black flower corsage decorates her tail. Black leg warmers with chains, stars, horsehoes, and pyramid studs are on her front legs.
It's all about the hoofbeats for me. I'm always trotting out the latest tunes and I love it when one of my friends yells, "Hay, I know that song!"

Olympia is a vampire bat hybrid with deep purple hair that is streaked with black and features a black spiderweb mohawk. Her pale white skin is complemented by purple eyebrows, purple eyes, lavender eyeshadow, yellow eyeliner, and purple lips with fangs. On her back are yellow bat-like wings.
She is wearing a sleeveless blue top with an angular soccer ball heart. Around her waist is a black skirt-like belt with a flared hem. Her equine body is lavender with a bushy black tail streaked with blue. Purple wraps with drippy yellow stripes cover her front legs and decorating her back leg are a variety of black bats and hearts.
I'm batty about team sports - I love the "we're all in this together" spirit of being part of the herd. I also love wearing black, so my beasties have nicknamed me "Gothlete."

Penepole is a butterfly hybrid with magenta hair that has purple highlights and blunt bangs. She has pale pink skin, deep purple lips, and magenta eyebrows with swirls and dots. Her eyes are green with purple eyeshadow and she wears chartreuse glasses. On the top of her head is a spiral horn and on her back are bronze mechanical wings with lots of gears, cogs, and pistons.
She is wearing a dark turquoise corset with front straps, swirls, and green gear accents. Around her waist is a green multi-strand chain belt embellished with gears and a horsehoe charm. Her horse body is burgundy with a wavy purple tail. Dark turquoise wraps that match her corset cover her front legs and a yellow-green design with swirls, gears, and cogs decorates her back leg.
I'm a finely tuned Fright-Mare who's geared to trot like a top. I believe precision makes the world go 'round and that includes getting my name right. It's P-E-N-E-P-O-L-E! Please pronounce it precisely.

Pyxis is a Pegasus hybrid with deep pink and dark purple hair that is pulled into a ponytail. Small horns poke through her hair and on her head is a small blue jockey hat with chin strap. She has soft pink skin with blue eyes, light blue eyeshadow, pink lips, and a lavender laurel branch on her left cheek.
She is wearing a sleeveless pink polo shirt with a centaur emblem. On her back are feathery silver wings and around her waist is a black triple belt with rosette ribbon accents. Her horse body is blue with a pink tail. Decorating her back leg is a horseshoe plaque and silvery dots. On her front legs are silver wraps with a horsehoe on one and a rosette ribbon on the other.
I'm a classically trained trotter and I love precision mixed with artistry. Watching me go through my paces is like spending a night at the ballet.

Skyra is a ghost hybrid with blue and purple streaked hair that is worn in long pigtails. Poking through her hair are two small horns. She has pale blue skin, violet eyebrows, and light blue eyes with light blue eyeshadow and lavender eyeliner. Her lips are aqua blue and lavender freckles decorate her cheeks. 
She is wearing a cheerleading outfit with a white top that has a blue collar, a turquoise & blue v-stripe, and a horseshoe emblem. The peplum skirt is blue and her silver chain belt has floating chains that end with a horseshoe and balls. 
Her equine body is pearl white, has a purple shimmer, and transitions to silver as it nears her hoofs. Light blue lace-up leg warmers with pompoms cover her front legs and her shimmery blue tail is tied with a light blue bow. A light blue megaphone graphic is on Skyra’s back leg and purple stars and confetti shapes decorate her leg and back.
I've been accused of being "perky" but I prefer to think of myself as energetic, and it's a good thing too, because it takes a lot of energy to cheer on the herd and encourage them to... Go! Fight! Win!

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair with light brown highlights. Her brown complexion is complemented by yellow eyes with purple shadow and red fanged lips.
She is wearing a black cropped vest over a sleeveless purple top with a leopard print. A golden belt and a short black skirt complete the outfit.
Accessories consist of a gold multi-bangle bracelet, black peep-toe wedges, and a purple iCoffin phone. 
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Draculaura has long black hair with streaks of violet that is worn in pigtails. Her pale complexion is complemented by light purple eyes with pink shadow, red fanged lips, and a pink heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a sleeveless black top with violet polka dots on the front. Her layered skirt has a split black layer and a longer pink layer.
Accessories consist of a pink statement necklace, white bracelet, and a pink iCoffin phone. Plum colored tights lead to pink wedges with a black bat wing trim.
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 9 pieces.

Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, deep pink lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her outfit features a white polo shirt accented by a black tie with blue zigzag stripes. A gray mini skirt covers her knee length black shorts.
She accessorizes with a blue multi-bangle bracelet, black wedge pumps, and a blue iCoffin phone. 
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Ghoulia has long light blue hair with streaks of blue. It is pulled to the back with a black headband. She has pale gray skin, light blue eyes, and red lips.
Her outfit begins with a cropped black vest over a sleeveless red top with a brain wrinkle print. Ghoulia’s skirt has a red layer with a front split and a longer black layer with a reverse scalloped hem.
She accessorizes with white cat-eye glasses, red wedge pumps, and a black iCoffin phone.
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Lagoona has light salmon hair with turquoise streaks and pink accents. She has pale blue skin, green eyes with purple eyebrows, pink lips, and freckles. On her calves are turquoise fins.
She is wearing a cropped blue vest over a pink top with black sleeves. They are complemented by a black skirt over blue shorts.
Accessories consist of a beaded bracelet, black peep-toe wedges, and a blue iCoffin phone. 
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Meowlody has white hair with a striped black streak and gray skin with a patch of white on her face. Her yellow cat eyes have blue eyeshadow and her lips are red.
She is wearing a black cropped vest over a sleeveless black top with jagged white claw mark stripes. She completes the outfit with an orange jean skirt.
Accessories consist of a pink multi-bangle bracelet, black knee highs, pink wedge pumps, and a pink iCoffin phone.
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Purrsephone has black hair with a striped streak of white. Her gray skin is complemented by a patch of white on her face, yellow cat eyes with blue shadow, and red lips.
She is wearing a cropped orange vest over a white sleeveless top with black claw mark stripes. A pink jean skirt completes the outfit.
Accessories consist of black knee highs, pink wedge pumps, and a pink iCoffin phone.
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Spectra has long and wavy purple hair with lavender highlights. She has blue & purple eyes, blue eyeshadow, purple lips, and pale skin that becomes translucent on her arms.
Her outfit features a sleeveless black top with a purple stripe down the front. It is complemented by a layered black skirt with an irregular hem.
She accessorizes with a large gray statement necklace, a gray multi-bangled bracelet, purple lace-up shoes, and a purple iCoffin phone. 
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Venus  has long hot pink hair with a streak of green in the front. Her pale green skin is complemented by big blue eyes with pink shadow and red prickly lips.
She is wearing a cropped baby blue vest over a black top decorated with green Skullettes, hearts, and squiggles. A black skirt over hot pink shorts complete the outfit.
Accessories consist of a yellow bracelet and a black iCoffin phone. On her feet are pink wedges with green vine laces that grow up her legs. 
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Catty has long pink hair that is pulled into a high ponytail. She has black skin, pink cat eyes with silvery shadow, and pink lips.
Her outfit features a strapless silver top decorated with a spiderweb and a pink “13”. The pink skirt has a silver peplum and a long pink train.
She accessorizes with two pink bracelets and a white iCoffin phone. On her feet are silver knee highs with silver wedge pumps. 
The figure has 9 pieces and stands about 3 inches tall.

Cleo has long black hair with streaks of gold that is pulled to the back with a gold headband. She has a tan complexion, light blue eyes with purple shadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
Her pale turquoise top is sleeveless with a teal zigzag graphic on the front. Around her waist is a golden belt with a black skirt over gold shorts.
Accessories consist of a gold beaded statement necklace, a blue multi-bangle bracelet, and a gold iCoffin phone. On her feet are pale turquoise wedges that complement the cobra tattoos on her feet. 
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 9 pieces.

Elissabat has long deep purple hair and a pale pink complexion. She has reddish orange eyes, purple shadow, and purple fanged lips.
Her outfit features a black 3/4 sleeve top with a purple chest and a purple laced corset. A layered black skirt with a purple peplum completes the look.
Accessories consist of purple cuff bracelets, a purple iCoffin phone, and black knee highs that lead to black wedge pumps.
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 9 pieces.

Operetta has long curly red hair with a black band that ends with a heart-shaped eye mask. She has pale lavender skin, lavender eyes with orange shadow, and red lips. 
Her cropped white vest covers a violet top with white sleeves and a spiderweb graphic. Blue knee-length shorts complete the outfit.
She accessorizes with black bracelets, a red iCoffin phone, and white wedge pumps with black accents.
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 9 pieces.

Toralei has short red hair with jagged black stripes on one side. She has light beige skin with an orange patch on her face, green eyes, red lips, and whiskers.
Her outfit begins with a cropped black jacket over a red shirt with black sleeves and claw marks on the chest. They are complemented by a red jean skirt and black tights with a jagged hem.
She accessorizes with a red multi-bangle bracelet and an orange iCoffin phone. On her feet are red and black sneakers with red laces.
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 9 pieces.

Twyla has turquoise hair with blunt bangs and streaks of purple. She has pale skin, purple eyes with lavender shadow, and pink lips.
Her outfit has a sleeveless purple top and a layered skirt. The layers are black and purple with jagged irregular hems.
She accessorizes with a black statement necklace, a black multi-bangle bracelet, and a turquoise iCoffin phone. On her feet are blue wedge pumps that lead to gray wispy tendrils that rise up her legs.
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 9 pieces.

Viperine has whitish pink hair with wiggly pink snakes and a pink headband. She has yellow skin with pink scale accents, snake-like eyes behind pink glasses, and fanged pink lips.
Her turtleneck dress is black with a light blue chest and elbow length sleeves. Around her waist is a light blue belt with a Skullette buckle and the skirt has a light blue ruffled hem.
She accessorizes with a pink iCoffin phone. On her feet are pink wedges with pink knee highs.
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 9 pieces.

Biteology Class has 194 pieces that creates a classroom, locker, and a Lagoona Blue figure.
Classroom
The classroom is black and gray with pink and blue accents. It has gray wrought iron windows, countertops, and an image of a bookcase. 
One wall rotates to reveal either a chalkboard or beakers and tubing. Another area has shelves with burning candles, spiderwebs, and an open book.
Classroom accessories include beakers, flasks, and a pink laptop. There is also a black and blue school desk.
Locker
The pink locker is coffin-shaped with a Skullette handle and is framed in black. It rotates and is able to open and close.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has yellow hair with turquoise highlights and a pink starfish. She has pale blue skin, green eyes with pink shadow, pink lips, and freckles. On her calves are turquoise fins.
Her outfit has a cropped gray vest over a violet top with a white scale print and black sleeves. A turquoise Skullette belt and a black skirt over magenta shorts complete the look.
She accessorizes with a white bracelet, magenta iCoffin, and a blue purse. On her feet are light pink pumps.

The playset has 280 pieces that create a Creepateria with a tower, a picnic table, and figures of Cleo and Frankie.
Creepateria
The Creepateria is black, gray, and purple with wrought iron windows, spiderweb accents, and a tower full of golden trophies. Decorating the walls are a Monster High banner, a kitchen clock, torches, and a creepy tree with pink flowers.
Inside there is a bench, countertop, an image of a lunch lady, and a rotating pillar with a vending machine and coffin lockers. The lockers have Skullette handles and can open and close. A laptop, various food items, cups, and other cafeteria accessories are also included.
Picnic Table
The picnic table is black with gray seats and a pink top. It can flip up and be used as a launcher in case of monstrous food fights.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has long black hair with streaks of gold that is pulled to the back with a gold headband. She has a tan complexion, light blue eyes with purple shadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
Her fearleading outfit has a sleeveless black top with a pink neckline, pink trim, and a Monster High emblem on the chest. The matching black skirt has a white waist and hem.
Accessories consist of white pompoms, a gold multi-bangle bracelet, and a purple purse. On her feet are white sneakers with black laces.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, dark pink lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her fearleading outfit is the same as Cleo’s except she has pink pompoms. She accessorizes with a turquoise purse and a pink iCoffin.

The playset has 86 pieces that creates a lab and a Ghoulia Yelps figure.
Creeperific Lab
The lab is black and gray with  blue accents, pink tubing, and a pink countertop. The wall of the lab has a spiderweb Skullette and a chalkboard with formulas. A portion of the wall rotates to reveal hidden potions.
Accessories for the lab include beakers, flasks, a green skull candle, and a black candelabra. There is also a laptop and a red purse.
Ghoulia Yelps
Ghoulia has light blue hair with streaks of blue that is pulled to the back with a green headband. She has pale gray skin, light blue eyes, and red lips.
Her cropped red vest covers a white top with long gray sleeves. A black and white keyboard belt with red pants complete the outfit.
She accessorizes with white cat-eye glasses and a black iCoffin phone. On her feet are black and white knee high boots with red laces.

The Electrifying Room has 147 pieces that create a bedroom with a bed, desk, mirrored stand, and a Frankie Stein figure.
Bedroom
The rotating bed is a silver operating table with blue sides and pink padding. The top is decorated with a yellow lightning bolt and translucent pink Skullette vacuum tubes.
The desk is black and gray with a blue desktop that has a power level and a laptop. The angled backboard has translucent yellow tubing, spiderwebs with a Skullette, and a rotating compartment that reveals a picture of Frankie’s pet, Watzit.
The mirrored stand is black, gray, and blue with a burning skull candle. The mirror rotates to reveal storage for a turquoise purse.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, dark red lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her outfit begins with a sleeveless black top with white shoulders and crisscrossed lines. Around her neck is a bolted white collar with a black and white polka dot tie. A black skirt completes the look.
She accessorizes with a blue iCoffin phone. On her feet are black pumps.

Fear Squad has 73 pieces that create bleachers, a scoreboard, and a Clawdeen wolf figure.
Playset
The playset is gray and chartreuse with purple accents. It has two bleacher seats, a rotating scoreboard, and a purple flag with “MH Monsters!!!”.
The coffin-shaped scoreboard has a score of 12 to 03 and rotates to reveal cheerleading accessories. The accessories are two pink pompoms and a chartreuse megaphone.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has long brown hair with yellow-green highlights. She has brown skin, yellow eyes with purple shadow, and fanged red lips.
Her fearleading outfit has a sleeveless black top with a pink neckline, pink trim, and a Monster High emblem on the chest. The matching black skirt has a white waist and hem.
She accessorizes with a purple scarf, a white multi-bangle bracelet, and a pink iCoffin phone. On her feet are white sneakers with black laces.

The playset has 84 pieces that creates a newspaper club office and a Spectra figure.
Office
The office is a smoky black with lavender skull candles, a pink picture, and a turquoise desk lamp. The wall has a clip that allows Spectra to “float” while in the office.
The lavender desk has translucent legs and chain accents. It opens to reveal some of Spectra’s articles. Office accessories include a purple laptop and a pink camera.
Spectra Vondergeist
Spectra has long purple hair with lavender highlights. She has blue eyes, blue eyeshadow, purple lips, pale skin, and translucent hands and forearms.
Her outfit has a cropped purple vest over a plum colored top with chain graphics. The matching skirt has a plum layer and a longer black layer.
She accessorizes with a silver bracelet and a pink iCoffin. On her feet are violet pumps.

The Gore-Geous Vanity playset has 87 pieces that creates a vanity, throne, and a Cleo de Nile figure.
Vanity
The vanity has a black coffin-shaped base, gold cobra legs, and a gray countertop. The rotating mirror is framed in black and topped with magenta and a Skullette. Accents include burning candles, lipstick, and other makeup.
Throne
The long throne has a gold headboard and footboard with with a turquoise mattress and black legs. The black sideboard has a clip that holds a long fan.
The Egyptian fan has a gold pole with a turquoise end. The curved top is gold and decorated with turquoise graphics.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has black hair with golden streaks that is pulled back with a gold headband. She has tan skin, blue eyes with purple shadow, deep red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
Her outfit has a blue and beige top with straps. The matching skirt has a blue top layer and a longer light blue layer. Under the skirt is beige shorts.
Golden accessorizes include a snake necklace, two multi-bangle bracelets, and an iCoffin phone. On her feet are black sandals with beige bandage straps.

The playset has 371 pieces that creates a graveyard with a dance floor, DJ table, lights and speakers. Cleo de Nile and Lagoona Blue figures are also included.
Graveyard
The graveyard has a central mausoleum with purple wrought iron doors, party lights, and a glow in the dark dance floor that folds out. The building is surrounded by pillars with green skull tops, spooky branches with translucent green accents, purple wrought iron fencing, and tombstone speakers. 
The top of the mausoleum has an irregular purple roof, spiderwebs, and a winged Skullette at the peak. The Skullette has a speaker that plays three songs.
On each side are black and gray tables. Complementing them are two magenta chairs with wrought iron backs, a blue candelabra, and glasses.
The DJ stand has two turntables and a purple laptop. It is topped by a skeletal arm and a burning candle.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has long black hair with streaks of gold that is pulled to the back with a gold headband. She has a tan complexion, light blue eyes with purple shadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
Her black top is sleeveless and features wavy yellow lines. A gold belt with a short black skirt covers knee length yellow shorts.
She accessorizes with a blue snake necklace, blue multi-bangle bracelets, a gold iCoffin phone, and a gold purse. On her feet are black peep toe wedges.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has yellow blonde hair with turquoise streaks and a pink starfish. She has pale blue skin, green eyes with purple eyebrows, pink lips, and freckles. On her calves are turquoise fins.
Her sleeveless black top has a white scale print and is covered by a cropped magenta vest. The ensemble is completed by a layered turquoise skirt with jagged hems.
Accessories consist of a turquoise bracelet, a magenta iCoffin phone, and a yellow purse. Her deep pink shoes are peep toe wedges.

The playset has 301 pieces that create a Monster Moviemobile and a Clawdeen Wolf figure.
Monster Moviemobile
The luxury vehicle is black and purple with a wrought iron cutout roof, lime green windshield, batty webbed grill, orange lights, and wheels with pink filigree rims. Additional accents include burning candles, translucent spiderwebs, a green skull hood ornament, and purple skeletal arms. The roof opens to create a movie screen that can display two different scenes.
The interior has magenta front seats, a purple coffin-shaped table, and pink and magenta back seats. Party accessories include tall blue glasses and a green skull candle.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has long brown hair with light brown highlights. She has brown skin, yellow eyes with purple shadow, and fanged red lips.
Her outfit features a peach tiger striped top with black sleeves. Complementing the top is a layered purple skirt with irregular hems.
She accessorizes with a pink scarf, a black iCoffin phone, and a red and black purse. On her feet are black knee high peep toe boots.

The Vamptastic Room playset has 128 pieces that creates a bedroom with a coffin, shelves, desk, makeup chair, and a Draculaura figure.
Bedroom
The black bedroom has a central coffin that folds open to reveal a place for Draculaura to hang and sleep. The coffin is topped with pink accents, a candle, and a Skullette.
On the left are shelves with gray bricks and translucent webs. The shelves hold a variety of colored bottles.
To the right is a white desktop with translucent webs and a gray wrought iron back. On the desk is a laptop, skull candle, a heart mirror, and makeup. The chair is black, sits on a pedestal, and has a wrought iron back and a magenta cushion.
Draculaura
Draculaura has black hair worn in pigtails with streaks of pink. She has a pale pink complexion with lavender eyes, pink shadow, fanged red lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her red turtleneck has white stitching, white buttons, and purple sleeves. The outfit is completed by a white skirt over purple shorts.
She accessorizes with a white scarf, white wrist cuffs, and a black iCoffin phone. On her feet are pink knee high boots with silver heels and black laces.
Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat, is also included. His is black with a pink bow on his head and pink hearts on his chest.

The Abbey ornament has long white hair with an under layer of pink, purple, and blue. She has light blue skin, blue eyes, and purple lips.
Her purple dress is trimmed with white fur and is wrapped with a string belt. She accessorizes with a furry white headband, a blue necklace, and furry white boots.
On Abbey’s left is a snowman with black eyes, an orange carrot nose, and brown branch arms. He wears a Santa hat and a black tie with white polka dots and a silver Skullette.

The Draculaura ornament has pig-tailed hair with curly ends that is striped black and pink. She has pale skin with pink eyeshadow, pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her pink vest has purple sleeves with frilly white cuffs. It is complemented by a white ascot with a pink bow and a white skirt with a black under layer.
She accessorizes with a Santa hat and purple tights. Her pink boots are detailed with black laces and straps. Draculaura is holding a cluster of snowflakes.

The Frankie ornament has long white hair with streaks of black. Her pale green complexion is complemented by one blue and one green eye, violet eyeshadow, and pink lips.
She is wearing her signature blue dress. It has a white collar with a black Skullette tie, puffy black sleeves, and a black hem.
Accessories consist of a Santa hat, silver dangle earrings with blue Skullettes, and a studded silver belt with chains. On her feet are black and white striped pumps.
Frankie sits on a stack of presents. A stitched gray present with an orange and black lid sits on a magenta present with a blue ribbon and a Skullette.

The Abbey ornament has long white hair with an under layer of blue, purple, and pink streaks. She has pale blue skin, purple eyes, and pink lips.
Her off-the-shoulder dress is purple with white fur trim. Wrapped around her waist is a white rope belt with a black pouch.
Furry white accessories consist of a headband, arm warmers, and knee high boots. Next to Abbey are stacked pink and blue presents.

The Frankie ornament has long black and white striped hair. Her light green complexion is complemented by one blue and one green eye, purple eyeshadow, and red lips.
She is wearing her classic blue dress that has a white neckline, puffy black sleeves, and a black tie. Accessories consist of blue dangle Skullette earrings and black and white striped pumps. She sits on a green present with a red and white striped lid.

The Frankie ornament has black hair with shiny silver highlights piled high on her head. She has pale turquoise skin, aqua blue lips, and one blue and one green eye. Stitches are on one cheek and aqua blue lighting decorates the other.
Her black party dress has blue sparkles, a silver neckline, and a knobby black hem. Hanging from the back is a white tulle train.
Over the dress is a black jacket with a silver lapel and flared shoulders. Accessories consist of silver earrings, silver arm wraps, black tights, and black knee high boots.
Monster High features a spooktacular group of ghouls and their freaky-fab friends. Fashionista Frankie Stein, the daughter of Frankenstein, shows off her killer style in a howliday dress and signature hair with knee-high boots. She's sure to be the greatest ghoul at the ball!
The ornament is the classic version of a Skullette. It is white outlined in black with eyelash eye sockets, a black nose, and a magenta bow. The ornament hangs from a shiny silver string.

Abbey features super-long and gorgeous white hair with streaks of blue, purple, and pink. Her skin is a lovely light blue with silver sparkles. Complementing her appearance is an outfit inspired by her signature wardrobe.
The figure is wearing a black, white, pink, and purple dress with a fractured print. The dress has a furry collar, a white striped hem, and is wrapped with a string that holds a blue pouch. On her legs are pink & blue gradient leggings.
She accessories with a blue crystal necklace and furry white arm warmers with jagged blue trim. On her feet are furry white knee-high boots with jagged blue collars.

Clawdeen has long curly purple hair with her ears poking out the top. She is all black and lacks facial features. Her body is decorated with a pattern of green paws, crescent moons, crossbone outlines, safety pins, and golden zippers. Unzipped portions reveal gold leopard print.
She is a chase figure and a variant of the regular Clawdeen. She has the same pose, but a different appearance. A chase figure is an intentional variation that is produced in smaller quantities.

Deuce has light green scaly hair with a snake mohawk that transitions from light to dark green. His wardrobe is based upon his signature outfit.
He is wearing a black & white striped vest over a red t-shirt. The shirt features a skull and cassette graphic. Around his waist is a white belt with a red cassette tape buckle and a dangling silver chain. His black pants are decorated with white outlined scales.
He accessorizes with a black & white skull wrist band and red framed glasses. The glasses may have tinted or clear lenses. On his feet are black & white checkered loafers with white soles.

Draculaura has pink hair and lacks standard features like eyes, a mouth, and clothes. She is all black with a pink & white pattern that consists of bats, lips with fangs, “X”s, spiderwebs, and the words “Scary Cute”.
This chase figure is a variant of the regular Draculaura. She has the same pose, but a different appearance. A chase figure is an intentional variation that is produced in smaller quantities.

Frankie has silver hair and lacks standard features like eyes, a mouth, and clothes. The all black figure is embellished with yellow stitches and a blue pattern that consists of nuts, lightning bolts, “Monster High”, “Totally Voltage”, and more stitches.
The chase figure is a variant of the regular Frankie Stein. She has the same pose, but a different appearance. A chase figure is an intentional variation that is produced in smaller quantities.

Ghoulia has metallic blue hair that hangs to the ground and is held back by a metallic green headband. Her white form is decorated with squiggly brains, dripping twin cherries, and blue brain wrinkled hearts. On her torso is “Ghoul Genius” written in dripping pink and outlined in black. On her feet are black shoes with drippy tops.
She is a chase figure and a variant of the regular Ghoulia Yelops. She has the same pose, but a different appearance. A chase figure is an intentional variation that is produced in smaller quantities.

Nefera is stunning with her metallic hair that features shimmery shades of purple, blue, and turquoise as well as streaks of black and gold. Her wardrobe is inspired by her Boo York, Boo York outfit.
She is wearing a lovely black sleeveless dress with wavy teal lines. Over the dress is a metallic gold chest piece with snake accents and a city skyline shoulder piece.
She accessorizes with a black snake & crystal headpiece and teal mummy bandage arm wraps. On her feet are teal blue strappy sandals with snake laces winding up her legs. Held in her outstretched right hand is a translucent purple pyramid crystal.

Rochelle has long pink hair with blunt bangs and streaks of light blue. She has pink eyes, speckled skin, and small wings on her back. Her clothes are inspired by her signature outfit.
She is wearing a black & white striped sleeveless top and a black & purple skirt. The skirt is decorated with fleur-de-lis, mesh patterns, and wrought iron designs.
Wrought iron accessories consist of a black headband with stony wings and a black bracelet. On her feet are pink socks with peep-toe pumps. The strappy pumps are adorned with fleur-de-lys, swirls, and black trim.

Skelita’s long black hair reaches all the way to the ground and is accentuated with orange highlights. She is bone white with brown eyes and face paint reminiscent of a sugar skull. Her colorful dress is inspired by her Scaris: City of Frights outfit.
The figure is wearing a sleeveless black top decorated with purple and pink piping, gray skull flowers, and ivy designs. The skirt features a layer of colorful patches with patterns of spiderwebs, bats, flowers, and more.
She accessorizes with a brown statement necklace, a double stitched brown belt, and brown wedge sandals. The sandals have green straps with skulls and floral accents on the soles.

Spectra has beautiful lavender hair decorated with pink and light purple highlights. The figure rests upon her hair giving her a floating appearance. Her skin is ghostly pale and becomes translucent near her hands and feet. She is wearing her lovely signature outfit.
The ensemble begins with a black sleeveless top that features a purple & blue strip with three silver chains down the front. Around her waist is a silver belt with a row of dangling rings which lead to her serrated hem skirt. The skirt is pink with a black fishnet design. On her feet are magenta boots with black laces and silver chain accents.

Toralei’s orange hair features a bob cut with black stripes on one side. She has green eyes, a tan complexion, pointy ears, and an exceptionally long tail. Her fearsome clothing is inspired by her signature outfit.
The figure is wearing an orange top under a black & red jacket with diagonal slash marks. Around her waist is a gold belt with black dots and a skullette buckle. Her pants are black with red tears and jagged cuffs.
She accessorizes with red fingerless gloves trimmed in black and peep-toe wedges. The black wedges are decorated with silver dots, red laces, and red soles.

Twyla has lovely lavender skin and amazingly long and wavy pastel green hair with streaks of light purple. Her clothing is based upon her 13 Wishes outfit.
The figure is wearing a blue top with black bug stripes and a black & light green bow by the neck. Her black skirt is decorated with light green filigree, a blue speckled stripe, and a light green belt with dots and a skull buckle.
She accessorizes with two bangles: one is light green and the other is black. On her feet are blue boots with black soles, black trim, light green laces, and spider accents. Rising up her legs are black tendrils.

This candy themed Twyla has pastel green hair with colorful speckles. In her hair is a pink & white peppermint barrette. She is all black and lacks facial features. Her body is decorated with a pattern pink and pastel green swirls, dots, and candy-like designs.
She is a chase figure and a variant of the regular Twyla. She has the same pose, but a different appearance. A chase figure is an intentional variation that is produced in smaller quantities.

Venus has super long light green hair with pink highlights. One side is shaved short and colored pink. Her skin is also light green with green ivy tattoos on her forearms and legs. Her clothes are inspired by her signature outfit.
She is wearing a blue vest over a black shirt with a pink & green print that features “eco punk”, skullettes, and more. Her skirt is black the her leggings are decorated with black, pink, and green designs. On her feet are pink boots with green laces, black trim, and green flytrap mouths.

Venus has long green hair with one side shaved short and colored pink. She is all black and lacks eyes and a mouth. Her body is decorated with pink, blue, and teal graphics of ivy, flytraps, flowered faces, skullettes, and leaves.
She is a chase figure and a variant of the regular Venus. She has the same pose, but a different appearance. A chase figure is an intentional variation that is produced in smaller quantities.

Count Fabulous is Draculaura’s pet bat. He is all black with yellow eyes and small white fangs. On his head is a pink bow and he is wearing a white shirt with pink hearts and trim. The figure is standing with his right wing outstretched and the left wing turned inward.

Crescent is a cute kitty and Clawdeen Wolf’s pet. She is purple with lavender ears and a tuft of fur on the top of her head. Her eyes are yellow with green irises and have black lashes with lavender highlights. The figure is in a laying pose with her head resting upon her front paws.

Sir Hoots A Lot is a wise owl and Ghoulia Yelp’s pet. He is light blue with a white chest and white feathers on his wings. His beak and claws are yellow and his big yellow eyes are outlined in blue. The figure is in a flying pose and rests upon his tail feathers.

Watzit is the adorable dog-like pet of Frankie Stein. He is tan with one floppy brown ear and stitched brown patches on his legs and around his left eye. Silver spikes protrude from his head and silver wings are on his back. His right eye is blue and the left is green. The figure is in a sitting pose with sprawled out legs.
