Ari will be spooktacular in this blue one-shoulder dress decorated with purple and blue chains, little Skullettes, and magenta trim. The single sleeve and asymmetrical top skirt are sheer magenta. 
Chain accessories include a wrapped blue necklace and a silver triangle-link belt with a hanging chain. For shoes, there are silver pumps with studs, spikes, chains, and manacle ankle straps. The purse is a purple clutch with wrapped chains.

This form-fitting dress has a ferocious look that is perfect for Clawdeen.  It has short black mesh sleeves, purple and lavender stripes, and a zipper print.
Accessories consist of black sunglasses, a gold bracelet, and green high tops. Completing the ensemble is a gold clutch with zipper accents and a studded strap.

Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen’s outfit is a combination of ferocious and fun. The sleeveless dress has a black turtleneck, purple hem, and a light green & yellow lightning bolt print. Decorating the print are fun of webs, stars, Skullettes, balloon animals, lightning bolts, “OMG” word bubbles, and more.
Gold accessories include a triple-buckled wrist wrap and a gold belt. For shoes, there are lime green peep toe pumps with side cutouts. The purple purse has spikes, claw marks, and feather accents.
Frankie Stein
Frankie ensemble also has a sleeveless dress with a turtleneck. The dress has yellow trim and a shimmery silver waist that separates the light blue bodice from the skirt. The white skirt has a Cleo de Nile feel and features a pink and blue Egyptian print.
Blue accessories consist of sunglasses and multi-strapped pumps. The silver handbag has an etched diamond pattern, a yellow flap, and a safety pin handle.

Cleo will look spectacular in this form-fitting dress. The black & yellow dress has a bandage wrapped print, black mesh shoulders, and yellow trim.
Complementing the dress are red sunglasses, a golden belt, and gravity shoes. The shoes are gold with pyramid platforms and Ouroboros ankle straps. The purse is a curved red handbag with two-headed snake handle.

Cleo de Nile
Cleo’s outfit features a form fitting sleeveless dress with black and turquoise stripes. The turquoise is decorated with a mummy bandage print. Yellow trim and a shiny gold accent stripe near the bottom of the skirt finish the dress.
The dress is accessorized by a gold pendant necklace embellished with a gold snake. The turquoise peep toe pumps have tassel accents and a wide ankle strap. Completing the outfit is a gold purse with a winged scarab design.
Ari Hauntington
Ari’s attire begins a with a powder blue top that has purple straps and a lavender print. The print is a pattern of spiderweb filigree and dangling bugs. Accompanying the top is a shimmery magenta skirt with a blue trimmed waist and a reverse scallop hem.
Accessories consist of a violet multi-strand necklace and fuschia pumps with chain link heels. The blue handbag has Skullette accents, a silver flap, and a silver chain handle.

Draculaura would love to have this stunning pink dress that is decorated with a filigree and Skullette print. It has wide blue straps and a blue waist ribbon.
Accessories include a black flower necklace and blue sunglasses. For shoes there are blue wedges with ankle bow-straps and heart-shaped cutouts in the heels. Lastly, there is a lip-shaped purse that is pink, covered in beads, and adorned with fangs and dangling strands.

Draculaura
Draculaura’s ensemble begins with a one-shoulder dress with a pink waist and pink trim. It features a diamond print in shades of pink, gray, and gold. The print is decorated with Skullettes, clown-face glasses, bones, hearts, spiderwebs, and more. Under the dress is a pair of shimmery black pants.
Accessories consist of a pink headband with bow and blue bow-tied wedges. The pink heart-shaped purse is adorned with little bows and a bow accented handle.
Lagoona
Lagoona’s outfit has a turquoise dress adorned with a wonderful aquatic print. The print that has colorful coral, black seahorses, and fish bones. The hem and neckline are salmon pink and ruffled. Complementing the dress is a pair of shimmery teal pants.
Accessories include a pair of swirled turquoise shoes and a clamshell purse. The coral pink purse has a tentacle handle and an octopus and rose motif on the sides.

Draculaura will have some fangtastic fun with this accessory pack. It features a pair of pink roller skates with yellow wheels and fang heels. Complementing the skates are yellow wing-like glasses. 
To carry her belongings, there’s a black fanny pack belt adorned with a bow and bat wings. Lastly, Draculaura can listen to an iCoffin and practice her roller disco. The iCoffin is pink with earbuds and wing accents.

Frankie will look amazing in this fun ensemble that features a black & white top with a Skullette print. Complementing the top is a plaid skirt with pink and blue lines, a pink waist, and pink suspenders.
Accessories for the outfit consist of yellow glasses, a layered silver chain necklace, and silver pumps with double straps. The last item is a blue clutch embellished with zippers, studs, buckles, and a small spiked strap.

This accessory pack is perfect for Frankie’s movie night. It starts with a pair a triangle shades with pink and blue 3D lenses. Then there are the blue platform booties that feature popcorn box heels.
Two tasty treats are also included. The red delicious brain puffs are in a silver box with “brain puffs” on the sides. To wash them down, there’s an icy blue drink in a cup decorated with lightning bolts and stitches.

Lagoona will look adorable in this sleeveless dress. It is turquoise complemented by a black & magenta scale pattern and a black hem with fishy details.
Accessories include a bubbly pink necklace and a turquoise belt with bubble pockets and a fish buckle. The shoes are pink wedges with winding leg straps. Completing the outfit is a reddish pink beach  tote.

Draculaura has long straight hair that is dark pink with black highlights. Her makeup features light pink eyeshadow and dark red lipstick. A dark red heart decorates her left cheek. Draculaura is a budget doll and lacks articulation in her elbows, wrists, and knees.
She is wearing a pink molded tank top with spiderweb details. A white strip with black hearts runs down the front. Over the tank she wears a short white & black polka dot cape with a pink bow, pink hearts, and a serrated hem. Her pencil skirt is black with shimmery vertical stripes. On top of the skirt is a shorter overskirt that is sheer pink with a spiderweb print.
Accessories begin with pink sunglasses, a black bat wing & spiderweb headband, and a black bat wing & spiderweb statement necklace. On her feet are pink shoes with black wedges and straps that weave up her legs. Her second pair of shoes are pink wedges with ankle strap bows and cutout hearts in the heels. Her light blue handbag is coffin-shaped with heart accents. Completing the ensemble is a parasol with a silver shaft, batty handle, skullette cap, and a pink canopy held shut by a heart-buckle strap.

Frankie has long and straight hair that is streaked black & white. Her makeup features soft pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick. On her right cheek are gray stitches. Frankie is a budget doll and lacks articulation in her elbows, wrists, and knees.
She is wearing a molded black tank top decorated with a silver lightning bolt and a string of light blue hex nuts. Over the top is a cropped silver vest. Her blue skirt has a zigzag print and over it is an asymmetrical skirt. The overskirt is sheer blue with a pattern of yellow lightning stripes.
Accessories consist of blue sunglasses, a blue hex nut headband, and a yellow hex nut pendant. On her feet are yellow wedges with stitched together cutouts. Her second pair of shoes are blue high tops with studded silver toe boxes and bolted silver heels. She has a yellow stitched skullette binder and a silver six-sided purse adorned with screws, electrical outlets, and a lightning handle.

Ari has long straight purple hair with pink highlights. She has pale translucent skin, pink eyeshadow, and violet lips.
Her off-the-shoulder dress is purple with a pink trimmed neckline and a ruffled hem with black trim. The printed front is decorated with gray chains, magenta cakes, and swirled lollipops. 
She accessorizes with a pink chain headband adorned with a layered cake topped with lavender frosting. On her feet are pink waffle pumps with ankle strap bows, heart accents, and gooey heels.
Ari is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees.

Catrine has long lavender hair with blue highlights and streaks of magenta. She has a pale complexion, pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, lavender lips and a lavender nose. A black birthmark decorates her left cheek.
Her outfit is a blue sleeveless dress with red trim, red straps, and a blue ruffled hem. The front of the dress is gray and features a print of donuts, cartons of milk, paint palettes, brushes, and colorful splatter.
She accessorizes with an orange headband with two red-frosted donuts with sprinkles. On her feet are adorable blue booties with cat-faced toe boxes and yarn soles.
Catrine is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees.

Cleo has long straight black hair with a streak of dark turquoise. She has a tan complexion, blue eyes with silver shadow, pink lips, and a light blue gem on her right cheek.
Her halterneck dress has a reddish-pink strap, neckline, and ruffled hem. The front of the dress is light turquoise with a print of creepy cupcakes, candy corn, and other treats.
She accessorizes with a golden headband topped with a blue frosted cupcake that has a gold crown. Cleo is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees.

Ari has long crimped hair that is purple with streaks of bright blue. She has a translucent complexion with pink eyeshadow, pink and blue eyeliner, and deep pink lips.
Her off-the-shoulder dress is black with a blue trimmed neckline and a colorful print. The print features sheet music, music notes, and chains. Completing the dress is a shiny blue hem.
She accessorizes with a pink chain headband adorned with a treble clef and a pink keyboard belt with dangling chains. On her feet are translucent magenta pumps that have chains, lots of straps, sheet music accents, and music note cutouts in the heels.
When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Draculaura has long crimped hair with pink streaks and blunt bangs. It is pulled into a high ponytail with the help of a pink winged-heart bow. She has turquoise eyeshadow, yellow and turquoise eyeliner, dark pink lipstick, and a dark pink heart outlined in turquoise.
Her black dress has a sweetheart neckline, clear blue shoulders, a pink tulle hem, and a colorful print. The print features pink, blue, and yellow outlines of bats and hearts.
She accessorizes with a translucent yellow belt with a bat wing bow and spiderweb etchings. On her feet are translucent pink wedges with studded straps, drippy accents, and bat cutouts in the heels.
When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Silva has crimped light blue hair with a streak of yellow in the front and a streak of pink with yellow on the side. Most of her hair is pulled into a high ponytail with a spiked black band. Her gray skin tone is complemented by blue eyes with purple accents, blue eyeshadow, pink lips with fangs, and a little black nose.
She is wearing a unique dress with a shiny light blue bodice that has a shredded trim. The rest of the dress is black decorated with neon colored wolves. Finally, there is a ruffled yellow hem on the asymmetrical skirt.
Accessorizes consist of bright pink earrings and a translucent pink fur-like shawl. On her feet are translucent yellow pumps embellished with cutouts, studs, and wild clawed heels.
When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Frankie has long crimped hair that is white with streaks of black, yellow, and blue. It is held in a high ponytail with a lightning encrusted band that is translucent pink. She has yellow eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, and hot pink lips.
Her sleeveless dress has a black bodice with multicolored lightning stripes. The skirt is black with colorful crisscrossed lines embellished with lightning bolts. At the waist is a translucent pink peplum and the hem is trimmed with a neon yellow tulle.
She accessorizes with one yellow and one neon pink lightning bolt earring. Around her neck is a translucent yellow lightning scarf. Wrapped around her left forearm is a blue lightning wrap amd on her feet are translucent yellow wedges. The shoes have hex nut accents and lightning straps that wind up her legs.
Sitting in her right hand is a translucent yellow Znap figure. When Frankie’s right arm is raised she emits one of four types of lights and sounds.
When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Clawdeen has crimped voluminous hair that is purple with streaks of black. She has pink eyeshadow, green eyeliner, and deep pink lips.
Her one-shoulder dress is black and features multicolored irregular stripes. It has a clear yellow ruffle along the neckline and long pink tulle decorates the asymmetrical hem.
She accessorizes with yellow spiked crescent moon cutout earrings and a translucent orange belt with studded strands and spikes. On her feet are translucent purple peep-toe pumps with studs, wide ankle straps, and jagged edges.
Additional items include a translucent purple beastie friend and six hair accessories. Clawdeen can wear a translucent pink crescent moon hair comb, a green crescent moon cutout headband, a green fanged-lip hair clip, or a translucent green spiral clip with a wolf accent. There are two hair extensions: one is green with a Skullette clip and the other is orange with a black bow-paw clip.
When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Twyla has full and crimped aquamarine hair with purple streaks and highlights. She has a ghostly lavender complexion with purple eyeshadow, yellow eyeliner, and deep pink lips. Her right hand are forearm are gray with wispy tendrils rising up her arm.
She is wearing a black dress that features a geometric spiral print accentuated by pink and green bugs. The dress has green straps and a shiny pink peplum with a tulle trim.
Accessories consist of translucent pink bug earrings and a pink spiderweb-bow statement necklace. On her feet are translucent turquoise wedges with lots of studded straps and cutout heels.
Additional items include a translucent pink beastie friend and six hair accessories. Twyla can wear a translucent purple bow-ear headband, a translucent yellow bug comb, a translucent blue dust ball & bow clip, or a black spiral clip with a Skullette key accent. There are two hair extensions: one is teal with a pink skull clip and the other is salmon pink with a dust bunny clip.
When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with streaks of pink. Her brown complexion is complemented by fanged deep pink lips.
She is wearing a purple sleeveless dress that has a green choker and a purple mesh neckline and waist. The front has a lavender animal print decorated with crescent moons, zippers, paw prints, and green emojis.
She accessorizes with a pink baseball hat adorned with crossbones and emoji emblems. On her feet are purple booties with furry cuffs and emoji accents.
Clawdeen is a budget doll and lacks articulation at her wrists, elbows, and knees.

Draculaura has long straight black hair with streaks of pink. She has pale pink skin, pink eyeshadow, fanged red lips, and a red heart on her cheek.
Her blue strapless dress has pink bow straps and a black tulle hem. The front of the dress features a print with little black hearts, safety pins, bats, pink bows, and dark pink emojis.
She accessorizes with a big red headband bow decorated with bats, hearts, and emoji bats. On her feet are translucent pink strappy pumps with cutout heels adorned with hearts.
Draculaura is a budget doll and lacks articulation at her wrists, elbows, and knees.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black and white. She has pale bluish skin, pink eyeshadow, red lips, and a gray scar on her cheek.
Her sleeveless black dress has a blue collar and a black tulle hem. The front features a print with wavy lines, eyeballs, hex nuts, blue lightning bolts, and yellow Frankie emojis.
She accessorizes with gray sunglasses that have an emoji accent. On her feet are blue boots with studs, straps on her calves, emoji emblems, and screw heels.
Frankie is a budget doll and lacks articulation at her wrists, elbows, and knees.

Lagoona has long wavy yellow hair with streaks of turquoise. She has pale turquoise skin, pink eyeshadow, and deep pink lips.
Her pink sleeveless dress has a turquoise ribbon waist and an aqua blue hem. The front of the dress has a print with bubbles, sunglasses, seashells,  blue seahorses and fishy emojis.
She accessorizes with coral pink emoji dangle earrings. On her feet are translucent turquoise wedge sandals.
Lagoona is a budget doll and lacks articulation at her wrists, elbows, and knees.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Jinafire Long & Venus McFlytrap
dolls.description:
The 3-pack features Venus, Jinafire, and Clawdeen as the backup band for the Fierce Rockers concert.
Venus McFlytrap
Venus has straight pink hair with a streak of light pink. Her hair is pulled into a ponytail and shaved short on the sides. She has pink eyshadow, orange eyeliner, dark pink lips, and a green spiky leaf design around one eye. 
Her outfit entails a black tube top with pink straps, a translucent green spiky collar, and a pencil skirt. The skirt is pink decorated with a black & green wrought iron vine design. Accessories consist of pink safety pin earrings, green ivy arm & ankle wraps, and purple booties with spiked heels. She holds black drumsticks to play her pink electronic drums. The outer drums are coffin-shaped and the inner drums are round and spiky with skullette etchings.
Jinafire Long
Jinafire has long straight hair that is swept to one side and is colored with a layer of green and a layer of chartreuse. Her makeup includes pink eyeliner, orange flame eyeshadow, and dark pink lips.
She is wearing an extra long sleeveless red top with a Chinese dragon print. The top has a high fire-trimmed collar and a long side split. Under the top is a black miniskirt. She accessorizes with dangly red fan earrings, a dragon bracelet, and dragon wrapped black booties. Her musical instrument is a bright green dragon keytar.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has wavy blue hair with lavender highlights. Her eyeshadow is lavender, her lips are gold, and a purple crescent moon decorates one eye.
She is wearing a black poofy faux fur top and leggings. The leggings are black, purple, and green adorned with various animal prints. Accessories feature a black chain and double hoop earring, a gold moon & claw choker, and a multi-banded studded black wrist wrap. On her feet are pink pumps with studs, claw marks, and spiked claw heels. She plays a golden double crescent moon guitar adorned with scrolls ad claws.
This Toys”R”Us exclusive does not include doll stands.

The Fierce Rockers 2-pack features Toralei Stripe and Catty Noir singing in a concert.
Toralei Stripe
Toralei has short orange and black streaked hair styled into a bob cut without bangs. She has silver and gray eyeshadow, black lipstick, and three  jagged teal marks under one eye.
Her outfit is a shimmery black leotard with an orange waist-wrap adorned with short jagged lines. Over the leotard is a teal feather-like cape with chest strap and a wide teal belt with crack marks. On her feet are black zip-up knee high boots with studded trim and claw heels. She accessorizes with a silver bangle, a teal studded bracelet, and a teal microphone.
Catty Noir
Catty has long straight pink hair with a teal under-streak. Complementing her black complexion is silver lipstick, pink eyeliner, silver eyeshadow, and one eye decorated with a silver fractured design.
She is wearing a unique jumpsuit with a black & shiny silver cobblestone print. The jumpsuit has one sleeve, one pant leg, a wide pink collar, and  peeking out of the neckline is a teal bra. Pink accessories consist of a studded bracelet, a winding studded belt, and a studded thigh belt. On her feet are teal cracked pumps and in her hand is a silver skullette microphone. 
Two doll stands and a diary are included with this Toys”R”Us exclusive.

This playset features Frankie working at the Pet Salon. The salon has a washing table, display cabinet & counter, stool, accessories, and a wolf pup. 
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has long silky brown hair with a streak of purple underneath. Her makeup includes purple eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists.
Her form-fitting dress is sleeveless, purple, and features a green & purple paw print pattern on the front. Around her neck is a gold necklace with a dog bone pendant. On her feet are purple pumps with spiked claw heels and furry trim.
Pet Salon
The washing table has a green coffin-shaped top with an embossed Skullette and spiderweb etchings. The legs are purple and connected by spider-like Skullettes. On top of the table is a silver claw foot bathtub with drips, a paw print emblem, and translucent blue bubbles along the rim.
The cabinet has pink shelves with spiderweb etched sides and a black counter with a spiderweb corner leg. On top of the shelves is a purple swirled frame topped with a coffin-shaped picture of a dog bone and paw prints. The cabinet backdrop is reversible and features supplies and pet toys. With the cabinet is a purple stool on a silver spiderweb etched pedestal.
Accessories that can be stored in the cabinet begin with a pink pet bowl and a white bone. There is also a purple bag in the shape of a paw print, a purple pet brush, a blue milk carton, and a translucent blue shampoo bottle.
Last, but not least, is an adorable purple & lavender wolf pup that fits perfectly into the bathtub. Accessories for the pup include a pink towel, a green bandana, and a golden leash.

Cleo has long black hair with gold highlights and blunt bangs. Her makeup features light blue eyeshadow and plum lipstick.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress that is turquoise blue with a gold cross strap, gold trim, and decorative gold strips. It features a lavender print with lines and zigzags accentuated by black dots and Egyptian cats. She accessorizes with a wide gold bracelet and gold platform pumps with Anubis heels.
Cleo’s pet is an adorable kitten with black stripes, big blue eyes, and cute little fangs. The kitten wears an elaborate gold collar and comes with a golden milk dish.

Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, reddish pink lipstick, light pink blush, and a light blue heart on her left cheek.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress that has a pink top adorned with magenta hearts. Separating the top from the ruffled skirt is a pink strip with a bow. The wine colored skirt is decorated with a pink heart and spiderweb print. Light blue accessories consist of a beaded bracelet and drippy wedges with wavy edges and straps.
Draculaura’s pet is a sweet pink poodle with blue eyes, a purple face, and purple wings. She has a light blue collar and two purple winged heart barrettes. To carry the fluffy pooch there is a quilted pink carrier with winged heart accents.

Frankie has long swept back hair that is streaked black and white. Her makeup features light blue eyeshadow and red lipstick.
She is wearing a sleeveless blue plaid dress. It has black straps, red lines, yellow lightning bolts, and white button designs. On her feet are red pumps with stacked heels and button accents.
Frankie’s pet is a patchwork teddy bear that is stitched together with different shades of blue. He has a red nose & tongue, silver head bolts, a stitched lightning bolt on his chest, and stuffing leaking out. Frankie carries a light blue spool-shaped bag with a silver medical symbol in case her bear needs emergency repairs.

Lagoona has long wavy yellow hair with a streak of turquoise. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow, coral pink lipstick, and soft pink blush.
She is wearing a lovely sleeveless dress with a coral pink hem and trim. It has a wavy turquoise print with pink flowers, spiral seashells, and sea turtle shadows that are pink or blue. Coral pink accessories include a seashell bracelet and strappy fish scale wedges.
Lagoona’s pet is a remarkably cute sea turtle. She is pink with a turquoise shell and has a coral pink bow on her head. For a toy, the turtle has a small turquoise ball.

Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with streaks of purple. Her light brown complexion is complemented by lavender eyeshadow and purple lipstick.
She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress with a dark purple back, a section of black bodice, and a patchwork zipper print. The print has purple and lavender patches decorated with skullettes, crossbones, paw prints, and crescent moons.
Lime green accessories consist of a double buckle wrist cuff and a double buckle belt with two rows of pyramid studs. On her feet are tall strappy purple wedges with seven buckled straps. Clawdeen does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Cleo has straight black hair with blunt bangs and a blue under layer. Portions of her skin has a mummy-like appearance and her makeup includes blue eyeshadow, plum lipstick, and a light blue gem mark on her right cheek.
She is wearing a halterneck dress with a blue back, black chest, and a gold neckline strap. The front of the dress is blue decorated with turquoise bandage-like lines, yellow designs, mummy skullettes, gems, and black hieroglyphics.
Golden accessories consist of draped pyramid earrings, a banded wrist cuff, and ornate Egyptian sandals. Cleo does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Draculaura has long straight black hair with blunt bangs and pink streaks. Her skin is pale pink with soft pink eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a pink heart on her left cheek.
She is wearing a one-shoulder dress with a wide pink waist, pink back, and a black front with a skullette & heart print. The print features vampire skullettes accompanied by big pink polka dot hearts, drippy pink heart outlines, small white hearts, and bat-wing hearts that are green or blue.
Pink accessories include a bat-wing heart headband, bracelet, and pumps with bat-wing heart ankle straps. Draculaura does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Frankie has black & white streaked hair with a stripe of blue that is pulled into a high ponytail. She has pale bluish skin, blue eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a gray stitched scar on her right cheek.
Her sleeveless dress has a black back, a thin black waist, and one black shoulder. The front features a print of blue, white, and gray stitched patches embellished with skullettes, hex nuts, and blue or yellow lightning bolts.
She accessorizes with one blue and one yellow hex nut lightning bolt earring, a yellow bracelet, and yellow booties with lightning bolt heels. Frankie does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Ari can’t wait for her first day of school. She has long pink, purple, and lavender hair that is held back with braids. Complementing her translucent skin is pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, and purple lipstick.
She is wearing a beautiful dress with a black & blue piano key ruffle around the neck. The body is lavender with a print of silver chains and magenta diamonds surrounded by lined sheet music. The hem is purple with a black tulle ruffle.
Accessories consist of a translucent pink bracelet and a silver belt with music notes and hanging chains. On her feet are translucent pink boots with chains on the toes and tassels on the sides. Her translucent pink bag has a chain handle, chain accents, and a long fringe.
Ari does not come with a brush or doll stand.
How do I boo? I rock! I use music to inspire monsters to be themselves! And if it makes them want to dance too, even better!

Personal Style: Boohemian Rocker. When I'm belting out pop ballads under hot stage frights, I like to wear cool, gauzy fabrics that float around me, while still looking shriek and modern.

Monster Quirk: I can turn solid, but not for long. When I try to blend in with normies, there's always a ghost of a chance that I'll spook out and be discovered.

There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

For her first day of school, Draculaura has straight black hair with pink streaks. It is pulled back into pigtails and has blunt bangs. She has subtle pink eyeshadow, red lipstick, and a red heart on her left cheek.
Her adorable dress features a pink & black polka dot bodice with batty accents and short white sleeves. Around the waist is a black peplum with a reverse scalloped hem. The pink skirt has a black net print decorated with a pattern of blue hearts and black bows.
Her first accessory is a pair of blue heart earrings; each with a single wing. Around her neck is a blue and black molded cravat and on her feet are hot pink booties with blue laces and bat wing heels. Her pink knobby handbag is shaped like a bat wing bow.
Draculaura does not come with a brush or doll stand.
How do I boo? I soar! I can fly, so I have a bat's eye view of everything. I think that's why I always see the good in the world.

Personal Style: I love to contrast edgy black with cheerful pink. My taste in fashion is sweet... with just a little bite.

Monster Quirk: I can't seem my reflection in a mirror, so I always risk looking a little batty. But thanks to centuries of practice, I'm scary-good at applying lip gloss.

There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

Frankie looks fantastic for her first day of school. She has black and white streaked hair with bangs that are pulled back. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, light pink blush, and red lipstick.
She is wearing a white collared shirt with pinstripe stitches under a blue vest with a yellow “F”. Her black & blue argyle skirt has white stitched lines and yellow lightning bolt accents.
She accessorizes with yellow nut & bolt earrings and a black lightning bolt necktie. Around her waist is a silver triple-wrap belt with a hanging chain and screw head buckle. On her feet are stitched black shoes with yellow laces and nut & bolt heels. Her stitched yellow purse is decorated with lightning, hex nuts, and Skullettes.
Frankie  does not come with a brush or doll stand.
How do I Boo? I try! I mean I try everything! I like to explore and experience and live everything the world has to offer.

Personal Style: Now that I have a school where I belong, I love my outfits to be a little preppy... and a lot stylish. I think electric blue plaids are especially voltageous!

Monster Quirk: Sometimes my stitches come loose and it's like my limbs have a brain of their own. When I offer you a hand, don't be shocked if I mean it literally.

There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights and pale pink skin. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow, red fanged lips, and a red heart on her left cheek.
She is wearing a molded black tank top sporting a pink skullette. Her pink skirt has a light blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. On her feet are pink high tops with bat wing accents.
Draculaura does not include a doll stand or brush. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation.
How do I boo? I soar! I can fly, so I have a bat's eye view of everything. I think that's why I always see the good in the world.

Personal Style: I love to contrast edgy black with cheerful pink. My taste in fashion is sweet... with just a little bite.

Monster Quirk: I can't seem my reflection in a mirror, so I always risk looking a little batty. But thanks to centuries of practice, I'm scary-good at applying lip gloss.

Draculaura’s hair is long and black with pink highlights. She has pale pink skin, pink eyeshadow, red lips, fangs, and a red heart on her left cheek.
Her cheerleading outfit has a molded black tank top decorated with a pink skullette. The pink skirt has a light blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. Her molded high tops are pink with bat wing accents.
Draculaura comes with a black & pink pennant with the Monster High crest and a black & white cheer hand. The hand features pink fingernails, the Monster High logo on the palm, and “#1” on the pointing index finger. A doll stand or brush is not included. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation.

Frankie has long black & white streaked hair and pale green skin. Her makeup consists of pink eyeshadow, light pink blush, and dark pink lipstick. On her right cheek is a stitched scar.
She is wearing a molded cerise tank top with a blue outline of the Monster High crest. Her black skirt has a blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. On her feet are molded blue high tops with jagged heels and embossed lightning bolts.
Frankie does not include a doll stand or brush. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation.
How do I Boo? I try! I mean I try everything! I like to explore and experience and live everything the world has to offer.

Personal Style: Now that I have a school where I belong, I love my outfits to be a little preppy... and a lot stylish. I think electric blue plaids are especially voltageous!

Monster Quirk: Sometimes my stitches come loose and it's like my limbs have a brain of their own. When I offer you a hand, don't be shocked if I mean it literally.

Frankie’s straight hair is streaked black and white. She has pale green skin, pink eyeshadow, pink blush, and dark pink lipstick.
Her cheerleading outfit features a molded cerise tank top with a blue outline of the Monster High crest. The black skirt has a blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. Her molded blue high tops have jagged heels and embossed lightning bolts.
Frankie comes with a blue skullette-shaped megaphone and a black & pink pennant with the Monster High crest. A doll stand or brush is not included. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation.

Djinni has purple and teal streaked long and wavy hair. She is wearing a glitter gold eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and has sun & moon marking on one side of her face. Her skin is lavender with magenta tattoos on her neck and arms and smoky designs on her legs.
Her first outfit, which she is wearings, is a black with gold sparkle dress. The tulle shoulder ruffles extend to the waist; one is lavender and the  other is magenta. 
She accessorizes with jagged lavender earrings, a gold statement necklace, a gold spiked belt, and two magenta bracelets. Her lavender purse features a scorpion emblem and on her feet are pink gravity shoes with pointy toes.
The second outfit features a light blue tank top with a wide gold flap collar. Complementing the futuristic top are glittery yellow leggings.
The next item is a high-necked dress with a purple and gold scorpion print bodice. The bodice has open sides with a v-hem that attaches to a pink skirt.
The final outfit has a sleeveless top that is shimmery black on top and purple on the bottom. The black skirt is adorned with a jagged purple tear print with yellow outlines.
Completing the wardrobe are two black bracelets and strappy knee high sandals with scorpion tail accents down the backs.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black and white. Her makeup features red lipstick and pink eyeshadow. On her head is a blue bike helmet adorned with studs, bolts, hex nuts, and raised lightning bolt designs.
She is wearing an adorable black romper covered with a pattern of blue and yellow lightning bolts. It has two sets of shoulder straps: two blue and two narrower black straps. On her feet are black sneakers with lightning and hex bolt accents.
Bicycle
Frankie rides a stylish blue cruiser with fenders, a yellow chain guard, a silver kickstand, and a black seat with a clear waist support. Decorating one side of the top tube is a black sticker with stitches, yellow lightning bolts, a blue stitched heart, and a skullette. The silver lightning bolt handlebars are held by a stem in the shape of a hand. The wheels have black tires and silver rims with lightning bolt spokes.
Frankie is a budget doll that lacks articulation at the wrists.
One of the ways Frankie likes to boo is to just get on her bike and see where it takes her. She can ride lightning fast when she wants to, but sometimes she likes to just cruise around the park, enjoying the fresh air and waving hello to other monsters. She says riding a bicycle feels so natural to her, it's almost like her father built her with pedals attached to her feet!

The Deluxe High School is an updated version of the Deadluxe High School. Most of the changes are color variations. It still has three stories, eight rooms, doll clips, and multiple accessories. When completely opened, it is five feet wide and four feet tall.
Outside
The outside of the school is purple, lavender, and violet with lots of wrought iron designs and bricks overgrown with ivy. Leading to the tall entrance doors are lavender steps and pillars guarded by gargoyles.
First Floor
On the first floor is the event area, library, and Creepateria. The event area and entrance way has blue stairs on each side, lavender pillars, and purple and magenta coffin lockers. It is furnished with a tall Skullette table with and a clawfoot couch that is black with a tufted pink seat.
The library is small and decorated with images of ornate shelves full of books. The outer wall is a secret door that rotates to the outside.
The Creepateria has a lavender pillar and big coffin-shaped windows. It is furnished with a green lunch counter and a pink picnic table with a swirled silver frame.
Second Floor
The second floor has the bathroom, radio station, vampire lounge, and classroom. The bathroom is at the top of the stairs and has a sink and mirror.
The second staircase leads to the radio station. It has a pink DJ table adorned with a blue Monster High crest. On the table is a laptop and microphone.
Everything is upside down in the vampire lounge. There is even an upside down black and pink throne that can seat a doll.
The classroom is decorated with purple bookshelves and has a hanging chalkboard. It is furnished with pink pedestal chairs and a pink and silver school desk.
Third Floor
At the top is a clock tower with purple bricks and a green clock. It folds open to create an office with an ornate black desk.

Case
The locking case has a handle on top and one side features the Draculaura doll with a fanged heart, “Cool Ghouls”, and “Monster High” with a Skullette. The other side has an image of a Frankie doll with “Fully Charged”, an “Ughh-Mazing!” pennant, a “Monsters” megaphone, and “Monster High” with a Skullette. The other side has a
Inside the case, there is storage for dolls, makeup, and accessories. The right side also has an image of Draculaura and a mirror with working lights.
Makeup & Accessories
There are three makeup palettes. The first has four colors of lip gloss and a small applicator brush. Next is a four color blush palette and brush. The last one has twelve shimmer cremes shaped into lightning bolts and Skullettes.
For hair, there is a red hair extension and two hair ties with Skullette buttons. One button is pink and the other is blue.
Nail supplies begin with two polishes. One is shimmery blue and the other is a shimmery purple. To help paint your nails, black and pink Skullette toe separators are included. For additional flair, there are a variety of Monster High themed nail stickers.
The final accessory is a ring with a large pink gem.
Draculaura
Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights, blunt bangs, and pig tails. She has light pink skin, purple eyes, fanged red lips, and a pink heart on her cheek.
Her outfit features a pink top with black polka dots and short ruffled white sleeves. The pink skirt has a black peplum and a diamond trellis print embellished with black bows and blue hearts.
She accessorizes with blue winged heart earrings and a black and blue ascot necklace. On her feet are pink booties with blue laces and bat wing heels. Her knobby pink handbag is shaped like a bat wing bow.
There is a similar case with Frankie Stein. Both were Costco exclusives.

Case
The locking case has a handle on top and one side features an image of the Frankie doll with “Fully Charged”, an “Ughh-Mazing!” pennant, a “Monsters” megaphone, and “Monster High” with a Skullette. The other side has a Draculaura doll with a fanged heart, “Cool Ghouls”, and “Monster High” with a Skullette.
Inside the case, there is storage for dolls, makeup, and accessories. The right side also has an image of Frankie and a mirror with working lights.
Makeup & Accessories
Makeup begins with three palettes. The first has lip gloss with with four colors and a small applicator brush. Next is a four color blush palette and brush. The last one has twelve shimmer cremes shaped into lightning bolts and Skullettes.
For hair, there is a white hair extension and two hair ties with Skullette buttons. One button is pink and the other is blue.
Nail supplies begin with two polishes. One is glittery yellow and the other is a shimmery green. To help paint your nails, black and blue lightning bolt toe separators are included. For additional flair, there are a variety of Monster High themed nail stickers.
The final accessory is a ring with a large blue gem.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black and white. She has pale bluish skin, one green and one blue eye, pink eyeshadow, red lips, and stitches on her cheek.
Her top is mostly blue with a yellow “F” on the chest. The upper half looks like a collared white shirt with pinstripe stitches. Her argyle skirt is black and blue with stitched lines and yellow lightning bolt accents.
Accessories consist of yellow dangle earrings and a black lightning bolt tie necklace. At her waist is a double belt with stitches, grommets, and dangling chains. 
On her feet are black platform wedges with stitches, yellow laces, and screws in the heels. Her large yellow bag is decorated with hex nuts, lightning bolts, and stitches. 
There is a similar case with Draculaura. Both were Costco exclusives.

The Fright Roast Coffee playset features a cafe counter, two stools, and lots of delicious accessories.
The purple cafe counter is trimmed with studs and has dripping edges. It sits upon a pink cart decorated with dripping zigzag cutouts. On the front is a menu blackboard framed in blue and embellished with Skullettes.
A blue canopy with studs, cutouts, and a webbed “Cafe” sign covers the counter. It is held aloft by four bony black poles.
The three-legged stools have black curled bases held by a spiderweb support. The seats are light turquoise with dripping edges and small backrests.
Cafe accessories begin with two cups filled with a Skullette-topped brew. They can be placed on the silver espresso machine etched with spiderwebs and drippy goo. For ghouls on the run, there is a blue travel cup and a brown to-go box.
Snacks include a pink batty cupcake and a sprinkled donut that are displayed on a spinning stand. The turquoise stand has spiderweb designs and is topped by a winged Skullette.

Frankie has black & white streaked hair that is pulled into a high ponytail. She is wearing khaki coveralls with orange lightning bolt stripes and a name tag with “Stein” on the chest. On the right shoulder is a Ghostbusters logo patch. The legs have real cargo pockets and a sheer yellow cloth is tied around her left leg.
She accessorizes with yellow lightning glasses, blue lightning hoop earrings, and a silver dog tag. Around her waist are two belts. The first is silver with a lightning bolt buckle and the second one is a blue utility belt with a Skullette carabiner. She wears black wrist cuffs and black molded fingerless gloves. On her feet are high black boots with orange lightning down the fronts, zippers on the sides, and jagged lightning platforms.
Ghostbusting accessories feature an iconic black proton pack with a translucent yellow cable that connects to the gun. The proton pack opens and can store the translucent green slimer figure. Frankie’s last item is a black clip-on walkie-talkie.
Who Ya Gonna Call?
Frankie Stein!

It's not every day that there are ghosts at Monster High! Oh, wait, yes it is. But, paranormally, there aren't trespassing ghosts who zip around the howlways and classrooms leaving a trail of... ewww... slime!

Clawdeen found the little green slimer in her locker next to her ruined shoes. Then Ghoulia spied him wreaking havoc on the computer lab. Drac tried to catch him, but have you ever tried to fly when you've got slime on your wings? And Cleo - let's just say she took one look at the mess and felt royally ill.

So supernaturally, they called Frankie! She's a ghoul who doesn't mind lending a hand - sometimes literally - and a little ectoplasm dripping off her stitches isn't going to spoil her school spirit.

Frankie got to work! She strapped on a proton pack and fired neutralizing particles like a pro... until it was hard to tell who caused more mayhem - Frankie or Slimer.

Frankie chased down the howl, past the clawditorium and into the creepateria...

Every monster who had lunch that period was treated to a spooktacular show! Slimer bounced from tray to tray, gobbling down tater tots, chomping pizza slices, tossing Shriek salads, and wow, can he guzzle milk! All the while, Frankie was hot on his oozy tail, doing flips, somersaults, even the occasional pirouette!

But then Frankie had a voltageous idea! "Hey Slimer," she called out to the happily munching ghost, "why don't you join us? Grab a bite and fang out!" Slimer stopped. No one had ever asked him to eat with them before! So Slimer joined the ghouls and had a grave time! And he ate every last bite... off everyone else's trays. But the ghouls didn't mind - he's really kind of cute once you get to know him... after he stops sliming you.

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair with purple streaks. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow and burgundy lipstick. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists.
Her sleeveless dress has a wide green strip over one shoulder and the neckline. Attached to the strip and over the other shoulder are two thin purple straps. The black dress is decorated with a purple, green, and lavender pattern of paw prints and splatter marks. Around her waist is a wide gold belt with a row of spikes and a crescent moon. On her feet are unzipped purple booties with crescent moon accents.
Locker
The pink coffin-shaped locker is kept secure with a gold Skullette padlock. Inside the locker, on the door, is a coffin-shaped mirror outlined with intricate designs. The back of the locker has a black calender that displays the phases of the moon. Hanging from the top is a green chandelier with dangling crescent moons. The bottom of the locker has a purple storage compartment embossed with designs and a crescent moon.
School supplies can be stored on the shelves of the locker. Included with the playset is a green binder and a green Skullette & crescent moon notebook. There is also an extra pair of shoes for Clawdeen. The gold peep-toe wedges have spikes alond the sides, front, and up the back of the heels.
How Do I Boo? I create! I love designing fashion, hairstyles and makeup. For me, it's an expression of how I feel on the inside.

Personal Style: I'm a fierce fashionista and was born to design. I love to sink my claws into the latest trends and put my own spin on them... for my outfits as well as my ghoulfriends'.

Monster Quirk: My hair grows furrrociously fast so I can change up my look whenever the mood strikes... which is typically several times each lunar cycle.

Clawdeen loves school. She gets to learn new things and fang out with friends, all while showing off her latest fashion designs. Of course her locker has to be as clawesome as she is! It's her home-closet away from home, where she can stash clothes and accessories with her books. It even has a hidden compartment.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura & Frankie Stein
dolls.description:
Frankie, Drac, Cleo, and Clawdeen are wearing ice cream themed outfits and snacking on delicious ice cream treats. The ghouls are budget dolls and lack articulation at the elbows and wrists.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long black & white striped hair pulled into a high ponytail. She is wearing blue eyeshadow and pink lipstick. Her cute sleeveless dress features a bodice with a black & white geometric print. The blue splattered skirt is decorated with colorful candy dots and eyeballs. 
Around her neck is a yellow ice cream cone pendant and on her feet are dripping blue booties. Her red hexagon purse has a chain shoulder strap and crystal designs. She is eating a cone with blue ice cream.
Draculaura
Draculaura has black hair with pink stripes that is worn in a high ponytail. She is wearing soft pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick. Her pink strapless dress is adorned with blue and white dots, red ice cream cones, and fanged treats. 
Around her neck is a stiff yellow ruff with a waffle pattern and on her feet are pink lace-up booties with waffle accents. She has a lip-shaped handbag with fangs and dangles. Her waffle cone is topped with pink ice cream.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has black & teal streaked hair styled into a bob cut with blunt bangs. She wears sparkly eyeshadow and red lipstick. Her yummy white off-the-shoulder top is decorated with colorful candy sprinkles, dripping yellow toppings, and monstrous treats. Complementing the top is a turquoise skirt with a waffle print. 
On her head is a gold waffle etched headband and on her feet are drippy yellow pumps with ankle straps and ice scream scoop heels. Her golden purse is adorned with rows of dangling beads and a large scarab emblem. She is snacking on a cone with purple ice cream. 
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with purple highlights. She wears lavender eyeshadow and purple lipstick. Her dress has a cropped lime green bodice with a drippy print and a purple skirt. The skirt has a pattern of wavy lavender lines and ice cream bars with double claw sticks. 
On her feet are drippy green pumps with ice cream bar heels. She carries a purple crescent moon purse that features lots of studs and dangling beads with crescent moons. Her chilly treat is a drippy green ice cream bar with double claw sticks.

Draculaura has extra long straight black hair with thin streaks of pink. She has a pale pink complexion, dark eyeshadow, dark red lips, and a dark red heart on her cheek.
Her sleeveless dress has pink and light blue stripes embellished with a black bat print. The skirt has a black waist and two tiers trimmed with a black tulle hem.
On her feet are light bluee knee-high socks and black booties. The booties have pink laces and drippy wedge heels.
Thirty hair accessories accompany Draculaura. There are clips, combs and hair ties that are black, blue, or pink. She also has three hair extensions; one pink, one light pink, and one light blue. 
There are hair pieces with flowers, bats, hearts, webs, and wings. They can be combined with other hair accessories to create elaborate hairdos.
Draculaura lacks articulation in her elbows and wrists.

Robecca Steam
Robecca has blue and black streaked hair that is long and wavy. Her eyes have gear-shaped irises and her metallic copper skin is complemented by a silvery eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, and red lipstick.
She is wearing a shimmery blue dress decorated by a gear & screw motif. It has puffy sleeves, purple trim, and a tulip skirt with a purple ruffled hem.
Accessories begin with dangling copper gear earrings and a blue top hat adorned with copper gears and sprockets. On one wrist is a purple steampunk cuff and around her waist is an elaborate copper belt with lots of gears and mechanical parts. Robecca’s shoes are riveted blue pumps with ankle straps and dangling sprocket accents.
Hexiciah Steam
Hexiciah has black hair with parted bangs, sideburns, and a big handlebar mustache. He has strong angular features and his right eye has a gear-like iris. Copper mechanical gears and pistons make up his left forearm and hand.
He is wearing a white collared shirt with rolled up sleeves, a purple ascot tie, and a shimmery blue pinstripe vest with buttons up the front. Around his waist is a brown tool belt with a pouch that can hold his hammer, screwdriver, and socket wrench. His red breeches are accompanied by a one-piece stocking and shoe combo. The knee high stockings are white with gray accents and the black shoes are decorated with copper gear straps.
Bless my boilers but I have has quite the monumental day! I suppose it being my first day adds to the excitement of it all. I hardly know where to begin in describing the feeling of...existence. The feeling of steam flowing through my "veins," gears turning, pistons pumping, my father extending his hand to help me take my first steps; almost beyond comprehension. I am alive and the sensation is wonderful!

Father leads me to a mirror and I see myself for the first time. I am fearfully and wonderfully made with polished skin and exquisitely placed rivets holding everything together. Then he gives me a pair of the most remarkable boots with rocket jets in the soles. They fit me perfectly. Father leads me out of his workshop and into my first encounter with sun and sky. The colors, the sights, the sounds of the world around me cause a curious sensation inside that bursts forth in a joyous inarticulate noise that Father calls laughter.

I leap into the air; my rockets fire and I rise like a spirit unchained, higher and higher until laughter again bursts forth like the rays of the sun.

I AM ALIVE!

Skelita has long black and teal hair that is pulled into pigtails. On the top of her head is a pink, yellow, and green headdress made up of skulls and flowers. Holding her pigtails are hair clips that match the headdress. Her skeletal features are accentuated by light blue eyeshadow, pink lipstick with stitch accents, and flowery sugar skull makeup.
She is wearing an amazing dress that has a sleeveless black bodice decorated with colorful flower outlines, a pink neckline, and a blue crochet ruffle trim. The shiny black skirt features a dense pattern of pink, purple, and blue flowers with green leafy accents. Under the skirt is a sheer white petticoat with an embroidered lace hem made up of sugar skulls and heart designs. 
On her feet are decorative pink wedges. They are covered with woven straps and have yellow emblems with “MH” and festive skulls. Skelita comes with her diary and an ornate black stand adorned with Skullettes, flowers, and a sugar skull on the base.
I scream to dance among the humans...

Every autumn, when there is a bite in the air, the undead are invited by their living familia to cross over to the human world for a monstrous reunion. This spooktacular celebration is Dia de los Muertos - the Day of the Dead - and it is my favorite howliday - filled with bootiful costumes, to-die-for feasts, and, of course, dancing!

Ever since I was a bebé, I have attended the reunion with Abuelita - my grandmother - but this year she is unable to make the journey. I am un poco worried that without her, I will not receive my own welcome. But being a hopeful monster, I will dress up, put marigolds in my hair, and wait for my candlelit invitation to appear and guide me to the human world...

The playset includes Frankie in her Science Class with a school desk, whiteboard, a lab frame & cabinet, and a lab bench with experiments.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has black & white streaked hair that is straight with choppy ends. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists.
Her outfit is a white dress decorated to look like a lab coat. It is printed with a yellow “F” , a shirt & tie image at the neckline, a seam with silver Skullette buttons, blue splatter, and a magnifying glass in a pocket with an atomic symbol. To protect her eyes she has studded blue safety goggles. On her feet are blue studded wedges with lightning bolt cutouts and lightning bolt embossed heels.
Science Class
The school desk has blue claw legs, a black spiderweb seat, and a drippy back with zigzags and Skullettes. The blue desktop is etched with a pencil, paper, and spiderwebs.
Next is the whiteboard which has a dark blue frame with a Skullette accent and a black studded stand. To write on the whiteboard get the blue Skullette marker wet. An extra beaker is included to dip the marker.
The lab frame has black pillars with lightning bolt designs, Skullette toppers, and spiderweb accents. One pillar has a pink shelf with a back image of beakers, test tubes, plants, and spiderwebs. The pink top of the frame is decorated with scientific images and symbols and a blue clock in the center. The clock has a green face with an angular swirl, pink Skullette hands, and “13” at the top. 
The lab bench has a blue claw-legged frame with a shelf, wrought iron spiderwebs, and a Skullette emblem. The black top has the Monster High logo and a dropper holder. The clear dropper has a pink bulb with a Skullette.
On top of the bench is a pink & blue Skullette funnel with a chartreuse goo base and two removable beakers; one with bubbles and the other with a green critter. Cold water can be poured down the funnel and into a beaker to change the color of the critter or bubbles.
Additionally, there is a three-eyed frog inside a container with a green bubbly goo top. The container’s black base has a pink button that when pressed makes the frog hop. There is also a pink plant in a light green pot. When water is added the plant rises.

Lagoona has lovely blonde hair with turquoise highlights. It is long and wavy and pulled into a side ponytail. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists.
Her outfit is a sleeveless black romper with a turquoise scale print on the front. Around her waist is a pink twisted rope with a seahorse accent. On her feet are coral pink wedges with double straps, seashells on the fronts, and spiral seashells etched on the heels. Safety equipment includes turquoise seashell elbow and knee pads and a pink helmet. The helmet is decorated with a Skullette on the front, wave designs, and a dorsal fin.
Scooter/Surf Board
The surf board is pink with a Skullette emblem, bubbles, and a turquoise outline. At the back is a turquoise fin and a cutout bite mark. 
To convert the board into a scooter there are three turquoise tentacle wheels with silver Skullette brackets that clip to the bottom. The handlebars are pink tentacles with a white starfish attached to a silver retractable stem that clips to the top of the board.
Lastly, Lagoona has a pink coral backback. It is oversized and designed to store all the pieces of the scooter when it is used as a surf board.
How Do I Boo? I float! I'm very chill in and out of the water. I try not to sweat things, but when I do I just swim it off.

Personal Style: I keep it casual, from sporty cute to surfer chic, so I'm always up for whatever's going on that sounds fun.

Monster Quirk: When I'm out of water too long, I develop frightfully dry skin. I slather on so much skin cream, sometimes I'm as slippery as an eel-monster.

Lagoona is always a ghoul on the go... whether shes hanging 10 on her trusty surfboard, or zipping around on her speedy scooter. So leave it to Lagoona to sport a 2-in-1 combo: Her surfboard transforms into a scooter, and the extra parts are stored in her shell-shaped backpack.

Frankie has long thick hair that is mostly black with a section of white on the right and a yellow streak in the front. Two yellow plugs attach to her hair and connect to her hair extensions. One extension is pink and the other is blue. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick.
She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress that features a tartan pattern. The blue, turquoise, and white pattern features black hex nuts interconnected with blue stitched lines. On her feet are blue lace-up booties with striped platforms, stitch accents, and a row of hex nuts up each heel.
Accessories consist of a silver brush, a silver electronic hair tool, and 6 light-activated stencils: 3 blue and 3 yellow. The hair tool has a UV light that activates when the tool is closed. The stencils slide into the hair tool which can be used to create designs in Frankie’s hair and extensions.
Frankie lacks articulation at her elbows and wrists. A doll stand is not included.

Zomby Gaga has long wavy hair that is pink with soft purple highlights and tied into a high ponytail. Her undead complexion is complemented by sparkly purple and silver eyeshadow. Veiny lines extend down from her hairline, her nose is colored black, and her pink lips are striped and extended with stitches. A bony tattoo decorates her neck and on her hands are bones, spiderwebs, and “Lady Gaga” spelled out on her fingers.
She is wearing a black tuxedo with a white collared shirt and black bow tie. The jacket has flared sleeves and the pants have bell bottoms. On her feet are black lace-up booties with high platforms and stiletto heels. She accessorizes with black sunglasses and a bubblegum bubble.
Zomby Gaga’s second outfit is much more casual. The sleeveless flannel shirt dress is red and black plaid embellished with “Born This Way” and irregular double white lines. Underneath the dress are black fishnet tights.
The doll is inspired by Zombie Boy (Rick Genest) and the ensemble worn by Lady Gaga in the Born This Way music video.
Lady Gaga is Zomby Gaga!

Age: Like my love, my age is infinite.

Killer Style: I believe in staying true to myself! What I wear is an expression of my thoughts, loves, hopes and dreams. My fashion changes from day to day, just like my mood and tastes!

Monster Quirk: Even when I feel sad and alone I can't hide who I truly am and I wouldn't have it any other way, because - like the real you - the real me is brave, strong, and BORN THIS WAY.

Favorite Activity: I want to inspire every monster to join me in a worldwide kindness movement! Let's all spread love, bravery and acceptance.

Inspired by the artistry of Zombie Boy!

Ari has long wavy purple hair with highlights. She has pale and translucent skin, pink and magenta eyeshadow, and purple lips.
She is wearing a sleeveless lavender dress with light purple trim. The front features a keyboard neckline and a sheet music and chain print. The bottom of the dress has a white stripe with pink music notes above a violet keyboard.
Accessories begin with a keyboard-brimmed purple hat with chain accents. On her wrists are wide bracelets with chains; one is lavender an the other is magenta. Her tall boots are translucent pink and embellished with chains, piano keys, and treble clef heels.
She plays a pink piano on a silver chain stand with a purple chain stool. The piano has chain accents, a purple microphone, and magenta sheet music on a black Skullette stand. The piano can be transformed into a keytar.
Ari lacks articulation at her elbows and wrists.
Ari has monster skills on the piano, but when she really wants to impress, she converts it into a keytar and jams!

Personal Monstra: I rock! I use my music to inspire monsters to be themselves! And if it makes them want to dance too, even better!

Killer Style: Boohemian Rocker. When I'm belting out pop ballads under hot stage frights, I like to wear cool, gauzy fabrics that float around me, while still looking shriek and modern.

Monster Quirk: I can turn solid, but not for long. When I try to blend in with normies, there's always a ghost of a chance that I'll spook-out and be discovered.

Cleo has straight black hair with a turquoise under layer and gold streaks in her bangs. Her tan complexion is complemented by gold and turquoise eyeshadow, dark turquoise lips, and a gem on her cheek.
She is wearing a sleeveless blue dress with a coral pink choker and a colorful print. The print features snake swirls and gold treble clef lines. The long sheer overskirt is gold with turquoise music notes and a serrated hem.
Golden accessories consist of a crowned cobra headband, snake earrings, and an elaborate chest piece. A coral pink snake wraps around her wrist and on her feet are golden platform pumps with striations and snake straps.
Her musical instrument is a bronze harp decorated with snakes, sarcophagi, and gems. A turquoise snake wraps around the pillar and the top of the harp is a removable comb.
Cleo lacks articulation at her elbows and wrists.

This 2-pack features Amanita and Nefera hanging out at the Scream & Sugar cafe.
Amanita Nightshade
Amanita has long bluish purple hair that is magenta streaked and pulled to the back. Her light green skin is complemented by swirled magenta eyeshadow, green eyeliner, green lipstick, and leafy vine accents around her eyes.
She is wearing a wonderful satin dress with blue and magenta diagonal stripes decorated with a black leaf print. The neckline is black lace and hanging below the wide scalloped hem is a black lace underskirt.
Accessories consist of a light purple corpse flower headband, black spoon and fork earrings, a light green bracelet, and molded black elbow-length gloves. On her feet are black cupcake-like pumps with vine accents.
Nefera de Nile
Nefera has long straight teal hair with blunt bangs and streaks of purple. She wears teal eyeshadow, purple lipstick, and a diamond on her left cheek.
Her outfit begins with a glittery gold sheer tunic with black trim and a black belt with a scarab buckle. Under the tunic is a tube top that matches her high-waist leggings. The top and leggings have brown, turquoise, and purple wavy lines covered with a hieroglyphic print.
She accessorizes with a large gold Egyptian choker and a gold wrist cuff. On her feet are golden pumps with brick etchings and fan designs.
Food related extras include two goblets and two desserts. The gold goblets have two-headed monsters writhing out of the tops; one is light purple and the other is light green. The first dessert is a toothy black cake with eyes sitting upon a gold plate. The last item is a blue pie in a purple tentacle pan with gold tentacles rising out of the top. 
The 2-pack does not come with doll stands or brushes.

The playset features Cleo de Nile at the Scream & Sugar Cafe. The cafe has a food case and menu board; a table and chairs; a candelabra, and lots of ghoulish treats.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has long straight black hair with streaks of gold. Her eyeshadow is gold and her lips are dark pink. On her right cheek is a turquoise gem-like mark.
She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress that is blue with a print of reddish pink triangles outlined by interconnected black lines. The waist has a metallic gold ribbon and the hem is a frilly black mesh. Golden accessorizes consist of chandelier earrings, a snake necklace, and studded peep toe pumps with snake accents.
Scream & Sugar Cafe
The blue food case has three shelves with spiderweb etchings at the top. Behind the case is a black wrought iron wall with a menu board surrounded by two blue ornate skullette wall reliefs. The menu board has a scrolled magenta frame with a large skullette at the peak. The black menu has images of skulletttes, food, and illegible writing.
The wrought iron table has a black spiderweb cutout tabletop with batty designs, purple spiderweb legs, and a wavy purple umbrella stand with swirls. The drippy magenta umbrella has embossed spiderwebs and hanging chartreuse skullettes along the edges. Two purple wrought iron chairs accompany the table. They have skull seats, swirled legs, and spiderweb designs with skullette and batwing accents.
The blue candelabra has a wavy stand of stacked orbs sitting upon a wrought iron cutout pedestal with curled tips. Five candles sit at the top with strands of dripping wax.
Foods, drinks, and accessories begin with a gooey green tiered tray full of pink cupcakes and a light green monstrous pie ala mode on a blue plate. Bubbly blue goo is in a golden bowl with black snake legs, peach colored biscuits are on a silver tray, a red spider cake is on a purple plate, and a mint green beverage is in a beaker. There are also two golden goblets, a golden ladle, a golden cup & straw, and two forks; one turquoise and one pink.

Gooliope has voluminous blue hair with streaks of yellow and purple. She has blue eyes with curly lashes, blue and yellow eyeshadow, and red lipstick.
Her dress has a white bodice with pink coral lines, wavy blue & yellow lines, and a ruffled black tulle collar. Separating the bodice from the skirt is a shimmery gold ribbon belt. The black skirt features a colorful print with sailor Skullettes, “blob” banners, bubbles, and other designs. The longer under layer has the same pattern as the bodice as well as a ruffled black tulle hem with gold glitter.
Golden accessories consist of a tugboat headband and hoop earrings. The earrings are large dripping life preservers held by Skullettes. On her feet are gold booties with dripping cuffs, red rope laces, rope details, jeweled platforms, and skull heels. Her gold anchor purse has a chain handle, a pirate Skullette, and seaweed accents.
Gooliope stands 17 inches tall and comes with an oversized black doll stand.

Dayna has long wavy blonde hair with gold tinsel highlights. Her golden skin is enhanced with light blue eyeshadow, shimmery eyeliner, and red lipstick.
She is wearing a strapless dress with a molded black bodice that features a sweetheart neckline and a gem encrusted front. Around her waist is a shiny gold belt with a Skullette buckle. The long black skirt is decorated with a metallic gold print of Skullettes, hearts, and gems. Beneath the skirt is a sheer black under layer.
The dress can be rotated and transformed into a new look. The alternate version has a shimmery gold neckline with black tulle trim, a shimmery gold waist, and a bodice with light blue and white diagonal stripes. The blue skirt has a treasure map print with octopuses, sailing ships, red “X” marks, dashed lines, and Skullette & crossbones shaped islands.
Accessories begin with a treasure chest headband. It is topped with a blue feather and opens to reveal gold coins. She also has blue swing earrings with green parrots. Painted black gloves cover her hands and on her feet are blue platform booties. The booties have wide cuffs, compass accents, and map etchings with a red “X”. The platform heels can be removed to expose stacks of gold coins.
Dayna does not include a brush or doll stand.
I've lived me whole life on the sea. It's me home and, truth be telled, it's me mate. The waves talk to me, and the stars in the sky be me guide. It's a life of adventure and there's treasure to be found! But today I spied treasure that isn't gold - a ship awash with friendly monsters!

Draculaura has black hair with pink streaks that is curled and pulled to the back. She has shimmery eyeshadow, pink lips, and her signature heart under her left eye.
Her nautical themed dress has a white top with short sleeves double striped with pink. The wide sailor collar is black and trimmed with pink. Decorating the pink and white striped skirt are stars, broken hearts, anchors, bats, and rope hearts. The skirt is trimmed with two ruffled tulle hems; one blue and one black.
Accessories start with a white headband sailor cap decorated with a pink heart & anchor emblem. The yellow earrings are rope hearts with bats and the matching necklace is a rope bow tie outline. Molded pink elbow length gloves with blue dots cover her hands. On her feet are sheer pink knee high socks with heart-shaped polka dots. Her golden rope shoes have high platforms and bat accents. The pink cutout tote bag has gold rope straps with heart-shaped handles.
Count Fabulous, her pet bat is included. He has a pink bow on his head and is wearing a white shirt with pink hearts, a pink scalloped collar, and a pink hem.
Shiver me tombers! The ghouls set sail after Draculaura finds a map featuring a big treasure-y X! But when the seas get choppy, it doesn't take long to discover that none of these wannabe-pirates have sea legs - not even Lagoona! And Rochelle is more anchor than sailor! It's only a matter of time before their adventurous vacation is all washed up!

Lagoona has long blonde hair with pink streaks that is pulled into pigtails. Her makeup consists of light purple eyeshadow and a light pink lipstick.
She is wearing a white & coral pink striped top with 3/4 sleeves and turquoise trim. Her white skilts have double leg stripes and a black, yellow, and turquoise print that features stars, ship wheels, and “Monster High” banners.
Accessories begin with a large pink coral headband embellished with a black ship’s wheel. She wears gold earrings made up of dangling stars, a black tulle scarf, and molded black gloves. Striped socks match her top and her turquoise shoes are boat-like with swirly wave heels and gold star accents. Her white beach tote has pink lines and turquoise wave designs.
Lagoona comes with her pet piranha. Neptuna is pink and fuchsia with large turquoise eyes.
Shiver me tombers! The ghouls set sail after Draculaura finds a map featuring a big treasure-y X! But when the seas get choppy, it doesn't take long to discover that none of these wannabe-pirates have sea legs - not even Lagoona! And Rochelle is more anchor than sailor! It's only a matter of time before their adventurous vacation is all washed up!

Rochelle has pink hair with teal streaks and blunt bangs. It is pulled into a high ponytail that is held to the side with a bow-shaped tentacle. She has blue eyeshadow and pink lips.
Her adorable dress has a boat neck top that is blue with gold trim and a wide ruffled collar with blue & white stripes. Complementing the top is a  black skirt covered with “Monster High” banners and octopuses surrounded by pink or blue. Under the skirt is a shiny blue layer with a sucker print and a sparkly black tulle hem.
Accessories begin with a gold tentacle hoop earring and a translucent blue heart-shaped eye patch covered with suckers. A black & blue polka dot scarf is tied around her neck and on top of her head is a large headpiece with a sailing ship surrounded by squirming tentacles. She has light brown molded gloves with sucker accents and around her waist are wrapped gold ropes with a large anchor. On her feet are elaborate knee high boots with a light brown wood texture. They are wrapped in rope, encrusted with stars, decorated with anchors, and have pirate heels. The last item is a gold treasure chest purse with a beaded handle and an octopus emblem.
Rochelle comes with her pet gargoyle gryphon, Roux. He is a light speckled gray and has lavender eyes.
Shiver me tombers! The ghouls set sail after Draculaura finds a map featuring a big treasure-y X! But when the seas get choppy, it doesn't take long to discover that none of these wannabe-pirates have sea legs - not even Lagoona! And Rochelle is more anchor than sailor! It's only a matter of time before their adventurous vacation is all washed up!

Catrine has wavy lavender hair with streaks of pink and purple. She has big blue eyes, light pink eyeshadow, and a dark pink lipstick.
Her blue dress has an adorable print that features blue anchors with ropes, birds, pink flowers, pink mice holding “Catrine” banners, and colorful stars. A black bow tied halterneck and a black double-striped hem complete the dress.
She accessorizes with a black beret decorated by a pink bow. One ear pokes through the beret and holds it in place with a silver stud earring. Her other ear has a silver twine ball earring. Around her neck is a large silver anchor necklace with a pink bow accent. On her feet are blue weaved wedges with pink bows and anchor accents. Her blue handbag has rope handles and a pink anchor and bow emblem.
The swashbuckling mateys are on a hunt for buried treasure. But being a pirate is harrrrd work - especially when their vessel gets tossed by monstrous waves! Their cruise of a lifetime is turning out to be all wet!

Clawdeen’s long brown hair with purple streaks is pulled into a side ponytail. Her makeup is light with a soft purple eyeshadow and a salmon pink lipstick.
She is wearing an elbow-sleeve top that has squiggly purple and white stripes and thin black lines. Her black capri pants have pink stitching and golden accents on the legs.
Accessories begin with a black pirate hat adorned with a paw print & crossbones. The has is attached to a coral pink headband bandana. A gold necklace with a crescent moon, compass, and little treasures decorates her neck. Around her waist is a coral pink sash with a gold paw print & crossbones. Her purple pirate boots have peg leg heels and are embellished with gold crescent moons, compasses, and crossbones. Crossbones, compasses, chains, and paw prints also decorate her coral pink tote.
