The swashbuckling mateys are on a hunt for buried treasure. But being a pirate is harrrrd work - especially when their vessel gets tossed by monstrous waves! Their cruise of a lifetime is turning out to be all wet!

Gil has pale scaly hair with a translucent blue mohawk fin that is hanging to the right. He has dark teal eyebrows, pink eyes, and light blue lips. Translucent blue gills are on his neck and translucent blue fins protrude from his forearms and calves.
He is wearing a sleeveless shirt that is blue and aquamarine striped with a black anchor and red rope graphic. His black board shorts feature a print that has fish skeletons with red and white stars.
Accessories consist of translucent green breathing goggles and a silver chain necklace with a fish hook and shark tooth charm. On one hand is a silver wrist wrap made up of ropes, chains, and a fish hook. His scaly turquoise loafers have silver eyelet patches on the sides. He carries a turquoise duffel bag with a pink netted pouch.

Clawdeen has beautiful straight brown hair with purple highlights. Her nightie features a green leopard print bodice with black straps and a frilly black mesh neckline. A shimmery purple strip separates the bodice from the black skirt. The skirt is decorated with irregular purple and green spots and a purple hem.
Accessories consist of a sleep mask that matches the spotted pattern of her nightie and purple slippers. The fuzzy slippers are adorned with cute monster ears. Clawdeen does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Draculaura has long straight black hair streaked with dark pink. She is wearing a cute pink nightie with an elaborate chain link print. The print features tiny pink polka dots, skullettes, and pink hearts. The neckline and frilly hem are black with red polka dot hearts. The neckline is also adorned with a red bow and the hem is trimmed in red.
Accessories consist of a sleep mask that matches the print of her nightie and pink slippers. The fuzzy slippers are embellished with bat wing accents. Draculaura does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black & white with blue highlights. Her nightie has blue straps, a yellow strip by the waist, and lightning bolt stripes. The yellow, blue, white, or black lightning stripes are separated by thinner stripes of black or yellow.
Accessories consist of a sleep mask that matches the lightning print of her nightie and blue slippers with neck bolts poking out the sides. Clawdeen does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Draculaura has black hair with pink streaks, blunt bangs, and is pulled into a high ponytail. Her light pink skin is complemented by pink and turquoise eyeshadow, bright pink lipstick, and her signature heart under her left cheek.
She is wearing a molded pink bodice adorned with a black bat wing neckline and a black & pink heart-shaped bow. Pink hearts run down the front and pink & white ruffles are along the sides. 
The fuschia skirt has light pink scalloped stripes and a ruffled black tulle hem. The front of the large pink train is decorated with hearts and black bats. On her feet are pink pumps with heart accents, side cutouts, and knobby heels.
The front of the top has a lever that creates a brand new look. The bodice becomes a black corset with pink laces and blue heart buttons. The lever hangs over the skirt and is decorated with blue & pink winged hearts. Most importantly, the train extends upwards and transforms into wings.
A brush or doll stand is not inlcuded with Draculuara.
There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

The light turquoise gore-geous ghoul has long deep pink hair with purple and lavender highlights. Her makeup includes gold eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, and hot pink lipstick. She stands 28 inches tall and has a button on the back of her head that when pressed will change the color and look of her eyes.
Her adorable dress has a shimmery bodice with a yellow, pink, and black zigzag print. It has a single black strap and a decorative seam that runs from the black mesh sleeve to the hem of the shimmery pink bubble skirt. Over the skirt is a black mesh top layer.
Accessories consist of a cat ear headband with gold hoop earrings, a yellow & pink hair extension, pink cat-eye glasses, dangling pink Skullette earrings, and a heart-shaped mask. On her legs she wears either blue ivy wraps or wrought iron wraps. Her hot pink pumps have swirled designs and removable covers adorned with studs and chains. 
Gargoyle wings can be attached to her back and there are a variety of tattoo-like stickers. Designs can be drawn on her body with the included pink marker and can be removed with a damp cloth.

The pink gore-geous ghoul has long mint green hair with streaks of blue and purple. Her makeup consists of purple and pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, and lavender lipstick. She stands 28 inches tall and has a button on the back of her head that when pressed will change the color and look of her eyes.
Her black dress has a shimmery purple collar and button stripe down the front. Both are trimmed with polka dot tulle which is also used for the short sleeves and peplum. Separating the bodice from the skirt is a light green ribbon with a purple belt. The asymmetrical skirt has a purple Skullette print and a shredded hem.
She accessorizes with a cat ear headband with gold hoop earrings, a colorful hair extension, gray cat-eye glasses, dangling purple Skullette earrings, and a purple heart-shaped mask. Turquoise ivy wraps or gray wrought iron wraps can decorate her legs. On her feet are purple pumps with swirled markings and removable gray covers with studs and chains.
Gargoyle wings can be attached to her back and there are a variety of tattoo-like stickers. Designs can be drawn on her body with the included pink marker and can be removed with a damp cloth.

Skelita has long black hair with brown highlights. Her bony features are accentuated by light blue eyeshadow and red lipstick outlined in black. Dots surround her eyes and swirly designs and stitched decorate her face. She stands 28 inches tall and has a button on the back of her head that when pressed will change the color of her eyes. 
Her lovely dress has a black halterneck top with pink and purple trim and a shimmery print of gray flowers and curled designs. The triple-layered skirt features colorful patches with drippy hems and adorable prints. Patch designs include spiders, stars, flowers, safety pins, skeletons, and Skullettes.
She accessorizes with a burnt orange statement necklace, a brown belt, and a bracelet. The belt and bracelet are etched with Skullette designs. On her feet are green wedge sandals with brown heels.

Ari has long magenta hair with streaks of purple. Her makeup consists of pink eyeshadow, light blue eyeliner, and lavender lipstick. She lacks articulation at the wrists, hips, and knees. Ari lights up and sings when activated. There are four modes: vocals; music & vocals; music, vocals & lights; and lights only.
She is wearing a sleeveless lavender dress with an asymmetrical hem. The short dress is molded and adorned with embossed chains. Over it is a sheer magenta dress with a shimmery silver chain design and a blue asymmetrical hem.
Silver accessories begin with a double chain headband decorated by a chain flower and a necklace with a purple gem charm. The gem is also a button to activate her music and lights. Around her waist is a silver belt with four studded rows, two dangling strands, and music note accents. On her feet are translucent blue knee high boots made up of wedge heels and interconnected chains.
Also included is a silver microphone and a silver pedestal adorned with chains and Skullette emblems. Ari’s feet clip into the pedestal which allows her to stand.
Monster Parents: Ghosts

How Do I Boo? I rock. I use music to inspire monsters to be themselves! And if it makes them want to dance too, even better!

Once upon a tomb, monsters unlived in hiding... afraid they would be in danger if humans new they existed. But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance!

Draculaura
Draculaura has long black hair with streaks of pink. It has side swept bangs and is pulled into a ponytail. She wears turquoise eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a soft pink blush. Under her left eye is a pink heart.
Her sleeveless dress has a sweetheart neckline with a black mesh top. The pink dress is decorated with black bats outlined in turquoise. 
Turquoise accessories include dangly heart earrings, a heart bracelet, and a belt with a winged heart cutout. On her feet are tall black boots with batty heels and winged heart accents. She carries a fanged pink handbag with little wings and a bat handle.
Moanica D’Kay
Moanica’s long hair is light purple with thick streaks of light green. She wears purple eyeshadow and dark purple lipstick.
Her outfit begins with a yellow top that features an image of a rib cage and heart. Over the top is a green, black, and gray camo vest. Completing the ensemble are black jeans covered with white and gray splatter.
Pink accessories consist of worm earrings, a double chain with rib cage pendant, a rib cage bracelet, and a brain wrinkle belt. On her feet are pink wedge booties embossed with a brain wrinkle design. She carries a pink brain purse held by a long shoulder strap.
The 2-pack has a brush, but doll stands are not included.

But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance.

Abbey has straight white hair with streaks of pink. It is pulled into a high ponytail and features side swept bangs with a purple streak. Complementing her blue skin is lavender eyeshadow and pink lipstick.
She is wearing a long sleeve dress with a purple bodice that has a white ice crystal print. The blue skirt is covered by a sheer purple top layer decorated with shimmery ice crystals.
Accessories consist of a furry white scarf, furry white wrist cuffs, and a translucent purple snowflake belt with beaded icicles. On her feet are translucent purple ice booties with furry cuffs. Her masquerade mask is a white snowflake.
Abbey does not come with a brush or doll stand.

Clawdeen has long brown hair with purple streaks that is pulled to the back with tied strands. Her makeup includes lavender eyeshadow and pink lipstick. Decorating her right eye are green crescent moons and white starry dots.
She is wearing a ferocious tiger striped dress that is yellow and purple with green highlights. The chest and neckline is black mesh and crisscrossed by gold trim. The bottom of the dress has a ruffled purple hem that is long, sheer, and decorated with different phases of yellow moons.
Purple accessories consist of a molded fur shrug and peep toe pumps. The pumps are covered in spikes and have crescent moon heels. Her green masquerade mask is a wolf face with a nose, whiskers, and pointy teeth.
Clawdeen does not come with a brush or doll stand.
Once upon a tomb, monsters unlived in hiding... afraid they would be in danger if humans new they existed. But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance!

Cleo has long black hair with streaks of gold. It features blunt bangs, blue side streaks, and a hair bump tied in the back. She wears turquoise eyeshadow, turquoise eyeliner, and red lipstick. Under her right eye is a turquoise gem and under her left eye are five turquoise diamonds.
She is wearing a single shoulder dress that is reddish orange with yellow lines that create a mummy wrapped look. Over the dress is a sheer drape with a blue and gold Egyptian print.
Accessories begin with a wide gold necklace with gem and snake accents. Around her waist is a gold belt adorned with a winged scarab. On her feet are burnt pink pumps with winding snake straps. Her masquerade mask is a blue Eye of Horus.
Cleo does not come with a brush or doll stand.

Deuce  has green scaled hair and a snake mohawk. The snakes are hanging to the right and get progressively darker.
He is wearing a tuxudo-themed shirt with a white collar, yellow lapel, yellow trim, and a gray snake print. Complementing the shirt are a pair of gray jeans.
Accessories consist of a yellow skull & snake bow tie and a gold snake bracelet. On his feet are pearl white boots with black soles and wrapped snake accents. His masquerade mask is a pair of red sunglasses.
Deuce does not come with a brush or doll stand.

Lagoona has long yellow blonde hair with light turquoise streaks. A portion is pulled to the back and her bangs form a side swept curl. She wears purple eyeshadow, salmon pink lipstick, and below her left eye are three green starfish.
Her sleeveless dress features two different prints separated by black outlines. One print is turquoise with green aquatic plants and the other is salmon pink with green dots and fan-like scales.
She accessorizes with a coral pink arm wrap made up of tentacles and turquoise ankle-strap wedges with decorated with pearls and starfish. Her masquerade mask is coral pink stars with bubbly starfish accents.
Lagoona does not come with a brush or doll stand.
Once upon a tomb, monsters unlived in hiding... afraid they would be in danger if humans new they existed. But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance!

Moanica has purplish pink hair with a streak of neon green. It has side swept bangs and is pulled into a high ponytail with a curled split. Her gray skin is accentuated by pink & magenta eyeshadow, purple lipstick, and soft pink blush.
Her form fitting dress features a splattered camo design that is black, bright green, pink and white. The single shoulder strap and frilly hem are black tulle decorated with a metallic purple print.
She accessorizes with dangly green tombstone earrings and a studded pink belt with a large flower. A black painted glove covers one hand and on her feet are pink brain wrinkled pumps. Her masquerade mask is black with drippy spirals.
Moanica does not come with a brush or doll stand.

This playset features Draculaura at the dance party celebrating the opening of Monster High, the school where everyone is welcome. The party has a dance floor, stage, photo booth, banner, and refreshment table.
Draculaura
Dracululaura has beautiful black & pink streaked hair. It is long and straight with blunt bangs. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a pink heart around her left eye. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists.
Her dress has a lovely pink & white splatter-striped bodice with a black tulle neckline. The pink skirt has a serrated hem and a blue spiderweb print accented by winged hearts. Blue accessories consist of earrings and a bow-heart broach. On her feet are blue wedges with ankle strap hearts.
Dance Party
The party dance floor is black, etched with swirls, and has a light-up Skullette in the middle. There are two black doll stands attached to purple Skullette bases. When the dance floor dial is turned, dolls using the stands will twirl and spin.
Attached to the dance floor is a raised pink stage with a green bat wing microphone resting on a black chain stand. The stage is framed by blue coffin-like speakers and tied-back curtains. It is topped in black with spiderwebs, swirls, and a silver skullette with black bat wings.
The photo booth has a black swirled frame, an argyle backdrop, and is topped with translucent pink Skullette and heart shaped balloons. With the photo booth is a green three-legged stand with a black camera on top. The stand has a holder for a cell phone so you can take actual photos of the party. 
Connecting the stage and photo booth is a Monster High banner framed in purple. It is decorated with swirled spiderwebs, dangling spiders, and cute bats.
The round refreshment table has a purple dripping tabletop etched with spiderweb swirls and a bat wing heart. It rests upon a black pedestal with four claw feet. Snacks include three monstrously pink cupcakes sitting  on a silver pedestal and a bubbly green bowl of punch.
Party accessories include three masquerade masks on sticks. There is a blue cat ear mask, a green bat wing mask, and a red vampire lips mask. There are also two Skullette & heart balloons. The balloons can be held by ghouls or attached to the banner for decoration.

Draculaura has long pink hair with streaks of black. It is pulled into a ponytail and embellished by black hat with a spiderweb Skullette decoration. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, a red heart around her left eye, red lipstick, and a red heart on her left cheek.
Her black dress has pink straps, a sweetheart neckline, and a white print with check patterned bats connected by strings of dots. The tulle overskirt layers are asymmetrical with serrated hems. There is a pink layer and a black layer with a metallic pink print.
She accessorizes with pink spiderweb swirl earrings and a hard pink neck piece with flared shoulders, flared collar, and a heart cutout at the chest. She wears black painted gloves with pink hearts and on her feet are black spiderweb pumps with winged heart accents.
Three party accessories are included with Draculaura. There is a pink “Monster High” speech bubble, a blue Skullette mask, and a purple masquerade mask with spider designs. A doll stand is not included.

But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance!

Frankie has long white hair with angled blunt bangs and black streaks. It is held back with a top bun and decorated by a blue lightning bolt bow headband. Her makeup features blue eyeshadow, gray eyeliner, pink lipstick, and a yellow lightning bolt around her left eye.
Her black collared halterneck dress has a mesh neckline and features a black, blue, and yellow diagonal print with white hex nuts. The yellow waist accentuates the black tulle overskirt that is graced by a metallic blue print.
She accessorizes with yellow gear earrings and blue painted elbow length gloves with raised gears. On her feet are silver peep toe pumps with screws, studded ankle straps, and yellow lightning bolt accents.
Three party accessories are included with Frankie. There is a black stitched lightning bolt mask, a yellow Skullette mask, and a silver mechanical masquerade mask. A doll stand is not included.

All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Ari has thick wavy purple hair and glowy translucent skin. Her makeup consists of pink eyeshadow, light blue eyeliner, and lavender lipstick. 
Her sleeveless dress is violet with a purple mesh neckline, blue trim, and an asymmetrical hem. The front features a floral print created by a pattern of blue, red, and silver chains.
She accessorizes with a silver belt and translucent blue boots. The belt has four studded rows, two dangling strands, and music note accents. The boots have wedge heels and rows of interconnected chains that go all the way up to her knees. 
Ari is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists. A brush or doll stand is not included.
Once upon a tomb, monsters unlived in hiding... afraid they would be in danger if humans knew they existed. But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance.

Draculaura has wonderful pink hair with with a big black streak down the middle. She wears it in a high ponytail that is accentuated by a black spiderweb skullette decoration. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, a pink heart around her left eye, deep red lipstick, and a deep red heart on her left cheek.
She is wearing a black dress with a sweetheart neckline, red ribbon straps, and a pink mesh peplum. The front of the dress features a white print with check patterned bats connected by strings of dots.
Complementing the outfit is a hard pink neck piece with flared shoulders, flared collar, and a heart cutout at the chest. On her feet are black pumps adorned with spiderweb designs and hearts with spiderweb bows.
Draculaura is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists. A brush or doll stand is not included.

Meadoe is a yeti hybrid with purple and blue hair pulled into long braided pigtails. What makes her unique is her translucent antlers with dripping icicles and pink crystal points. She has blue icicle eyebrows, blue eyes, and wears pink and blue eyeshadow and pink lipstick.
She is wearing a pink top with a geometric crystal print. Around her neck is a furry white shawl with a snowflake crystal cluster. Her deer body is light blue with a fluffy pink tail. Snowy white wraps cover her front legs and decorating her back leg are black and blue snowflakes.
I tried rebelling against the yeti stereotype of being a cold fiend, but I can't. Snow is my thing, and I couldn't unlive without ice skating. It warms my heart like nothing else... except my beasties.

Merry is a carousel horse hybrid with pink hair that has turquoise streaks. It is pulled into wavy pigtails and poking out the top is a light blue spiral horn. She has pale turquoise skin, swirly pink eyebrows, and dark turquoise eyes. Her makeup entails pink eyeshadow, drippy black eyeliner, and pink lipstick.
She is wearing a tank top with black & white diagonal stripes and drippy pink accents. On her back are black skeletal wings and around her waist is a light blue dripping ribbon belt with bows.  Her horse body is gray with a fluffy pink tail tied with a black bow. Merry’s front legs have pale  turquoise wraps embossed with horseshoes and swirls and tied with pink ribbon. Pink bows and colorful swirls and dots decorate her back leg.
There's a song that's always stuck in my head. Ghoul thing it always puts pep in my step, even when I'm lost - and I get lost A LOT. Sometimes I feel like I'm just going 'round and 'round, ya know?

Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with highlights. Her brown complexion is complemented by purple eyeshadow, red fanged lips, and red nails on her fingers and toes.
She is wearing a pink tiger striped top under a black jacket. The jacket has a lavender faux fur collar and purple trim. Completing the ensemble is a purple miniskirt with a gray ruffled hem.
She accessorizes with two gold hoop earrings in each ear, a gold necklace with a red pendant, a black belt with gold studs, and pink thigh-high leggings. On her feet are black peep-toe boots with rows of purple straps.

Cleo has straight brown hair with light brown highlights, gold streaks, and blunt bangs. Her tanned skin is complemented by purple eyeshadow, red lips, a blue gem on her cheek, and painted nails.
She is wearing a sandy yellow jumpsuit made up of bandage wrappings. Over the jumpsuit is a flowing blue top with crisscrossed straps. Completing the mummy look is a wrapped fingerless glove on her right hand.
Accessorizes begin with a gold headband encrusted with gems and gold triple chandelier earrings. A gold band and a triple bangle decorates her left arm. Around her waist is a studded gold belt and a gold cellphone is strapped to her right thigh. On her feet are black sandals with wraps that match her jumpsuit.

Draculaura has pink and black streaked hair that is pulled into pigtails. She is pale pink with pink eyeshadow, crimson lips, red fingernails, and a deep pink heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a red top that has white stitching, brown sleeves, and white ruffled cuffs. At her neck is a white peplum held by red hearts. Completing the outfit are brown tights and a white pleated skirt with a gray ruffled under layer.
She accessorizes with safety pin earrings. On her feet are pink books decorated with black straps, black laces, and gray hearts at the tops.

Frankie has pulled back hair that is streaked black and white. She has violet eyeshadow, red lips, and silver bolts protruding from the bottom of her head. Her pale green skin is accentuated by red fingernails and stitches on her arms, legs, and cheek.
She is wearing a cute black and blue plaid dress with red and gray lines. The collar and shoulders are white and the gray puffy sleeves have black cuffs. Under the skirt is a gray ruffled layer.
Accessories consist of a black tie with a blue Skullette and a silver triple bangle. Around her waist is a black belt with studs, chains, and a lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black and white striped pumps with ankle straps.

Lagoona has curly yellow blonde hair with streaks of aqua blue. Decorating her hair is a pink flower and turquoise ruffles. She has light blue skin with freckles, purple eyeshadow, violet lips, and pink finger and toe nails.
Her outfit begins with a jacket that has a blue scale print, black sleeves, and turquoise cuffs. Under it is a black top with a scaly pink midsection. Gray fishnet tights under black shorts with turquoise trim completes the ensemble.
She accessorizes with a gold seahorse pendant and a gold pearl bracelet. On her feet are black wedge sandals with white stripe accents.

Catrine has long and wavy lavender hair with bright streaks of magenta. Her white skin is complemented by light blue eyes with purple shadow and purple lips.
She is wearing a sleeveless black top decorated with irregular pink and light blue stripes. Matching the top is a short black jean skirt.
Accessories consist of a pink scarf, a light blue bracelet, and a purple iCoffin phone. On her feet are pink wedge pumps.
The figure stands about 3 inches tall and has 13 pieces.

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair that complements her brown complexion. Her eyes are yellow with purple shadow and her fanged lips are red.
She is wearing a cropped black jacket over a sleeveless purple dress. The dress has yellow circles print, a yellow hem, and a yellow belt with a Skullette buckle.
Accessories consist of a yellow bracelet, yellow pumps, and a purple iCoffin phone.

Ghoulia has long light blue hair with sky blue streaks that is pulled back by a black headband. She has a pale complexion, pale blue eyes behind white glasses, and red lips.

Kiyomi has long pink hair with streaks of light pink hair accentuated by a blue headband. She has a light blue complexion with ghostly white eyes and eyebrows and bluish lips.

Lorna has lots of wavy orange hair that complements her light aquamarine skin. She has bright blue eyes, pink lips, and teal green fins on her calves.

She accessorizes with white bracelets and a red iCoffin phone. On her feet are black pumps with oval cutouts and silver wedge heels.

Rochelle has long pink hair with blunt bangs and streaks of light blue. She has gray speckled skin, pink eyes with pink shadow, and bright pink lips. Speckled gargoyle wings protrude from her back.
Her white top is sleeveless and decorated with irregular black horizontal stripes. Completing the look is a black skirt.
She accessorizes with an aqua blue scarf, a silver bracelet, and an aqua blue iCoffin phone. On her feet are silver wedge pumps with pink socks.

The Advent Calendar has 244 pieces packaged in a box with 24 mystery windows each filled with a small buildable gift. Also included are three figures: Clawdeen Wolf, Draculaura, and Frankie Stein.
Gifts
To celebrate the holidays there is a green Christmas tree with Skullette ornaments and a purple bow topper. With the tree are a variety of wrapped presents, a robot toy, and a nutcracker.
For fun, there are three set of snow skis and poles. They are stored on a rack decorated with silver skulls and skeletal arm latches.
To relax, there is a fire pit with an orange flame. Around the pit are three lounge chairs: one purple, one pink with a Skullette, and a light blue wrought iron chair.
For snacks, there is a table full of mugs and a pedestal with muffins and a dairy carton. Additionally, there are plates full of spider-topped cakes.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with purple highlights. Her brown complexion is complemented by yellow eyes with purple shadow and red fanged lips.
She is wearing a cropped black vest over a red long sleeve top with an animal print. Completing the outfit is a layered black skirt and black shorts.
On her feet are gold wedges with purple & gold knee highs. Gold accessories include a multi-bangle bracelet, earmuffs, and a Santa hat.
Draculaura
Draculaura has long black hair with violet streaks and pigtails. She has pale pink skin, light purple eyes with pink shadow, fanged red lips, and a pink heart on her cheek.
Her pink top has a magenta snowflake print and plum sleeves. It is complemented by plum shorts under a double layered skirt that is pink and baby  blue.
Accessories feature a light blue scarf, magenta earmuffs, light blue wrist cuffs, and a magenta purse. On her feet are white knee high boots with black laces and silver wedges.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black that is held in a high ponytail with a blue band. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, dark pink lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her black outfit has a sleeveless top with a blue & gold graphic complemented by a white collar with a silver tie. A short black skirt and silver tights complete the look.
Her accessories consist of blue goggles, yellow goggles, pink earmuffs, a pink bracelet, and a Santa hat. On her feet are blue sneakers with black laces.

Clawsome Fashion has 20 pieces that create a clothing rack and a Clawdeen Wolf figure.
Clothing Rack
The rack has silver stands with a purple bar that holds two hangars. On the hangers are a cropped white vest and a short black skirt.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has long brown hair with green highlights. She has brown skin, yellow eyes with purple shadow, and fanged red lips.
Her outfit features a green top with a tiger stripe print. At her waist is a purple Skullette belt with a black skirt that has a ruffled purple hem.
Accessories consist of a pink scarf, pink bracelet, and a black iCoffin. On her feet are purple pumps with black knee highs.

The Birthday Bash has 153 pieces that create a party with a tree, table, gifts, and a Draculaura figure.
Birthday Party
The party features a yellow green base with a creey tree that has curled branches. Hanging from the branches are translucent skulls, balloons, and strings of pink streamers that connect to tombstones.
The tombstones are gray with Skullette emblems. One sits on a counter with a blender, cup, and a skeletal arm. The other tombstone hides Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat, who sits on a translucent staff.
Central to the party is a table with a pink cake decorated with burning candles. With the cake are presents adorned with Skullette bows. 
Draculaura
Draculaura has black hair with streaks of violet that is worn in pigtails. She has a pale pink complexion, light purple eyes with pink shadow, red fanged lips, and a pink heart on her cheek.
Her violet red and black top is sleeveless and has fanged hearts along the midsection. The outfit is completed by a layered black skirt with a violet red waist.
She accessorizes with a white statement necklace, a white bracelet, and a black iCoffin. On her feet are pink wedges with black bat wing accents.

Fintastic Surfing has 18 pieces that create a surfboard and a Lagoona Blue figure.
Surfboard
The deep pink surfboard rests on a blue platform that allows it to rotate. Yellow accents include a seashell, starfish, and a crab.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has wavy yellow hair with turquoise highlights and a pink starfish. She has pale turquoise skin, chartreuse eyes with purple eyebrows, purple eyeshadow, pink lips, and freckles. On her calves are turquoise fins.
Her one-piece swimsuit is pink with one shoulder strap and a turquoise fish skeleton graphic. Around her waist is a translucent skirt.
She accessorizes with two black bracelets and a black iCoffin. On her feet are black peep toe pumps.

The Glam Ghoul Band has 182 pieces that create musical instruments and accessories plus eight figures. The ghouls are Catty Noir, Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura, Frankie Stein, Lagoona Blue, Spectra Vondergeist, and Venus McFlytrap.
Instruments & More
Instruments include three guitars with Skullette graphics and a keyboard with spiderweb accents. There is also a drum set with cymbals and a bass drum decorated with a Skullette and purple spiderweb.
The singers have three microphones that are held by black stands. Additional items consist of a black and magenta speaker and a green candelabra with burning candles.
Catty Noir
Catty has straight pink hair with turquoise streaks. She has black skin complemented by pink eyes and lips.
Her strapless top is pink with a gray design and a turquoise neckline. A magenta skirt, silver multi-bangle bracelet, and turquoise pumps complete the outfit.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has a purple and chartreuse bob cut. She has brown skin, yellow eyes, and red lips. 
Her outfit has a cropped black vest over a purple top with a leopard print and a black skirt with a ruffled hem. She accessorizes with a yellow multi-bangle bracelet, yellow Skullette belt, and purple pumps with black knee highs.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has black hair with light blue streaks. She has a tan complexion, light blue eyes with purple shadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
Her dark blue dress features a light blue graphic and a gold belt. Accessories include a gold statement necklace, gold multi-bangle bracelet, and dark blue wedges with bandage accents.
Draculaura
Draculaura has black hair with pink streaks held back by a pink headband. Her light purple eyes with pink shadow, red fanged lips, and pink heart on her cheek go well with her pale pink complexion.
She is wearing a light pink sleeveless dress with a spiderweb print on the skirt. A magenta statement necklace, black knee highs, and magenta bat wing pumps complete the outfit.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has white hair with streaks of blue, black, and yellow. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, deep pink lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her outfit features a black & yellow lightning top, a black skirt, and gray shorts. She accessorizes with a blue multi-bangle bracelet, and blue wedges.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has yellow hair with pink and turquoise highlights. She has pale turquoise skin, yellow green eyes, pink lips, and freckles. On her calves are turquoise fins.
A cropped turquoise vest covers a black top with a Skullette graphic. A silver and black skirt, pink bracelet, and magenta pumps finish the outfit.
Spectra Vondergeist
Spectra has wavy purple hair with magenta highlights. She has blue eyes, blue eyeshadow, purple lips, and pale skin that becomes translucent on her arms.
Her outfit has a purple sleeveless top with magenta designs and a black and purple layered skirt. Accessories consist of a magenta bracelet, a silver belt with dangling chains, and silver wedge pumps.
Venus McFlytrap
Venus has long pink hair with a streak of green. Blue eyes with pink shadow and red prickly lips complement her pale green skin.
Her outfit has a sleeveless black top and a layered green skirt. She accessorizes with a pink statement necklace, silver bracelet, and silver and pink wedges with vines growing up her legs.

Gore-Geous Throne has 21 pieces that create a lounge chair and a Cleo de Nile figure.
Gore-Geous Throne
The throne is a black lounge chair that has turquoise and gold cushions. With the chair is a turquoise fan with gold accents and a translucent blue travel cup.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has black hair with golden streaks that is pulled back with a gold headband. She has tan skin, blue eyes with purple shadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
Her bathing suit has a turquoise top and a black bikini bottom. Covering the bottom is a translucent turquoise skirt.
Gold accessories consist of a snake necklace and a multi-bangle bracelet. On her feet are gold sandals with beige bandage straps.

The Monsterific Name Builder has 242 pieces that create a nameplate and a Frankie Stein figure.
Nameplate
The nameplate has black and purple bricks with green highlights. It has a magenta base, black top, a skeletal arm, skull candle, and spiderweb and Skullette accents. White bricks spell out “Frankie” or can create up to 8 letters of your choice.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, dark pink lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her sleeveless black top has white and blue crisscrossed lines and a white collar with a black and white polka dot tie. She completes the look with a blue skirt that has a black ruffled hem. Accessories consist of black pumps and a purple purse.

Physical Deaducation has 137 pieces that create a gym and a Frankie Stein figure.
Gym
The gym is black and purple with turquoise accents, a gray wrought iron window, a “Monster High” sign, and a pillar. The pillar has a turquoise locker and a skeletal arm holding a pink award ribbon.
At the top of the gym is a casketball hoop with a chartreuse net and on one side is a pink gymnastics bar that ends with a heart. There is also a pink cushioned bench and a translucent green spiderweb trampoline held by blue skull posts.
Gym accessories include an orange casketball and a gold trophy topped with an adorable bat. 
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, dark pink lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her outfit has a black tank top with a blue lightning graphic and a double layered black skirt. Under the skirt are yellow shorts.
She accessorizes with a yellow multi-bangle bracelet, a blue bag, and a pink iCoffin. On her feet are white sneakers with blue laces.

The School Fang Out has 337 pieces that create an office, lounge, and figures of Draculaura and Elissabat.
School
The school is dark purple and black with turquoise and blue. It has purple double doors, pink wrought iron windows, gray pillars, skull candles, and skull accents.
The first floor has pink and purple lockers, a storage bench, and a sink. There’s also a restroom with a purple coffin door.
The black wrought iron stairs lead to the second floor with Headmistress Bloodgood’s office. The office has the Headmistress’ head, a table with a flask and beaker, and a computer desk that rotates to reveal a microphone.
A pink Skullette blacklight is included with the playset. When the light is shined on the walls five spooky symbols are revealed.
Draculaura
Draculaura has black hair worn in pigtails with streaks of pink. Her pale pink complexion is complemented by lavender eyes, pink shadow, fanged red lips, and a heart on her cheek.
She is wearing her fearleading outfit that has a sleeveless black top with a pink neckline, pink trim, and a Monster High emblem on the chest. The matching black skirt has a white waist and hem.
Accessories consist of light pink pompoms, white cuffs, and pink and white sneakers with black laces. Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat is also hanging out at the school.
Elissabat
Elissabat has long deep purple hair with blunt bangs. She has a pale pink skin, pink eyes, purple shadow, and purple fanged lips.
Her outfit features an off-the-shoulder black top with a layered purple skirt. Completing the look are lavender and black striped knee highs with purple pumps.
She accessorizes with a lavender statement necklace, purple bracelet, silver purse, and a black iCoffin.

Stage Fright has 162 pieces that create a stage and a Catty Noir figure.
Stage
The stage is turquoise with a black frame and gray bat wing curtains. Accents include colored lighting, gold spiderwebs, purple wrought iron, skeletal arms, and the back of the stage has black wrought iron. With the stage is a black, gray, and purple speaker.
In the center of the stage is a rotating gold Skullette pedestal. Sitting on it is a turquoise microphone and stand. The pedestal plays two songs: “Boo York, Boo York” and “Shooting Stars” from the Monster High: Boo York, Boo York movie.
Catty Noir
Catty has straight pink hair with blunt bangs. She has black skin, pink cat eyes with silvery shadow, and pink lips.
Her deep pink top has 3/4 sleeves and a gray spiderweb print. Completing the look is a silver jean skirt and light pink tights.
She accessorizes with a light blue statement necklace, silver bracelet, light blue bag, and a gold iCoffin. On her feet are pink wedge pumps.

The Study Howl DJ has 84 pieces that create a desk and a Toralei Stripe figure.
Desk
The desk has a white desktop on a black wall with smoky purple highlights. It comes with a red floor and a black stool with purple cushions.
Accessories consist of a study book, burning candle, skull lamp, and spiderweb accents. The desk flips to reveal a turntable with headphones and speakers rise from the back.
 Toralei Stripe
Toralei has reddish orange hair in a bob cut with black stripes in the front. She has almond skin with an orange patch on her face, green eyes, red lips, and whiskers.
Her outfit features a matching sleeveless top and skirt. They are two tone with red and black jaggedly separated. Black shorts complete the look.
She accessorizes with an aquamarine scarf, a multi-bangle silver bracelet, and a gold iCoffin. On her feet are aquamarine wedge pumps.

The Teen Scream Salon has 56 pieces that create a vanity and a Frankie Stein figure.
Vanity
The vanity is gray with a blue counter, tool clips, and a translucent spiderweb accent. It has a rotating mirror topped with a Skullette and yellow bulbs.
A dark pink bonnet hair dryer completes the salon. It comes with a black seat that has purple cushions. Purple beauty accessories include a mirror, brush, and hair dryer.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair streaked with black. One blue and one green eye, pink eyeshadow, and deep pink lips complement her pale green skin.
Her outfit features a white collared shirt with a black & blue zigzag tie. A short gray skirt is worn over black shorts. She accessorizes with black pumps and a black iCoffin.

This 3-pack includes Original Ghouls Lagoona Blue, Getting Ghostly Twyla, and an exclusive Power Ghouls Frankie Stein.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has yellow hair with turquoise highlights. She is wearing a turquoise dress with a pink starfish. On her feet are pink shoes.
Twyla
Twyla is translucent turquoise with long curly hair. She has purple eyes, a small mouth, and her legs are smoky black.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has white hair with black lightning. She wears black gloves and boots and a blue jumpsuit with a yellow lightning bolt. A yellow mask covers her face.

This 3-pack includes Original Ghouls Toralei Stripe, Circus Ghouls Venus McFlytrap, and an exclusive Ghostly Draculaura.
Toralei Stripe
Toralei has orange hair with a striped black streak. She is wearing a sleeveless black top with an orange zipper, an orange skirt, and black shoes.
Venus McFlytrap
Venus has green hair with pink streaks. She is wearing a black & white diamond print outfit, black gloves, and pink tights.
Draculaura 
Draculaura has pigtails with a heart bow. She is translucent pink with purple eyes and a fanged mouth.

dolls.character: Abbey Bominable, Catty Noir & Clawdeen Wolf
dolls.description:
This 3-pack includes Original Ghouls Catty Noir, Candy Ghouls Abbey Bominable, and an exclusive Rag Doll Ghouls Clawdeen Wolf.
Catty Noir
Mini Catty has long pink hair and dark gray skin. She is wearing a shiny silver dress with dots and shiny silver shoes.
Abbey Bominable
Abbey has white hair with a lavender streak. She has a lavender outfit with stars and an ice cream cone. On her feet are pink shoes.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has black hair with a magenta streak. She is wearing a magenta outfit with a yellow-spotted green patch and green shoes.

dolls.character: Ari Hauntington, Cleo de Nile & Rochelle Goyle
dolls.description:
This 3-pack includes Original Ghouls Rochelle Goyle, Getting Ghostly Ari Hauntington, and an exclusive Beach Ghouls Minis Cleo de Nile.
Rochelle Goyle
Rochelle has straight pink hair with streaks of light blue. Her sleeveless outfit is striped black & white. On her feet are pink shoes.
Ari Hauntington
Ari has long hair with curly ends. She is translucent magenta with purple eyes and a small mouth.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has straight black hair with a yellow portion and a blue headband. Her black swimsuit has three blue stripes with a yellow ankh on the chest.

This 3-pack includes a Power Ghouls Twyla, Sleepover Ghouls Catrine DeMew, and an exclusive Circus Ghouls Lagoona Blue.
Twyla
Twyla has aquamarine hair and her face is covered by a blue mask. She is wearing a blue jumpsuit with a turquoise spider. She has long black sleeves, a black waist, and black shoes.
Catrine DeMew
Catrine has lavender hair and is wearing a lavender nightie with a pink bow print. On her feet are pink slippers.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has yellow hair with black and crimson. Her outfit is blue with a black skirt, black sleeves, and pattern of black diamonds and pink dots. Under the skirt are blue tights with black shoes.

This 3-pack includes Geek Shriek Twyla and two exclusive figures: Electrified Ghouls Draculaura and Candy Ghouls Frankie Stein.
Twyla
Twyla has pale turquoise hair with light purple highlights. She is wearing purple glasses, a purple top with spiderwebs, a black skirt, and black shoes.
Draculaura
Draculaura has black hair, streaks of pink, and a batty heart. She is wearing a black top with pink and yellow hearts, a pink skirt, and pink shoes.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has white hair with sparkles. She has a light blue outfit with snowflakes and a swirled lollipop, a white skirt, white gloves, and black shoes.

dolls.character: Ari Hauntington, Lagoona Blue & Venus McFlytrap
dolls.description:
This 3-pack includes Fruit Ghouls Venus McFlytrap and two exclusive figures: Electrified Ghouls Ari Hauntington and Mermaid Ghouls Lagoona Blue.
Venus McFlytrap
Venus has yellow-green hair with pink highlights and a cherry graphic. She’s wearing a black shirt with cherry hearts, a pink skirt, and pink shoes with cherries.
Ari Hauntington
Ari has crimped magenta hair with blue streaks and a translucent pink headband. Her black dress has a blue collar, blue hem, and music note and chain graphics. On her feet are pink shoes.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has yellow hair with light green highlights. Her black top has a dotted waist and a teal seashell graphic. Her mermaid body is coral pink with an aquamarine tail.

dolls.character: Ari Hauntington, Lagoona Blue & Venus McFlytrap
dolls.description:
The Collector Case includes an exclusive Space Monsters Frankie Stein.
Case
The Minis case is lavender and holds 28 figures. It has a handle and a translucent cover with window cutouts.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has shiny silver hair and a shiny silver outfit with black stripes, a blue belt, blue accents on the chest, and a blue stripe on each leg.

Mini Clawdeen has long spring green hair with curly tips. Her brown complexion is complemented by brown eyes with crescent moon accents and a fanged smile.
She is wearing a black one-piece swimsuit decorated with a yellow crescent moon and violet claw marks.

Mini Cleo has straight black hair with a yellow section in the front and a blue headband. She has a tanned complexion, bright blue eyes with diamond accents, and a diamond on her cheek.
Her black swimsuit has three blue stripes with a yellow ankh on the chest.
Cleo is an exclusive for the Minis 3-Pack #4.

Mini Draculaura has deep pink hair with pigtails. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes with heart accents, a black heart on her cheek, and a fanged smile.
Her black swimsuit features two fanged hearts. The larger heart is pale turquoise and the smaller one is dark pink. In her hair is a black heart hair clip with blue wings.

Mini Frankie has long white hair trimmed with a light blue under layer. She has pale green skin, a stitched cheek, and one blue and one green eye with lightning accents.
She is wearing a black one-piece swimsuit with a yellow and a blue lightning bolt on the chest.

Mini Moanica has long light pink hair with a big green streak in the front. Her pale complexion is complemented by pale green eyes with biohazard accents.
Her black one-piece swimsuit features a pink and chartreuse radioactive symbol.

Mini Venus has spirng green hair with curls and pink streaks. She has pale green skin, turquoise eyes with swirly accents, and a prickly smile.
Her black one-piece swimsuit features a green flytrap on a leafy swirled vine.

Mini Abbey has sparkly white hair with a lavender streak in the front. She has light blue skin, purple eyes with dotted eyeliner, and a fanged smile.
Her lavender outfit has white stars and features an ice cream cone. On her feet are pink shoes.

Mini Catrine has curly lavender hair with glittery highlights. She has white skin, blue eyes with dotted eyeliner, and a small pink nose.
Her light blue outfit has a pink hem and a cream puff surrounded by black hearts. On her feet are pink shoes with black straps.

Mini Cleo has glittery gold hair with streaks of turquoise and a brown headband. She has beige skin, blue eyes with diamond accents, and a turquoise gem on her cheek.
Her costume is gold and features a monsterific chocolate kiss. On her feet are drippy brown shoes.

Mini Draculaura has glittery pink hair in pigtails with a black bow on top. She has a light pink complexion,  purple eyes with dotted eyeliner, a fanged smile, and a black heart on her cheek.
Her black outfit is decorated with a violet donut and a sprinkle print. On her feet are violet shoes.

Mini Frankie has curly white hair with sparkly highlights. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye with hex nut accents, dotted eyeliner, and a smirky smile.
Her light blue outfit features snowflakes with a swirled lollipop. It has a white skirt with a black waist, white gloves, and black shoes.
Frankie is an exclusive of the Minis 3-Pack #6.

Mini Jinafire has curly green hair with sparkly highlights. She has a gold complexion and jade green eyes with blue dotted eyeliner.
Her candy-themed outfit has purple and pink stripes, black bubbles, a bubbly soda, and a white frosted hem. On her feet are drippy pink shoes.

Mini Lagoona has curly turquoise hair with glitter highlights and a streak of yellow. Her pale turquoise complexion is complemented by freckles and teal eyes with dotted eyeliner. She is blowing a pink bubblegum bubble.
Her yellow outfit is embellished with a pink hem, pink dots, and a pink bubble in the center. On her feet are pink shoes.

Mini Twyla has mint green hair with sparkles and a magenta streak in the front. Her pink complexion is complemented by big purple eyes with buggy accents.
She is wearing a light blue top with an ice cream cone graphic. Her skirt is purple with a violet peplum and her laced shoes are black with smoky tendrils.

Mini Ari is all black and decorated with pastel colors. She has violet streaks in her hair and lavender circled dots for eyes.
Her outfit is trimmed in violet and has lavender music notes on the front. On her feet are violet shoes.

Mini Clawdeen is completely black with pastel coloring. She has drawn-on yellow eyes, small fangs, and pink highlights decorate her hair.
Her outfit is trimmed in green and features a pink paw print on the chest.

Mini Ari has long magenta hair with curls. Her pale pink complexion is complemented by dark violet eyes outlined with dangling black dots.
Her slate blue top has a music note seam, black sleeves with purple stripes, and a purple waist. A black skirt covers her purple tights and her shoes are black with double rows of purple dots.

Mini Catrine has light purple hair with curly tips and a streak of magenta. She has pointy ears, white skin, and a pink nose. Her sky blue eyes are outlined in black with dangling dots.
She is wearing a pink outfit with a black diamond print and white highlights. Her sleeves and pants are black with double white stripes at her ankles.

Mini Draculaura has black hair with dark red streaks and pigtails. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes outlined with dangling black dots, and a fanged smile.
Her dark red outfit features a black diamond print with white heart accents. A black skirt, black shoes, and double red stripes on her legs complete the ensemble.

Mini Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black and a lime green accent. She has pale green skin, stitches on her cheek, and one blue and one green eye. Outlining her eyes are dangling black dots.
Her lime green top has a black diamond print and a blue bow tie. Completing the outfit are black gloves, a blue pleated skirt, and black tights.

Mini Lagoona has yellow hair highlighted by a curl of black and crimson. She has pale turquoise skin, teal freckles, and teal eyes outlined by dangling black dots.
Her outfit is blue with a black skirt, black sleeves, and pattern of black diamonds and pink dots. Under the skirt are blue tights. Her shoes are black with pink laces.
Lagoona is an exclusive for the Minis 3-Pack #5.

Mini Venus has green hair with hot pink streaks and curls. She has pale yellow-green skin, spring green eyes outlined with black dangling dots, and a prickly smile. 
Her white outfit features a black diamond print. Black elbow-length gloves cover her arms and hot pink tights are on her legs.

Mini Ari has crimped magenta hair with blue streaks and a translucent pink chain headband. She has translucent skin, purple eyes with music note accents, and blue eyeliner.
Her black dress has a blue collar, a blue hem, and is decorated with colorful music notes and chains. On her feet are pink shoes.
Ari is an exclusive of the Minis 3-Pack #7.

Mini Draculaura has crimped black hair with streaks of pink and a batty heart decoration. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes with heart accents, blue eyeliner, a fanged mouth, and a heart on her cheek.
Her black top features pink and yellow hearts and heart outlines. She has a blue bow at her waist, a pink skirt, and pink shoes.
Draculaura is an exclusive of the Minis 3-Pack #6.

Mini Frankie has long white hair with a green melon design in the front. Her pale green skin is complemented by one blue and one green eye with seed accents, a stitched cheek, and a smile with her tongue sticking out.
She is wearing a yellow green top under a green jacket with seed embellishments. Completing the outfit is a gray skirt and green shoes.

Mini Venus has yellow-green hair with pink highlights and a double cherry design. She has light green skin, green eyes with cherry-heart accents, and she’s licking her lips.
Her black shirt is decorated with cherry hearts. A pink skirt and pink shoes with cherry graphics complete her outfit.

Mini Draculaura has pink hair with black streaks in her pigtails and a light blue bow-heart headband. She has pale pink skin, a fanged smile, pink eyeshadow, squinting eyes, and black glasses with heart accents.
Her outfit has a white collared skirt under a pink overall skirt with hearts, a chest pocket, and black polka dots. Under the skirt are light blue tights and black shoes with pink laces.

Mini Rochelle has straight pink hair with light blue streaks. She has speckled skin, a smirky smile, pink eyes with fleur-de-lis accents, and gray glasses with fleurs-de-lis.
Her white collared top is complemented by suspenders and a black skirt with a fleurs-de-lis print. On her feet are black shoes with white laces.

Mini Twyla has pale turquoise hair with light purple highlights. She has pale skin, an open smile, purple eyes, and purple glasses with buggy accents.
Her purple top has a white collar and features a turquoise spiderweb graphic. She completes the ensemble with a black skirt and black shoes.

Minis Ari has long hair with curly ends. She is translucent magenta except for her eyes and mouth.
Her eyes are big and purple with music note accents. Her mouth is just a small black dot.

Minis Clawdeen has pointy ears protruding through long hair with curly tips. She is a translucent purple except for her eyes and mouth. 
Her eyes are big and brown with crescent moon accents and long lashes.  Her smiling mouth has little white fangs.

Minis Draculaura has long pigtails with a heart bow in her hair. She is translucent pink except for her eyes and mouth.
Her eyes are purple with lavender highlights and heart accents. She is smiling with little protruding fangs.
Draculaura is an exclusive for the Minis 3-Pack #2.

Minis Jinafire has long wavy hair with curly ends. Her body, hair, and outfit are translucent green.
Her mouth is a small black dot and her jade green eyes have big black lashes and diamond accents. On her legs are black scale designs.

Minis Rochelle has long straight hair with blunt bangs. Gargoyle ears poke through her hair and she has small gargoyle wings.
She is salmon pink except for her eyes. Her eyes are pink with black eyelashes and fleur-de-lis accents.
Minis Twyla is translucent turquoise with long curly hair. She has big purple eyes with buggy accents and a small mouth. Her legs transition from turquoise to smoky black.

dolls.series: Glow in the Dark Ghouls Minis
dolls.description:
Mini Skelita has long black hair with a big orange highlight in the front. She has a white complexion, big black eyes surrounded by dots, a black nose, and a thin smile.
Her light blue top features a skeletal design with a magenta flower. The outfit is completed with a magenta skirt and light blue skeletal tights.

Mini Clawdeen has black ears poking through her curled brown hair with purple stripes. She has brown skin, big brown eyes with crescent moon accents, a little black nose, and a fanged smile.
Her yellow Halloween outfit features purple stripes with a black cat graphic and black sleeves. She has a black tail, black pants, and yellow catty shoes.
Halloween Minis are found in orange locker boxes.

Mini Cleo has straight black hair with a drippy white patch, orange in the front, and a dripping yellow headband. She has a beige complexion, big blue eyes with diamond accents, a yellow diamond on her cheek, and a smirky smile.
Her Halloween outfit has a sleeveless top that is yellow dripping into orange. The top is decorated with a candy corn graphic and the costume is completed with yellow pants.
Halloween Minis are found in orange locker boxes.

Mini Draculaura has medium purple hair with a streak of violet. Her pigtails have black streaks and an orange heart-shaped bow with fangs. She has pale skin, purple eyes with heart accents, a heart under her left eye, and a big fanged smile.
Her Halloween outfit features a black shirt with orange sleeves, purple heart bats, and an orange & purple Skullette. The pleated skirt is green and her pants are purple with orange stripes. On her feet are black shoes.
Halloween Minis are found in orange locker boxes.

Mini Frankie has long white hair with a streak of orange and black that is held by a blue hair clip. She has pale green skin, one blue eye, and one green eye. Her eyes have hex nut accents and stitches are on her right cheek.
She is wearing an orange pumpkin top that features a jack-o’-lantern face and a black bow tie. The blue sleeves and orange pants are decorated with black stitched lines. A black skirt and blue shoes complete the Halloween outfit.
Halloween Minis are found in orange locker boxes.

Mini Lagoona has wavy blonde hair with a black curl in her side swept bangs. She has blue eyes with starry accents and a light blue complexion with blue freckles. On her forehead above her left eye is a white bandage wrap.
Her Halloween costume is a white jumpsuit with a mummy-like appearance. It is decorated with black bandage lines and an orange jack-o’-lantern graphic.
Halloween Minis are found in orange locker boxes.

Mini Skelita has long black hair with curls, an orange streak, and a magenta strip with stitches. She has a pale white complexion, a stitched mouth, and black stitch marks on her arms. Her brown eyes have flower accents and are surrounded by purple dots. 
She is wearing a flared purple top decorated with a dripping white Skullette that has a black bow and stitch designs. Completing her Halloween attire are orange pants with black stripes on the legs.
Halloween Minis are found in orange locker boxes.

Mini Abbey has wavy white hair with a violet under layer. She has light blue skin, purple eyes with snowflake accents, and a fanged mouth.
Her pink top has an icy white collar and is accessorized by violet bracelets. Her mermaid body is lavender with pink tail fins.

Mini Frankie has long white hair with black highlights in the front. She has one green and one blue eye, pale green skin, and stitches on her cheek.
Her sleeveless top is blue with a yellow double lightning bolt emblem. Her lower body is silver and transitions into a blue tail fin.

Mini Lagoona has curly yellow-blonde hair with light green highlights. She has a shiny blue complexion and teal eyes with starry accents.
Her sleeveless black top has a dotted waist and features a teal seashell graphic. Her mermaid body is a coral pink that transitions to aquamarine at the tail.
Lagoona is an exclusive of the Minis 3-Pack #7.

Mini Moanica has light pink hair with a lime green stripe and a yellow-green under layer. She has pale skin and aquamarine eyes with biohazard accents.
Her sleeveless gray-black top features a green biohazard symbol. Her mermaid body is hot pink and transitions into a green tail fin.

Mini Abbey has long white hair with streaks of pink, lavender, and blue. Her blue complexion is complemented by purple eyes with snowflake accents.
She is wearing a pink dress with a white scalloped collar, white designs, and a lined hem. On her feet are white shoes.

Mini Ari has long violet hair with curly ends. She is pale white with purple eyes that have music not accents.
Her blue outfit has piano key graphics, a magenta belt, and a ruffled hem. On her feet are magenta shoes.

Mini Catrine has long lavender hair with curly tips and a red streak. She has a white skin with pointy ears, big blue eyes with bow accents, and a small pink nose.
Her pink sleeveless pink dress has three blue stripes and a white cat face. On her feet are light blue shoes.

Mini Catty has long pink hair with curled ends. She is dark gray with pointy ears, has pink eyes with music note accents, and has a small pink nose.
Her shiny silver dress is sleeveless and decorated with pink, gray, and white dots. On her feet are shiny silver shoes.

Mini Clawdeen has lovely brown hair with a magenta streak in the front. Her light brown skin is complemented by big brown eyes with crescent moon accents.
She is wearing a sleeveless dress that is medium purple with lime green stitching. A lime green grommet belt and lime green shoes accessorize the outfit.

Mini Cleo has straight brown hair with golden streaks. She has tan skin with raised stitches, big blue eyes with diamond accents, and a turquoise diamond on her right cheek.
Her outfit is a yellow jumpsuit decorated with random black lines. Crisscrossing her chest are turquoise mummy bandages. She accessorizes with a gold headband.

Mini Deuce has a lime green scaled scalp with a mohawk full of green snakes. He has a light complexion, green eyes with diamond accents, and wears red glasses.
His outfit features a black sleeveless shirt with a red coiled snake. His pants are green and his shoes are black.

Mini Draculaura has black hair with pink highlights, pigtails, and a pink heart-shaped bow with fangs. She has purple eyes with heart accents, pale pink skin, and stitches on her arms and legs. 
She is wearing a pink outfit with black buttons and a pleated hem. It is complemented by a light blue jabot, a light blue belt, and pink shoes.

Mini Frankie has long white hair with black highlights in the front. One of her lightning sparkled eyes is green and the other is blue with stitches underneath. Her skin is pale green with raised stitches running down her arms and legs.
She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress with a white collar and a black lightning bolt tie. A red belt separates the top from the pleated skirt and on her feet are black shoes.

Mini Gigi has long pink hair with a high top ponytail streaked with orange. She has freckled skin and big blue eyes with diamond accents.
Her sleeveless top is half pink and half blue with an orange waist. She completes with outfit with puffy black pants and pink slippers.

Mini Jinafire has long green hair with streaks of black. She has golden skin and deep green eyes with diamond accents.
Her violet dress has a black decorative seam and a light pink print. On her feet are orange shoes.

Mini Lagoona has wavy yellow hair with curly turquoise highlights. Her pale green complexion is complemented by big teal eyes with starry accents.
She is wearing a turquoise dress with a pink starfish graphic and a red hem. On her feet are pink shoes.

Mini Moanica has purplish-pink hair with a big streak of green. She has pale gray skin with aquamarine eyes that have biohazard symbol accents.
Her yellow outfit features a black & gray vest and a gray biohazard symbol. On her feet are pink shoes.

Robecca has curly black hair with streaks of blue. Her skin is a coppery brown with dots on her forehead and her eyes are brown with cog accents.
She is wearing a purple outfit decorated with light blue gears. A black belt is at her waist and her light blue shoes have black laces.

Rochelle has straight pink hair with streaks of light blue. She has pale gray speckled skin, gargoyle-like ears and wings, and pink eyes with fleur-de-lis accents.
Her sleeveless outfit is white with black horizontal stripes. On her feet are pink shoes.

Mini Skelita has long black hair with curls and streaks of orange. She has pale white skin with black bony stitches on her limbs. Her big brown eyes have flower accents and flowers decorate her cheeks.
She is wearing a dark turquoise dress with a black skeletal print. At her waist is an orange belt and around her ankles are green bands.

Mini Toralei has orange hair with curly ends and a striped black streak. Her ears are pointy and her yellow skin is complemented by big green eyes with paw print accents and orange stripes on her cheeks.
She is wearing a sleeveless black top with an orange zipper and stitching. Her skirt is orange and on her feet are black shoes.

Mini Twyla has pale turquoise hair that is wavy with streaks of purple. Her white complexion is complemented by bright purple eyes with buggy accents.
She is wearing a blue dress decorated with a black bow, a turquoise spiderweb, and a spider. At her feet are smoky swirls and light blue shoes.

Mini Venus has long green hair with pink streaks and highlights. She has green skin, spring green eyes with swirly accents, and a prickly smile.
Her sleeveless black dress has a pink ivy graphic and a green stitched hem. On her feet are pink shoes.

Mini Clawdeen has long brown hair with a streak of pink. She has big brown eyes with crescent moon accents and a fanged mouth.
Her skin is a pale violet with purple stripes. Green paw prints decorate her body.

The Draculaura ornament has long black hair with streaks of pink glitter. A portion of her hair is pulled high and streaked with pink and glitter. She has a pale pink complexion with deep pink fanged lips and a heart on her cheek.
Her strapless dress is dark red decorated with glitter, a violet bow belt, and a white lace neck wrap. The tiered hem has violet bows with a layer of white and a layer of pink. She accessorizes with a pink heart tiara, pink earrings, and black and pink pumps with winged hearts.
A Keepsake is much more than an ornament. It's a little work of art, created by a real person with a passion to tell a big story. From the people and things you love, to memories of the past, to the anticipation of something new. Your Keepsake honors and celebrates everything that makes the holidays special - joy, togetherness, family, and friends.

When you hang a Keepsake, you're hanging the story of you. Happy hanging!

The Draculaura plush has pigtailed hair that is pink with black stripes. She has light pink skin, all black eyes with lashes and eyebrows, a pink heart on her cheek, a thin smile, and small ears. Draculaura stands about 4 inches tall and does not have legs.
Her classic outfit has a pink vest with white stitching, black mesh sleeves, and scalloped white cuffs. It is complemented by a scalloped ascot and a white skirt with pink stitching.

The Frankie plush has black and white striped hair with yellow-green skin and stitches on her arms. She has a solid blue and a solid green eye with lashes and eyebrows, stitches on her cheek, and a thin smile. Frankie stands about 4 inches tall and does not have legs.
Her signature outfit is blue and black plaid with black mesh sleeves and white shoulders detailed with zigzags. She accessorizes with a black and white polka dot tie with a Skullette. Her black belt has a double row of dots, hanging chains, and a lightning bolt.

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair with light brown highlights. She has a tan skin tone with yellow eyes, purple eyeshadow, and dark red lips with fangs. Her finger and toe nails are painted dark red.
She wears a wild wardrobe that is inspired by her signature outfit. It features a pink and black tiger striped top, a violet skirt, and a gray under skirt. Over the top is a black jacket with a lavender faux fur collar, purple cuffs, and purple trim. 
Accessories consist of multiple gold hoops earrings, a studded collar, a gold beaded necklace with red pendant, and a black belt with gold hexagon studs. Pink thigh-high leggings complement her peep-toe wedge boots. The boots are black with rows of purple straps and gold buckles.
Age: 15

Personal Monstra: I create! I love designing fashion, hairstyles and makeup. For me, it's an expression of how I feel on the inside.

Monster Quirk: My hair grows furrrociously fast so I can change up my look whenever the mood strikes... which is typically several times each lunar cycle.

Biggest Pet Peeve: I hate having so many brothers and sisters in this school at the same time. They're annoying, embarrassing, and totally know how to push my buttons.

Draculaura has black and pink streaked hair with blunt bangs and long pigtails. Her pale pink complexion is complemented by magenta eyes, pink eyeshadow, and red lips with fangs. A red heart is on her left cheek and her nails are painted red.
She is wearing a red & white ensemble inspired by her signature outfit. It has a red vest with white stitching, brown sleeves, and flared white cuffs. At her neck is a white jabot held by red hearts. Her tiered skirt has a short white top layer with red stitching, a white middle layer, and a gray under layer. Completing the look are brown tights.
Accessories begin with gray and white safety pin earrings. On her feet are pink lace-up boots with black laces, black straps, and gray hearts. Draculaura’s parasol is black with a gray Skullette top, pink ball accents, and a batty handle. It is held closed by a pink strap with a gray heart buckle.
Age: 1,599

Personal Monstra: I soar! I can fly, so I have a bat's eye view of everything. I think that's why I always see the good in the world.

Monster Quirk: I can't see my reflection in a mirror, so I always risk looking a little batty. But thanks to centuries of practice, I'm scary-good at applying lip gloss.

Biggest Pet Peeve: The lack of vegetarian selections in the Monster High creepateria is so sad.

Frankie has long pulled back hair that is streaked black and white. She has a pale green complexion with one blue and one green eye, purple eyeshadow, red lipstick, and red painted fingernails. Her neck bolts are silver and stitches adorn her arms, legs, and right cheek.
She is wearing an adorable dress inspired by her signature outfit. It features a blue and black plaid print with red and gray lines. The collar and upper chest are white and her short puffy sleeves are gray with black cuffs. Beneath the short skirt is a gray under layer. 
Accessories begin with blue Skullette earrings and a silver triple bangle. Her tie is black with white polka dots and a Skullette at the tip. Around her waist is a black belt with a double row is silver dots, a dangling chain, and a lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black and white striped ankle strap pumps with black platforms.
Age: 115 days old. But some parts of me are older than others.

Personal Monstra: I try! I mean, I try everything! I like to explore and experience and love everything the world has to offer.

Monster Quirk: Sometimes my stitches come loose and it's like my limbs have a brain of their own. When I offer you a hand, don't be shocked if I mean it literally.

Biggest Pet Peeve: Every morning when I come upstairs, my father insists on grinning and shouting "It's alive!"

Treesa has long pink hair with streaks of green that is pulled into a ponytail. She has yellow-brown eyes, pink eyebrows, green swirled eyeshadow, and pink lips.
Her brown skin is adorned with wood grain striations and branches protrude from her forearms. On her back are wing-like green ivy branches, a small bird house, and a knob. When the knob is turned, her ivy wings extend and she becomes taller as her torso grows.
She is wearing a peplum top with a black sweetheart neckline and a turquoise halter strap. The shimmery peplum and matching skirt feature a colorful wood grain print decorated with a variety of black insects.
Accessories consist of black bug earrings, a brown vine headband, and turquoise wedge sandals with vines twisting up her legs. Six charms can be used to accent her branches and vines. The charms consist of flowers, bugs, and a spiderweb.
Treesa stands in a brown tree trunk with cutouts, spiderwebs, and insects. It is accompanied by green ivy and turquoise webs. The trunk opens to reveal green hand-like clips and a base.
My mother taught me that being a tree nymph meant caring for all living things and cherishing our garden home, but she didn't warn me about my chaotic teen-in-tree-years! Not only are my powers coming in but my growth spurt has made me monstrously tall and I'm really branching out!

And now I've accidentally showered some ghouls with my mystical pollen - causing them to sprout wings! I'm stumped as to how to fix this, but I love to sink my roots into a challenge.
