The 2-pack features Cleo de Nile and Ghoulia Yelps. It is an exclusive of the Mattel Shop.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has long black hair with blunt bangs, glitter highlights, and teal streaks. She has a tan complexion, light blue eyes, elaborate eye makeup, deep red lips, and a turquoise gem on her cheek.
Her outfit is a black jumpsuit with elbow length sleeves and knee length legs. It is detailed with a print of winding golden lines and turquoise graphics.
She accessorizes with coral snakes on a gold statement necklace, gold armbands, and a gold cage peplum. On her head is an ornate gold headband decorated with a teal cobra. Her sandals have sparkly teal soles and golden straps with coral accents that wind up her legs.
Accompanying Cleo is Hissette. The cobra is gold with a turquoise crown and jewelry.
Ghoulia Yelps
Ghoulia has long wavy hair that is streaked light and dark blue. She has a pale gray complexion, pale blue eyes, and red lips.
Her outfit has a gray shirt with a breast pocket, black cuffs and trim, red buttons, and a drippy hem. The knee-length shorts are a pinstripe blue decorated with a turquoise skull print.
Accessories consist of a bright green explorer hat, red zombie arm earrings, blue cat eye glasses, a turquoise scarf, and a red brain belt. On her feet are black knee-high boots with red laces and bright green heels. She carries a black torch with orange flame and a gray satchel with a red zombie hand graphic. 
With Ghoulia is Sir Hoots A Lot. The owl is bright green with yellow eyes and blue accents.
If you have ever been trapped in a pyramid for thousands of years, you know how dreadfully boring it can be. If you were also trapped in that pyramid with only your pet cobra to keep you company and aid in your pranks against your rather abhorrent sister, you can imagine how "poor" (but actually quite wealthy) Cleo felt - entombed in an opulent palace with all of the luxuries her royal family had to offer, but no one there to admire and worship her. If you know all of that, you understand why she began to scream of a mysterious and bespectacled ghoul who would one day rescue her, befriend her, and, of course, idolize her. It was surely her destiny.

It is a little know fact that zombies are among the brainiest monsters in the world. They are often buried in deep thoughts and are able to solve mysteries and piece together puzzles much faster than their slow gait or moaning dialect would imply. As Ghoulia often says"urghhhghgh ghrrrhhhh uhhhh," which roughly translates to "I'm busy and enunciation is overrated." And, in fact, Ghoulia has been monstrously busy lately because she found what only a zombie with her superior intellect would consider "a clue." Donning her hat and calling Sir Hoots-A-Lot, she sets off on an archeological expedition to dig up a grave treasure - the princess destined to be her true ghoulfriend.

The ghouls of Monster High now have an amazing school bus. The bus transforms into a salon with a pedicure station, smoothie bar, and a rooftop pool.
School Bus
The purple bus has pointed arch windows, yellow lights, etched filigree, spiderweb designs, pink bat wing accents, and “Monster High” signs on the sides. The black wheels and grill have ornate designs and the black roof has yellow lights and a “Monster High” sign.
When the bumper is pulled the side and roof open to reveal a silver floor and six pink seats. The seats share black pedestal bases. The back wall of the bus is black with an image of makeup accessories.
Salon
Pulling the bumper opens the bus and pulling it further swivels the seats to create the pedicure station. The salon has a blue fold-up counter for the smoothie bar and a black pedestal table with a drippy pink top.
At the back is an ornate black vanity with a pink knobby-trimmed counter. The vanity mirror has black trim and a Skullette peak.
The roof of the bus becomes a spa tub with aqua blue water graphics. The sides of the tub have slots to hold snacks and beverages.
Accessories for the playset include a silver brush, turquoise hairdryer, smoothie drinks, and fruit snacks.

This playset includes lots of sports accessories and a Frankie Stein doll.
Locker Room
The locker room has two pink coffin-shaped lockers with with Skullette locks. The lockers open to reveal shelves and hooks for storage.
Next is a blue spiderweb etched bench with twisted black legs and a whiteboard. The board is framed in pink and rests on a purple stand. When you wet the included sponge “chalk” it can be used to write on the whiteboard.
A variety of sports accessories are also supplied. There is a soccer ball, bone bat and eye-ball, teal catcher’s mitt, Skullette racket, and tennis ball. They can be stored in the green net bag. Additional items include a blue ball cap, blue cleats, and a travel cup.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has black & white streaked hair held by a blue headband. Her pale turquoise skin is accented by one blue and one green eye, blue eyeshadow, stitches on her cheek, and red lips. She is blowing a bubblegum bubble.
Her cropped white top features a Monster High emblem, pink 3/4 sleeves, and blue trim. The outfit is completed by black shorts with blue trim.
She accessorizes with blue Skullette earrings and blue wrist warmers. on her feet are white high tops with pink lightning bolts.

The 2-Pack features Frankie Stein and Draculaura dressed for some exciting experiments.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has white hair with black streaks that is pulled into a long ponytail. Her pale green complexion is complemented by one green and one blue eye, gray shadow, green eye liner, and green lips.
She is wearing a sea green lab coat dress with a print of pink buttons, black stitches and colorful splatter. The look is completed with molded black leggings and silver knee-high boots with lightning details. Her lab accessories include blue lightning goggles and a jar with a translucent green monster.
Draculaura
Draculaura has straight pink hair with black streaks. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes with gray shadow, fanged pink lips, and a heart on her cheek. 
Her pink dress has a serrated white lapel, a black waist, serrated hem, and a scientific print. The print has winged hearts, beakers, atomic symbols, and formulas. Pink booties, batty pink goggles, and a pink laptop complete her lab outfit.
Draculaura's solo experiments in science class can go kind of batty. But with Frankie as her lab partner, they're sure to be voltageous!

Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has brown hair with streaks of purple that is pulled to the back. Her light brown complexion is complemented by sandy brown eyes with purple and pink shadow, fanged pink lips, and black and pink eye grease. 
Her outfit features a cropped white top with pink mesh shoulders, pink and white jagged stripes, and the Monster High crest. The black sweats has a white waist with pink drawstring, pink leg stripes, and white cuffs.
She accessorizes with a pink & black Skullette bow and a pink & black pompom. On her feet are purple high tops.
Clawd Wolf
Clawd has dark brown hair with a high and tight cut. He has brown skin, fanged lips, sandy brown eyes, and black and red eye grease.
His uniform has a black tank top with saw tooth trim, a pink and white jagged stripe, and “12” with a jagged blue outline. The matching black shorts have a pink hem. On his feet are turquoise high tops.
Sports accessories consist of a gold football and a light blue helmet and shoulder pads. The helmet has red, white, and blue stripes, and the pads have pink claw marks.

dolls.character: Clawdeen Wolf, Weredith Wolf & Barker Wolf
dolls.description:
The 3-pack features Clawdeen Wolf, Barker Wolf and Weredith Wolf getting ready for bed.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has long brown hair with streaks of purple. Her brown complexion is complemented by yellow eyes, lavender shadow, and pink lips.
She is wearing a sleeveless top that is purple with one yellow shoulder. The front is decorated with jagged black diagonal stripes and yellow details.
Her yellow capri pajama pants have a gray animal print and purple trim. Accessories consist of yellow bone hair clips and purple monster slippers.
Barker Wolf
Barker is light brown with goldenrod hair adorned with light blue stripes. He has green eyes, a brown nose, and fangs.
His sleeveless shirt has jagged diagonal stripes and his shorts are blue. Both are trimmed with orange. He has an orange creature sleep mask and a red toothbrush.
Weredith Wolf
Weredith is a furry light brown with dark brown ears, markings, and tail. She has big yellow eyes and small fangs. 
Her top is lavender with light blue marks and diagonal jagged black stripes with yellow eyes. Her diaper is pinned with yellow bones. She comes with a yellow baby bottle and a soft pink blanket.
The Wolf family is packed with siblings all trying to get ready for bed at once! It's total chaos but also a howling good time!

dolls.character: Cleo de Nile, Lux de Nile & Sandy de Nile
dolls.description:
The 3-pack features Cleo, Lux, and Sandy de Nile spending time together.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has long straight black hair with golden highlights. Her tan complexion is complemented by turquoise eyes, light pink lips, and a turquoise gem on her cheek.
She is wearing a sleeveless sweater dress that is purple in the back and has pink trim. The front features a teal and purple design detailed with hieroglyphics. On her feet are multi-strapped turquoise sandals.
Lux de Nile
Lux has spiked black hair with purple streaks and a golden headband. He has tanned skin, slate blue eyes, and bandage wrapped limbs.
His sleeveless red shirt has gold trim and a blue & yellow pyramid print. Black shorts with colorful hieroglyphic designs and red sandals complete his look.
Sandy de Nile
Sandy has tan skin, big turquoise eyes, and bandage wrapped limbs. On her head is a large gold Egyptian headdress.
She is wearing a purple onesie decorated with a pyramid lined waist. On the chest is an eye with lashes and a turquoise iris.
Accessories for the dolls include a blue blanket, yellow travel cup, a green drink box, and a teal baby bottle.
The de Niles are a closely wrapped family who think a night of watching movies or playing games together is creeperific fun!

Ebbie has blue hair with sky blue streaks that is pulled into high ponytails. She has aqua blue skin with purple eyebrows, blue eyes with blue shadow, purple freckles, and purple lips. Instead of legs she has a fish body with scales and a flowing tail fin. 
She wears a sleeveless swim top that has wavy black and pink stripes. It is decorated with white dots, bubbles, and a yellow hem. Over her eyes she wears a pair of gray sunglasses.
Accessories consist of a translucent green beach ball and a pink crab-shaped pool. 
The doll is about 5.5 inches tall.
The Blue family feels at home on any beach, and enjoys sharing those go-with-the-flow times playing in the sun and surf together.

Fangelica has wavy purple hair with streaks of black that is pulled to the back. She has pink skin, magenta eyebrows, purple eyes with pink shadow, and fanged deep red lips.
Her sleeveless turquoise top is complemented by a pink wrap that holds the bat wings on her back. Her black trimmed skirt is purple with a print of black winged hearts, confetti, streamers, and little white hearts. On her feet are black sandals with bat wing accents.
Baking accessories consist of a light blue hand mixer with skeletal beaters and a purple bowl. The dripping pink monster cake rests on a light purple pedestal.
The doll is about 5.5 inches tall.
The kitchen is a fangtastic place for Dracula and his two daughters to bond while whipping up a tasty bites from traditional to Drac's fave - vegetarian.

The 2-pack features Lagoona and Kelpie Blue ready for a day at the beach.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has blonde hair with light turquoise highlights. She has pale turquoise skin, teal eyes, pink shadow, and coral pink lips.
She is wearing a two piece swimsuit that is pink and turquoise with a scale print complemented by skeletal seahorses. The top has orange “V” straps and the shorts have orange trim with a teal tulle peplum.
Accessories consist of tentacle sunglasses and bubbly orange sandals. Her beach bag is translucent yellow with stripes and a Skullette.
Kelpie Blue
Kelpie has super curly has that is part blonde and part turquoise. She has lavender skin, blue eyebrows, green eyes, purple freckles, and purple lips. 
Her one-piece suit has one black strap, diagonal pink, white, and turquoise stripes, and a spiky black scaled heart graphic. Around her waist is a sheer pink cover up.
She accessorizes with a pink headband, dark sunglasses, and teal sandals. Her beach bag is coral pink and can be used to carry a blue travel cup and sandwich.

Pawla has curly brown hair with streaks of turquoise. It is pulled into two big poms and complemented by a purple cat-face sleep mask.
She has a brown complexion with yellow eyes, freckles, and pink fanged lips. Her oversized forearms and legs are furry and she has a bushy tail.
Her sleeveless nightgown features turquoise and black zigzag stripes. The stripes are decorated with pink paw prints, claw marks, and yellow cat eyes. 
Accessories consist of a gold bow around her neck, a pink moon storybook, a purple monster pillow, and a yellow werebear. The bear has a pink bow and only one button eye.
The doll is about 5.5 inches tall.
The Wolf family is packed with siblings all trying to get ready for bed at once! It's total chaos but also a howling good time!

Pharrah has purple and black hair pulled into a high ponytail. Her tan complexion is complemented by purple eyes, lavender lips, and a gem on her cheek.
She is wearing a sleeveless coral pink dress with a gold waist and a “V” hem with gold trim. The front is adorned with yellow designs accentuated by turquoise triangles.
Accessories consist of a gold bow headband, a golden necklace, and crimson pink shoes with bow ankle straps.
A board game comes with Pharrah. It sits on a purple table and features a desert-themed board with Egyptian symbols. Two mummy game pieces and a golden die are also included.

Sandy de Nile has a tan complexion, turquoise eyes, and bandage wrapped limbs. On her head is a gold Egyptian headdress with a snake emblem. She is wearing a purple onesie with lavender stripes and a yellow ankh on the chest.
A golden high chair comes with Sandy. It has a tufted turquoise seat, an ornate headrest, and Bastet statues at the base. Food and accessories include a monstrous slice of cake on a turquoise plate, a lavender sippy cup, and a gold fork.
The de Niles are a closely wrapped family who think a night of watching movies or playing games together is creeperific fun!

The Vampire Kitchen has a stove, a counter with a sink and mini-fridge, two chairs, and lots of accessories. Cooking in the kitchen is Draculaura and her father, Dracula.
Stove
The four-burner stove has a pink top with silver knobs and a backdrop with spooky images. Above the stove is a cabinet with a pink webbed door and winged heart handle.
The stove rests on a black oven with pink feet, a purple door, and a blue web-cracked window. Inside are silver shelves with cutouts.
Counter
The counter is pink with pyramid studs along the edges, It has a gargoyle faucet and a bubble-filled sink.
Over the counter is a blue arch with hooks and a black webbed hook. Hanging from the hook is a pink chandelier detailed with bats and spiders.
A yellow work area with a black pedestal pulls out and the counter sits on a gray mini-fridge. The fridge has black claw feet, a translucent blue door, and black shelves.
Chairs
The chairs have black wrought iron legs and pink tufted seats. The backs are designed to look like stylish flames.
Accessories
Cooking accessories consist of a black towel with hearts, a yellow oven mitt, a blue cookbook, a purple frying pan, a silver pot with green goo, a purple mixer with tentacle beater, and utensils. There is also a pink cookie sheet, a yellow cupcake pan, a red bowl with wiggly food, a monstrous cake, and a rack with ice cream cones.
Draculaura
Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights. She has a pink complexion with purple eyes, light blue shadow, fanged red lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her sleeveless dress has wavy pink lines decorated with a bat cupcake print. It has a frilly white collar and a black waist. She completes the look with a red and white chef’s hat and red pumps with bow accents.
Dracula
Dracula has pink skin, purple eyes behind black glasses, and fanged lips. His molded black hair is combed back on top.
He is wearing a red print shirt with white and red pinstripe sleeves and collar. The shirt is complemented by black pants and shoes. Protecting his outfit is a black apron with a wide purple collar.

Abbey looks magnificent with her straight white hair pulled to the back and decorated with a streak of blue and purple. She has pale blue skin, purple eyes, gray shadow, and fanged dark blue lips.
Her outfit has a black faux fur shawl and a beautiful dress. The dress is purple with a pointed black hem and a print of purple, blue, and black puff balls.
Translucent accessories include a black headband with purple crystals and a choker with epaulettes. A cross strap connects the choker to the belt. 
On her feet are translucent blue crystal boots with icy cuffs. Floral embellishments can be attached to the belt, strap, or boots. Her furry blue purse has a purple moth accent and is inspired by Shiver, her pet woolly mammoth.

Rochelle has wavy pink hair with streaks of pale turquoise. Her speckled complexion is complemented by pink eyes, gray eyeshadow, and pink lips.
She is wearing a dress with a sleeveless turquoise top embellished by pink ruffles down the front. The double-layer skirt is violet-red with a pink and turquoise print that features flowers, fleurs-de-lis, and dragonflies.
Accessories consist of a black filigree headband with turquoise fleur-de-lis flowers, a black belt and suspenders, and pink booties detailed with fleurs-de-lis.
Pink flowers, magenta flowers, and a turquoise dragonfly can be used to decorate her accessories. She also has a turquoise handbag of Roux, her pet gargoyle, with a black bow.

Venus has long straight hair that is streaked green and pink with one side shaved short. She has pale green skin, blue eyes, gray eyeshadow, and soft pink lips with prickly fangs.
Her dress features a pink and magenta floral print with green flytrap accents. The dress is embellished by black trim with pink dots and a black tulle hem.
She accessorizes with a light green ivy headband with a pink flytrap and a green ivy chest wrap. On her feet are black booties with embossed ivy.
Pink flowers can be used to decorate her accessories. Her purse is an orange pot that has a blue fly and holds Chewlian, her pet Venus flytrap.

The School Spirit 2-pack features Draculaura and Twyla wearing peanut butter and jelly themed outfits.
Draculaura
Draculaura has long black hair with a center streak of violet that is pulled into a high ponytail. She has pale pink skin, light purple eyes with pink shadow, pink fanged lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her raglan shirt is white with black sleeves and a “D” on the chest. The pink skirt is decorated with peanut butter and jelly splatter and peanut butter sandwich halves. On her feet are pearl white shoes.
Twyla
Twyla has aqua blue hair with a streak of purple that is pulled into a high ponytail. She has lavender skin, aqua blue eyes with pink shadow, and pink lips.
Her outfit begins with an aqua gingham check top embellished with a purple “T” and a purple bow. The skirt is dark purple with purple jelly splatter and jelly sandwich halves. On her feet are purple high tops.
Accessories
Food accessories include two lunch bags, a jar of peanut butter, a jar of jelly, and two sandwiches. The sandwiches are heart-shaped, dripping with jelly, and have wings.

The School Spirit playset includes Frankie Stein with a lunch cart, cafeteria table, and lots of food accessories.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long black & white striped hair pulled to the back and held with a yellow Skullette bow headband. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, black glasses, and red lips.
Her gray top has yellow trim and a yellow “F” on the chest. The complementary shorts are blue plaid with yellow lightning bolts. Accessories consist of a yellow tote and yellow high tops.
Lunch Set
The four-wheeled food cart is a yellow-green with a Monster High crest and spiderweb accent. The purple backdrop has a shingled awning and an image with lots of food items.
The combination table and bench has a tubular silver frame. The table top and bench are tan.
Accessories
Accessories consist of two lunch bags, two lunch trays, two cups with straws, two sandwich halves, and a variety of foods and creepy desserts.
Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair with her pointy ears poking out the top. She has a light brown complexion, red lips, and a purple dress with long sleeves. She is squishy and about 2 inches tall.

Cleo has straight brown hair with streaks of yellow and a yellow headband. Her tan complexion is complemented by deep pink lips, a gem on her cheek, and mummy wrapped arms. Her turquoise dress is sleeveless and has a flared hem. She is squishy and about 2 inches tall.
Draculaura has straight black hair with blunt bangs and pigtails in the back. She has a pale pink complexion, pink lips, and a long sleeve pink dress. She is squishy and about 2 inches tall.

Frankie has long white hair with four black streaks on top. Her pale green complexion is complemented by red lips and a steel blue dress with short puffy sleeves. She is squishy and about 2 inches tall.
Lagoona has long yellow blonde hair with lots of curls and a flower accent. She has pale blue skin, pink lips, and a 3/4 sleeve turquoise dress. The figure is squishy and about 2 inches tall.

Skelita has black feathered back hair with orange highlights in the front. She has a white complexion with bony accents, bright red lips, and a sleeveless gray dress with a patchy skirt. The figure is squishy and about 2 inches tall.

Skelita has long wavy black hair with orange streaks. She is pale with bony features, blue eyeshadow, red lips, and sugar skull makeup.
Her outfit begins with a sleeveless black top that has purple and pink piping and a gray floral print. What really stands out is her layered skirt made up of colorful patches.
Accessories consist of an orange statement necklace and a double stitched orange belt. On her feet are strappy green skull sandals.

Aqua-Batic Diving has 73 pieces that create a diving board, aquarium, trophy display, and a Lagoona Blue figure.
Playset
The blue diving board has translucent blue spiderweb rails and a black base. Next to the board is a chartreuse clothes rod with a white hangar.
The aquarium has blue glass, a bluish-black case with coral pink accents, and a translucent blue spiderweb on the top. Inside the tank are three coral pink fish and a green water plant.
The back of the rotating aquarium has a coral pink stand that holds a gold Skullette trophy. Behind the stand is a picture of Lagoona and two gold award ribbons.
Lagoona Blue
Lagoona has yellow-blonde hair with turquoise streaks that is held in a high ponytail with a pink band. She has pale turquoise skin, green eyes, purple eyebrows, purple eyeshadow, pink lips, and freckles. On her calves are turquoise fins.
Her one-piece swimsuit is black with a magenta Monster High emblem on the chest. Over the suit is a light blue cropped vest and a pink skirt. She accessorizes with blue swim goggles and blue wedges.

Booo-tique Shopping has 59 pieces that create a shopping boutique and a Draculaura figure.
Booo-tique Shopping
The boutique has a mirror and a display rack of clothing. The mirror is framed in black and light blue with a snake decoration. It is topped by a pink spiderweb with a Skullette. Displayed on the mirror is Draculaura’s vampire reflection.
The clothes rack is black with pink accents and has rotating blue and gray hooks. It is topped by a Count Fabulous statue. Clothing displayed include a white scarf, silver layered skirt, and a pink skirt with a light blue Skullette belt.
Draculaura
Draculaura has long black pigtailed hair with pink streaks. She has pale pink skin, lavender eyes with pink shadow, red fanged lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her outfit has a pink tank top with fanged hearts and a black skirt. She accessorizes with a multi-strand necklace, white bracelet, pink iCoffin, and a gold Skullette tote. On her feet are pink pumps with black knee highs.

This playset has 60 pieces that create a Venus McFlytrap figure and Chewlian, her pet Venus flytrap.
Chewlian
Chewlian is green with yellow-green accents and leaves, white teeth, a pink mouth, and orange roots. His leaves move and his mouth can open and close.
With Chewlian is a purple watering can and a section of purple wrought iron fence. Next to the fence is a translucent green skull on a black pole.
Venus McFlytrap
Venus has bright pink hair with green streak highlights. She has light green skin, blue eyes, pink shadow, and red prickly lips.
Her cropped blue vest is over a black top with a green ivy print. They are complemented by a pink skirt with black shorts.
She accessorizes with a silver multi-bangle bracelet and a green iCoffin. On her feet are pink sneakers with green vine laces that go up her legs.

The playset has 319 pieces that create a scaris wheel and a ticket booth. Cleo de Nile and Deuce Gorgon figures are also included.
Carnival
The scaris wheel is purple with lime green accents and translucent webs. The three seats are decorated with magenta skulls. 
A black wrought iron gate guards the stairs of the Ferris wheel and a sign leads the way. The sign has a skeletal magenta arm, a skull top, and displays the minimum height to ride.
The ticket booth has a chartreuse counter and an arched roof held by magenta wrought iron. A Monster High sign and a skull decorate the top and a creepy tree branch sticks out the side. 
Accessories include a candy apple, soft pretzel, and a selfie pic of Cleo and Deuce.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has long black hair with streaks of gold that is pulled to the back with a gold headband. She has a tan complexion, light blue eyes with purple shadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek.
She is wearing a a pale green top with wavy teal lines. A black skirt with a gold peplum covers her tan shorts. 
A gold statement necklace, blue multi-bangle bracelet, and tan bandage sandals accessorize the outfit.
Deuce Gorgon
Deuce has green scaled hair with a mohawk made of snakes. He is wearing his signature outfit.
He has on a black & white striped vest over a red t-shirt with a a skull and cassette graphic. They are complemented by black pants with a white belt that has a red cassette buckle. 
Accessories consist of red sunglasses, black & white checkered loafers, a black bracelet, and a black glove on his left hand.

Drama Class has 162 pieces that create a theater stage and an Ari figure.
Theater Stage
The turquoise stage has gray bricks, red curtains, and light gray pillars topped with Comedy and Tragedy masks. The top of the stage has a purple peak decorated with Skullettes.
Stage accessories include colored lights, candles, and an easel with an Ari Hauntington sign. Props consist of a tombstone, a creepy black tree, and a rotating arm that changes from the sun to the moon.
Ari Hauntington
Ari has long wavy pink hair with braided strands in the front. She has pale white skin, magenta eyebrows, pink eyes with pink shadow, and magenta lips.
Her outfit features a sleeveless purple dress with a chain graphic. At her waist is a magenta train and under the dress are gray shorts.
Accessories consist of a magenta statement necklace and purple wedges with chain straps winding up her legs.

The Fangtastic Photo Day has 164 pieces that create a photo booth and a dressing room.
Photo Booth
The black and purple booth features two interchangeable backdrops, photo lights held with skeletal arms, and a camera. Additional details include purple webs, candles, a yellow skull, Monster High poster, and a photo of Draculaura.
When the booth is unfolded it creates a dressing room. The room has a coffin closet and a vanity that has Draculaura’s reflection in the mirror. Hanging from the clothes rack is a pink skirt and a grey top.
Draculaura
Draculaura has black hair and pigtails with streaks of pink. Her pale pink complexion is accentuated by her lavender eyes, pink shadow, fanged red lips, and the heart on her cheek.
She wears a pink top with black details and an angular black skirt with a pink underlayer. Accessories include a black scarf, blue bracelet, and a pink iCoffin phone. On her feet are black  knee high boots with purple hearts and pink soles.

This Fear Squad set has 65 pieces that create bleachers and figures of Abbey Bominable, Cleo de Nile, and Venus McFlytrap.
Playset
The playset has purple bleachers with chartreuse seats and a variety of cheerleading extras. There is a pink megaphone, pink and a white pompoms, a megaphone sign, fearleader sign, a blue bottle, and a gold bat trophy. Special pieces are also included that allow the figures to perform a pyramid cheer.
Figures
Abbey, Cleo, and Venus are wearing matching fearleading outfits. The outfits are black with a Monster High emblem on the chest and pink trim on the neckline, waist, and skirt hem.
Abbey Bominable
Abbey has white hair with a streak of pink and a streak of blue. She has pale blue skin, pink eyes with pink shadow, purple eyebrows, and pink fanged lips. Her accessories consist of a silver headband, a blue multi-bangle bracelet, and furry white boots.
Cleo de Nile
Cleo has black hair with gold streaks that is pulled into a high ponytail with a gold band. She has a tan complexion with blue eyes, purple eyeshadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek. Her accessories include a gold multi-bangle bracelet and gold sneaker with black laces and white soles.
Venus McFlytrap
Venus has pink hair with green streaks that is worn in a ponytail. She has pale green skin, blue eyes with pink shadow, and fanged red lips. Her accessories consist of a green multi-bangle bracelet and pink sneakers with white soles and green vine laces that run up her legs.

The playset has 68 pieces that create a cafe and a Frankie Stein figure.
Fright Roast Cafe
The cafe has a gray wall with a coffee maker, table, and menu board. The coffee maker is magenta and gray with blue accents, skull spouts, and a burning candle. With the coffee maker are two pink mugs.
The attached table is blue with green snake legs. Next to the table is the blackboard menu. It is surrounded by yellow tubing and a yellow spiderweb. The menu wall rotates to reveal a Skullette and an image of Frankie.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair with streaks of black. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, red lips, and stitches on her cheek.
Her outfit has a blue top with elbow length sleeves and a stitched diamond print. It is complemented by a black skirt.
Accessories consist of a blue headband, yellow scarf, silver bracelet, green apron, and a blue iCoffin. On her feet are silver wedges.

The Monsterific Booster Pack has 148 pieces that create a chair, coffee table, TV, fireplace, and a Clawdeen Wolf figure.
Playset
The swirly black chair has a high back, purple armrests, and a magenta cushion. With the chair is a coffin-shaped coffee table that is black with a magenta top and a purple base.
For entertainment, there is a flat screen TV with a Monster High scene on the screen. It sits on a black and gray stand with a magenta top.
The fireplace is swirly black and gray with purple accents and a white Skullette on the chimney. Protruding from one side is a creepy black tree with magenta sprouts.
Room decorations include skull candles, a flask, remote, and more.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with streaks of chartreuse. Her brown complexion is complemented by yellow eyes, purple eyeshadow, and red fanged lips.
She is wearing a black top with jagged green stripes and a green double-layer skirt. Accessories consist of a pink multi-bangle bracelet and purple pumps with black knee highs.

Soaring Snowboard has 20 pieces that create a snowboard and an Abbey Bominable figure.
Snowboard
The lavender snowboard has a purple nose and a white tail. The deck is pink and can be used as a stand for Abbey.
Abbey Bominable
Abbey has long white hair with a blue and a purple streak. Her light blue complexion is highlighted by lavender eyes, purple eyeshadow, and fanged pink lips.
Her outfit features a white long sleeve top decorated with pink and blue triangle trees. A blue vest and black pants complete the look.
Accessories include a silver headband and a pink iCoffin phone. Keeping her warm are furry white wrist cuffs and boots.

Stitchin’ Style has 23 pieces that create a sewing machine and a Clawdeen Wolf figure.
Sewing Machine
The black and purple sewing machine is detailed with a white Skullette. It rests upon a yellow table with an ornate pink leg.
Clawdeen Wolf
Clawdeen has long brown hair with curls and purple highlights. Her light brown complexion is enhanced by her yellow eyes and fanged red lips.
She is wearing a lovely green dress decorated with a cheetah print. A black vest and purple shorts complement the outfit.
Accessories consist of a purple bracelet and a purple iCoffin phone. On her feet are black pumps.

Voltageous Science Lab has 25 pieces that create a lab table and a Frankie Stein figure.
Lab Table
The blue table is held up by translucent yellow legs that are supported by a black base. On the table is a beaker that is being heated by a flame.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has long white hair with lovely black streaks. She has pale green skin, one blue and one green eye, pink lips, and stitches under one eye.
Her black dress is accentuated by a blue Skullette belt and a yellow tie with a lightning bolt design. Black knee-high stockings and blue wedge pumps finish the ensemble.
Accessories consist of a yellow multi-bangle bracelet and a silver iCoffin phone.

dolls.character: Catty Noir, Clawdeen Wolf, Cleo de Nile, Draculaura, Frankie Stein, Twyla, Venus McFlytrap & Deuce Gorgon
dolls.description:
This 8-pack features Season 2 figures that include the exclusive Gem Ghouls Draculaura and Gem Ghouls Frankie.
Candy Ghouls Venus McFytrap
Mini Venus has sparkly green hair with a hot pink streak. She has pale yellow-green skin, teal blue eyes outlined with black dangling dots, and a prickly smile. Her light blue outfit has white polka dots and a sparkly flower. Green shoes are on her feet.
Candy Ghouls Catty Noir
Mini Catty has glittery pink hair and a dark gray complexion. She has pink eyes with music notes and a small pink nose. Her blue top has white stripes and a light blue lollipop. Magenta shoes are on her feet.
Fruit Ghouls Cleo De Nile
Mini Cleo has straight red hair with a brown headband and leafy accents. She has tan skin, blue eyes with diamond sparkles, and a turquoise diamond on her right cheek. Her red jumpsuit is decorated with a halved apple.
Fruit Ghouls Deuce Gorgon
Mini Deuce has a yellow scaled scalp with a green snake mohawk. He has green eyes with diamond accents behind yellow glasses. His outfit features a yellow sleeveless shirt with crisscrossed lines and a pineapple graphic. His pants are green.
Gem Ghouls Draculaura
Mini Draculaura is translucent with angular features. She has pink pigtailed hair with turquoise streaks and bangs, pink skin, spiky purple eyes, and a black heart on her cheek. Her black dress is decorated with a turquoise bow and belt. On her feet are black shoes.
Gem Ghouls Frankie Stein
Mini Frankie is translucent with angular features. She has long white hair with a blue streak, green streak, and a pink accent. She has pale green skin, stitches on her cheek, and one blue and one green spiky eye. Her outfit consists of a black dress with a purple lightning bolt and black shoes.
Mermaid Ghouls Clawdeen Wolf
Mini Clawdeen has pink curled hair with a streak of green. Her brown complexion is complemented by brown eyes with crescent moon accents and a fanged smile. She wears a sleeveless pink top with a zigzag graphic. Her lower fish body has green scales and a pink tailfin.
Mermaid Ghouls Twyla
Mini Twyla has light aquamarine hair with purple curls. Her pink complexion is complemented by purple eyes with buggy sparkles. She is wearing a single sleeve top that is purple with a black web design. Her lower fish body has light aquamarine scales and a purple tailfin.

The Mini playset features the Monster High school and the exclusive figure, Original Ghouls Draculaura with suspenders.
High School
The high school has lavender walls, multiple purple floors, and coffin-shaped windows. There is a Creepateria, library, bathroom, study, and clock tower.
The Creepateria has a blue stove with a silver lid that reveals monstrous food. The library has a secret entrance hidden by the rotating bookcase. Next to the library is a pink swing.
Purple stairs lead to the second floor and the bathroom with a silver monster toilet. Flushing the toilet pops the lid which will knock off a mini figure.
The study has a desk, blue book, and a bench. At the edge is a pink skeletal arm holding a chalk board.
At the top of the school is the clock tower. It has web designs, out-of-order numbers, and irregular pink arms with a Skullette accent.
Draculaura
Mini Draculaura has black hair with pink streaks and a pink bow. She has pale skin, purple eyes, a fanged smile, and a heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a pink top with blue heart buttons and a blue bow tie. Black pants, suspenders, and pink shoes complete the outfit.

Mini Catty has glittery pink hair and a dark gray complexion. She has pink eyes with music notes and a small pink nose. 
Her blue top has white stripes and a light blue lollipop. Magenta shoes are on her feet.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

Mini Venus has sparkly green hair with a hot pink streak. She has pale yellow-green skin, teal blue eyes outlined with black dangling dots, and a prickly smile. 
Her light blue outfit has white polka dots and a sparkly flower. Green shoes are on her feet.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

Mini Avea is all black and decorated with pastel colors. She has aqua blue highlights, aqua blue eyes, and a pink nose.
Her outfit has a red collar, red trim, and buttons. Her horse body has purple speckles on the back leg and blue highlights on the tail.

Mini Cleo is all black and decorated with pastel colors. She has yellow stripes in her hair and a light blue headband. Her eyes are light blue and her nose is a yellow dot. 
She has yellow stripes on her body and legs. Additional light blue stripes are by her feet.

Mini Frankie is all black and decorated with pastel colors. She has blue and turquoise streaks in her hair, a blue dot nose, and stitches on her cheek. One eye is turquoise and the other is blue.
Her outfit has a blue lightning tie, a turquoise waist, and stitch details.

Mini Lagoona is all black and decorated with pastel colors. She has aquamarine highlights, eyes, and nose.
Her outfit is decorated with a pink seashell on the chest. Aquamarine cuffs are on the sleeves and pink cuffs are by her feet.

Mini Rochelle is completely black with pastel coloring. She has sky blue eyes outlined with lashes, a button nose, and pink streaks in her hair.
Her outfit is trimmed in pink and features a fleur-de-lis on the front. White shoes complete the look.

Mini Twyla is all black and decorated with pastel colors. She has pink streaks in her hair, magenta eyes, and a magenta nose.
Her outfit has aquamarine lines and details and the top is decorated with a pink bug. Pink shoes are on her feet.

Mini Ari is light purple with purple hair decorated with grape details and green streaks. She has blue eyes with grape sparkles and a thin smile.
Her dress is black with a green collar, grape graphics, and a blue hem. Blue shoes complete the outfit.

Mini Cleo has straight red hair with a brown headband and leafy accents. She has tan skin, blue eyes with diamond sparkles, and a turquoise diamond on her right cheek. Her red jumpsuit is decorated with a halved apple.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

Mini Deuce has a yellow scaled scalp with a green snake mohawk. He has green eyes with diamond accents behind yellow glasses. 
His outfit features a yellow sleeveless shirt with crisscrossed lines and a pineapple graphic. His pants are green.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

Mini Gigi has a long green high-top ponytail and pink hair with grape details. She has light skin, green eyes with grape accents, long lashes, and a crooked smile.
Her black outfit has red trim and features a grapes graphic on the chest. On her feet are pink shoes with jagged green trim.

Mini Lagoona is light turquoise with yellow hair decorated with a pineapple design. She has one teal eye, one winking eye, teal freckles, and a crooked smile.
Her top is yellow with brown lines and a green collar that create a pineapple graphic. A black skirt and yellow shoes complete the look.

Mini Rochelle has long pink hair with yellow streaks, yellow bangs, and a lemon wedge graphic. She has speckled light gray skin, closed eyes with gray shadow, and small pink lips.
Her yellow dress has a black neckline and a skirt with fruit wedge details. On her feet are black shoes with yellow socks.

Mini Toralei has orange-red hair with an orange slice graphic. She has light orange skin, green eyes with orange wedge sparkles, and an angled smile.
Her orange top has features a white wedge patter. The outfit is completed by a black skirt and orange shoes.

Mini Abbey has white hair with pink highlights and a baby blue headband. She has powder blue skin, magenta eyes with snowflake sparkles, and a fanged mouth. Her pink glasses have snowflake details.
She is wearing a white collared shirt, pink suspenders, and pink pants with black pyramid stripes. On her feet are light pink shoes with black laces.

Mini Catty is dark gray with pink curly hair. She has pink eyes with music note accents, an open smiling mouth, and wears white glasses with pink star details.
Her outfit is gray with pink stars and a white collared shirt. She completes the look with pink shoes.

Mini Clawdeen has long brown hair with curls and green swirls. She has a brown complexion, one winking and one brown eye, and a fanged smile.
Her white collared shirt has red trim and crescent moon buttons. A green skirt with tiger stripes, black shoes, and black glasses with crescent moon accents complete the look.

Mini Frankie has white hair with black streaks and a blue headband. She has has pale green skin and one green and one blue eye with hex nut sparkles. Over her eyes are yellow glasses with lightning frames.
Her geeky outfit features a collared white shirt with a yellow tie and lightning bolt suspenders. The look is completed with a blue skirt and black shoes.

Mini Moanica has long hair that is half pink and half yellow-green. She is pale gray with an open smile and aquamarine eyes that have biohazard sparkles. Her glasses are pink with radiation symbols.
She is wearing a pink top with yellow-green diamonds and a white collar. A black skirt and black shoes with pink laces complete her nerdy look.

Mini Draculaura is translucent with angular features. She has pink pigtailed hair with turquoise streaks and bangs, pink skin, spiky purple eyes, and a black heart on her cheek. 
Her black dress is decorated with a turquoise bow and belt. On her feet are black shoes.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

Mini Frankie is translucent with angular features. She has long white hair with a blue streak, green streak, and a pink accent. She has pale green skin, stitches on her cheek, and one blue and one green spiky eye. 
Her outfit consists of a black dress with a purple lightning bolt and black shoes.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

dolls.series: Glow in the Dark Ghouls Minis
dolls.description:
Mini Catrine has long medium-purple hair with a streak of pink and magenta. She has pale gray skin, black eyes with bow accents, and a pink nose and mouth.
Her pink outfit is decorated with bone details and the rib cage has purple bows. A black skirt with purple squares completes the look.

dolls.series: Glow in the Dark Ghouls Minis
dolls.description:
Mini Draculaura has pink hair with black streaks. It is worn in pigtails and decorated with a black & white bone heart bow. She has a pale pink complexion, big black eyes with long lashes and heart sparkles, a fanged smile, and a heart on her cheek.
Her outfit is all pink with bone details and a baby blue skirt. The rib cage graphic has a baby blue heart.

dolls.series: Glow in the Dark Ghouls Minis
dolls.description:
Mini Lagoona is light turquoise with yellow blonde hair that has a pink curl. She has black eyes with starfish sparkles and teal freckles.
Her turquoise outfit is decorated with bone details. The rib cage graphic features a pink octopus.

dolls.series: Glow in the Dark Ghouls Minis
dolls.description:
Mini Venus has long green hair with pink highlights and curled ends. She has a green complexion, black eyes with swirl accents, and a prickly smile.
Her black outfit is decorated with bone details. The rib cage graphic has a wiggly Venus flytrap.

Mini Ari has violet hair with lavender highlights. She has a shimmery complexion, violet eyes with music note accents, and black lashes.
Her top is pink and decorated with bubbles. She has a lavender mermaid body that transitions to a black and violet tail fin.

Mini Catty has curly pink and orange ombre hair. Her dark gray skin is complemented by pink eyes with music note accents.
She wears a shiny silver top decorated with a spiderweb print and a pink star. Her mermaid body is yellow and transitions into a pink tail fin.

Mini Clawdeen has pink curled hair with a streak of green. Her brown complexion is complemented by brown eyes with crescent moon accents and a fanged smile. 
She wears a sleeveless pink top with a zigzag graphic. Her lower fish body has green scales and a pink tailfin.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

Mini Cleo has black and teal ombre hair with a gold headband. She has tan skin, blue eyes with lashes and diamond accents, and a diamond on her cheek.
Her sleeveless blue top is decorated with gold “V” stripes. She has a golden mermaid body that transitions into a blue tail fin.

Mini Draculaura has pink hair that transitions to black on her pigtails. In her hair is a light blue heart bow. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, a fanged smile, and a heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a sleeveless white top with heart buttons and a light blue scalloped collar. Her mermaid body is pink.

Mini Twyla has light aquamarine hair with purple curls. Her pink complexion is complemented by purple eyes with buggy sparkles. 
She is wearing a single sleeve top that is purple with a black web design. Her lower fish body has light aquamarine scales and a purple tailfin.
The figure can be found in the Minis 8-Pack.

Mini Avea has aqua blue hair pulled into a ponytail. She has lavender skin and blue eyes with big lashes and wing details.
Her salmon pink jacket features four black buttons and black trim. She has black wings, a purple horse body with light purple spots, and an aqua blue tail.

Mini Draculaura has black hair with pigtails, pink streaks in her bangs, and a pink bow. Her pale pink complexion is complemented by purple eyes with heart accents, a crooked fanged smile, and a heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a pink top with blue heart buttons and a pink bow tie. Her black pants have suspenders and pink shoes are on her feet.
Draculaura is an exclusive figure included with the Minis High School Playset.

Mini Abbey has white hair adorned with violet net highlights and a hockey stick and puck graphic. She has light blue skin, plum eyes with snowflake sparkles, and a fanged open mouth.
Her violet uniform has black trim and details, a “13” on the chest, and pink and black stripes on the sleeves and pants. Black shoes with white laces complete the outfit.

Mini Deuce has a green scaled scalp with a yellow patch that has green lines. On top of his head is a mohawk full of green snakes. He has a light complexion, green eyes with diamond accents, and wears red glasses.
His outfit features a black sleeveless shirt with “13” and red lines with dashed accents. His pants are black with a white waist and his shoes are black with white laces.

Mini Draculaura has pink hair with black net accent streaks. In her hair is a black heart bow. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, a fanged smile, and a pink heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a black, white, and pink top with a graphic of tennis rackets. Her uniform is completed with black shorts and black shoes.

Mini Robecca has long black hair with violet and lavender streaks. She has coppery brown skin, forehead line and dots, closed eyes with purple shadow, and an open smile.
Her magenta cheerleader outfit features blue and light blue drippy graphics with “MHS” and a gear on the chest. On her feet are hot pink shoes with black laces.

Mini Venus has green hair with pink highlights and ball details. Her light green complexion is complemented by green eyes with swirl accents, black lashes, and a prickly smile.
She wears a black uniform with “13”, vines, pink graphics, and a white waist. On her feet are black sneakers with white laces.

Mini Abbey has pink and white side-swept bangs. She has powder blue skin, purple eyes with snowflake sparkles, a fanged smile, and a snowflake on her cheek.
Her teddy bear costume is a patchwork of bright blue and white. It has pink buttons and a purple snowflake graphic on the chest.

Mini Catrine has side-swept hair that is blue with a streak of lavender. She has a pale complexion, blue eyes with bow accents, and a bow on her cheek.
Her teddy bear costume is a patchwork of slate blue and lavender. It has silver buttons and a graphic of a bow on her chest.

Mini Clawdeen has swept bangs that are brown, green, and pink. She has brown skin, brown eyes with crescent moon sparkles, a fanged smile, and a crescent moon on her cheek.
Her teddy bear costume is a patchwork of yellow and purple. It has gold hex buttons, a crescent moon on the chest, and stuffing leaking out of the seams.

Mini Jinafire has green bangs with a streak of black. She has golden skin, big green eyes with diamond accents, a crooked smile, and a fan on her cheek.
Her teddy bear costume is a patchwork of crimson and pink. It has gold buttons and a fan graphic on the chest.

Mini Venus has side-swept bangs striped light and dark green. She has light green skin, aquamarine eyes, a prickly smile, and a Venus flytrap on her cheek.
Her teddy bear costume is a patchwork of pink and green. It has gold button bolts and a Venus flytrap graphic on the chest.

Cleo has black hair pulled into a top bun with her blunt bangs streaked blue and teal. She is tan with turquoise eyes, gold and blue eyeshadow, pink lips, and a gem on her cheek.
Her ballet dress is turquoise with a colorful print and a single black tulle shoulder strap. The skirt consists of strips with two tulle under layers; one pink and one black. 
Accessories consist of a gold tiara, gold decorative body armor, blue bandage wrist wraps, and a gold ribbon wand. On her feet are golden slippers with inverted pyramid pedestals and straps that wind up to her knees.

Draculaura has black hair with pink highlights pulled into a high curled ponytail. She is pale pink with purple eyes, pink eyeshadow, light blue liner, fanged pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.
Her bodice has a sweetheart neckline, pink & light blue stripes, and black winged hearts. The pink skirt features a spiderweb print with blue bow designs and small heart dots. Under the skirt are two tulle layers: one pink and one black.
Accessories consist of a pink tiara, a black ascot, black spiderweb bracelets, light blue leg warmers, and a pink bouquet of roses. Around her waist is a pink belt with a winged heart buckle. On her feet are pink slippers with bat wing pedestals.

Moanica has lavender hair with streaks of bright green styled into a double-curl updo. She has a gray complexion with green eyes, pink & copper eyeshadow, and magenta lips.
Her pink & purple print dress is decorated with green designs and yellow biohazard symbols. The skirt has a jagged hem and two tulle under layers; one green and one black.
Accessories consist of a skeletal flower tiara, a pink studded choker & belt harness, spiked purple wrist wraps, and a black masquerade mask. On her feet are purple platforms with bone details and spiked straps that wind up her legs.

Cleo has long black hair with teal streaks that is pulled back and held with a yellow “POW” hair band. She is tan with turquoise eyes, silver shadow, and pink lips. A star and dots decorate one eye and a turquoise gem is on her cheek.
Her sleeveless dress has teal acrylic shoulders, a black back and bodice, and a yellow front with a comic book print. The print has “BAM”, pink gems, Skullette mummies, speech bubbles with yellow gems, and pink polka dots. 
On her feet are yellow double-strap pumps with cutout exclamation bubbles for heels.

Draculaura has long black hair with pink streaks that is in a high ponytail. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, and fanged dark pink lips. A star and dots enhance one eye and a red heart is on her cheek.
Her sleeveless dress has a red collar, ruffled red acrylic shoulders, and a pink back. The blue front features a print with “Ha!”, speech bubbles, fanged hearts, and polka dot hearts. On her feet are pink double-strap pumps with cutout speech bubbles for heels.
Draculaura accessorizes with a speech bubble handbag that is plum colored and decorated with heart indents and a fanged heart.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black and white. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, pink shadow, and bright red lips. Under one eye is a blue star and dots.
Her sleeveless dress has a blue collar, yellow acrylic shoulders, and a blue back. The front is white with blue polka dots and a print of scissors, Skullettes, lightning bolts, and word bubbles with “POW” and ZAAAP”.
Frankie accessorizes with “BAM” speech bubble earrings; one blue and one yellow. On her feet are yellow booties with cutout lightning speech bubble heels.

Lagoona has yellow blonde hair with streaks of turquoise pulled into a ponytail. Her pale turquoise skin is complemented by turquoise eyes, pink shadow, freckles, and hot pink lips. A pink star and dots are under one eye.
She wears a sleeveless dress adorned with a turquoise back and an acrylic turquoise overlaid hem. The pink front features a print with “WOW”, fish bone thought bubbles, Skullettes, and turquoise polka dots. On her feet are pink pumps with bubble accents and heels with “WOW” thought bubbles.
Lagoona accessorizes with a thought bubble handbag that is chartreuse and decorated with an embossed fish bone.

Ari has big, puffy, and curly lavender hair streaked with magenta curls. She has pale translucent skin, light purple eyes, pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, and pink lips.
Her music themed dress has a green & white striped top decorated with keyboard stripes. The green, blue, and purple ombre skirt features sheet music and chain designs. A green band and a black tulle peplum is around her waist.
Ari accessorizes with a translucent blue fan, a magenta bag with chain strap, and translucent blue strappy chain shoes with tea cup bases. Translucent tea time accessories consist of a purple tray holding a magenta sugar dish and a floating yellow teapot.

Clawdeen has long brown hair with a central purple streak pulled into a high ponytail. Her brown complexion is complemented by yellow eyes with purple shadow and fanged pink lips.
She wears a white & pink leopard print top decorated with desserts, tea cups, plates, and silverware. The purple & black skirt features letters that spell out “beast” and other monsterific words. The dress is completed by a purple waist and a black tulle peplum.
Accessories consist of purple sunglasses and translucent purple pumps adorned with spikes and claw heels. Tea time accessories include a pink tea pot and a translucent green floating cake in a dessert dome.

Lagoona has blonde hair with turquoise highlights held in a ponytail with a turquoise sea flower clip. She has pale turquoise skin, turquoise eyes, light purple eyeshadow, freckles on her cheeks, and light pink lips.
Her outfit features a pink tiered ruffled top with a black tulle neckline and black trim. The dark green pencil skirt has a print with green octopuses, coral pink fish, and other aquatic designs. On her feet are translucent pink shoes with ankle straps.
Lagoona has two tea time accessories. She has a translucent pink floating tea cup with a stirrer and a pink dessert. The dessert sits on a tiered stand that is translucent black and dripping.

Draculaura has black and dark pink hair with curled ends and blunt bangs. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, light blue eyeshadow, fanged red lips, and a baby blue heart on her cheek.
Her pajama dress features a magenta hood with black eyes and ears. The dress is light blue with pink and yellow polka dots, a pink heart on the chest, and a fluffy pink hem.  The blue, yellow, and pink striped sleeves have black bat wings. 
The second outfit is a pink dress decorated with graphics of blue monster faces, cobwebs, yellow fur balls, and bats. It has a black bat collar and a light blue hem.
Accessories consist of two pairs of shoes. There are light blue pumps with batty ankle straps and black knee high boots. The boots have drippy heels and winged bat-like collars.
Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat, is also included. He is pink with yellow eyes and a light blue bow on his head.

Twyla has aquamarine hair with a streak of purple & magenta. She has a lavender complexion with aqua blue eyes, blue eyeshadow, scalloped eyeliner, and hot pink lips.
Her plush pajamas are blue with a light blue patch and a pattern of pink specks and light blue spiders. The sleeves have black, pink, and light blue zigzag stripes and the furry pink hood has eyes and light blue ears. 
The second outfit is a sleeveless blue dress with light blue trim and a frilly light blue tulle hem. The dress is decorated with a print of monster faces, spiderwebs, spiders, and deep pink zigzags.
Two pairs of shoes are included. There is a pink pair of wedge pumps with studded pink accents and black boots with a monstrous face, toothy soles, and zigzag embossed heels.
Dustin, Twyla’s pet dust bunny, comes with the doll. He is purple with a blue nose and turquoise eyes, one is a button and the other is a line.

Venus has very long hair that is streaked green and pink with the right side shaved short and dyed pink. She has light green skin, light blue eyes with light shadow, and prickly pink lips.
Her pajama jumper is pink with a splatter print, black eyes, and a blue & white mouth patch on the stomach. It has zigzag striped sleeves that are pink, green, and black with light blue furry cuffs. The light blue hood has black eyes and green flytrap-like ears.
The second outfit is a light blue off-the-shoulder dress with pink straps, pink trim, and a serrated pink tulle hem. The dress is embellished with a print of cute monsters, Venus flytrap mouths, and black, pink, and green zigzag shapes.
Two pairs of shoes are included with the outfits. The first is a pink pair of booties with toothy platform soles and vine covered heels. The second pair are light blue boots with a monster face, toothy etched soles, claw heels, drippy accents, and Venus flytrap collars.
Chewlian, Venus’s pet Venus flytrap, comes with the doll. He is green with pointy teeth, black eyes, a mohawk of leaves, and sits in a pink pot.

Alivia has blue & black streaked hair with blunt bangs. It is held in a ponytail with a coral pink gear bow. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, pink lips, and silver bolts at her temples.
Her sleeveless orange dress features a blue & gray plaid print on the front. It is decorated with gears, yellow lightning bolts, and a blue ruffled hem. On her feet are black boots with thick platforms and stitch accents.
With Alivia is Gigawatt, her pet that is a mix of a mouse and a bunny. He is orange with stitches, green eyes, a turquoise patch around one eye, and one bunny and one mouse ear. Alivia can carry him around with her blue and coral pet carrier.

This playset includes a bunk bed, bedding, and accessories. Hanging out on the bed is Weredith, Pawla, and Packlyn Wolf.
Bunk Bed
The purple claw foot bunk bed has pink mattress boxes with bone details, light blue curtains with pink bows, and Skullette embellishments. It has a green bottom bunk and a black skeletal ladder that goes up to the yellow & black striped top bunk.
Bedding & Accessories
Bedding consists of a purple animal print blanket, two pink patchwork blankets, and three pillows: one blue, one pink, and one green. Accessories include a red book, a green monster rug, a turquoise teddy bear, and a lavender teddy bear.
Weredith Wolf
Weredith is a furry brown with dark brown ears, markings, and tail. She has big yellow eyes, small fangs, and a pink tuft with a blue bow. Her onesie is pink & blue striped with a bone print and a wolf graphic.
Pawla Wolf
Pawla has brown hair with streaks of turquoise that is pulled into a curly bun. She is a brown with yellow eyes, fanged pink lips, and freckles. Her pajama shorts and tank top are light turquoise with a paw print.
Packlyn Wolf
Packlyn is a furry light brown with dark brown ears, markings, and tail. She has big yellow eyes, small fangs, and a lavender tuft with a green bow. Her onesie is lavender striped with a bone print and a wolf graphic.

The Monster Family 2-pack features Draculaura and Fangelica preparing for a birthday celebration.
Draculaura
Draculaura has long black hair with streaks of pink. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes with plum shadow, fanged violet lips, and a red heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a black form-fitting dress with an ombre bat print. Magenta tulle details include the single shoulder and an asymmetrical peplum. A deep pink party hat and pink booties with swirly heels finish the outfit.
Fangelica
Fangelica has purple hair with streaks of black that is pulled into high pigtails. She has pink skin, magenta eyebrows, blue eyes with pink shadow, and fanged dark red lips. On her back are pink bat-like wings.
Her party dress is light blue with drippy purple stripes and a batty print. Accentuating the dress is a pink bat wing collar, a pink mesh peplum, and a bubble skirt. She completes the look with a light blue party hat and plum sneakers with thick wafer cone soles and drippy designs. 
Accessories
Birthday accessories include magenta balloons shaped like a heart and a Skullette, a slice of cake on a plate, and a purple present with a cutout bat-wing bow. Inside the present is a pink Count Fabulous figure.

In this Monster Family 2-pack, Frankie and Alivia are having a barbecue.
Frankie Stein
Frankie has black & white streaked hair worn in a high ponytail. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, chartreuse eyeshadow, and soft pink lips.
Her sleeveless dress is striped blue and white with a print of black stitched lines and watermelon wedges. Over the dress is a coral pink patchwork apron with a scalloped trim. On her feet are blue peep-toe pumps with lightning edge heels and grommeted buckle straps.
Alivia Stein
Alivia has blue & black streaked hair that is pulled back with bangs. She has pale bluish green skin, one green and one blue eye, pink lips, and silver bolts at her temples.
Her sleeveless dress is black in back and plaid in front. It is decorated with pulsing white lines and a colorful gear print. Pink straps, a frilly pink ascot collar, and a ruffled pink hem complete the dress. On her feet are stitched black boots with thick platforms.
Accessories
Barbecue accessories begin with a silver grill detailed with bolt handles and a screw pedestal. A blue tray holds three ears of corn which can be held by the skeletal hand-shaped tongs.

Howleen has pink & orange streaked hair with a parted bob cut. She has a tan complexion with yellow eyes and fanged pink lips.
Her sleeveless dress is black with a dotted print on the front that features colorful crossbones. It has a pink hem and is accessorized by a turquoise double-belt with safety pin and crossbone accents. On her feet are pink high tops. 
With Howleen is Cushion, her pet hedgehog. She is light beige with pink eyes, light blue quills, and a pink bow. Howleen can carry her around with her pink and turquoise pet carrier.

Ari has long straight hair that is streaked purple and magenta. She has pale translucent skin, light purple eyes, pink shadow, lavender eyeliner, and magenta lips.
Her molded lavender swimsuit has a floral print on the front that is teal, turquoise, and magenta with music note and teardrop accents. The print is separated by a wide magenta stripe with rows of lavender chains.
Ari is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Clawdeen has long brown hair with streaks of purple. Her brown skin is complemented by yellow eyes, pink shadow, lavender eyeliner, and fanged deep pink lips.
She wears a molded purple swimsuit with colorful dripping splatter that forms a Skullette, crossbones, a paw print, and a crescent moon. Additional details include a neckline with gold and black chains and a double strap belt at the waist.
Clawdeen is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, pink eyeshadow, light blue liner, red fanged lips, and a pink heart on her left cheek.
Her molded pink swimsuit has a sweetheart neckline and halterneck straps. The front is decorated with a blue spiderweb design and an ascot bow with a fanged black heart.
Draculaura is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Frankie has straight black hair with streaks of white. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, light pink eyeshadow, and red lips. On her right cheek are gray stitches. 
Her molded swimsuit is blue with black & white stripes, a red collar neckline, and a lightning bolt tie. Additional details consist of stitching, a yellow zigzag, and a “F” on the chest.
Frankie is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Lagoona has long yellow hair with streaks of turquoise. She has pale turquoise skin, teal eyes, pink eyeshadow, pink blush, freckles, and hot pink lips.
Her molded coral pink swimsuit is decorated with turquoise seahorses, pink fish skeletons, bubbles, and black & white details. The neckline features  a pink & turquoise scale print.
Lagoona is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Draculaura has black hair pulled into a ponytail and decorated with pink and yellow highlights. She has pale pink skin, yellow eyeshadow, purple eyes, fanged pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.
She is wearing a molded pink bodice adorned with a black bat wing neckline and a black & blue heart-shaped bow. Baby blue hearts run down the front and pink & blue ruffles trim the sides. 
The black skirt has a pink and blue heart print and a ruffled yellow tulle hem. The large train features a pink and black spiderweb mosaic design. On her feet are black pumps with heart accents, side cutouts, and knobby heels.
The front of the top has a lever that creates a brand new look. The bodice becomes a pink corset with yellow laces and black heart buttons. The lever hangs over the skirt and is decorated with black-winged pink hearts. Most importantly, the train extends upwards and transforms into wings

Lagoona has yellow blonde hair with coral pink streaks that is worn in a ponytail. Teal blue eyes, turquoise shadow, coral lips, and teal freckles complement her pale turquoise skin.
She is wearing a striped turquoise dress with a pink flower print and a coral pink hood with a hard plastic edge. The hood can be pulled down to her shoulders to create a cape-like shawl with black tulle frills. 
The dress can be pulled further down to her waist to reveal a molded sleeveless top that is black with coral pink, turquoise, and scales. The hood then acts as a layered skirt with a black tulle peplum.
Pulled even lower the dress becomes a shimmery scaled skirt that has a big coral pink hem with black tulle accents. Coral ankle-strap pumps accentuate each variation of the outfit.
The final transformation is into a mermaid. Pulled completely down, the dress gives Lagoona a black waist with a shimmery scaled tail and coral pink tail fins. Translucent wing-like coral fins are added to her back to complete the look.

Clawdeen has brown hair with purple highlights that hang in two long ponytails. She has tan skin, yellow eyes, pink eyeshadow, and fanged deep red lips.
She is wearing a molded black top detailed with gold zipper stripes, purple leopard print, and a wolf waist buckle. The purple fur collar is adorned with gold dots and a crescent moon.
Her purple skirt is decorated with diagonal rows made up of gold phases of the moon. The waist and hem are trimmed in black. On her feet are purple pumps with claw toes boxes, furry ankle straps, and howling wolves for heels.
Clawdeen’s molded gold train features moon phase cutouts, embossed howling wolves, and fluffy purple fur trim. When you swish her purple tail a golden wolf mask lowers over her face and her train flips up to create a lavish collar.

Mini Clawdeen has long brown hair with a lavender streak in the front. She has a brown complexion, brown eyes with crescent moon sparkles, and a fanged smile. Her turquoise dress features a graphic of Crescent. On her feet are purple shoes.
Crescent is purple with a black nose and orange eyes with crescent moon details. White markings stripe his eyes.

Mini Cleo has straight black hair with yellow streaks and a turquoise headband. She is tan with blue eyes and a turquoise gem on her cheek. Her purple outfit with black booties features a graphic of Hissette.
Hissette is turquoise with purple eyes. He wears a golden crown and a gold collar with a blue gem.

Mini Draculaura has pigtailed hair that is striped black and pink and decorated with a blue bow. She has purple eyes with heart sparkles, a thin smirk, and a heart on her cheek. Her pink outfit features a blue graphic of Count Fabulous. On her feet are black shoes.
Count Fabulous is black with big blue eyes and a pink bow on his head. He wears a pink shirt with a heart graphic.

Mini Frankie has white hair with black streaks in the front. She is pale green with one green and one blue eye, stitches on her cheek, and silver bolts in her neck. Her light blue outfit features a graphic of Watzit. On her feet are black shoes.
Watzit is tan with darker stitched patches, silver spikes on his head, and silver wings on his back. He has one green and one blue eye.

Mini Lagoona has yellow hair with a curl of coral pink. She has a pale turquoise complexion, teal freckles, and teal eyes with starfish sparkles. Her turquoise outfit features a Neptuna graphic.
Neptuna is coral pink with pink fins and face. He has turquoise eyes with seashell accents.

Pennywise is a Monster High doll inspired by the character from the IT Chapter Two film. She has lots of tightly curled orange hair and an intense stare. Her clown-themed face paint has black eyeliner, a red nose, and red lips.
She wears a stunning grey clown suit with a large tulle collar, billowy shoulders, frilled cuffs, a gathered organza skirt, and white-gloved hands. The sleeves and capri pants have metallic stripes and red pompoms decorate the bodice. Red accents embellish the waist, sleeves, and cuffs.
On her feet are grey and white lace-up boots. Each boot is detailed with a toothy platform and a red pompom on the toebox.
Accessories include a red balloon and a paper boat with “SS Georgie” on the side. This Skullector doll has 11 points of articulation and includes a doll stand. 
Dolls ordered from the Mattel Creations website also included a Pennywise print. The print is individually numbered and limited to 1300.
You'll float too, Ghoul...

Hiya, you in the Loser's Club, is my lurking a bit too freaky for you? Down in my gutter? You know what they say, one person's sewer is a clown's home sweet home. 
Don't you want to join me? Are you not intrigued by my killer style and my gore-geous smile?! You say you are fierce, that you are not afraid. Prove it.
Show me you are unique. Show me you are a monster too.
All you've got to do is float. Come on... we all float down here.

The Grady Twins are inspired by characters from the 1980 The Shining film. Each girl has big brown eyes, full lips, ad beautiful brown hair accentuated by an axe barrette.
They have matching outfits that feature babydoll dresses. Each light blue dress is detailed with white dots, sheer sleeves, and a pleated bodice. A pink ribbon with a bow is at the waist and white lace trims the collar, sleeves, and skirt.
On their feet are white knee-high stockings and black mary jane shoes. The shoes have green hedge-like platforms with animal-shaped heels.
Several accessories are included with the twins. There is a key to room 237, a page from Jack’s typewriter, and a tennis ball. These Skullector dolls have 11 points of articulation and include doll stands.
Dolls ordered from the Mattel Creations website also came with a Grady Twins print. The print is individually numbered and limited to 500.
Come play with us, ghoul...

Hello there. We see you playing ALL alone. We, of all ghouls, understand just how lonely this hotel can be... especially when it's monstrously snowy outside. Why don't you come play with us? We have been haunting these halls for ever and ever and ever, lurking for a guest like you to be our new beast friend. Somebody who can appreciate how scary-cute we are - mirror images, holding hands in our matching dresses. OH! Please don't ride your tricycle away! Maybe we can use this key to play a fangtastic game of hide-and-shriek in room 237?! We only hope you have a freaky-fab time here at your stay at the Overlook Hotel.

Beetlejuice and Lydia are Monster High dolls inspired by the 1988 Beetlejuice movie.
Beetlejuice
Beetlejuice looks frighteningly amazing with wild bright green hair, big blue eye, and deep red lips. Complementing her pale white complexion is purple eyeshadow and light green blush.
Her outfit begins with a black & white striped suit with a white collar, black tie, and a wide black belt. The back of the jacket has a jagged trim and a multi-layered tail. One layer is a messy black lace and the other is a semi see-through purple print.
Completing the look is a black & white carousel hat with batty accents, sandworm earrings, and black booties. One boot’s heel is of Barbara in her scary visage and the other heel is of Adam with his scary transformation.
Lydia Deetz
Lydia has straight black hair, big brown eyes, lavender eyeshadow, and full lips. Her mostly black gothic ensemble features a lovely black dress with a shiny vine print.
Accentuating the outfit is a a wide-brimmed hat, black nylons, and black shoes. The heels of the shoes are Beetlejuice in snake form.
Accessories include a camera for Lydia and a copy of the Handbook for the Recently Deceased. Each Skullector doll has 11 points of articulation and 2 doll stands are included.
The dolls were available from the Mattel Creations website.
Beetlejuice... Beetlejuice... Beetle...

C'mon, ghoul, it's showtime! Say my name three times and we'll be compadres, amigos, BFFs. I'll show you the ropes about being a ghost, and you help me get back to the land of the living. Whaddaya say? If only more of the recently deceased were like my goth-to bestie, Lydia. You gotta love her pitch dark sense of fashion. It's totally to die-for. She has some scary good, calypso moves, too. So stop acting grave and just say it. Together, we're gonna be the best bio-exorcist team this podunk Winter River village has ever seen.

Greta Gremlin is a Monster High doll inspired by the Gremlins 2 movie. She has long and luscious green hair and lovely green skin. Her big green eyes, silver shadow, and full red lips complement her complexion.
She wears a black and purple leopard print dress with a shredded hem and black tulle underlayer. Over the dress is a fabulous red pleather jacket with a furry collar and silver accents. Completing the look are spiked green stilettos accentuated by red flowers.
Accessories begin with large hoop earrings, a red flower hair clip, and a tube of red lipstick. Hanging from her shoulder is a black heart-shaped purse that features an image of Spike, the leader of the gremlins.
Greta comes with Gizmo, the small but adorable Mogwai. A stand is also included with the doll.
The doll was available from the Mattel Creations website.
How about a smooch?

Don't be shocked by my outrageously glam hair and freaky fab fashion - Gizmo and I are about the ghoulest pair you'll ever meet. Sure, I used to be a basic gremlin, but after sipping the "Splice O' Life" Lab's secret potion... Hello, Glow up! Now I am drop dead gore-geous. Especially when I reach into my killer purse, swipe on some fierce red lipstick, and pucker up for a big kiss. So whaddaya say? Let's cut to the chase, grab Gizmo, and run out of here before this lab explodes. Then we'll live happily ever after - until death do us part.
